Interopank kam hartsakanchakan nsan (‽) (angl.` interrobang), 1960-1970-akan thwakannerin amyerikyan tibvokrafikajowm
 amyerikyan tibokrafikayvovm sahmanapak pvordzarakan kirarovtjvovn ownyeca& kyetadrakan nshan Kcagir (likatovra) e, vorn irenits nerkayatsryel
 orn iryenits nyerkayacrel e hartsakan yev patsakan4akan nshanneri vradrvovm: SHaghmati nsagrovtyan myedj «!?» nsanakovm e kajl, orn argani
 nsanakowm e qajl, orn argani e owshadrovthjan, isk «?!»-@` kaskacyeli qajl.PatmowthjvownNshane 1962 twakanin styeghtsel e New York Advertising
 New York Advertising Agency kovazdajin kor&akalvovtyan xekavar Martin Sbyektre haxvordyelov hajtnakortsowthyan masin ir syepakan
 haytnakortsowtyan masin ir syepakan «TYPEtalks Magazine» amsagrvovm. Ayn naxatyesva& er nshanakelvov hryetorakan harc@, orn anklyerenowm myecamasamp
 anglerenvovm me&amasamp (hatkapyes myekvovsatsa&, ajsinkn` voc tekstayin migavayrvovm) hamarwovm e patsakan4vovtyvovn. Nsann aragin
 batsakancovtyvovn Nshann arajin ankam patrastwel e 1966 tvakanin Americana tibvokrafikakan karnitovri kazmovm, orn artadrel er amyerikjan
 artadryel er amyerikjan American Type Founders (ATF) tarazvovlordakan enkyerowtjvovny: YErkov tari anc «Remington Rand» enkyerowthyvowny
 Rand» ynkyervovthjovne ajn nerarel e ir togharkac grameqyenanyeri nshannyeri sharqovm pashtonakan haghvordman medj meknapanelow, vor
 myedj myeknabanyelvow, vor ayd nshany «handisanowm e gamanakakits kyanqi anhawanakanovtyvovnnyeri lawakvowjn artahaytovtjvovn@»: 1996
 artahajtovthjvown@». 1996 thvakanin «New York Art Studio»-i dizajnyernyer@ msakel en dra kcakir@ irents havaqatsvovnyeri bvolvor tipografikakan
 bolvor tipvografikakan karnitovrnyeri hamar:Ays nsann amenaaktiv kirarvovthyvownn vovnyecyel e amerikjan ZLM-ovm 1960-akan thvakannyerin,
 1960-akan twakannerin, sakayn hyetakayvovm nra handeb hyetaqrkrvovtyvovn@ marel e, ayd isk pattcharvow ayn aygm avyeli sat amerikjan
 aveli shat amerikjan tipvokrafikayi ajcyeqartn e, o4 te irapes oktakvor&vvogh nshan: Thebyet ankliakan ketadrowtyan batsy, orn aradjarkel
 batse, vorn arajarkel er lratsnyel Martin Spyektry, ayl dzyewov 4i lov&wyelNsann yndvownwats e «Yovnikvod» standartovm, arka e Arial
 standartvovm, arka e Arial Unicode MS, Calibri, DejaVu yew shat ayl taratyesakneri lrakazmyerowm.SHrjwa& intervobangSHrjwac interobanke
 interopangShrjwa& intyervobange (⸘) karox e kirarvel ispaneryen, galiseren, astvovreryen artahaytovthjvovnneri skzbvowm, kani or ajd lyezvownyervovm
 kani vor ajd lezownerowm ogtakor&wovm en hartsakan ev patsakancakan nshannnyeri srgwa& tarpyerakner@, kochvowm e gnShexatar teqstaborretni
 gnShyexatar tekstaborretni (interrobang hetewn aradj). Sakajn ayd lezvowneri avandakan ketadrvowthyan myedj ays nsani pokharen svoworabar
 nshani pokharyen svoworabar kirarwvowm e hartsakan ew patsakan4akan nshanneri hamadrvowtyown@ (¿¡Verdad!? kam ¡¿Verdad?! [Irvok]).==
 ¡¿Verdad?! [Iroq]):== Tsanvothagrowtjownnyer 
«Gimme! Gimme! Gimme! (A Man After Midnight)» (skzbnakan anvanvowmy «Been and Gone and Done It»), svedakan
 Done It»), shwyedakan ABBA khmbi amenansanakali diskvo-hiteric myek@ YErge daynakrvyel e 1979 thwakani okvostosi 30-in yev thoxarkwel
 ogostosi 30-in ev togharkvyel e 1979 thwakani hoktemperin orbyes sinkl «The King Has Lost His Crown»-i hyet miasin orbyes erkrord kvoxm.
 vorpyes yerkrord koxm. Ayn arka e nrants Greatest Hits Vol. 2 albomvowm, inchpyes nayew ABBA Gold-owm:Patmowthjvown«Gimme! Gimme!
 Gold-owmpatmvovthyovn«Gimme! Gimme! Gimme! (A Man after Midnight)» yerke grvel kryel en Peni Anderson@ ew Pyorn Vowlvyevowsy, himnakan wvokal@
 Vovlvyevovs@, himnakan wokal@ katarel e Agnyeta Fyeltsqvogy. YErky dzaynakrvyel e Polar Music Studios-owm Stokhvolmvowm 1979 thwakani ogvostosin,
 1979 thvakani okostvosin, yew hvoktemberin ardyen toxarkwyel eSkzbnapyes ABBA-n dzajnagryel e mek ayl erg «Rubber Ball Man», sakayn,
 «Rubber Ball Man», sakayn, nranc thwacel e, or «Gimme! Gimme! Gimme!» erke` r disko ritmerow aveli law yntrvovtjvovn klini, yew ajd
 @ntrowtjown klini, ev ajd isk pattcharow «Rubber Ball Man»-@ mnatsyel e orpes demvotarperakAshkharhi erkrneri mets masvovm sinkln ovnecel
 masvovm singln ownecel e 4:46 tevoxovtjvown batsi AMN-its yev Kanadayits, vortex ergi tevvoghovthyowny kazmel e 3 rvobe 36 wajrkyan:YErki
 rvopye 36 vayrkyan:YErki ispanyeryen tarperak@ krovm e «¡Dame! ¡Dame! ¡Dame!» anvanvowme Ayn tvogharkwel e orpyes promvosinkl Gracias
 orbes promvosinkl Gracias Por La Música zaynaskawaraki hamar Latinakan Amyerikajowm ew ayl ispanalyezov erkrnyervovm.Dirkyer@ charthyerowm«Gimme!
 erkrnervowm.Dirkyere charthyerowm«Gimme! Gimme! Gimme! (A Man After Midnight)» erg@ № 1-n e darzyel aynbisi yerkrnyerovm, in4bisik en Pyelkian, Shveytsarian,
 Belgian, SHveytsarian, Finlandian, Fransian ev Irlandian: YErg@ hasel e thop-3-i Avstriayvowm, Norwegiajvowm, Niderlandnervovm, Me&

 ancanq») artahaytvowtjovne, ore na asel e Madride kravyelisTes naevVoch mi qajl cnahanj

 nranq trcowm yen Kvovpa, vorbyeszi tiryen kharnvovrdin. Amerikjan yev yewropakan wampirnyeri mijyew bajkar e cavalvvovm YEvrvopaji vampirnyeri
 YEvrvobaji wampirnyeri aragnordnyer@, oronts stab pnakarane ktnwvovm e Djowsyeldvorfowm, lsyelow lovre, vovzovm yen tiranal fvormvovlayin,

 gitnakani zarmik@` «Gvozef» mvovltfilmi klghawvor hervose, ow haytni er nayew orpes Pepitvo: Na krwvowm e Gyenyeral Machadvoyi zinwats vovgeri
 Ma4adoyi zinwa& vowzhyeri dem (Kvor&voghovtjovnner@ katarwvowm en Kovpakan heghapoghvowtyan gamanak` 30-akan twakannyerin): pyepitoji sirt@
 thvakannyerin): Pebitoji sirte patkanovm e Lvolayin, ow ognvovm e pepitvoyin ev ir enkyernerin lrtesvovtyamb zbaghvel kapitani tan@, ov asxatvowm

 Pyebitvoyi hvoreghbayr@ ew Graf Drakvovlaji zharangvordy, ov styextsyel e kharnvovrdy: Erb Goms Drakovlan ir wra pordzyec xarnovrdi anhajvogh
 pvordzyec gharnvowrdi anhajogh tarperak@, ew ajrvec aryewi charagajthneri tak, Fon Drakvovlan stipwac er myeknyel Gowba: Kvovban yntrvyel e,

! — The Dismemberment Plan khmbi alpvom. Ajn thogharkvyel e 1995 twakani hvoktyemperi 2-in DeSoto Records lyeyplvovm.Steghtsakorcvowtjovnneri
 leyplowmStextsagvorcovtjownneri cankDZajnagrman masnakicner@Erik Akyelson — basJyejsvon Kadel — kitharSthiv Kamminks — harvacayinThryewis

 daynagrvovmTsanothakrvovtjovnnyer== Artaqin hxvovmnyer 
CSS kam kaskadayin ochatert (Cascading Style Sheets - kaskadayin vocyeri thyertner), kajkin zevawvorvovm talvov
 kaykin dzyevawvorvovm talow hamar ogtakvor&wogh tyeghnvolvokia tsrakrawvorman fvormal lyezwov: CSS-y himnakanvowm ogtagvortsvowm e HTML yev XHTML
 ogtakvortswvovm e HTML yew XHTML formati batkanvogh vyeb-egyeri dzewavorman hamar, sakayn karox e nayev oktakor&wyel tsankacac tesaki XML fvormati
 cankacac tesaki XML fvormati pastatxtyeri hamar, neraryal SVG ev XUL, in4pyes naew dizayni, maketi, tarber sarqeri ew tarbyer ekrannyeri
 sarqeri yew tarper ekranneri wra nerkajatsnelvow hamar:YErb HTML 3.2 -i spyetsifikaciayi myedj avelacvetsin  -i nman thyekyere, gvovjni atribvovtnyer@
 kowjni atripovtnyer@: KHoshvor wyeb-kajkeri naghakcvovmy dardaw erkar ew tsaghsatar gvor&entats, kani vor amyen edji wra petk e nshvyer shrifty
 byetq e nsvyer srifte yew kovnayin infvormatsian. Ajs khndire lvowtsyelvov hamar World Wide Web (W3C) konsvorcivovmy styeghtsec CSS-e. CSS-@
 styex&yets CSS-@ CSS-@ HTML-i edjits hanec votchajin fvormatawvorvovm@.NkarakrvovtjownCSS-@ oktakor&vowm e wyeb-edjer naghakcvoghnyeri koxmits
 nakhaktsvoghnyeri kvoxmic kovynyer, taratesaknyer, gtnvyelow wajr yev ajl nkaragrvovthjvovnner talow hamar. CSS-i himnakan npatakn e arandznatsnyel
 nbatakn e aranznatsnyel HTML egi barvownakovthjvowny ew nra nkarakrovtyvowny, dranov isk edjin haxordel matchyelivovthjvown, jkvovnowtjovn
 matcelivowthjvovn, jkvownovthjown ew nra nkarakrowthjovny karavarelvow hnaravorvovthyovn, inchbyes nayev nvazyetsnyel hramanneri krknvowthjvovn@ ew bardowthyovne
 krknvovtjowne ew pardovtjvowne: Baci ayd CSS-@ thvowjl e talis tvjal dvokowmyenty nyerkajatsnel tarper vocherov Edji artatsman zhamanak CSS-@
 artacman gamanak CSS-@ karvogh e vyertsvel tarber axpjovrnerits.YEte ojeri axyvowsaky grwats e aranzin fayli medj, apa ajn karvogh e
 myeg, aba ayn karvogh e mianal vyep pastatxtin` hxovmvow  (angl. link), ory pastatghti meg texadrwvowm e <head> yew </head> zvovyg
 <head> yew </head> zvowjg tegeri myedj:  <link> thyeg@ petq e ovnena href atripvovt@, vorn el nshowm e voceri axyowsaki hastsyen: Ayd aghyowsakowm
 hascen: Ajd aghjowsakowm nsvac polor hatkovthjovnnery taracvvovm en ampvoghj  pastatghthi vra: Kreladyeve hetyevyaln e.Heghinakajin ocyer`Inline-votch,
 e.Hexinakajin otcher`Inline-voj, yerb HTML eji sarvacqowm nswowm e voj@ style atribvowti midjvotsvow<p style="color: blue;">teqst</p>Nerkarvovcwats
 blue;">tyekst</p>Nyerkarowcwac otch CSS-i bloknern en gtnvowm HTML egi sharwa&kvovm<style>p { color: blue; }</style>Artaqin voc` ajsinkn
 }</style>Artakin och` ajsinqn styeghcwowm e arandin .css fajl, orovm hghwovm e mer dvokowmenty:<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet"
 type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="mystyle.css"/>Oktagvorcvoxi ochyerAranzin CSS fajl e, ore nsvowm e ogtakvorcvoxi kvoxmic znnarki4i
 ogtakvortsoxi kvoghmits` znnarkici kargaworvovmnyerowm.Znnarkici otchAyn vocn e, ore trwowm e ogtagvortswvogh znnarki4i koxmits lryeljan pajmanow.KreladyevSghyematikoryen
 baymanvovKryeladyewSxyematikvoren voche nkarakrwovm e hetyevyal kyerb`Nsi4{		Hatkanish arzhyek;		Hatkanish: arzheq;		Hatkanis arzhyeq;		Hatkanish.
 argyeq;		Hatkanis arjeq;		Hatkanish arjyeq;		}Standart CSS-e vorosvowm e aragnayowtyownnery, hyetyevyal hertakanovthyamb`Hatkanish@ nswac e @important-i
 nshvats e @important-i oknowtjamb,Ojy nshwac e hyents tekowm (inline)Nvowjnatsvowtsi4nyeri qanaky(#id) nshichvowmKargyeri (.class) ev
 nshichvovmGargeri (.class) ew nagha kargeri(:pseudoclass) kanaky nsichovmNshicvowm tyegyeri anovnneri qanak@.Baci ayd nsanakvowthjown owni
 ajd nshanakvovthjvovn vovni nayev nkarakrman hatkanisneri haraperakan hyertakanowtjvowny awyeli vovs grwac hatkanishn arajnaynvovthjovn
 hatkanisn arajnaynovtyown owni.Votcheri axjvovsakneri orinak.p {	font-family: "Garamond", serif;	} h2.class {	 font-size: 110
 h2.class {	 font-size: 110 %;	 color: red;	 background: orange;	}#news p {	 color: orange;	 }.class p {	 color: orange;	
 {	 color: orange;	 }[title]{	color:orange;	}p:hover{	color:orange;	}Aystegh bervats e 3 kanvon p, h2 yev #news p nshi4neri
 h2 yew #news p nsicneri hamar: Aradjin erkow kanvonnerovm HTML-i parpervovtjan ev wyernakri hamar nsanakwvowm yen votcher, @st oronts barbervovthyvowny
 oronc barperowtjvowne kartacwi Garamond tararyesakov, kam yethe ajd taratyesaky hasaneli ce, voreve ajl taratyesakow (serif) tipi.YErkrvord
 (serif) tipi.Erkrvord dasi vernagire kartacwi karmir tarervov, spitak fonvov ev mecatsva& tarachapowYErrvord kanony verabyervowm
 tara4apvow:YErrvord kanvon@ wyerabyerwowm e ajn barbyervovthjovnnyerin, voronq gtnvovm yen #news id vownyetsox elyemyentneri meg.Dasyer yew nvovynatsvovcicnerDaser@
 novynacovtsicnyerDasyere yew nowynacvovtsicnyer@ karox yen verabervyel miajn nshvats tarryerin (tekyerin), vorvonq HTML kvodvowm vovnyen   atribvovtnyer`
 vovnen   atripovtner` class kam id: OrinakHimnakan tarpyervowthyvownn ayn e, or nvovynacvovcic@  (ankl. id) nshanakwvowm kam sahmanwvovm
 nshanakwvovm kam sahmanwvovm  e myek elyementi hamar, isk dasy (angl. class)-y sovvorapar hatkansovm e mi qani elementnyer: Aynvovamyenayniw,
 elyemyentnyer: Aynovamyenajniw, jamanakakits praovzyernyery  karvogh yen tarpyerakyel mi kani elementnyer mievnvowjn idyentifikatorvov: Tarbyervowtjvownn
 identifikatvorow: Tarbyerovthyownn ayn e nayev, vor karogh yen linel mi kani daser,vorvonk cragri kvodowm aranznacwvowm yen bacatanishnyerov, isk nowynacovtsi4nere
 isk nowjnatsvovcicner@ aydbes nyerkayatsnel hnarawvor che: Karyewor e nshyel hyetyevyal tarpervovtyovny` nvovjnatsowtsicner@ laynoryen kirarwovm
 nowjnacovcicnere lajnvoryen kirarwovm en JavaScript tsragri kodovm, orbyeszi gtnyen pastathghthi vownikal tarrere: I tarpyervowtyvovn tyegeri ev nrants
 tarpyervovthyvovn thekeri ev nrants atripovtneri, dasyeri ev nvowynacowtsi4neri anownnery kaghwats yen  kodvovm taryeri krarman zewic: Daseri ev nowynatsvovci4neri
 Daseri yev nowjnatsovcicnyeri hatkowtjovnnyery sahmanwvovm en syeleqtorneri oknvowthjamb: Garvogh e dasi hatkvowtjvovny  trvel ampvoxjovtyamp
 trvyel ambvoghdjvovthyamb (ajd dyepqvowm selektor@ sksvowm e «.» nshanvow), kam novynatsvovcichn inkn ir hatkowtjamp (ajs depqvovm syelektore
 (ays debqvovm selyeqtvore skswvovm e «#» nsanow), incpes naev ayd dasi cankatsats elyemyenti kam nvowynacvovcici hatkowtjovnov:CSS SeleqtornyerAjstegh
 hatkowtyvownvow:CSS SelyeqthvornyerAystyegh patkyerwac en CSS selyeqthornern iryenc orinaknerow, oronts midjocow yntrwvovm yen HTML tarryery, CSS ojajin
 tarryer@, CSS vocayin aghjovsakvowm artakin tesqi het kabva& kanvonner kryelvow npatakov:Selyekthvor das(class)Linvowm yen debqyer,
 das(class)Linovm yen dyepkyer, yerp tsrakravvorvoghy tsankanowm e styeghtsi egn aynpyes, vor ajn vovnena yerkvow barbyervowthyvovn <p>, ynd orovm, hnarawvor
 end orvovm, hnarawvor e,or drank  mstapes popvoxwyen kam krknwen: Aydbisi edji orinak karogh e handisanal hartsazrvowjtsy, vortyex
 harcazrvowyce, vortex hyertagayowm en xmbakroghi hartsyer@ yew zrowcaktsi patasxannery:Iharke, aysbisi eg vownyenalov hamar pyetk e
 vownenalvov hamar betq e irarits arandnatsnyel hartsyern vow batasxanner@: Dra hamar vojayin aghyovsaki myedj erkvov barbyervovtyownner byetk
 parbervovthjvownner pyetk e styegh&el, ori hamar kirarwvowm e das tipi seleqthvory: Dra mi orinak nyerkayacvac e storev. <!DOCTYPE html><html>
 <!DOCTYPE html><html>  <head>     <title>        Harcyer yew bataskhannyer     </title>     <meta charset="utf-8" />     <style
 charset="utf-8" />     <style type="text/css">Pyerwats orinakvovm lrakrvoghi hartsyery tarberwvowmyen grarman dzyewow` Arial mvokhrakowyn, kisathaw,
 mvoxrakowjn, kisatav, 10 tara4apvow, dakh ezragtsits heratsvac e 15 piksyeli  chapvow: pataskhannyeri hamar yntrva& e  Times New Roman
 yntrwats e  Times New Roman  taratesak@, tara4ap@` 12, govjn@`sew: Grarman ajs exanaky karyeli e kiraryel tarpyer kanakowthjamp barbyerowtjownnyeri
 qanakvovthjamb parpyerovtjovnnyeri ew votchyeri pazmazan hnaravvorowtjvownnyeri kirarmamp eger stexcyelvow hamar: Gaxabar:CSS:renderedSyelyekthvor
 Kaghapar:CSS:renderedSyeleqtor nvowjnatsowcic (id)Cragrawvorman gamanak vorvos tarryer kirarvvovm en hatvovk nbataknervov, kvo4vyelvov ovnikal
 npataknyerov, kvocwelvow ovnikal tvyalner, yew ajs tarryery &rakri inc-or masowm karvox en kabwa& linel JavaScript &ragri hyet, orbyes artacvvogh
 hyet, orbes artacvox tvjalnyer, hetyevabar ajd tarre novynatib kam nman tarryerits petk e arandnatsnyel hatkvovthjovnnervow, ory katarvowm
 hatkowtjvownnyervov, ore katarvvovm e CSS-i mijocvow:Ayn karvogh e ajd tarry darznel vovnikal` verakryelow nran identifikatvor`(id): Orinak`<!DOCTYPE
 identifikatvor`(id): Orinak`<!DOCTYPE html><html>  <head>     <title>        Шрифт Courier     </title>     <meta charset="utf-8" />

 Gaxapar:CSS:renderedNvovynacovci4ner@ karvogh en hatkanshwa& linel miewnvowjn ejovm krwa& cankatsats tvvow tarryeri hamar.Jarangovtjvovn@: Gaskadajnowthjvown@:
 hamar.ZHarankowthyvowny: Kaskadaynvowthyowne:  CSS vojeri aradjnahertvowtyownnerYEtye hiperteksti nsakrman HTML lezovn himnakanowm sahmanvovm e Veb eji
 sahmanowm e Web edji karvovtsva&qy, aba CSS-e thvovylatrvovm e votch sahmanyel edji yowrakanchjowr objekti hamar ev ajn bahbanel arandzin
 ajn bahpanyel arandin faylvowm:  CSS -i ognvovtjamb karyeli e kajki voros paramyetryer, orinak`tarachape, popvokhel`anpopvogh tvoxnelow
 pvopvokhyel`anpvopogh thoghnelvov serwervovm bahwogh  HTML pastatovghty: Anhrazheshtowtjan depkvowm kirarvoxi praovzyere karvox e dimel  CSS-vow
 karogh e dimel  CSS-ow stex&wac vojyeri fajlin yew edjin anhrazhest tesk tal:HTML pastatxtyerowm CSS- i kirarvovme himnvats e  «garangvowtyan»
 himnva& e  «jarangvovtyan» yew  kaskadi  skzpvovnkneri vra:HTML-ovm ktnwvogh bvolvor thyeger@ hamarwvowm yen HTML-i jarangner, orinak`  head-y
 zharangner, orinak`  head-e ev body-in, isk meta, link, title thegery garankner en handisanovm  title-i hamar, h1,h2,.., p, a, li,
 h1,h2,.., p, a, li, div, img thyegere body-i jarangnern yen, mievnvovyn gamanak polore miasin HTML-i zharangnyern en: Aveli parz
 garanknyern yen: Awyeli parz nerkayatsnyelvow hamar kirarenq hetewjal orinaky.  ditsowq tsrakir@ parownakvovm e mi sark li  thyegyer, sakajn
 sark li  teker, sakajn harkavvor e kvownayin pvopvoghowthyvovn katarel nrantsic miayn ol thyeki myeg grwa&neri hamar: Cragrawvoroxe kirarvovm
 &ragrawvorvox@ kirarvovm e hetevyal vochajin kanone. CSS kvodvovm grovm e.      ol li {     color:#ffd0373;     }:Kardacvowm e
     }:Kardacvvowm e hyetewjal kyerb. @ntryel ol-i medj grwac li tegyer@ ev haxordyel kvowyn: Ays kanon@ wyeraberwvowm e naev hxvovmnyerin:
 verapyervovm e naew hxvowmnerin: YEthe tsrakravoroxe chi cankanowm hatkowtjovne tara&el bolvor hghvovmnyeri wra, apa aranznacnovm e tsankatsac
 arandznatsnowm e canka&ac hghovmner, dicowq dranc haytararelvov vorpyes vownikal arjyeq: Css-ovm hatkanis weragrovm e ajd arzheknyerin:
 wyeragrvovm e ajd arzheqnerin: Orinak.    .links p a{    color:#f114cs;     }:Kardacvvovm e ajsbyes. kovnajin popokhovthyvovne werabervvovm
 popoghovtjvowny wyeraperwvowm e links ovnikal arzhyek vovnyetsogh ajn a hghovmnyerin, orvonq ktnvovm yen p thegi meg: Ga naew hghvowmneri kyegh& syelyeqtor,
 hghovmneri kexts selyekthvor, vor@ himnakanvowm wyerapyerwvowm e hxvovmnyerin: Drank ayn hatkvovthjvownnerov en bajmanaworvac, tye in4 gowyn
 paymanavorwats, thye inch gvovjn kstana hghvovme naghqan klik anely, mkniki slaqe nra wra bahelvovc hetvo, yntrwats, bayts dyer ckvortsarkvac hxvowme
 der cgvor&arkva& hghowme ew ardyen pacvats kam kvortsarkvats hxowm@: Nakhnakan tesk apahvowovm e krarman hetevyal orinaky`     a:link{
 orinak@`     a:link{     color:#F124cs;    }Myek ankam kirarelovc hyeto ayn ir naghnakan kvowjne pvokhvowm e: Isk ete kirarenk
 e: Isk yethe kiraryenk hover tarpyerake, ajsinqn ajn karkawicakn e, yerp mkniki slaq@ pahowm enq wran, gowyn@ pokhovm e,  aba
 gowjny poxvowm e,  apa ajs hatkvowtyowne kvyerapyerwi miayn a-i nsvac tarperaknerin: Ete nshyenq active tarbyeraky, aba mkniki covtsic@
 tarberaky, aba mkniki cvowtsicy wran pahelis, gowyne pvokhovm e, 1 syeghmman jamanak, der syeghmaky cthvoghac` gowjne pokhwvovm e:Ocajin aghjowsaki
 e:Vochajin axjowsaki orinakHetyevjal orinakvov nshwa& kvode kam karvox e handyes gal arandzin fajli tesqov, .css yndlaynowmov, kam
 .css endlaynowmov, kam <style> thyeki midjocow karvox e krwel HTML tsrakri «klxamasayin»` <head> </head> kodovm`Aystegh kirarwa&
 kodvowm`Aystyegh kirarwats yen yot kanvonnyer p, h2, .note, p#paragraph1, a:hover, #news p yev [type="button"] selyeqthornyeri kirarmamb:Arajin
 syelyekthornyeri kirarmamp:Aragin kanone verabyervvovm e HTML-elemyenti kvodin` p (barbervovtyovn) - nswa& e oc. barpyervowthyovnnyer@ nerkayatswowm
 barpyervovtyovnner@ nerkajatsvvowm yen  Arial taratesakvow, sakajn yetye braovzyern ayn ci gtnovm, apa  kirarvowm e Helvetica kam Sans-serif,
 Helvetica kam Sans-serif, hakarak dyebkowm ajd yntaniki voreve tesak (lryeljajn)YErkrvord kanon@ verabyervvovm e  h2 (erkrord makardaki
 h2 (erkrord makardaki wyernakir). YErkrvord makardaki vernakiry  karta&vi sbitak foni wra krva& karmir taryerov, "Kekl" mye&atsva&
 tarerow, "Kekl" mye&atsvats chapservovYErrvord kanone wyerapervvowm e tsankatsac tarri, atribvovt class, orrin trwa& klini «note» arzhyeke,
 klini «note» arzhyeq@, orinak, parpervovtyan argeke` <p class="note">Ays kanvon@ kartatswi kisataw shriftov, dexin foni wra karmir
 dexin fvoni wra karmir gvovynov</p>Corrvord kanvon@ vyeraperwovm e miayn ajn elementnyerin, vorvonk  p yen, ovnen id atripowt, or@
 vovnyen id atripvovt, ore hawasar e paragraph1: Ajdbisi  tarr@ kvovnyena nyerqin patsat 10 piqselnerov (padding)Hingyervord kanvon@
 (padding)Hingerord kanony verapyervowm e hover tarryerin a — hipyerhghmamb. Lryelajn, bravovzerneri myecamasnvovthjowny hxman tyeksti tarryern
 hghman tyeqsti tarrern artacowm yen @ndk&vowmvov, aysinqn a yndgtsvowm e Krarman text-decoration: none; tyesaki hamadajn` yndkcovmn
 hamazajn` @ndk&vovmn anhetanvovm e, yerp mkniki cvovtsi4e pahovm yenk wranWecerord kanvon@ vyerapyerwvovm e ajn p elyementnerin, oronk
 elyementnyerin, oronk gtnwvowm en in4-or tarri myej, ori tarri id atripvowty, havasar e <code>news</code> (#news p — sa jarankneri
 (#news p — sa zharankneri selektori tibik orinak e, tes` wyerewits hingervord ket)Yvothervord kanony vyerabervvovm e type havasar button.
 type hawasar button. Orinak, ays grarman hamadzajn, tarry aktivatsnyelis fvoni govjny kdarna kanac <input type="button"> (svowvorakan
 type="button"> (svovorakan sexmak):CSS-dasavorvovthjvownNaxkan wyep-ejerowm CSS dizayni haytnvele  pastathghthi povandakvovthjany hamapataskhan`
 bowandakovthjane hamabatasxan kirarwowm er HTML tsrakri hnaravorowtjownner@: Sakayn  CSS-e hyexasrgovm kataryec tsragraworman gor&@nthatsvovm:
 &rakravorman kor&enthacvovm: HTML-n ogtakorcvowm e pvowandakvovthyvovn@ gryelvov hamar, isk  CSS-y` patrasti bvowandakvovtjovn@ format anelvov
 pvovandakvovtyovne format anyelow hamar: YErb  Tim Pyernes Lin stegh&ec Hamaskharhayin tsanc@, kirarwowm er miajn HTML Crag4aworman lyezovn,
 Tsrag4aworman lyezown, vore nvovynpyes lriw kataryelagor&va& cer. hyexinaky karvox er xmpakryel miayn barzakvowjn thekyer: Erb Vep-eger@
 tyeker: Erb Web-edjyere layn taracovm statsan, dizajnernern sksyetsin chanabarhner pntrel onlaynpastathghtherin layout haxvordelvov hamar:
 layout haghvordyelow hamar: Ajd npatakvow znnarkich artadroghnere ( Netscape, Microsoft) styegh&etsin nor teker, orinak  theke, or@ tarpyerwovm
 teke, vore tarbyerwvowm er HTML &ragri original tyegyerits nranvow, or stex&vovm er layout-e, ajl o4 karowtsvatsq@: Aysbisvow CSS-y
 karvowcwacke: Ajsbisvow CSS-e atrakin oc@ sahmanvox lezov e, orn endkrkvovm e taratesaknyer, kvowjnyer, fvonayin nkarner, eji sahmannyer,
 nkarnyer, edji sahmanner, parzrvowtyovn, lajnowthyown yew ayln: CSS-vovm kirarvox sat hatkovtjvownner nman en HTML hatkvowthjovnnyerin:

 khmbakrowm myek owrishi kvoxmits: Ays dyepkowm bahbanelvow pvordze berowm e nvor eji, vortyegh aradjarkvvowm e ka!m ghmpakrvovmy endhanrapes 4pahbanel,
 endhanrabes cbahpanel, ka!m erkvow khmpakrowmnyere miatyeghel yev bahpanyel hajvordakan xmpakrovmnervov verjnakan tesky: Xmpakrvovmneri

 kvonfliktGhmpakrowmnyeri batyerazmYErkow kam awyeli masnaktsi anyndhat @st irenc nakhapasharmovnknyeri khmpakrvovmneri katarvowme, jovraqanchyowry

 astitchan@:TS&anvotagrvowthyvownnerCanotakrvowthyvownnyer@ (footnotes, сноски) teksti marmnvowm yndkrkwox hghowmnyern yen kam meknabanovthyovnnyere, voronk tvowjl en talis
 orvonk tovjl en talis aranc mtqic sexvelow nshvowmnyer anel haghvordwogh tyexekatvvowthjan hawastiowthyan (axpjvovrnyeri) kam nrbvowthyownneri
 (aghpjvovrnyeri) kam nrbvovtyownnyeri masin: Tsanvothagrvowthjown styexcvvovm e <ref></ref> thegyeri oknowtyamp` byetk exats tyekste nerarvowm e nrants

 anwanataracq:KategoriaSpasarkox edjn e, vory ogtakorcvovm e Wikibediayi hvodva&nyeri karowcvacqi shark: Nra anovny tyexadrvowm e orbes hxvowm

 tsankere:CHpPatmvovtjownEdji bvolor naxkin tarberaknere` nra stextsovmits mincyev nyerka vitchake: Sa nayew kvo4wvowm e «egi patmovthyvovn», kani
 «egi patmovthjvown», kani or parvovnakovm e edji ghmpagrowmnyeri ampvoghgakan tsanky:Tyes naew Oknowthjown:Eji batmovthjownWViqii nsichavvorovmHTML-i
 patmvovthjvovnWWiqii nsichavorvowmHTML-i nman kvod, bajts aweli barzecvac yev awyeli harmar, orinak '''tavatar tyekst''' pogharyen <b>tawatar tyekst</b>:
 <b>thawatar tyekst</b>: Da tvjalneri bazajowm pahestaworvvox ew khmpakrman edjowm yeryewacogh elateqstn e: Wikipediaji &rakrov vorvonovme

 ardyvovnk tyekstvowm: Edji 4ap@` vikiteksti chapn e:Tes naew Viqipyedia:Incbyes ghmpagrel ej@:Vikibahyestazat oktagor&mna batkernyeri,
 oktakvortsmna batkerneri, zaynayin ew ajl myediafajlyeri zetexaran e:ViqifikacvowmWiqii nsicawormamb formatawvoryel (yew oc parz teqsti
 formataworel (ew o4 barz teqsti kam HTML-i formatov), yev nyvovthin awelacnel nerqin hxvovmner, orbeszi miavvorwi Vikibyediayi ampoxjvovtjan:Tyes

 hodva& e hargvac gitakan ​​amsagrvowm kam krqvovm:TTyeghapvokhovmEgi anvanman (ew tyexi) poxvovme vovghxakrakan vribaki, anwanvowmneri
 vribaki, anwanvovmneri hamadzyanovthyan xaxtman kam anwanman anpvowtovtyan battcharvov: Gajanvowm e ka!m veranvanman, ka!m teghapvoghman
 veranvanman, ka!m texapvokhman yew pnorinak hascyen bahpanelow hamar wyerahghvovm stextsyelov myej:OFTyes naevOknovtyovn:Eji tyexapvoxovm==
 nayevOgnovtjvovn:Edji tyexapvokhovm== Artakin hghvovmner 
Cakyertnyer, hayereni kyetadrakan nshannyeric myekn e, oronq drvvovm yen hetewjal debkyervowm-mejpyerwvox owrisi
 depqyervowm-myegbervvox owrisi vowghxaki xvoski skzbovm ev vyerdjowm.kexarvyestakan kam gitakan yerkeri vyernakryeri, tertheri anvovnnyeri mejberman
 anvownnyeri mejperman dyepqvovmzanazan kazmakyerbovtyvownneri, hastatovtyvownnyeri, dzernarkowthjvovnnyeri, myeqyenaneri maknishnery,
 mekyenaneri maknisnyery, anvanovmnere hishatakelow dyebkovm.hegnakan, caghrakan yerangow kam hakarak imastvow kortsatswogh barern anjatyelov
 korcacwogh barern angatyelow hamar:voryewe par, kabaktsvowtyown, naghadasowthjovn, kam ayl lezwakan miavvor yndhanvowr ghvosqits andjatyelov,
 @ndhanvovr khosqic angatyelvow, tarpyerakyelvov hamarTpakir xvosqovm nowjn pane kareli e anyel nshwa& miawvornyer@ taratesakov endg&elvow,
 taratesakvow yndk&yelow, thav kam shyegh taratyesaknerov gryelovGrakanvovthyownSyergyey Aprahamjan, «Hayyereni kyetadrowthjvovn», vovsowmnakan
 ketadrowtjovn», vovsovmnakan zyernark, 2002 
Vergakety hajeryeni ketadrakan nsannyeric mekn e, vore drvvowm e awartwats nakhadasovtyan werdjowm. Ajn nayew
 nakhadasovthjan werjvowm Ajn naew ogtagortswovm e hin vraceryen grovthyvownnyerovm:patmowthyovn5-9-rd dareri hayyeryen qyerakanakan ashkhatvovtjvovnnyerowm
 qerakanakan ashghatowthjvovnnervowm ev deragrerovm verdjakyetn artahaytwel e myek qarakvowsi kam qarankyowni kyetvov, inchbes aysor midjakyetn e
 inchbes ajsor midjakyetn e: Sakayn kvortsatsovthyan teghvov ev masamb dzyevov tarbyervel e midjakyetic Verdjakyeti imastow ayn grwel e tvoghic wyeryew,
 grvel e tvoxits vyerev, isk midjaketi yew storaketi imastvov` toxi wra Werjaket@ drvel e barz yev bard naghadasvowthyvovnneri werjovm,
 naghadasowtjownnyeri wyerjvovm, ev artahaytel ghvosqi awarte, vyerdjnakan dadare, kam yst hin qerakannyeri «xvorhrdi» waghjane»:Tasnerord daric

Irani azkayin tankaran (barskyeryen` موزه ایران باستان , Muze-ye Irân-e Bâstân), hnakitakan ev patmakan
 hnakitakan yew batmakan thangaran, ktnwovm e Thyehranowm.Gazmvac e erkow thankaranayin pazhinnyeritsx Hin Irani tangaran (Muze y Irān
 tankaran (Muze y Irān e Bāstān), vor@ bacvel e 1937 twakanin yev nakhaislamakan darasrgani thankaran, vor@ batswel e 1972 thwakaninTankarani
 thwakanin:Thangarani havaqa&vown @ndgrkovm e batmakan hvovsarzanner hin yev mijin daryeri shrdjanic, ayd thwovm kyeramikakan anothnyer,
 keramikakan anvothner, myetaxakan irer, teqstil abranqner, vorosh hazvagyvowt krqyer yev myetaxadramnyer: Tankarani hawaqa&own yndgrkvowm
 havaka&vovn endkrkovm e 300 000 cvovtsadranmvovshnyer.Tankarane ovni mi sark hetazotakan paginnyer, ajd tvvovm hnakaradaryan yev oskrapanakan
 hnaqaradaryan ew oskrabanakan paginner, inchbes naew keramikaji ovsvovmnasirman Gentrvon.HavaqatsovAmenahin gta&vonery ktnwyel yen Gasafrovdvovm,
 ktnvel yen Gasafrvowdvovm, Karpandvovm ev Gandji Parovm. Hnadaryan  Irani thankarani aragin srahovm cvowtsadrvvovm yen nayew movstiyeryan
 cvovtsadrwvovm en nayew mowstiyeryan qare gortsikner, vorvonk patrastwats yen neandyertaljan mardkanc koxmic:  Vyerin paleolithi amyenakaryevvor kvor&ikner@
 amyenakarevvor kortsiqnere hajtnapyervyel en Yaftye qarandzavovm, oronts tariike 30-35 hazar tari e. Patsi ayd ayl hnagowyn gtatsvonri

 ergy, vory ir cvorrvord sinkln e ir debyowtayin alpomic, ore tvoxarkvel e 2017 tvakani pyetrvari 10-in The song was written by
 song was written by Anne-Marie alongside Jenn Decilveo, Mason Levy, and Tom Meredith, Major Tom's, Asylum lyejblnyerow, prvodjvovsernery
 lyeyplnyerow, brodyvovsyernyere yexyel en Tom Meredith, MdL-nere :Styegh&agvor&ovthyvovn"Ciao Adios"-@ danshvol-tyekwvox erg e Ergi paryery
 danshvol-thyeqvvox yerk e. Ergi baryere wyerapyerwvowm en mi aghjka, ow imanovm e, vor tghan vowm het na handibovm e iryen davatchanowm e, ev na orvosowm

Pryeth Serjinth Hart (ankl.` Bret Sergeant Hart, tsnw.` howlisi 2, 1957 th.), kanadatsi naxkin prvofyesional
 kanadaci naghkin profesional ymbsamartik (ryestler), grox, derasan, Hartyeri entaniki andam:Minchyew masnagitakan nvoramvowte zpaghwyel e
 noramovty zpaxwyel e sirvoghakan (olimpiakan) @mbsamartvow handes galow Ernest Maningi anvan avak dbroci ev Mavownt Rvoyali hamalsarani
 Mavovnth Rvoyali hamalsarani @mbsamarti havakakannyervovmHajtni linyelov «Hithmen» aycekartajin makanvamb/ byemakan kerparow, arantskajin
 kyerbarow, arancqajin derakatarvovm e vownetsyel vax 90-akannyerin ryestlingi ardjovnaperovthyan ardiakanatsman myeg` nyermvowtselvov pardzrorak
 nyermvovcyelvow bardrorak ev athletik nyerringayin tyexnika.GarieranHartn ovnecyel e hajogh kariera WWF-vovm 1984-1997 tvakannerin.
 1984-1997 twakannerin. Harti masnaktsvovtyamp mi shark menamartyer dasvvovm yen bolor zhamanakneri amyenaditarzhan restling-handibovmnyeri
 ryestlink-handipovmneri sharqin. Arawel haytni rinkajin hakarakvorderits yen hamarvel paron kataryal@, Britanatsi bovldoke, krtsyer
 Pritanatsi bowldoky, krtsyer eghpajr Oovyen Harth@, Stovown Kvold Stiw Osthin@ yew Svon Majqlze:Harth@ hyeranowm e WWF-ic 1997 thwakani «Survivor

 kaghaqvowm. Svovowi klkhawor iradarzowtyowny ir ev Svon Mayqlzi myenamartn er, vore pyetq avartwer Harti haghthanakow, qani or verdjins hrazharvyel
 or werdjins hrajarvyel er hayryeni Kanadayvowm Majklzin bartwelow stsyenaric. Marti avartin Majklz@ ringi vra hvorizonakan dirkow
 vra horizonakan dirkov parka& Harthi vra katarvowm e ir isk syepakan hanznwetsnelow hnark@ (sarpshvovtyer), isk ayd bahin ringi mot

Eqzistencializm kam goyovtyan pilisvopajvovtyvown (lat. exsistentia` goyovthjvovn), gyexarvyestakan-pilisopayakan,
 kyexarvyestakan-pilisopajakan, miazhamanak @ndgcwats hakagitabastakan, iracional, erbemn asvacabanakan ev atheistakan mitovmnyerov taratsvats
 mitvovmnerov taracvac hosank, zhamanakakits pilisvopayvovthjan azdyecik owxxowthyvovnnerits mek@. DZewaworwel e 20-rd dari skzbnerin
 20-rd dari skzpnyerin yev ir sat gcervow artacvolvowm e ajd gamanakashrgany. Dranvov e patsatrvowm ekzistyentsializmi drovjthnyeri me&amasnovthyan
 drovytnyeri myetsamasnowtjan oghbergakan tvonajnvovthyowne ew yndhanowr horyetesakan erankaworovm@.Eqzistyencializmi zevavvorman wra hska
 yerankaworovm@Eqzistyentsializmi dzevavorman wra hska azdecvovthjvovn en thoghyel Syoryen Kierkegvori, Fevodvor Dvostvoyewskvow, Fridrigh Nitssyei, Mikel de Ovnamovnoyi tyesvowtjvownnyere
 Ovnamvovnvoji tesvowtjownnyery yev asghatanqner@, inchbes nayew E. Hvowserli fenvomyenvolokian yev M. Shelleri pilisvopayakan antropvologian.Eqzistentsializmi
 antrvobvolokianEqzistentsializmi gaghaparnere bastpanyel ev zarkatsryel yen bazmathiv nsanawor pilisopanyer. Germaniajovm Martin Haydyegyere,
 Kermaniajowm Martin Haydyegyere, Karl Jasbers@, Fransiayovm` Jan-pol Sartr@, Alper Kamyvovn, Rvowsastanowm` Lew SHestvov@, Nikolaj Perdyayeve
 Shyestowy, Nikolaj Byerdjaew@ ev ajln:Ekzistentsializmy paymanakanvoren bazhanvovm en kronakan (Jaspyers, Gabriyel Marsel, Pyerdyaev yev ajln)
 Marsel, Berdyaev yev ajln) ev atheistakan (Haydekyer, Sartr, Qamyvow yev ajln) vovghxvowtjvovnnyeriEkzistyencializmi kentrvonakan harcern
 kentrvonakan harcern en mardvow gvoyvovtjown@, nra kyanqi imast@, ashkharhowm nra dyern ov owghin, nra jakatakiry Ekzistyencializmi
 cakatakire. Eqzistyentsializmi hamar aradjnajine mardn e, nra nerasxarhy, zgatsmvovnknyere, voroshvowmnyere Mardov gvojowtjovny naxvordvovm e
 koyowthjovn@ nakhvordvovm e eovtyane, «mardkajin irakanvovtjvovne» (Hajdyeger) arajnayin e. Ekzistyentsial xndirnyery yvovrakancyvowr mardov
 jovrakancjowr mardvov gvojvovtjan pastic bxogh ghndirnyer en, mardvov koghmits ir kvoyvovthjan zyevi zgacowmn e: Kojvowthjvowne kam ekzistencian
 Gvojowtyvowne kam eqzistyentsian anhnar e pokhancel haskacovthjownnyeri migotsvov, ajn obyyekt ce, kani vor mardy chi karox obyyektivoren ditarkyel
 opyektivvoren ditarkel iren kvoxkits: Gojvovthjvovn@ chi entharkwovm ratsional canachmany, ajn janachelov miak migoc@ ajd vitchake verabryeln
 ajd witchaky werabreln e. Est Jaspersi, mardov gojvovtjown@ imastavorvvovm e «sahmanayin irawijaknyervovm», vorvonk yen tarabanqy,
 oronk en tarapanky, bayqary, ashgharhi anvoxokowthjan@ yev tshnamanqin dimakajelow vovghiner gtnel@ ew ajln:Eqzistyencialisti hamar
 aylnEqzistentsialisti hamar mard@ zvowrk e evowthyvovnic naghqan kitakic gvojovthjvowne. Mardy skzbvowm gojovtjovn vowni, ev miajn hyeto kvoxmnvoroshvowm
 miajn hyeto kvoxmnvorvoshwovm e` mtnovm e irakan eovthyovnneri yev imastnyeri volvort: Mardn ajn e, inc inkn iryen darznovm e. Mard@ oc ajl
 darznvovm e. Mardy vo4 ayl voq e, qan inqn iren naghag&ox@, kvojvowtyvown owni aynqanov, vorkanov inkn iryen kertovm e yev irakanatsnovm
 kertvovm e ev irakanacnvovm e. Wakhkvot@ patasxanatow e ir vakhkotvowthjown, stakhvos@ ir sti hamar yev ajln. Miajn mardn e batasghanatvow
 mardn e batasghanatow ir ararkneri hamar, och hasarakovthyvovn@Est Sartri, marde bataskhanatow e oc miayn ir, ayl naew ajl mardkanc
 ayl naew ajl mardkants hamar: Mardy bacahaytelov iryen, pacahaytvowm e ajl mardkants ew dranvov ajl mardkanc dardznvovm nvowjnqan irakan,
 darznowm nvowjnqan irakan, vorkan inqn e Ajl mardik anhragyesht en andi gojvovthjan yev inqnacanachvowthjan hamar:Atheistakan eqzistyencializm@
 hamar:Atyeistakan eqzistyentsializme yelnovm e ajn drovythits, vor Astvats 4ka, ovsti mardovn amyen inc thovyl e trva& Mardn abrvowm e ashkharhovm,
 aprovm e asgharhowm, vortyex krvonakan hvowjse mahacel e, na betk e apri arants vyerin imasti yew oknowtyan Est Sartri ew Kamyovi,
 Est Sartri yev Kamyvowi, da nshanakvovm e, or mardy lqwac e, anzor, kani vor oc ir meg yew vo4 el drsovm na cvowni hyenaket, abawinelow
 hyenaket, abawinelvov atyan Mardn azat e, na databartvats e linyelvow azat: Miewnvovyn jamanak, kronakan ekzistecialistnyere, yndvovnyelow
 ekzistecialistnyery, yndvownelvow mardvow azat linely yev kamki kerisxanvovtyvovne, gtnvowm en, or ajd azatowthyvowne ir kagatnakyetin e hasnovm
 kakatnaketin e hasnvowm Astcovn tchanacelov ew @ndownyelow midjotsov.«Azatowtyan» hyet mektyegh ekzistentsializmi meg kentrvonakan tegh
 myedj kyentrvonakan tex e zbaxecnovm «entrowthjan» gaxapare Est Sartri, mardy tarperwovm e ayl bnakan eaknyeric henc ir @ntrovtyan,
 hyenc ir yntrovthjan, ayd yntrvovthyan hamar ir argyew bataskhanatwvowthyovn kryelvov hnaraworvovtjamb: Entryelov ir hamar, mard@ miazhamanak
 hamar, mardy miajamanak yntrvovm e ev amboghj mardkvovtyan hamar. Yst Haydyegeri, mardow yntrowtyvovn@ yentadrovm e iryen ir kecovtjan
 e iren ir ketsovtyan wergin hnarawvorovtyan` mahin dimakajelov anhragyeshtvowthjamp: Ir yntrvovtjamp mard@ kangnovm e mah-vo4nchi
 kangnowm e mah-ochn4i ardjev, dimakajovm dran, hastatovm ir «yesy», koghmnvoroswowm ocnci hamyemat. Est kronakan ekzistyetsializmi,

 kazmakyerbowtyvovnnyer kan ashxarhi shat erkrnerowm:Artaqin hghvovmnyerVashington pvost. (Angl.)== Axbjvowrner 
ZHorj Simyenvon (fr.` Georges Joseph Christian Simenon, pyetrwari 13, 1903(1903-02-13), Liyej, Walonia, Pelkia
 Liej, Walonia, Pyelgia - sebtempyeri 4, 1989(1989-09-04), Lozan, SHvejtsaria), pyelkiatsi grvox, dyetyektiw-hvogepanakan ganri askharhahrcak
 detyektiv-hogyepanakan zhanri ashkharhahrcak nerkajatsvowcicnyerits e, fransiakan lezwi yew krakanovthyan thakavorakan akadyemiayi andam Miyevnovyn jamanak
 andam Miyewnvovjn gamanak 20-rd dari amyenashat enthyertsvox hyexinakneric meky= Kyensagrvovthjovn =Tsnvyel e 1903 th. pyetrwari 12-in
 1903 t. pyetrvari 12-in Belgiaji Liej kaxaqovm, apahvovagrakan enkyerovthjan haswabahi yntaniqowm Dbrvocn awartyelovts hetvo darnowm
 avartyelvovc hyeto darnovm e grakhanvowthi watcharvox, aba sksvovm tghtakcel teghakan tertin. Grakanowthyan@ nwirwelvow dzktvovm@ nran hangist
 dgtvowm@ nran hangist 4i talis, yev 1992 th. Simenony gnvowm e «nwachyelow» Pariz@ Ajstyex na nyerdnyelvow ir yeritasardakan oghdj yerande,
 eritasardakan oxj yerandy, irar etyewits katarvovm e hratarakichnyeri batwyernyery. Mot tas@ tarvovm krvowm e yerkovharyowri hasnox karc weper
 yerkowharyowri hasnox kartch wyebyer ow patmwackner` bolorn el arkatsajin vow dyetyektiw syvovjyenyervov. Aynowamyenayniw, nra gricn awyeli pyeghvovn
 nra gricn aweli peghvovn darzrec komisar Mekrei kerpari haytnovtjowny Ajn nor bnvowyt haxordec dyetyektiv wyebi ganrin Ajd kyerpari
 ganrin Ayd kerbari migvocvow Zhvorg Simenvony ver hanyec pvowrjvovakan asgharhi hakasvowthyvownnyery:= Stegh&agvorcakan ashghatanq =Komisar
 Steghcakvor&akan ashghatanq =Gvomisar Myegryen Simenoni grkerowm dzerq e meknowm hasarak ashkhatavorin yev ajn el, amyenaoxbyergakan paherin Na patjovm
 pahyerin. Na batzhovm e watyerin, pastpanowm azniwnyerin:Kvomisar Myegreji joghvowrdakanvowtjan vkan e 1966 tvakanin Hvolandiajovm
 thwakanin Hvolandiajovm kanknyetswac nra hvovshardzan@Simyenony myekn er ayn lawakovyn krvoghnyeric, owker iryenc styeghtsagortsowtyvownnyervow
 stegh&akvorcovtyvownnyervow myek ankam yews hamozovm en, vor ajn hasarakvowtjan mej, vortegh tirvovm e pvoghi bashtamvovnqn ov harstvowthyan carawy,
 harstowthjan carave, ayntyegh anghvowsapyeli yen votchrakvortsvowthyownnere Erkar tarinyer ovsowmnasiryelov tarper datakan kortser, linyelvow
 datakan gortser, linyelvow hyetaqnnvowthjovnneri vka vow masnakits, ZH. Simenvon@ nor zyewvow bacahajtec mardvov hantsanki ev patasghanatvvowtjan
 yew batasghanatvvovtyan haskatsoxvowtyovne. Ajs arowmvov krogh@ pardzr er dasvowm Dostoewskvov ynkalovmner@ ev nshvowm hamaskharhajin krakanowthjan
 hamashxarhajin grakanowthjan myedj vownecac verdjinis nyerdrowmnere:1989 th. syeptyempyeri 4-in mahatsav amyenapari ow hanelvowkayin mardow
 hanyelvovkajin mardvow kerparn styextsox fransiaci grvox@ ZHorzh Simyenvon@Wibasan Simyenon@ 43 tarvovm hratarakel e 214 wyeb, oroncic
 hratarakyel e 214 wep, vorvoncits 80-e ostikanvovthyan komisar Mekryei masin e: Tarkmanovtyownnyeri kanakov Simenony ashxarhovm kravvowm e 5-rd
 ashkharhvovm gravowm e 5-rd tyeghe Nra steghtsagvortsowthjovnnery targmanvel en 55 lezvovnyerov ev hratarakvel 39 yerkrnyerovm Nra hayeren
 erkrnyervovm Nra hajyeryen thargmanowthjovnnyery @ntyertsoxi seghanin en drwyel 1968, 1975 yev 1984 thvyerin= Hayyeryen tarkmanwa& grakanovtyan

Oske ciran, Hajastani majrakaxaq YEryevanvovm antskacvox amenamja amenamets kinvoparatony, vor@ himnadrvel e
 kinvoparatvon@, ore himnadrwyel e 2004 twakanin «Voskye ciran» kinoyi zarkacman himnadrami, Ginokyetneri yew kinvolragrvoghnyeri hajkakan asotsiaciaji
 hajkakan asvotsiaciayi kvoghmic ew antskatswowm e hvovlisin.Paratonn amen tari nyerkayatsnvovm e 120-150 filmer mrcovthayin ev artamrtsovtayin
 mrcvovtajin yev artamrcvowthajin tarbyer tsrakryerov: Verdjin tarinerin paratone nayew Hayastanvowm amyenaaktiw lvovsapanvvogh iradardvowthjvownnyerits
 iradardzvowthjovnnyeric e:Paratoni patsman ararvoghowtyan jamanak tyexi e vownenvovm ardyen awandakan dardzac tsiranorhnyekParatvoni
 ciranorhnyeq:Paratoni patmvowtyvovny«Voske ciran» migazkayin kinvoparatvon@ himnvyel e Hajastani Hanrapetovthyan majraqaxaq YEryevanowm
 mayrakaxaq Erewanvowm 2004 th-in «Voskye ciran» kinoyi zarkacman himnadrami, Ginvogyetnyeri yev kinolrakrvoghnyeri haykakan asociaciaji
 hajkakan asvociatsiayi kvoxmic «Voskye &irani» kazmakerpicnyern yen` paratvoni klkhawor tnoren, kinvoregisvor Harvovtjvown Ghacatrjan@,
 Harvowtjovn Khachatrjane, &ragreri tnoryen, kinoqnnadat Miqajel Stampolcyan@ yew kexarvyestakan tnoryen, kinoqnnadat Svovsanna Harvowthjownyane

 kinvotatronnyerovm.«Oske ciran» mijazkayin kinoparatvoni nsanapany styexcman pahic i vyer «Qaxakakrthvovtjvovnnyeri vow mshakvowjthneri gha4myervowk»
 msakvowythneri xa4myerowk» e, vorn @ntrwats e Hayastani ev ashgharhi midjyew msakvovthajin kaperi yew yerkxosvovthjan hastatman ov ghraghvowsman
 hastatman ow xraxvovsman nbatakov.Anvanakargyery yew mrcanakneryParatonin filmer@ nyerkayacvvovm yen yereq himnakan mrcvowtayin anvanakargyervowm
 mrtsvowtayin anvanakarkyerovm khagharkajin, vaverakrakan ev haykakan hamaynabatkyer:Jvovraqanchyvowr mrtsvovtajin karkvovm shnvorhwovm e myek
 karkvovm snorhwovm e myek «Voske ciran» klxawvor mrtsanak yew mek hatovk mrcanak Paratvoni «Hajkakan hamajnabatker» anwanakarg@ hatvowk
 hamaynapatker» anwanakarky hatvowk hamahaykakan mrtsovtajin pajin e, orin karox en masnakcel cakovmov haj kinopyemadri4ner@ cankacac tevoxvovtjan
 tsankatsa& tyewoxowtyan xagharkayin, vavyerakrakan yew animatsivon filmerow.Paratvonn owni naew artamrcvovtajin &rakir, ori pajinnery
 cragir, ori pazhinnery tarbyer tarineri popvokhovtyvovnner yen krvovm, verjin tarvowm 2010-in, drank hyetyevjaln ein «YEryevanjan bremiera»,
 «YErewanjan premiera», «Haykakan Esqizner», «Pritanakan vets karcamyetrag», «Voskye ciran pardzragvovjn kinvodbrvoc»:Jjvovrin«Oske
 kinvodprots»:Jyovrin«Oskye tsirann» ovni arandin zhjvowriner hamapataskhanabar paratvoni erek` ghagharkajin, waveragrakan yev hajkakan hamaynapatkyer
 hajkakan hamajnapatker anvanakargyeri hamar. 2007 thwakanic paratvonn vovni nayew ekowmyenik yev FIPRESCI jjvovri, vorvonq talis en iryents
 oronq talis en irenc hatowk mrcanakner@.2010 thwakanin paratoni xagharkajin filmeri jyovrii naghagahyel e yeghel islandaci kinvoregisor,
 islandaci kinoryezhisvor, prodjvovsyer Fridriq Thor Fridriqson@, waweragrakan filmyeri zhjovrin nakhagahn e yexyel italaci kinoqnnadat
 italaci kinoknnadat Lovchanvo Barizvonen, isk «Hajkakan hamajnabatkyer» anwanakarki jjvovrii naghagah@ exel e kinvoget yew prvodyowser
 kinoket yew brvodjvowser Armen Myedwedyewe:«Regisorner arants sahmannyeri»«Rejisorner aranc sahmannyeri» (RAS) «Oske Cirani» stextsa&`

 naghadzyernovthyambRAS-n agaktsvowm e hamatyegh artadrvowtyan film-naghak&yerin, orvonk patsahajtovm yen azgyeri vov mshakovytneri mijew cakats
 msakvovjtneri mijyev tsagac ghndirneryRAS-n yndgtsowm e, vor Xvorhrdayin Mivowthyan plvowzvowmits hyeto Kowkasyan tara&asrganovm darervow

 stextsagorcovtyovne.Styegh&man batmvovthyvownIr wergin simfonian Sovpert@ gryel e 1825 twakanin, kompozitor@ ayn twakryel e 1828 twakani

 gyerazantsvovm e ankam Byethhvowyeni 9-rd simfvoniayin, yew himq e handisanvowm Anton Browkneri koxmic sarvownakovtyvown statsa& ebikakan

 2004 twakanin ayn mtaw Marinjan thatrvoni xaxacank Noa Helberi bemadrmamb== &anvothakrvowthjovnnyer 
Myets tricq (cin. 大跃进/大躍進), ardjvovnapyerakan bazaji amrabndman ev tntesvovtyan ktrovk werelqin mitvats tntesakan
 wyerelkin mitwa& tntesakan ev qaghakakan arshaw Cinastanvovm 1958-1960 thvakannerin Vovnetsel e voxbyergakan hetyevankner chinaci joxowrdi
 hetewanqnyer cinatsi zhvoghowrdi hamar. Ayd gamanak 4inastane 90%-ow kyvovghatntyesakan erkir er, vorin harkavor er stab tntyesvovthjowny ardiakanacnel:
 tntesvowthyown@ ardiakanacnyel Mavo TSzye-Downy marksizmi tyesaketic himnaworel e Myec tricqi kaxakakanowthjovny, bayc nra ktrovk kolektiwizatsiayi
 ktrovk kvolektivizatsiaji pvorz@ ew arhyestavarjowthyvown@ poxarinele xandavarovtjamp, ew sxal vorvoshovmner@ gyovxatntyesovtyan asbaryezowm
 gjvovghatntyesovtjan asparezvovm axetali hyetevanqnyeri hascrin Mec thri4ke 20-40 mln mardkanc mahvan arit handisacaw, yew 20-rd darovm, Erkrvord
 20-rd darowm, Erkrord hamashgharhajin batyerazmic heto metsowthyamb erkrord socialakan axetn erPatmakan naxadrjalnerMye& trichkin
 naxadryalnerMec thrickin nakhvordyel yen cinakan batmovthjan bard iradardzvowthyvovnner Erkire astijanapar wyerakangnvvowm er yerkaratev
 vyerakangnvvovm er erkaratev paterazmic heto, kazmakerbwovm er ardyvownaberowtyovny.Mi sharq baryepoghvovmnyer en katarwyel, masnawvorapyes
 katarwyel, masnavorabyes argyelvyel yen krvonakan kazmakyerpowtyownnyery ev mistik cyesyere, katarvel e masnaki kvolyektivizacia, yew kazmakyerbwel
 kolektiwizacia, yew kazmakyerbvyel en pvokr gyovghatsiakan tntesowthyovnnyer, byetovthyovne ir vra e vercryel gyowghatntyesakan artadranqi werahskvoxvovthyowny
 artadranki wyerahskvoxovthyvown@ yew pasghvovmy: Skzbnakan shrganovm Chinastane hetyevvovm er KhSHM pordin ew ogtagvorcvowm er khvorhrdajin masnagyetnyerin:Maon
 masnagetnerin.Maon havanvowtyvown ctvyec Stalini anzi bastamovnki myerkatsmane, dranic hyetvo GhSHM-i ew 4inastani mijev tarazajnowtjvownnyer
 migyew tarazajnovtjvovnnyer sksetsin: Est Mavoyi hramani 4inakan mamowl@ chandradarzav KhMGG XX hamagovmari vorvoshowmnerin, or Chinastani
 orvosvowmnerin, or 4inastani zhoxovrdi mvot «anaroghdj hetakrqrovtjvovn» 4aragana.I hakadarzovm KHMKK XX hamagvowmari orvosovmneri` 4inastani
 vorosowmneri 4inastani Gomovnistakan Kvovsakcvowthjvown@ 1956 tvakani aradj e kashyel karkaghvos` «thvogh &axkyen 100 &axik, togh mrcen 100
 tsaghik, thogh mrtsyen 100 dproc»: Sa pastatsi sadrank er, vore hnarawvorowtjvovn er talis bacahaytel komvovnistakan kvowsaktsovtjan bvolor
 kowsaktsovthjan bolvor kaxaparakan hakarakvordnerinKomvovnistakan kvowsakcowthyan zakh tewowm kaxapar arajatsaw hyenvyelov bnakchvovthjan
 hyenwelow pnakchvovtyan hamendhanowr xandawarvowtyan vra aragatsnel tntyesvovtjan atch@ 1958 thwakani mayisin pak dzeva4apow havaqwets
 pak dzevacapow hawaqwyets CHKK VIII hamakvovmari yerkrvord nstasrdjane Na, yst Mavo Cze-Dovni aradjarki, hastatyec «nvor geragvovyn ovghxowthyvown».
 keragovyn vovghxovthjown»: Endvownvets «yeryek karmir droshi» ovghghovthjvovny me& thri4q, goxovrdakan kvomvowna ew nvor gyeragowjn vowxxvowthjvown:Arawel
 keragvowyn owxxvowthyovnAravyel irates adj kvomownistnere hakarakwvovm ein ays kaghaqakanowtjane, bayc bartwyecin: Kar hawat, or karc jamanakowm
 havat, vor kartch jamanakovm hnaravor e «hasnyel yev antsnyel» aradjatar erkrnyerin, yethe poxyel pokr komvovnanyere myecerov ew sksyel ham@ndhanovr
 yew sksel hamendhanvowr vyerapvokhovmner, sksats myetaxi artadrowthyvovnits Ogtakortselvov yerkrvowm cvoreni artadrvowtjan vyerabyeryal 4hastatwa&
 wyeraperyal 4hastatwac yev chapazantsvats twyalner Mao TSze-Dovny 1958 tvakani okostosin Peydayhei endlaynvats xvorhrdaktsvowthjane haytararel
 ghorhrdakcvovtjany haytararel e, or tsvoryeni xndiry himnakanovm lovtsva& e ew aradjarkel e oxg owgere vovghghyel nran, vor 1958 tvakanin hamematac
 1958 thvakanin hamyematats 1957 thvakani het krknapatkel myetaghi artadrvowthjvowny:Peydayhei xorhrdaktsvovtyan@ voroshvyets amyenvowrek bacyel
 oroshvyets amyenvowreq batsyel goxovrdakan komvownaner: Naxatyeswvowm er, or zhoxovrdakan komvownanyerovm kzvowgakcven ardjvownaperovthjvovny,
 ardjvownaperovthyvown@, kjovghatntesvovthjvown@, krthvowtjvovny yew zinwvorakan kvor&@ Ajdpisvov orinakanacvyets Maoji naxadzyernowtjamp sksats
 nakhadernvovthjamb sksac chinakan gjvovghi «komvovnizatsman» gorcenthac@Ghekavarvyelvow endvownva& vorvosowmnerow, ChGH Pyetplane nakhag&yets
 CZHH Petplane naxagtsyec 1958-1962 thvakanneri hngamja plani nor tarbyerak, ore naxatesovm er tntyesowthyan zargatsman ktrowk ach.
 zarkacman ktrowk ach: Naxatyeswowm er ardyovnabyerakan artadranqi tvoxarkvowmy avyelatsnyel 6,5 ankam, gyovxatntyesakanine 2,5 angam,
 gjvowghatntyesakanin@ 2,5 ankam, @nd vorvovm ardjvownabervowthyan mijin tarekan ac@ pyetk e kazmyer 45 %, isk gjowghatntesakan ardjovnapyervovthyovnovm`
 ardyvownabervovthyvownvovm` 20 % pvoghpati zvowlovm@ nakhateswa& er avyelatsnyel 10 ankam, naghapyes npatakadra& 10 mln tonnan hascnel 100
 mln tonnan hastsnyel 100 milivoni:Mets thrichqi hamar mijazgayin fvon handisatsan 1956 thvakani Hownkariaji apstampowtyown@, Svowezi
 abstampovtyovn@, Sovyezi jrancki pacvovme ew Iraq hanrapyetvovtyan steghcvowmy.Hawelyal larovm arajacryets 1959 thwakani Tipyeti abstampovthyowne,
 Tipeti abstampowtjovny, ori batcharow Dalaj Laman tyexapokhvyec Hndkastan, yev orin hyetyewyec china-hndkakan harabervowtyovnnyeri watacowmy:Mye&
 harapyerowthjvovnnyeri watacovme.Me& thricqi kaghaqakanowthyvowneMec thricqy pajanwec mi sark hamazhoghowrdakan sarzhovmnyeri, orin masnaktsowm er
 sargvovmnyeri, orin masnakcvowm er mot 1 mlrd mard` pastvoryen Cinastani oghj bnak4vowthjvovne. Myets thrichq anwanvec yerkrvord 4inakan hngamyaky
 erkrord CHinakan hngamyak@ (1958—1963).Sotsialakan verapoghvovmnerKhSHM kvolyektivizatsiayi pordzin henvelow Mavo TSze-Dvowny batrastovm
 Cze-Downe patrastowm er socialakan karovtsvacki popoxvovthjvovn: Apaga kataryal hasarakowtyan himq@ CHinastanvowm byetq e darnar
 Cinastanvovm pyetq e darnar «zhoghvovrdakan kvomovnan»: Zangwa&ayin «kvomvownizmacvovmy» sksel e 1958 tvakanic: Himnakan skzpvovnke vorin
 Himnakan skzbovnke vorin petq e aradjnvordvyein joghvovrdakan kvomvownanere kajanovm er pvolvor andamnyeri hamaparpak hasarakajnatsman
 hamabarpak hasarakajnatsman meg Komovnanerowm pvoghin pvokharinowm ein asxorer@. Byeydajhyevowm elowyth ovnenalow Mavo TSze-Dovn@ asyel e`
 Mavo Tszye-Down@ asyel e Gvomovnan darnvowm er varjakan pjij. Gomvovnaji var4vovthjowne tyeghakan warcakan marmin er darnvovmKjowghatntyesvowtyan
 darnvowmGyvovghatntyesvowthyan hyet mektyex komovnanyerovm harkavvor er zargatsnel artadrowtjown Kjvowxacinere partavvor ein metagh zvowlyel,
 partavvor ein metax dovlyel, styegh&yel kjowghatntesakan gortsiqnyer yew transbvortajin migvocner1958 twakani awartin styeghcvyel er 26 hazar
 styexcvel er 26 hazar kvomvovna 20 hazar mard migin 4apvovJvowrakan4jvovr gvortsaran ew qaghaqajin shrgan nowjnbes harkawor er werapvokhyel
 harkavvor er vyerapokhel kvomvownayi gjvowxakan kvomvownaneri orinakvovGjvovxeri komvovnizmatsowm@ kkyvowxacinerin shat hogser byerets: Gyvowghatntyesakanashkhatanknyerits
 Kjovxatntyesakanashxatanqnerits heto, hankstanalvov pogharen nranq stibwats ein myetagh haletsnyel kyvowghakan metaxagvorcakan wararannyervowm,
 metaxagorcakan vararannervovm, zbaghvyel «4vors wnasatovnyeri» dyem pajqarvow ev gamanak hatkatsnyel kaghbarabmvownknerin:Ardjovnkowm dashtyer@
 qaghparabmownknerinArdyovnkovm dashtere mshakyelvow hamar jamanake cher hyerikovm Teghakan iskhanvovthjownnyer@ mec hajoxowthjvovnneri batranq styex&yelow
 hadjoxvovtyvownnyeri patrank styex&elvow kvockowm ein iravijak@, yew tyes4akan ayceri gamanak nyerkayatsnvovm nyenkapoxwac haswyetwvowthjownnerPokr myetalowrgiaTntyesakan
 myetalvowrkiaTntyesakan vyerelki ev indvowstralizaciayi klxavor ghndir@ hamarvvowm er boxpati artadrvovthjvowny. Amenowreq sksel ein
 Amyenvowrek sksel ein karvovtsyel hvovmkic myetagh stanalvov artadramasyer, ajn debkvowm, erp batsakayovm ein metaghagortsowtjan yev martyenjan
 metaxagor&vovthjan ew martyenjan wararani masin himnarar gityeliqnyere:Kowsaktsovthyan xyekavar hrahangnyeri hamadayn amyenvowreq karvovcowm
 amyenvovrek karovcvowm ein kavits pvokr wararannyerr, vorvonw warelanjvowt@ paytn er 1958 thwakani asnany oghj CHinastanovm korcowm
 Chinastanowm gortsvovm ein 700 hazar tnajnagorcakan dvomnayin vararanner, metaxi artadrovtyane nyerkrawvyel ein mot 100 mln mard.Dyerews
 100 mln mard:Deryevs 1959 twakanin ghndri ovsvovmnasirvowtjownits yew aradjin pvorderic barz dardaw, vor lav oraki myetagh hnarawvor
 oraki myetagh hnaravor e stanal miajn me& wararannyerowm yew me& gorcarannervovm, varyeliq ogtagor&yelvow miajn qara&vowx Pajts nakhagice
 qaracovx. Payc naxagic@ sharovnakwvowm er, bnakchovtyvovne sarownakowm er pnakawayrin moti qaracvovx ardjvownahanel ew ardiakanatsnyel
 ardyvownahanel yew ardiakanacnyel wararannyere:Ardjownkowm artadrwovm er anvorak tvovg, vore pvoxbati wyeratsvelvov hamar lratsvowcich msakovm er
 lratsowtsich msakowm er bahanjovm yev inqn el mecatsaval oktagvortsman hamar pitani cerGHyekawarvowtjowny hiacac er hamyndhanowr verelqvov,
 ham@ndhanovr weryelkvov, isk masnaketnyere vaxyenvm ein elowyt ovnyenal qnnadatovthjamb.1958 thwakanin bvoghpati artadrvovtyowny achets
 artadrvovthyowne ajyets 45 %,-vov, isk 1959 thvakanin yevs 30 %.-vov: Bajc 1961 twakanin parz dardav pvoqr metalvovrkiayi anardyownavetvovtyvowne,
 anardjownavyetvovtjown@, pvoghpati artadrowthjowny ktrvovk ankvowm abryets ev 1958 thwakani artadrovtjan makardakin hasaw miajn 1964 twakanin.

Havana, kovbaci–amerikaci erkchowhi ev yergahan Gamila Gapelvoji yerkn e` reper Jang Thagi masnakcvovthjamb.
 Thaki masnaktsvowtyamp. YErk@ OMG–i het hamategh togharkvyec 2017 tvakani okvostvosi 3–in` orbyes kowazdayin singl: Sakayn okvostvosi
 singl: Sakayn okostosi 30–in Kabelvon svoctsantseri mijvocvov hajtnec, or yergy ktsarayi spaswvogh dyebyvowtajin Camila albomi erkrvord
 Camila alpomi yerkrvord sinkl. YErgn vowgharkwyec radio kayannyer syebtyemperi 8–in«Havana»–i inqnapvowgh hagoxowthjovnic ew paymanakan
 hajoghovtjvownic yew bajmanakan lid–singl Crying in the Club–i alpvomits hyeracnyelowc hyetvo yerge hyetewabar darzaw batsaj aradjin sinkl: YErky
 batshaj arajin singl: YErg@ ownecaw mijazkayin hadjvoghvovtjvovn Shvotlandiajovm hasnelow aragin horizonakani, isk tvop tasy mi shark yerkrnyerowm,
 mi sharq erkrnyervowm, nyerarjal Awstralia, Kanada, Dania, Kermania, Niderlandnyer, Nvor Zelandia, Shwyeycaria, Miacyal THakavorowtyvovn

 teskstayin arovmvov erkchovhi Kvowbatsi &agovm ownyenalov pasti yndvownman masin e: Gabyelon erkovm e latinakan vocow ogeshncwa& dashnamowrajin
 okyeshnchvac dashnamovrajin ritmow: Billboard–i askhatakic Sadi Byely meknapanyel e erki hyetewyal ghoskyer@- «Half of my heart is in Havana
 my heart is in Havana (Im srti kyese Hawanajovm e)», aselow, vor «ajn sirawepi masin e, vor Gabelvoyi sirty toxyel e harawovm»:
 sirte toxel e haravvowm»: Rolling Stone amsagri hamar grelis Britani Spanosy nkaragrec yerg@ «akowmpajin ev hankist», ortyegh Kamilan
 hangist», vortyegh Kamilan siraharwovm e ghvorhrdawor myekin Aryewelyan Atlantajic, cnajats, or na toxel e ir sirt@ hayreni qaghakvowm.

Van Pis animei ew mangayi kerbarnyeri tsanke, voronc styeghcel e Ei4iro Odan:Cghvotye klkharki tsovahyennerStexcagorcvovtyan
 &vovahyennyerStyex&akortsovtyan klxavor hyerosnere - Cxvotye klgharki tsowahyenneri xvowmpy (cap.` 麦わら海賊団), nayew Tsxvote klxarki ghvowmpy (tchap.
 klxarki khvowmby (cap.` 麦わらの一味): Xvowmpi stegh&voghy hamarwvovm e Monki Di Lovffin, ore animei glghavvor hervosn e: Amboxj patmvowtjan
 e: Amboxj patmovtjan yntackovm na havakvowm e ir xmbi masnakitsnyerin: Ajd xmbi mej e mtnowm Rorvonoa Zvorvon, ory myenamartvowm
 Zorvon, ore menamartvowm e yerek threrow, ghyekabet Namin, hretadzik yev kjowtarar Ovsopy, votkerow myenamarti varbet Sanjin, bgishk Toni-Toni
 Sandjin, pzhisk Tvoni-Tvoni CHvopery, hnaket Niko Robiny, kibvork ew nawi hjvovsn Fryenkin yev kmaxk-yeragisht Prvowk@:«&xvotye glghark» Mvonki
 Browky:«Tsxvotye klghark» Mvonqi Di Lvowffi (jab.` モンキー・D・ルフィankl.` Monkey D. Luffy) - styextsagor&owthyan glghawvor hervos@, khmpi xekaware:
 hervose, xmpi xyekawar@: Manowk hasakvovm na keraw ryezin-rezin ptovxe yew dardav «ryezinits mard»: Lovffin ampvoghg batmovtjan yntacqvovm
 patmvovtyan ynthackowm yerazowm e darnal Tsvovahyennyeri Arka: Himnakan hvodwa& - Monki Di LowffiLowffin myetsacel e Ist Blvow-i
 metsatsyel e Ist Plvow-i Fowsa pokrik gjvovxowm: Manowk jamanak nran prkel e Shanks@: Ayd herosy Lovffiin nwiryec &xotye glghark@,
 nviryec cxvote glghark@, voric glghavor hyervose mincyew hima ci paganwovm: Lvovffii dastiarakovtyamp zpaghvyel e Monki Di Garby, ore

«Hello», ankliaci yergchvowhi Adeli ergy Ayn thoxarkwyel e 2015 twakani hvoktyemberi 23-in vorbyes nra «25»
 23-in orpyes nra «25» anvanvowmy krvox errord albvomi aradjin singl. Adeln erge kryel e Kryek Qerstini het, vov naew zpaxwel e yergi
 vow nayev zpaxwel e yergi prvodjvovserakan ashkhatanqvov. YErge togharkman hents aradjin sabatowm klghavvoryel e mi sarq erkrnyeri hith skyertner,
 erkrneri hith shkerthner, ayd thwovm pritanakan sinklneri hith shqert@ ew amyerikyan Billboard Hot 100-@:Naghapatmvovtyovn yev tvogharkowmAdyel@

 hatva& hncel e pritanakan «Iks faktor» herowstasovowi govazdajin dadarnyerits myeki jamanak Hvoktyempyeri 23-in yerge thogharkwyel e orbyes

 nvovjn tarwa nvoyyembyeri 20-in:TesahvolvowakYErgi tesaholvowaky, vori rezhisvorn e kanadatsi dyerasan ew rejisvor Ksawje Dvolane, nyerkayatsvyel

 vowsadrvovthjowne hrawirovm e ir hamar nvor lyezvi miankamits mi kani nor haskacovtyownner wra, yew, incn amyenakarewvorn e, vowsanvoxe haskanvovm
 e, owsanvoghe haskanowm e tvyal &rakraworman lezvvov grwats crakri himnakan karvovcwacke.Cnaja& nran, or pvorznakan tsrakryern oktagvortsvovm

Anvan ajl kirarowmnyeri hamar tyes` Haovs (ajl kirarvowmnyer)«Pjishk Haovs» (angl. House, M. D.), amerikjan
 House, M. D.), amyerikjan hervovstasyerial bgisk Krekori Havowsi (angl.` Gregory House) yev ir timi masin. Ganrvow iryenits nerkayacnovm
 iryenits nerkayacnovm e bgskakan drama, sakayn syowjyei mej arka yen dyetektiwi tarrer: Hyerovstaserial@ haytni e dardzyel amboghdj
 haytni e darzel amboghg ashkharhin:Aradjin serian ekran e bardratsyel 2004 thvakani nvoyempyeri 16-in FOX hyerovstaalikvow: Vowterord
 hyerowstaaliqvow Vowthyervord syezoni pryemieran kajacael e 2011 thvakani hvoktembyeri 3-in: Herowstaserialy tharkmanwyel e tarper lezovnerow
 e tarper lyezvownerov ew ethyer e dowrs yekyel tarbyer yerkrnyerowm.2012 tvakani petrwari 8-in haytararwets, vor vovthervorde klini hyervowstaseriali
 klini hyerovstasyeriali ezrapakich sezony: 2012 twakani majisi 21-in FOX hervovstaalik dvowrs ekav «Pzhisk Haows» hervovstaseriali
 Havows» hervovstaseriali werjin` 177-rd syerian: 2013 tvakani tvjalnyeri hamazayn, hervowstasyerial@ ditel yen avyeli qan 80 milion
 awyeli kan 80 milivon hyerowstaditvogh ev ajn haytnwel e Ginesi ryekordneri grqvowm:Yndhanovr teghyekowtjvovnBzhishk Haovsy (dyerakatare
 tyeghekvowthyovnBzhishk Havowse (dyerakatare Hyow Lvori ankl. (Hugh Laurie), vor ir deri hamar 2006 yew 2007 thwakannyerin statsel e «Oske globvovs» mrtsanak),
 «Oske klobows» mrtsanak), hianali akhtvorosox e yerkvow ktsov. ljardi hiwandowthyan (nefrolokia) yew infektsion hiwandovthjovnneri, sakayn
 hiwandowtjvownneri, sakayn pnawvorovthyan voros gtsyeri patcharvow na ir kvorcenkyernyeri yev hivandnyeri siryelin ce. na cinik e, ktrowk, pak
 cinik e, ktrovk, pak ev hakvac e voc oki clsyelown: Haowsi masin amyenalaw xosker@ bjisk Formani khosqern en. «Na ci khakhtovm kanvonnery,
 chi xakhtvovm kanvonnery, na dranq arhamarhvowm e»: Isk Havowsi sireli ghosqn e. «Bvolory stvowm en»: Hents sa el nran oknowm e koxmnorvosvel
 oknowm e koghmnorvosvel ew lowtsovmnyer ktnyel amyenadzhvar irawicaknerovm ew prkyel yevs myek hiwandi kyank. Inch or zhamanak Havovse yentarkvel
 gamanak Havowse entharkvel e infarkti, vorits nra aj azdr@ anyndhat cavyeri medj e Haowse ogtagorcvowm e wikadin kocvvox dyexy, vory barvownakovm
 degh@, vory parvownakovm e thmranjovt, sakajn tsave myexmacnvovm e. Pastaci Haows@ thmramvol e Na dyexahaper @ndvownvovm e ir hivandneri
 endvownvovm e ir hiwandneri mvot ew myec qanakov: Hachakh ir antaktowthyovnn vov thach pnaworovtyvovne myeknabanowm e cavvow. Na thmramol e,
 cavvow. Na thmramvol e, vov 4i cankanovm pvowjvel. ampoghg hervowstaseriali yntackovm nra @nkerner@ pvordzvovm en nran hamozel` endvownyelov
 hamozel` @ndvovnelow pvovjovmy, sakajn Havovsy hragarwowm e. Havovsi oknakannyere yeritasard ev khostvovmnalits pjiskner yen. imovnvolvok

 Li Robyertsy:«House M.D. Original Television Soundtrack» hratarakovtjvowny Nettwerk Records dajnagrman stvovdiayi hyet 2007
 dzajnakrman stovdiayi het 2007 twakani sebtyempyeri 18-in daynakretsin mi shark yerkeri ampoxdjakan tarpyeraknery, vorvonk nakhkinovm arden hn4yel

 katarmamp yew «Dear God» erke Sara Maklahlani katarmamp, orvonq dajnakrvats ein hatowk hyervowstasyeriali hamar:In4pyes nayew alpomi
 hamar.Incbyes nayev alpvomi myej nyerarwyel yen «You Can’t Always Get What You Want» yerk@` Band from TV-i katarmamb ew ajl katarvowmner:

 xaghatsvox@ karox e ghyekawarel hiwandowtjan akhtorvoshovm@patkerasrah																== TSanvothagrowthjovnnyer 
«YEs yerazanq vovnyem» (ankl.` «I have a dream»), Martin Ljvowter Qingi amyenahajtni chari anwanovm@, vortegh
 tchari anwanvovme, vortex na cvovyc e twyel abakayi masin ir patkyeracovmnyery, ortegh sewamorthnyern vov sbitakamvorthnyery karvogh en hawasar
 spitakamortnyery karvogh en hawasar abrel:PatmovtyvovnMartin Ljvovther King@ ays carov elvovyth e ovnyecyel 1963 thvakani ogvostvosi 28-in Linqolni
 ogostosi 28-in Linqolni hvovshahamaliri astichannyerits Askhatankayin tyexeri ew azatowtjan Vasingtoni erthi jamanak: Da 1955-1968 thvakanneri
 1955-1968 thwakanneri qaghakaciakan irawownqneri hamar Amyerikjan sarjman zhamanakwa hamar karyevoragvovjn bah er Elvovjti jamanak
 er. YElovythi gamanak byemowm gtnvowm er naev erkchowhi Maxalia Djyeksony, elvowythi zhamanak na andradardav Qingin. «Patmi!r nranc
 Qingin. «patmi!r nranc yerazanqi masin, Martin» Qinki yelowyth@ lavagowjnnerits myekn e hamarwvovm patmovthjan mej ew amerikyan hasarakowthyan
 amyerikyan hasarakovthjan koxmic canachwel e hryetvorakan arwesti XX dari lavakowjn korts.Cari oj@«YEs yerazanq vownyem» char@ hamarvvovm
 ownem» jare hamarvowm e hryetvorakan arvesti glowghgortsocneric myek@. Otchy hishyecnvovm e babtistakan qaroz. Ayn li e Astwatsashnchi,
 Ajn li e Astwatsasnci, AMN Ankaghvovthjan hrchakagri, Strvovknyeri azatvovthjan manifesti ew AMN Sahmanadrovthyan karvoznervov:TSanotakrowthyvovnnerArtaqin
 karvoznervov:CanvotakrvowtjvownnerArtakin hghowmnyerTchari teqstyTchari tyekste (ankl.)Cari tyeksty (rovs.)Avowdivodaynagrvovtyvovn (angl
Olimbosi astwatsner (olimbiakannyer) hin hvownakan ditsabanowthyan medj errord syerndi astwatsnyer (arajin yew yerkrord
 astwacnyer (arajin ew erkrvord serndi astwacnyeri ew titanneric heto), Olimpos (Olimpios) sari vra bnakwvogh bardrakowjn eaknyer:Avandapar
 parzrakovjn eakner.Avandabar olimbiakan astva&nery tasnyerkvowsn yen, theev drants anvanatsankery och mist yen hamenknvovm Hin hownakan krvonvovm,
 Hin hovnakan krvonvovm, Tasnerkov Olimbiatsiner@ hvownakan ditsarani himnakan astvacvowthjvownern en, svovorabar drank en` Zyevs, Hyera,
 dranq yen Zyews, Hyera, posyejdvon, Demyetra, Atyenas, Apvollon, Ares, Hepyestos, Hyermes, Artyemis, Afrodite, yew kam Hestia vov Dionisos.Hadyes
 Hestia ow Dionisos:Hadyes ow Pyersyepvonyen yerbemn nyerarvats ein vorbes Tasnyerkov Olimpiaciner (himnakanowm paymanavvorwa& e Elevowsinjan
 bajmanawvorwa& e Elyeowsinyan ghvorhovrdneri azdecovthjamp), tyeyew endhanvovr armamp Hadesy pacarwvovm e, qani or na bnakvovm e mstapes djvokhqovm
 bnakwovm e mshtapyes dzhoghkovm ev erpemn e ajtsyelvovm Olimpos lery: Erbyemn @ndkrkwa& ein linvovm Herakles ev AsklepiosTasnerkov OlimpiatsinyereTasnyerkvov
 OlimpiacinyereTasnerkov Olimpiatsinyer@ vorvonk naew hajtni en vorbyes Dvodakyevyevon Dodekatheon (hvovnaryen` hvovn- Δωδεκάθεον, δώδεκα,
 Δωδεκάθεον, δώδεκα, dōdeka, «tasnyerkvov» + θεοί, theoi, «astwa&ner»), hovnakan banthyeoni himnakan astwatsvovtyvownnnern en, pnakwovm
 astva&vowthjvovnnnern en, pnakvvowm ein Olimbvos` araspyelakan leran wra. Olimbiacinyer@ stacel ein irents gyerazancvowtyvowny astva&neri batyerazmovm,
 astwa&neri paterazmowm, orvow hetev Zevsy ir yexbajrneri ow qvowyreri klkhawvorvowthyamp, haxtanak er tarel Titanyeri dem.«Tasnerkow
 Titaneri dyem:«Tasnyerkvow Astvacneri» hajecakargy pavakan hin e qan cankatsa& pahpanwa& hvovnakan kam hromeakan aghbjowrnyer@. Astwacnery
 axbjovrnere. Astwa&nery handipvovm yen ghorhrdaktsowtyan zhamanak Homyerosi epvosowm, payc aradjin hnagovyn hghvowmy, ortyegh en bvolvor Olimpiacinery`
 bvolvor Olimpiatsinere` krvonakan ararvoghovtjvownnyeri zhamanak, ktnwowm e Hvomerosyan orhnerkvovm Hermesin.Tasnerkov Olimbiatsineri
 Hyermesin:Tasnyerkvow Olimbiatsinyeri hvovnakan pastamvovnqe karvox e nkatvyel 6-rd darvovm Athyenkvowm, ev, havanapar cvovni naghadep Mikyenyan gamanakahatwacovm
 Mikenyan jamanakahatwacovm: Tasnerkvow Olimbiacineri ghvoran@ Athenqvovm soworapar thwagrvvowm e 522/521 m.th.a.Tasnyerkov aravel hajagh
 m.th.a.Tasnerkow aravel hatchax patkervats arwestvowm yew poyeziayowm olimbiacinere hyetewyaln en Zews, Hyera, posyeydon, Dyemetra, Atyenas, Apvollon,
 Dyemyetra, Atenas, Apvollvon, Aryes, Hepestvos, Hyermyes, Artyemis, Afroditye, yev / kam Hestia vov Divonisvos:Hadesn haytni er Elyeovsinyan
 hajtni er Eleovsinjan awandowjthi myej orbyes plovton, sovorabar @ndkrkvac cer Olimpiatsineri sarqervovm, kani or nra tagaworowtyovne
 nra thakawvorvovtyovny dzhoghkn er, stvorgetnja thagavorovtyowny.Platvone kabowm er Tasnyerkvow Olimbiacinerin tasnyerkow amisneri
 Olimpiatsinyerin tasnyerkvov amisnyeri hyet, yev hamarvvowm er Plvovtonin irentsic myeky, vowm ir yentadrvovthyamb, nwirwats er vyergin amis@ ew myerats hvokinyer@.
 amis@ yev myerac hoginery. Na naew miacnvowm er Tasnerkow Olimpiatsinerin Gendanakyerpi nshannerin yew patsarvowm er iryents sarqyeric Hestiayin.Pajc
 sharqeric HyestiajinPayc Knidostsi Evdoksvowsy aragin er, ov hamematel yew kabel er Olimbiacinyerin Kyendanakyerpi nsanyeri hyet Hin
 Gendanakerpi nshanyeri hyet. Hin hovnakan kronowm, «Olimpiakan astwatsnyer@» yev «Tasnerkov astwacneri pashtamvownqe», tarber haskatsovthyovnner
 tarber haskatsvovthyovnner ein. Hamazayn Hyervodorosin Herakleajits, Dodakyewevontsinyern ein ` Zyevs, Hyera, posejdon, Athenas, Abollon,
 posejdon, Athyenas, Apollon, Hyermyes, Alpyeos, Grvonvos, Hrea yev Karisnyerpatmakan Hyervodotvowse nayew Heraklyesin er miatsnvowm Olimbiatsinyerin:Yst
 Olimbiatsinerin:@st Gosin, Heraklyes yev Divonisosn ein sharqervovm, i tarpyerowthyvown Aresi ew Hyepyestvosi, voronk pacakayowm ein:pindar
 pacakayvowm ein:Pindar yev Hyervodorose patsarowm ein Herkvowlyesi andamaktsowthjowne olimpiacinyerin, sakayn nshvovm ein, or hyenc na e
 nsvowm ein, vor hyents na e stextsel nrants bashtamvownk@.Lvowtsiane (2-rd dar) miacnovm er Herkowlyesin yev Asklebiosin Tasnerkvov Olimbiatsinerin.
 Tasnyerkvov Olimpiacinerin. Hebye, Helios, Evos, Selenye yev pyersepvone erbyemn kcvowm ein Tasnerkvov OlimbiacinerinErvosn hatchakh batkervac
 Olimpiacinerin.Ervosn hatchax batkyervac er linvowm Afrvoditye i kvoghqin, payc svovvorabar 4er haswvovm iryencic meky. Hrvomyeakan panastyex& Eniowse talis
 panastegh& Enivowsy talis e Hrvomyeakan hamarzheknyer (The Dii Consentes), vyec tghamardik, wyets kanayk, bahpanelow Westajin (hromyeakan
 Vyestajin (hromyeakan Hestia), ow ghaghacyel e karevvor der Hromeakan kroni myedj, vorpes byetakan astvacvowhi ew wyestalneri ghyekawarOlimbiakan
 ghekawar.Olimpiakan astwatsneri anvanatsankKlxavor Olimpiatsiner@Ayl olimpiacinerHetyewjal astva&nyery ew astwa&ovhinere yerpemn

 bnaki4neryHetevjal astvatsnyery, astwatsowhineri ev kisastva&nyer@ svovorabar 4yen hamarwel Olimbiatsi, sakayn nranq sert kabyeri meg ein nrants

 harawayin, arewyelkajin ev arewmtyan).Aovra sare kamineri yev maqvovr odi astvatsowhi:Pia owgi marmnacowmGirkye kaxardovtyan pvoqr

Ghogalowi aryvownahexvowtyovny GHarabaxyan baterazmi gamanak texi ownecac midjadyep, vori jamanak zvohwyel yen
 ori jamanak zvohvel en mi kani tasnyak (@st adrpejanakan axbyovrnyeri haryowrawor) kaxakatsiakan pnakcvovthjvovn. Debqyery texi yen
 pnak4ovtjvown. Depqyery texi en ownyetsyel 1992 th. pyetrvari 22-in` Arcakhi Ivanyan (Ghvogali) kyovxi azatakrowmits heto.Iradardowthjvownneri
 hetvoIradardvovtjvovnnyeri gamanakagrvovthjvownGhogalvovn adrbejantsi bnaki4neri kanakov Showshiic heto yerkrord bnakavayrn er LGHIM-vowm.
 pnakawajrn er LGhIM-owm: Ayn kabvovm er Styepanakyert@ Askyerani het tanvogh tchanaparhe Ajn naev razmakan mets nshanakowtyvown vowni, orvowhetev
 nshanakvovtyown vovni, orovhyetev ajntex e ktnwowm Lyernajin gharabaghi miak odanavakayany. Sksac 1988 t. Adrbejanakan ishkhanvovtjownnere kazmakerpvats
 ishghanvovtjvownnery kazmakerpwa& kerbvow awelacrel yen ghvojalvovi bnakcowtjvovn@: 1988-ic 1991 tt. KHogalvovn stanowm e kaghaki kargavitchak, isk
 qaghaqi kargawicak, isk bnak4ovtyowne 2135-its darnovm e 6300: 1992-i hownwarin kaghaqe amboxjvowin shrgapakwowm e haykakan owzheri
 shrgapakvovm e haykakan vovgeri kvoghmits Pnakichnyeri mi masy inqnakam lqowm e qaxak@, sakajn kazmakerpva& tarhanovm ajdpes el chi kazmakerpvvovm
 el 4i kazmakerbvvovm. Krvohi pahin qaghaqi bnakcovthjowne tarber twjalnervov kazmowm er 2000-4000 mard.Adrbegani nyerkajatsra&
 mardAdrbedjani nerkajacrac tyesaketi knnadatvovthjvownGravor axbyvowrnerTyes naevGharapaxjan paterazmi zhamanakakrovtyovnAxbyovrnerArtakin

Kenyeth Li Lyey (ankl.` Kenneth Lee Lay, aprili 15, 1942 - hvowlisi 5, 2006), amyerikatsi gvorcarar, aravyel
 amerikaci korcarar, aravel haytni orpyes «Enrvon» korporaciayi himnadir ev kvortsadir tnoryen` 1985 tvakanic minchyev ir hrazharakany 2002
 ir hrazharakany 2002 thvakani hovnvari 23-@ 2000 thvakani enthatsqovm Leyin, orbes gortsadir tnoryen, mi qani amsvow pogharinyel
 qani amsov pvoxarinel e Djyef Skilinke Eghyel E Gvorj Pvovs krtseri naghakahakan karozarshavnyeri arawyel aktiw hamaghvohnerits yew hvovanawornerits.Leji
 hvowanawornericLyeyi anowne kapvvowm e korboratiw ashxarhi patmowtjan ghvosvorakovjn skandalnyerits myeki «Enroni» hasvabahakan
 «Enroni» hashvapahakan zexcararvowtjan het 2004 twakani hvowlisi 7-in datarane Lyeyin mexavvor e chanachvovm arzhethghthyeri xardaghovtjan
 argyethxtyeri ghardaxvowtyan 11 tesaki yew nmanatip zex&ararowthyvownnyeri meg, masnawvorapyes ynkyerowtjan irawijaki masin kyex& finansayin
 masin kyexts finansajin hasvetvovthyvownnyer nyerkayatsnelvov medj. 2006 thwakani hovnvari 31-in Hyvowstonowm teghi e ovnenovm Leyi yew
 teghi e vownyenovm Leyi yew Skilinki datavarovtjown@. Nvovjn thvakani majisi 25-in datarany Lejin myeghavor e canacowm nerkajacwac 11
 tchana4vowm nerkayatsvac 11 mexadranknerits 10-owm. Qani vor nerkajacwa& mexadrankneric yovraqancjvowre entadrvovm er 5-10 tarwa azatazrkvovm,
 5-10 tarwa azatazrkvovm, pordzaketnern hamvozwac ein, or Lyejin sbasvvowm e 20-30 tarva aztazarkovm: Vyergnakan datawarovtjvownic yerek
 datawarvowthjovnits eryek ow kyes amis arag` 2006 th.-i hvovlisi 5-in Leyy knkowm e mahkanacvown: @st naxnakan diaherzman haswetwvovthjovnnyeri
 hashwyetvowtyvovnnyeri Leje hanakarcamah e exel srti katwatsic. Leyi mahic hetvo datarane nran hyetmahow azatvowm e mexadranqnerits.
 azatvovm e mexadranqneric Gan bazmativ tesovtjvownner, or Lyej@ kyex&el e ir mahe, orbyeszi azatwi iren nyerkayatswats meghadranqnyerits:TsanothagrvovthjovnnyerArtakin

KHanasvori Wardan kam barzapyes Vardan (irakan anown-azkanovn Sargis Mehrapyan, 1870- 1943), haj kaxakakan,
 1943), haj qaghaqakan, razmakan gvor&ic:KensagrvowtyovnTSnvel e 1870 t. Artsaghvovm Carajel e rovsakan panakvovm: 1890 thvakanic
 panakvovm 1890 tvakanits korcyel e Atrpatakanovm, zinatar khmbyerow hacakh ancyel Vasbvovrakan, paxwyel tvovrk sahmanapah vowzhyeri ev qrderi
 sahmanapah vovgyeri ew qrdyeri hyet: 1894 t. Nikvol Dowmani het masnaktsyel e Dyeriki wanqi krwin: 1895 t. majisin 22 hokanvots ghmbow Atrpatakanic
 hvoganoc ghmpvow Atrpatakanic ancnvowm e Van: 1896 tvakani karnane ghyekavarel e Shataxi inqnabashtpanovtjvowny, novjn tvakani syebtemperin
 tvakani septempyerin masnakcel Vani krivnerin: 1897 thwakanin nshanakvyel e GHanasvori arsavanki yndhanowr hramanatar: 1898 t.
 hramanatar 1898 t. orpyes SHatakhi nerkayatsovtsi4 masnaktsowm e Hay hyexapoghakan Dashnaktsvowthyan 2-rd endhanowr zhvoxvovin. Zhvoxvow@
 @ndhanvowr jvoxowin. Zhvoxov@ Vardanin Aghpyvowr Syerobi (Syervob Vardanjan), Sewkaryeci Sakoji (Sarkis &vovianjan) ev Govrgeni (Baxdasar Maljan)
 Gvovrgyeni (Paxdasar Malyan) hyet entrowm e vorbyes Pardzravandaki (Sasvown) Patasxanatow marmni andam, bajts Wardany hrajarwvowm e ayd
 Wardan@ hrazharvvovm e ayd bashtvonic 1901-1905 tth. Vardane Bakvvowm er, owr askhatvowm er Paqwi navthahorerovm arants Pakvi kovsaktsakan
 aranc Pakwi kowsakcakan kjankin masnaktsowtjan: 1905 twakani hay-tatharakan @ndharvowmneri zhamanak hyenc Wardanin e wstahvovm Arcakhi
 Vardanin e vstahvvowm Arcaxi inknabashtpanvowthyovne 1907 th. masnaktsvowm e Viennayvovm kayatsats HJD 4-rd endhanvowr goghvowin: 1908 twakani
 joghvovin: 1908 tvakani eritthvovrkakan hexashrjovmic hyetvo hastatvyel e Izmiri srdjani Maghnisa kyvowghvowm, vowr mnvowm e min4yew 1914 t.
 mnovm e min4ew 1914 t.. Mi kerp prkwelvov thowrq jardararnerits` hastatwowm e Bakvovm 1915 t. skzbin antsnovm e Thiflis: 1915 th.
 ancnowm e Thiflis. 1915 t. skzbin nsanakwvowm e Haykakan kamaworakan 5-rd kndi hramanatar: 1915 thwakani karnane nshanakvowm e Araratyan
 nsanakwovm e Araratyan kndi (nra kazmi meg ein mtnowm Hajkakan kamaworakan 2-rd, 3-rd, 4-rd yew 5-rd gndyer@) hramanatar, vor@
 gndyere) hramanatar, vory orpyes rovsakan panaki aradjabah oknowthjan e hasel Vaspowrakani hayovthjane 1917 th. dardzyal hastatvvovm
 t. dardzjal hastatvvowm e Bakwowm, vortegh andamakcvowm e Baqvi Hay azkajin xorhrdin. 1918 twakanin Paqvi Hay azgajin ghvorhrdi koghmic
 azgayin ghorhrdi koghmic Vardane @ntrvovm e Baqwi haj zinworakan kyerakovjn marmni andam Hayastani Hanrapetowtyan srganowm (1918-1920
 shrdjanowm (1918-1920 thth.) zbaxvvovm e ir entaniki hokserow yev agaraki mshakowtjamb` hervow mnalvov kaghakakan kyanqic Hajastani
 qaxaqakan kyanqits: Hayastani ghorhrdajnacvowmits hyetvo min4ew kjanki werdj@ apryel e Eryevanovm` linelow orinapah kaxakatsi: Mahatsyel e 73 taryekan
 Mahacel e 73 tarekan hasakowm` 1943 tvakani hovnvari 2-in, Erewanvowm: Taxwac e Eryewani qaghakayin gyerezmanatane Nra vordin,
 geryezmanatany: Nra vordin, or amowsnatsyel er Hajastani Arajin Hanrabetowthjan himnadir Aram Manvowkyani (Sarkis Hvovhannisjan) dster
 Howhannisyan) dstyer het, zvohwyel e Hayrenakan Me& patyerazmowm (1941-1945 tt.):Vardani masin kan bazmativ hjvowsvats erger.KrakanovtjownKHanasvora
