«Giyew-Mvogilaji akademia» azgajin hamalsaran (GMAAH) (vowkr. Національний університет «Києво-Могилянська
 університет «Києво-Могилянська Академія», НаУКМА), Vovkrainaji petakan pardzrakovjn vovsvowmnakan hastatvovtyown, ktnvvowm e Giyevowm` hnagvovjn
 gtnwowm e Kiyevvovm` hnakvovyn Pvodoli taratskovm. Akadyemian himnadrvel e 1615 thvakanin, orbyes wanq, hiwandanvoc yew dprots bvolor dasi yerexanyeri
 polvor dasi ereghanyeri hamar Metrvopolit Mokilan ayn dardzrel e Kiyew-Exbayrakan kolekia (1632): Mvogilayi mahits hetvo ajn stacel
 mahic heto ajn statsyel e akadyemiaji karkawitchak yew ko4vyel e Kiyev-Mvokilajakan akademia (1659-1817), aydpisvow, hamarvovm e Vovkrainayi
 hamarvowm e Vowkrainayi yeryek amyenahin povhyeric myeke Ostrvozhi akademiayic ew Lwowi hamalsaranic hyeto, in4pyes naew Aryewyelyan YEwrobayi
 naew Arewyelyan YEvrobaji amenahin barzragvovjn dprvocnerits mek@ Nerkajowms Owkrainajvowm yeresown krthakan hastatovtjvownnyerits mekn
 hastatvovthyvovnnyeric mekn e, vorn vovni hetazvotakan ew inknavar hamalsarani kargavitchak Hamagor&akcovm e pazmathiw midjazgayin hamalsaranneri
 midjazkajin hamalsaranneri hyet, inchbyes orinak, YEwrobakan hamalsarannyeri asotsiatsiaji. Hamalsaran@ erklezow e` ovkraineryen yew anglyeren
 vovkraineren ev ankleryen. Owkrainayi ayn pokrathiv hamalsarannyeric e, ory migazkajin canachvovm owni17-18-rd daryerovm Kiyew-Mvogilaji
 daryerowm Giyew-Mokilayi akadyemian kaewvor dyer e khaghacyel Vovkrainayi yew Rowsastani intelyektvowal ev hokevvor kyanqowm Akadyemiayi sanyeric
 kjankovm. Akadyemiaji sanyeric en akanavor gvortsichnyeric hethman Ivan Mazepan, pilisvopa Grikori Skvoworvodan, Simeon Polotskin, bzhishk Danilvo
 polockin, pzhishk Danilvo Samvoylovi4y yew ajlq. Ayntyegh e svovvorel naew Mikhajil Lomonosvowy Hamalsaran@ orakwel e arewmtamyet yew &arayel
 arevmtamyet yew &arayel e Narnjakowyn hexapvokhvovtjan aktiwistneri stab:PatmvovthjovnGiyew-Exbayrakan kolyekiaji himnadrovmHvokevor
 kvolyegiaji himnadrovmHokewvor dprotsner@, krthvowtyvovn stanalvow hamar kvolegianyer@ kvoyvowthyvovn en vownecyel Giyewjan wvojyevodvovthjvownvovm 16-rd
 voyyevodvovtyovnovm 16-rd dari vergic sksa& Drank stex&wyel en otaryerkratsi katholikneri` jyenvovatsinyeri, dominikacineri ew cizvitneri
 dvominikacineri ew tchizwitneri koghmic katolik hawatk ev lyehakan karkyer sermanelvov nbatakvow.Azgajin vyera&nndi kyentrone dardyel e Novi
 kentrony dardel e Novi Swyet gyovghe: Aystyex, Giyev-Pyechvorjan mayrawanqi tbaranvowm arghimandrit (ovxxapar vardapyet) Elisyej pleteneckii
 vardapyet) YElisej pleteneckii hvowanow nyerqo Giyewi yeghbajrakan Astva&ahaytnowtjan wanqin (Киево-Братский Богоявленский монастырь) arentyer
 Богоявленский монастырь) arentyer steghtswyel e nayev ghmbak, ore dbroc e darzel: 1615 thwakani hoktemberi 15-in dbrotsy tyeghapokhvyel e arandzin
 tyeghapvokhwel e arandin hastatvowtjovn Pvodvolvowm: Ajs amsathivy hamarwovm Gievi yeghbayrakan dprvoci kazmakyerbman amsathiv@, dprots,
 kazmakyerbman amsativy, dprots, vore Giew-Mokilyaji kvolyegiayi naghordn e, ew or@ hetakajvowm akademia e dardel: Gvolegiayi kanvonadrvovtyown@
 Golyekiaji kanvonadrowtyvowne (1620) kazmwel e himnwyelvov Lwowi yexbajrakan dbrvotsi kanonadrovthjan wra: Lwowi yew Lvowtski yexpajrakan dbrotsnyeri
 yexpayrakan dbrotsnyeri oros ovsowci4nyer teghapvokhvel en Kiyew` dasavandyelov: 1632 thwakanin YEghpajrakan dprotsin miatsvyel e Giyev-Pecvorjan
 miacvel e Kiyew-Pecvoryan majrawanki dprvotse, vory himnadrvyel e 1631 thwakanin Gievi ew Kalichi metrvopvolit Pjvotr Mokilaji koghmic. Nvor
 Mokilayi koxmits: Nvor ovsvowmnakan hastatvovtyown@ statsel e Kiyew-YExbajrakan kolyegia anwanvowm@Kievi yeghpayrakan dprvotsvowm svoworvovm
 yeghbajrakan dbrvocvowm sovvorvovm ein himnakanovm watcharakannyeri, arhestavornyeri yev kazakneri yeryekhaner@: Dbrocy nyvovtabyes satarvovm er Zapvorozhiyei
 satarvovm er Zaborogiei Syec zvorky, masnawvorabyes hetman pyotr Saganda4ninDbrvoci aragin ryektory yeghel e Ivow Boretskin (1615-1618).
 Pvoryetskin (1615-1618) Ryektvorner en nayev yeghel Myelyeti Smvotritskin (1619-1620), Kasyan Sakovichy (1620-1624), Fvoma Ievlevi4y (1628-1632):Giew-YExpayrakan
 (1628-1632):Giyew-YExbayrakan kvolegian pyotr Mogilayi orvokGiyevi Expayrakan kvolyekiaji xyekawar, brvotyektor yew ghnamakal dardaw Pyotr Mvokilan:
 dardzav Pyotr Mvogilan Pjvotr Mogilaji irakanatswa& baryepokhvowmnyer@ Kiyev-Exbajrakan kvolegian dardryel yen vovsovmnakan hastatvowtjvovn,
 owsowmnakan hastatvowthyvown, or@ «latinakan», arewmta-ewropakan krtakan hamakarki koxmnorvosowm vowner @nd orvovm, yst «Rovsneri patmowtjan»
 «Rovsnyeri patmvovthyan» qaxakakan banflyeti hexinak Kyeorgi Kvoniskii, Gievi Akadyemian Pjotr Mvokilan 4i stex&yel, ajl, ogtwyelov polsi
 ayl, ogtwelov Pvolsi orinakic, vyera&novnd e tvel ayn Giyevjan Akadyemiajin, ore styeghtsvyel er mye& ishghan Jaroslaw Wladimirowichi
 Yaroslaw Wladimirvowi4i orvoqKvolekiayvowm vovsowtsanvowm er yekexetsakan slavvoneren, rvovsyeryen (1751 th.), hvownaren, leheryen, isk
 hownaren, lyehyeren, isk himnakan owsowtsman lyezovn latinyerenn er. Vowsanoghner@ dastiarakwvowm ein ovxxapar vogvow. Owsowmnasirvowm
 ogov. Vovsowmnasirvowm ein hayrenakan yew hamashgharhayin batmvovthyvovn, krakanvowtyvovn, pvoyezia, pilisopayvowthyvown: Aystyex e nayev dasawandwvowm
 Ajstegh e naew dasawandwvovm er yeragshtvovtyan tarrakan tyesowtyvown (@st arevmtyan orinaki) yev yergetsvoxvovthjvovn, wardapyetvowthjvown, thvapanovtjown,
 vardapyetowtyvovn, twabanvovthjvown, hretorvovtjown, astwacabanvovtjvovn Sanyere amyen shapat banakhosvowtjan varganknyer ein anowm: Gvolegiayvovm
 ein anovm. Golyegiajvowm @ndvovnowm ein pvolor xaweri ereghanyer XVII darowm Kiev-Mvokilayi akademian ownyer 8 dasaran, vorvonq bajanvovm
 dasaran, voronq paganwvovm ein krtsyer (4 dasaran), migin (2-rd dasi) ev awak (2-rd dasi) bazhinneri` analogia kam fara, infima, kerakanvowtjovn,
 infima, qerakanvovthyvown, sintaqsima, 4apa&vojabanvovtyown, hretorowthjovn, pilisopayvowtjown ew astwacapanowthjovn Akadyemiayowm vowsovtsman
 Akadyemiajvowm owsvowcman tyevvoxowthjvovny minchev 12 tari zhamkyetow er: Owsanvoghnere karox en sovvorel ev awyeli yerkar, kani or akadyemian
 erkar, qani vor akadyemian bardzragvowyn dproc er Vovsanvoxnyer@ iravovnq vovnein ayntyegh svovvoryel vorkan cankanvowm ein, aranc tariqajin
 ein, aranc tariqajin sahmanapakman. Nranc 4ein patzhvovm ev 4ein heratsnvowm vowsowtsvowmits, haswi er arnvovm njvovthakan tsanr witchaky
 njowthakan &anr wichak@ ew hivandvowthjvownnyery. Erkrvord yev nowjnisk yerrord tarin nowjn dasaranvovm mnalov hnarawvorothjvown kar Xyekavar
 hnaravorothjovn kar. Xyekavar andik ein` ryektor@, thaghapyet@ (tesowche ew tntyesvary) ev vyerakatsvown (sovbyerintyendant, saneri kark ov kanvonin
 sanyeri karg vow kanonin hyetyevvogh hski4). Gvolegiayi dasakhvosner@ skzpvowm patrastvovthjvown ein stanvovm Evropaji hamalsarannervovm, isk
 hamalsarannerowm, isk karj gamanak hetvo kolegian ardyen inqn er patrastovm dasaxvosnerPyvotr Mvokilan dasakhvosnyerni yew kariqawvor
 dasaghvosnerni ew karikawvor vovsanvoghnerin abahovowm er abrovsti yew vovsman mijocnyervov: Nra orvoq dbrocic nyerkyev karowcvel e nor kare
 karovcwel e nor qarye hastatvovtyvown: Ajn gojowthjown owni ar aysor Kiyev-Mvokilayi akademiaji taratsqvovm yew hajtni e vorbes Syexanatnayin
 e orpes Sexanatnayin kam Sovrb Hvogvow yekexyeci: Mahanalis Mokilan kvolyegiayin ktakel e myets mijotsnyer yev kradaran, or@ barvovnakvowm
 gradaran, ory parownakvovm e 2131 girq, tner ev bakajin sinowtjownner Podolvowm, Pvozdnjakovski ghowtory, Knyedin, protsyew ev Rowno gyowxyery.Akadyemiaji
 kjowghyere:Akadyemiaji kargavicaki statsowmI batiw pjotr Mogilaji Kvolekian statsyel e Giyew-Mvogilayi kvolegia anovny Ays anwamb
 kvolekia anvowne: Ays anvamb el batmovthjan myeg e mtel. Miak bane, vor ci hastsrel anyel Mvokilan, da ayn er, or Golekian stanar barzrakowjn
 Kvolyekian stanar pardragvovjn dbrotsi bashtonakan kargavitchak. Nra ashakyertnyer@ sharvownakyel en Mogilayi sksa& gvor&@.1658 thwakanin, est
 kvorts@:1658 tvakanin, @st Gyetmanscinaji ev Rye4 Pvosbvolitayi midjyew knqwa& Gadja4i bajmanagri, Kiyew-Mvokilaji kolyekian statsyel e akadyemiayi
 statsyel e akadyemiaji kargawijak: 1694 thwakanin Ivan V thagawory yev 1701 twakanin petrvos I -y hastatyel en hastatvovtjan akademiaji
 hastatvovtyan akademiaji kargavijak@Kiew-Mokilaji akademian XVIII darovmGiew-Mokilaji akadyemian aragin ovxxapar parzragvovyn
 vowghxapar barzrakvowyn owsowmnakan hastatvowthyownn er Aryeweljan YEwrvopajowm, vory bastvonapes arganatsyel e Akademiayi kvocman@ Akademiaji
 kocman@ Akademiayi kargawichak stanalovts heto vowsovmnasirwogh gitovtyovnneri shrganak@ yndlaynvel e: Nerdrwel yen franseren
 Nyerdrvel yen franseren (1753 t.), germanyeren (1738) Kristvonyeakan skzbnaxbjvovrnyeri ovsvovmnasirman npatakow mttswel e arameryeni
 nbatakov mttswyel e aramereni hryeakan parpari vovsvovcovm: Vowsvowtsanvel e pnakan patmowthjvovn, ashxarhagrovtjvovn, mathematika: Vorosh gamanak
 matyematika: Orosh jamanak dasavandvyel e naew cartarapetowtyown ew keghankar4vowthyown, bardrakvovyn pertchakhosvovtjovn, kjvowghakan ev kencaghayin
 kyowghakan ev kyencaxayin xnayvoxovthjovn, pzhskvowtjvovn yev rvovsakan hryetorabanvowthjown: XVIII dari avartin dasaxosneri thiw@ hasel e
 dasakhosneri tiwy hasyel e min4yev 20 ew avyeli. Akadyemiaji gradaranowm 10 000-its avyeli girk kar 1759 thvakanits sksats astwatsabanovthyvovn@
 sksa& astwa&apanowthjovne dasavandvyel e Fevofan pokopovichi hamakargvov, hryetorapanvowtjvovne` Mighayil Lomvonosowi byerjaxvosovtjan vowxyetsowjtsov,
 byerchakhvosovthyan vovxecvovjcvov, mnaca& ararkanyere` otaryerkrya vowghyetsovjtsnervov. 1742 twakanin ashakyertnyeri tiwy hasel e 1 234 mard Kiyevi
 e 1 234 mard. Giyevi akademian yvovrahatvowk kradaran e vownecel: Ayn dzewaworvel e yerkow dareri ynthatskovm. Nra himq@ drwyel e
 yntacqowm Nra himke drwel e deryevs Exbajrakan dprocowm Baci ayd, pyotr Mvokilan kolegiayin e garankel ir grkery: Akadyemiayin grqyer
 krqere. Akademiayin grker nvirelov avandvovyth e zewavvorwel. Gradaran@ lratswel e naew gnovmnyeri ew Ovkrainaji tbarannyeric stacwox grkyeri
 tbaranneric stacwvogh grqeri haswin. Gradarany krkyer vownyer Rvovsastanic, Ovkrainajic, Byelarovsits: Kayin krkyer, voronk hratarakwats ein
 voronk hratarakva& ein Amsterdamowm, Hambowrgowm, Halleowm, Pyerlinvowm, Pratislawayvovm, Dancikowm, Varsavayowm, Lvondonvowm, Parizowm,
 Londvonvowm, Parizvowm, Hrvomvowm, Poloniayowm ew ayl vajryerowm Baci tpakir krqeric, gradaranvovm pahpanvel en bazmativ zyerakrer`
 yen bazmativ zeragrer` zhamanakakrvovthjovn, taryegrqyer, hvowsakrovtjownner, orakrer, incbyes naew brvofesorneri dasaxosovthjownner,
 prvofyesornyeri dasaxvosowtyvownner, ovsanvoghnyeri kvonspyektnyer, ancjal dareri pastathxter yev ynthatsik pastathghtyer, zgali tyex en zbaxyetsryel paganordakrakan
 zpaghetsryel pazhanordakrakan hratarakovthyownnere.Akadyemiaji pakvowmMvoskwaji hamalsarani himnadrvovmits heto (1755) akademiayi karyeworovtjovne
 akademiayi karyevvorovtyvown@ nwazel er: 1805 tvakanin GHarkowi hamalsarani stextsovmy Giyew-Mogila akadyemiajin werdjnakanabes zrkyel er
 vergnakanabyes zrkyel er bardzragowyn vovsvovmnakan hastatowtjan naghkin dyeric: Sakayn ayn hamalsaran darznelvow pvordyer arvel yen`
 dardnelow pvorzyer arvel yen` bacelvow lratsvovcic fakovltyetnyer, inchpyes orinak, iravakan, bjskakan, mathyematikakan yew ajln: Rovsastani
 mathyematikakan yev ajln Rovsastani TSar Aleksandr I-i karkadrvovthjamb ev Sinvodi hramanow 1817 thwakani ogostvosi 14-in Akadyemian pakvel e.

 1991 twakani septemberi 19-in orvosvovm endovnec vyerapatsyel Akadyemian orbyes «Giyew Mvokilaji akadyemia azgayin hamalsaran» Akademiayi
 hamalsaran» Akadyemiaji werakangnovme texi e vownecel Vjacheslaw Bovxvoveckvov agakcovthyamb, vov el darzyel e Giyev Mvogilayi akademia
 Kiyev Mokilayi akadyemia azgayin hamalsarani aragin nakhagah@: Wera&nva& hastatovtyvovny @ndorinakyec Hyovsisayin Amyerikayi Barzrakvowyn
 Amyerikaji Pardzrakvowyn krthvowthjan hamakargy, pakalavri astitchan yev makistrvosi astican tramadrvovm e akdyemiakan kreditajin hamakargin
 kreditajin hamakarkin hamapataskhan1992 thwakani okostvosi 24-in, arajin angam Vovkrainaji ankaghvovtjan ore nshyelvov hyet miasin
 ore nselow hyet miasin texi e ownecyel Kiev-Mogilaji akademia azkayin hamalsarani bashtvonakan batsvowmy.1995 thvakani hovnisin GMAAH-n
 twakani hvovnisin GMAAH-n tvyel e ir aragin vec srganavartner: Kitahetazotakan kentrvon@, ory kocvvovm e «Giyev Mvogilayi akadyemiaji
 Mogilayi akadyemiayi zharangvowthjown», styexcwel e, orpeszi nvorasteghc akadyemiayovm hastati hin akadyemiaji sarownakakanowthjvowny:
 sharownakakanovthjowne KMAAH-n naghadyernyel e naev vowkrainakan myek ayl batmakan vovsvovmnakan hastatowtjan zartonqe` Ostrogi akademianKMHAH-n
 Ostroki akademian:KMHAH-n laynoren haytni e darzel orbyes aradjin hamalsaran, vori vovsanvoxnyern vow dasaghvosnere (Giyewi Narngakvovyn hyeghapoghvowtyan
 Narndjakovyn heghapvokhvowthyan ayl masnakicnyeri thvovm) patsahayt ynddimatsyel yen  2004 thwakani Vovkrainaji naghakahakan @ntrvovtyownnyeri
 nakhagahakan entrvowthyownnyeri zangva&ajin kyextsikneri dyem Ayd iradardvovtjvovnneric hetvo Giyewi Mogilaji akadyemia azgajin hamalsaranowm
 azgayin hamalsaranvowm bacwyel e Narndjakvovyn hyexapoghvovthyane nwirva& tangaran (Pomarancheva Revolyuziya-Укр.)Grtakan hamakargKMA-n
 Revolyuziya-Укр.).Krtakan hamakarkGMA-n owni Vowkrainayi krtvovtyan yev kitowtyan naxararvovtyan amenapardr hawatarmakrman makardak@ yew krthowthyovny
 makardake yev krthvovtyvovne kazmakerpva& e Hjvowsisajin Amerikaji hethanrakrthakan hastatowtjownnyeri orinakov. Ovsovmnakan tarin yeramsja

 eramsyakvow. Asnanaji yev karnanajin kisamjaknyery nyerarvowm yen  ankax owsovmnasirvovtjan lratsowtsich sabath, orn hnaraworowtjovn e
 orn hnaraworvowtjvovn e talis ajn owsanvoxnyerin, vovkyer lracowci4 ashghatyelov karik ovnyen iryenc kvovrsayin askhatanknyerin kam knnowtjownnerin
 kam qnnowthjovnnyerin patrastvelow hamar: Jvowraqanchyvovr kowrs vovnen himnakan akadyemiakan ararkanyer ew @st yntrovtjan lratsvowtsich
 entrvovthyan lracvowcich kam fakowltatiw parapmownkner. Gvorcovm e kryeditajin hamakark 100 balanots sandghakvow:Pakalavri astitchan
 sandghakowPakalawri astichan vownecvoxner@ karogh yen iryenc owsvowm@ sharvovnakyel hamalsarani oreve makistrosakan tsragryerov: Hamalsarany
 cragryervow: Hamalsarane patrastovm e naew Piznyesi karavarman makistr, gitvovtyovnnyeri teknatsowner (PhD) ev kitvowtjvovnneri doktorner.
 kitovtjvovnnyeri dvoktorner Hamalsarann Owkrainayovm arajinn er, or miatsyel e  doktvorakan krtvowthyan srdjanaknerowm barepokhvowmneri
 srdjanaknyervowm parepvoxvowmnyeri  Boloniayi gorcyntacin.GMA-n erklezvow hastatovtyovn e` vovkrainyeryen yew angleryen Himnakan lezown owkrainyerenn
 lezovn vovkrainyeryenn e Hamalsarann arajarkowm e biznes-dasentacner anglyeren lezwvov` hamakvor&akcelov Kanadayi Edmontoni MaqEwan

 vowsvovmnasirovthyvovnnyer. Vowkrainan ev hetxorhrdayin taracky» ghvoragrow ankleren crakir Aragarkwvovm e «Germanakan ev yevropakan
 «Germanakan yev yewrvopakan owsvovmnasirowthyvownnyery» magistratrvosakan cragir Enaji hamalsaran het hamakvortsaktsyelowVowkrainaji ayl
 hamakvorcaktselvowOvkrainayi ayl byetakan hamalsaranneri nman, ovsanvoghnyery karawarowthyovnic stanvovm en hamyest amsakan krthatoshak: Kvowmari
 amsakan krtathoshak: Gowmari chape kakhwats e ovsanoghi eramsjaki aradjadimvovthjownits Gan mi sharq masnavvor krthathoshaknyer lavakovjn owsanoxneri
 lavagvowjn vovsanoxnyeri hamar Oowsanoghnery naew pargewatrvvovm yen irenc hasarakakan kvorcvovneowthjan hamar, mrtsanaknyer yen trvowm
 mrtsanaknyer yen trwvowm nrants, vovqer myecagvowyn nyerdrovm yen vovnyenvovm KMA vyera&nndi gor&vovm kam ajn mardkants, owqyer acqi yen ynknowm
 vowker a4ki yen enknowm vovkrainakan lezvi yev msakvovythi ghtanman kortsovm.GMA-n petakan hamalsarane ghyekavarwowm e Owkrainaji karavarovtyan
 Ovkrainayi karavarvowthyan Wyerstowgic Khorhrdi koghmits: Hamalsarani amyenabarzr bashtonjan GMA nakhakahn e. Krtovthjown@ ev hetazotowthyovnnyeri
 ev hyetazotvowthyovnneri hamakargwvovm yen gitakan ghvorhrdi koxmits: Mi qani byetakan marminnyer@ ghvorhrdaktsvowm yen hamalsarani karavarmany:
 hamalsarani karawarmany: Drank nerarovm en Mijazkayin khorhrdatvakan ghvorhvowrdy, Hogabardzvovnyeri xvorhovrd@, Ovsanoxakan xorhvovrdy
 Vovsanoghakan ghvorhvovrd@ ew Arwyesti khorhvowrde:@ndownyelowtyownGMAAH yndvovnyelovthjvovne bats e, inchpes el vovkrainayi, aynpyes el
 vovkrainaji, aynbes el migazkajin dimvordnyeri hamar` yndownyelowthyan knnakan miavornyeri himan vra: Yndvownelowtjan knnovthjvownnery
 Endownyelowtjan qnnvowthjownnery nerarvovm en pazmathiw tyestyer mi sarq ararkanyeric, ajd twovm, vovkraineren, angleryen, iravvovnk, mathyematika,
 iravvownk, mathematika, Kiew-Magilayi akademiayi batmvovtyovn,, howmanitar ararkaner (krakanvovthjan kam patmvowtyvovn), pnakitakan
 patmvowtyvovn), bnakitakan ararkanyer: Inchpes naev thyester@ myekyenajacvac en: Yndovnelvovtyan ays karge nerdrwel e, orpyeszi bacari yndownelowtjan
 patsari @ndownelvovthyan korcyntacowm enthadrjal kvorvowptsian: Yndvovnelovtyan tyester@ hamarwowm en djvarin ew @ndkrkovm e ararkanyeri
 endkrkovm e ararkanyeri layn srdjanak, oronk pnoros cen Owkrainayi pvovheri mets masin. Kiyew-Mvogilaji akademiayi patmovthjan kityeliknyeri
 batmovtyan kityeliqnyeri tyestavvorowm@ bacarik e Vovkrainayi hamalsarannyerovm. Ayn mttsvel e, Vovkrainayi patmowthjan meg hamalsarani
 batmvowtjan myedj hamalsarani vovnetsa& derits yelnelvov: Hamalsarann owni naev naghapvowhakan pazhin, ore kazmakyerpvovm e Tyestyeri naxapatrastman
 THestyeri naghapatrastman dasynthatsnyer.HamagvorcaktsowthyownKMA hamalsaran@ hamakorcaktsovm e mi shark hamalsarannyeri het, in4bes
 hamalsarannyeri het, inchbes yerkkvoxm hamadajnagreri ew cragreri migocov, ajnpyes el Erazmows Mvovndvovsi nman sghemanervov:Yntacik yerkkoghm
 skhyemanerov@nthacik erkkvoghm hamadaynagryeri aghjvovwsakHimnakan arancqayin hetazotvowthyvownnyery katarwvowm en tntyesakitowthjan, irawownqi
 tntyesakitowtyan, iravvovnqi yev hvowmanitar olortnervovm:Krakanovthjan myeg ev mshakvovythvovmGiyew-Mvokilayi akademiayi Ovkrainaji batmvowthjan
 Owkrainayi batmowtjan meg vownecac nsanakovthjownn @ndgtsyelov  npatakvov  1992 thvakanin toxarkvyel e pvostayin namakanish.Kievvo-Mvogilayakan
 namakanis.Gievo-Mvokilajakan akademiayi shyenke patkervel e 500 kriven thxthadrami vra, ore shrdjanarowthjan myeg e mtyel 2006 twakanin:Giev-Mvogilaji
 twakanin:Giew-Mogilayi akademian hishatakwvovm e mi sark weberowm: Nikvolaj Kokoli Taras Pvowlpa vyebi glxawvor hyervosner Ostab yev
 glxavor hyervosner Ostap ev Andrey Bvowlnan Kiyew Mogilayi akadyemiaji srjanawartnyer ein: Kiev-Mokilaji kvolegian hishatakvvovm e Pawyel
 hishatakvovm e Pavyel Zakryepyelnii mi kani webyerovm, ajd thwovm Harawayin kvomfort (1986) yew Es, Bvokdans (1983) Nikvolay Lyeskowe
 (1983) Nikolay Lyeskvow@ hisatakvovm e Giyewi hvogyevvor akademian «pyecorskie antiki» (1882) vibakvovm.Giyev-Mokilayakan akademiaji nsanakowtjovn
 akadyemiaji nsanakvowtjovn (1632-1817)Rvowsastanowm Giyevi akadyemian dardel e lvovsavorvovtjan aghbjvowr: Hyenc Giyevi akademiaji shrjanawartnern
 akademiaji shrganavartnern en himnel Rowsastani aradjin bardzrakvowyn ovsowmnakan hastatvovtyvownnery, naew Akademiaji  dasaxosnyeri aweli
 Akademiaji  dasakhosneri avyeli qan 80 tokose paghkatsa& er GMA shrjanavartnyerits. Akademiajvovm soworovm ein owkrainaciner, rvovsner, byelarvovsnyer,
 rovsner, byelarovsnyer, rowminacinyer, mvoldvovacinyer, syerpyer, bvosniacinyer, 4yernokortsiner, pvowlxarner, howyner, italatsiner: Serpiayi,
 italaciner: Serpiaji, Pvowlghariayi mshakvovthayin korci4nyery nvowynpes dimyel en` ghndrelov Gievi akademiayits owsvowtsichnyer ovxarkel.Akadyemian
 vowxarkyel.Akademian twyel e zgali tvov hasarakakan gvortsichner: Nra saner@ ovsvowtsanel yen Mvoskwayi Slawona-hovna-latinakan akademiayovm,
 Slavvona-hvowna-latinakan akademiayovm, peterbvovrki Alyeqsandr-Nevskvov jemaranvovm ew Kazani hokyevor akademiayvowm.«Giyew-Mvokilayi Akademian anvovnnervovm.
 Akadyemian anovnnyerovm: XVII—XVIII darer» hanrakitaranvowm, vory hratarakwel e 2004 thwakanin, byerwowm en 1 482 kortsicnyeri anvownnery,
 kvortsicneri anvovnnery, oronq kabwac yen akadyemiaji hyet: Kievi Mvogilaji Akademiajic yen yexyel 14 hyethmannyer, masnawvorabes.Svowrp
 masnavvorapes.Svovrp janacwa& metrvobvolitnyerits.Dmitri Tovbtalopyvotr KonjowshkevvicIwan MaksimovicAkadyemiayi hyet yen arn4wovm

 Perezovskii, Artyemi Vedyeli ew ajlots jakatakrery. Akademiayowm voros gamanak svoworyel e naew Mixajil Lvomvonosvowy.GM kvolyekiayi

 sovvorel yen byelarowsnery: Nranc twovm e eghel hajtni abaka kitnakan Simyevon Pvolotskin (1620-1680)Akademiayi srganavartnery Rovsastani

 Vovkrainaji lawakovjn pvovhyery gor&atvowneri achkyerov  Корреспондент.net -i varkanisajin axjovsakvovm НаУКМА-n Owkrainaji povheri sharkvovm
 Ovkrainaji bvowhyeri sarqvowm zpaxyecrel e errord tyex@2007 thvakanin «Zyerkolvo nedeli» sabatatyerti warkanisayin aghyvovsakvowm НаУКМА
 varkanisayin axjowsakvowm НаУКМА zpaxetsryel e yerrvord tyexe 200 vowkrainakan Bovheri twowm2007 tvakanin «Dengi» barbyerakani warkanisajin
 parpyerakani varkanisayin axyvowsakowm НаУКМА zbaghecnowm e aradjin teghe howmanitar vow tntesakan volortnervowm yew erkrord teghy irawakan
 yerkrord tyexy irawakan olvortvowm masnagetneri batrastman warkanishajin sandghakvowm2008 twakanin 228 vowkrainakan Bowheri warkanishvowm,
 Bovheri varkanisovm, @st Rinat Aghmyetvowi «Ovkrainaji Zargacovm» paryekvortsakan himnadrami, НаУКМА bajanel e yerkrord tyex@ Kiyewi
 e yerkrord tex@ Kiewi politeghnikakan institowti het (aradjine mimjanc migev baganyel yen Taras SHev4yenkvoji anwan Giyevi azgajin hamalsarane
 azgayin hamalsaran@ ev Yarvoslaw Imastovni anvan Azgayin irawapanakan akademian).2009 thwakanin, est kitakan ov bardzrakovyn
 gitakan vov parzrakovjn krtakan hastatovthjovnneri hxvowmneri mijazkajin indeksi  mvonitvoringi, НаУКМА statsyel e 36-rd tex@ owkrainayi
 36-rd texe ovkrainayi polor parzragvowjn owsovmnakan hastatovthyvownnyeri twvowm2009 tvakanin est «Kvompas-2009» («Korryesbvondent»
 «Kvompas-2009» («Korryesbvondyent» parbyerakan, 2009 thvakani mayisi  22) hamazkajin warkanisi ardjvovnqneri, НаУКМА zpaxyecrel e 2-rd tyegh@2010
 zpaghyetsryel e 2-rd tegh@.2010 twakanin, yst Vowkrainaji  lawagvovjn povhyer  varkanisi, vory kazmwyel e hashwi arnelvov lawakvovyn gvor&atvowneri
 lawagowjn gorcatovnyeri gnahatakannyere («Gorrespvondent» parpyerakan, 2010 thvakani majisi 21-in), KMAAH-n zbaxetsrel e 2-rd teghe:QnnadatovthjvovnVovkrainaji
 tyexy:QnnadatvovtyownOwkrainayi krthovtjan ev kitowthjan naxkin nagharar Dmitri Tapacnik@ batsasakan e bnvovthakrvowm akademiajvowm gor&yeri ardi
 akadyemiajvowm kortseri ardi wicake, nran hamematyelov rvowsakan ashgharhik «astgh» Ksenia Sob4aki hetKityek, Rowsastanvovm mi hajtni astgh
 Rvowsastanvowm mi hajtni astx ka, or@ oc yerkel, vo4 paryel, voc el byemovm khaghal kiti. Payts skandalner e sarqvowm cankacac ashxarhik yeryekowjthvowm,
 askharhik yeryekvovjtowm, ir nkatmamb kaska&eli owsadrowthjan makardak@ bahpanelvov: Na hajtni yntaniqits e, nra hayr@, yerbemni qaxaqaglvowxnyerits
 erbyemni kaghakaglvovxnyerits e exyel. Aha ajdbyes el krthvovthyan volortvowm menk nvowynpyes ownenq nman mi astx. Da Kiyev-Mogilayi akadyemian
 Giew-Mogilaji akadyemian e, vorn anwrdov datwovm e krthovthyan bolvor naghararnyeri het yew mist nowjn ardjownqvow... YEte krthovtjan olvortovm

 pvolityexnikvowm — ajntex karogh en amyen tari twel, the nranc vowsanoghnyeric qanisn yen heghinakavor mrcowythnyervovm, intyelektowal xaxyerovm shahel,
 intelektvoval khaghyerowm sahyel, kani profesvornyer yen hrawirvel artasahmanic, vorkan petakan pargevnyer en stacel, isk in4-vor myekn ajs amyen@

4arlz Lvowcanvo (makanvown@` Paxtavvor, angl.` Charles «Lucky» Luciano, irakan anvovn@` Salwatore Lvovkania
 anovny` Salwatorye Lvovkania ( ital.` Salvatore Lucania), cnv. 1897 t. noyyempyeri 24, Lerkara Fridi - mah. 1962 t. hovnvari 26, Neabol),
 hovnvari 26, Neapvol), azkovtyamp italaci gankster, hantsagor&, AMN-ovm kazmakerbwac hancawvorovthjan` mafiaji aragnvordnerits mekn
 mafiayi aragnvordnerits myekn er: 4vownyenalvov AMN kaxakatsivovthyovn, 1946 thwakanin artaksvyel e:KyensagrvowthjovnLaki Low4anvon tsnvel e
 e:GyensakrvovthjownLaki Lov4anon cnvel e Antvonio Low4anoyi yew Rvozali Kaporellii yntanikvovm ev nranc 4vors ereghanyerits errordn er: 1907 thvakanin,
 yerrvordn er: 1907 thwakanin, kariqits drdva&, Antvonivo Lvowchanvon gaghthel e AMN, texaworwel ashxatanki` orpes hankapor ew erkow tari anc,
 hanqapor ew erkov tari anc, 1909 twakanin AMN e texapoghyel oghj entaniqin: Nrank pnakovtyovn en hastatyel Manhyetheni harawaryevyelyan masowm
 haravarevelyan masowm gtnwogh nyerkin Isth-Sajd srdjanovm:Patani tariqovm Laki Lvowcanvon tsa&r askhatawardzow askhatel e vorbes banvvor:
 asxatyel e orbes panwvor: Njvov Jvorqi ayn shrdjan@, ortyex pnakwvovm er na, haytni er «Pvoqr Italia» anvownvov: Dbrvotsn awartelvowts hyeto
 Dprvotsn avartyelvovc hyeto na &anvotatsyel e mafiayi arajnvordnyer Myejyer Lanskii, Bagsi Sikeli yev Frenk Kvostelloji het: Ayd &anothvovtjowny
 hyet: Ajd tsanvothovthyovne tyexi e ownyetsel pvoghvotsayin barzapanowmnerits myeki gamanak, erb migadeby harthvel e Frenk Gostelloji kvoxmits:
 Fryenk Kvostelloji koxmits: 1911 tvakanin, Lovsawvorowthjan naghararowtjvovne Lvovchanojin teghaworyel e Prvovqlinowm gtnwvogh dzhvar dyerahasnyeri
 ktnvogh dgvar derahasnyeri vyeradastiarakovtyamb zbaxvogh hastatowtyvovnnyerits mekvowm: Hetakajovm na tsanvotatsel e kanatsi klkharknyer batrastvogh
 klkharknyer batrastvox varpet Maqs Gowdmani het, vov nran wercryel e askhatanki: ZHamanaki ynthackowm, yerb Lvow4anon arden dardzyel
 Lvowcanon ardyen dardel er hajtni heghinakvowtjvovn, Kowdmanin vyertsryel er ir pashtbanowtjan nyerqvo ew hargowm er nran` vorpyes ir hor@:Mnalvov
 orbes ir hory:Mnalow ajd askhatanqin, yeritasard Salwatoryen @ndovnyel e Gvorj Skoplvoni arajark@, ov &anvotner vowner vostikanvovtyvownowm
 vovnyer ostikanovthyvownvovm yev kaxaqakan dashtovm ew zbaghvel e thmranyovteri araqovmvow: Kanatsi glkharknere hascnelvow hajaghvordnyerin, na
 hascnyelow hajaxvordnyerin, na drants medj taqtsnowm er tmrapvosin yev aydpyes ayn araqvowm hasceatererin:1916 thwakanin Low4anon dzyerbakalwyel
 Lvowchanvon derpakalwel e yev databartvyel mek tarwa azatazrkman, sakayn vets amis ants, orinakyeli varki hamar azat e arzakvel: Aynovhyetyev
 ardakvel: Aynvowhyetyev @ndkrkwelow Nyov-Jorqi yerkvov xoshvoragovyn ganksterakan xmberits myeki` Djvowzebpye Masseriaji «@ntaniqi» mej,
 Masseriaji «yntaniki» medj, na brnel e ir hantsawvor owxin, zbaxwel kvoxobovtov, ryekyetvov, tmranyovtheri vacharkvov, kawatvovthyamb, maksanyenkvowthjamp,
 kavatvowthyamb, maqsanyengovtjamp, kazmakyerbyel e @ndhatakja xaxatner yev ayln, vori snvorhiw karyeli er karvoxovthyown kvowtakyel yew vastakyel hyeghinakvovtjvovn:
 vastakel heghinakovtyvown: Ayd tarinerin paterazm er mghvowm Massyeria yew Maranzanvo «entaniqneri» midjew` kaxakvowm iryenc azdecvowthyvownn
 irenc azdyetsvowtjovnn hastatyelvow hamar:1929 thvakani hvoktembyeri 16-in, Njow-Jvorki kentronvovm Low4anvojin aryewangyel yen Maranzanvoyi
 aryevangel yen Maranzanvoji mardik, taryel Stathyen Ajlendi amayi wayryerits myek@, kaghel nran &arits ew warvvox sigaryetnyervov ajryel dyemk@`
 sigaryethnervov ayryel dyemky` tsankanalvov imanal tmranyvowteri teghy: Chimanalow o4inch ev oroselov, or na ardyen mahacats e, thvoghyel yen nran
 mahatsa& e, thoghyel en nran ew heratsyel: Mvotakajkvov antsnox pareknyere Lowchanojin tyexapvoxyel en hivandanots: Nra oghdj mnalvow hamar, Myeyer
 mnalvow hamar, Myejer Lanskin nran anvanel e Baghtawor: Ajd midjadepe i hayt byeryec Lvovchanoji bnawvorvowtjan yerkvow drakan koxmyer@:
 erkvow drakan kvoxmer@: Aradjinn ajn er, vor na ckvotrwec kttanqneri gamanak, isk yerkrordy, or na karvoxatsaw iryen nyexatsnoxneri handyeb
 nyexatsnvoghneri handep tsowcabyeryel sarnasrtvowthjvovn: Vyerlovcelvow stexcwa& iravitchak@ ew hasvi arnyelov Meyer Lanskii hvowsovmy, na

 harwatsy yerkar spasel ctoxyec: 1931 thwakani abrilin, paymanaworvyelvow Maranzanvoji mardkants het, Lov4anvon vyeratsrec Massyeriajin,
 wyeracryec Massyeriayin, ajdbisov hartelov ir vowghin` dyebi isxanvovtyvowne hancavvor ashgharhi wra:Lvow4anvon ojtva& er kazmakerp4akan
 ojtvac er kazmakerp4akan yndovnakvowtjvownnervov: Na hnaryel er naghaki&, yst ori kexts kazmakerpovthyvowny «taniq» er handisanvowm 1920-1930-akan
 handisanvowm 1920-1930-akan twakannerin AMN-ovm kvorcox «Cor orenq»-i baymannyerowm yndhatakya sbirtajin khmickner wacharoxnyeri` povtlyekernyeri
 vacarvoghnyeri` powtlyegyerneri hamar: Na araginnyerits mekn er, vowm orosmamp mafian pyetk e kvortser korboratsianeri orinakov: Na kazmakerpyel
 orinakvow: Na kazmakerbel er gangsterneri «Myets yvotnyak»-@, vori myedj mtnvowm ein naev orbes gvorts@nkyernyer handyes yekox Nyow-Yorki, Bostoni,
 Nyvov-Yorqi, Bostoni, Rod Aylyendi, Atlantik Sithii kangsterakan ghmpaworvovmnery: Lvowchanvon kap er hastatyel naev och italakan cagowm
 nayew vo4 italakan tsakvowm vovnyecvox hantsawor xmbavorowmnyeri het` miagamanak ckortsnelov ir hyexinakovthjvovn@ mjows «@ntanikneri» aragnvordneri
 «yntaniqnyeri» aradjnvordneri mvot: Da ayn tarinerin hyexapokhakan nvorararvovtyovn er: Gvoza nostraji hamar asxatovm ein vo4 miajn &nvovndvow
 ein voch miayn tsnovndow sitsiliacinere, ayl nayew nranq, ovm karikn vovnyer ajd kazmakerbvovtyvowne: Hark e nsyel, vor voc italakan cakovm
 or och italakan tsakovm ownetsvox ganksternyere karvogh ein ashghatel Gvoza nvostrayi hamar, sakajn irawownq cownyein mtnelow nra sharqer@

 karogh e myecatsnyel mafiaji ardyownavyetovtjvowne: Na Kvoza nostrayi hatowk djvokati` «Spanovthjownnyeri korboraciayi» himnadirnyerits myekn
 korbvoraciaji» himnadirnyerits mekn er ew nra khvorhrdow ayd korboracian glkhaworvovm er Albyert Anastazian: Lowcanon ir hovanavvorvovtjan tak er

 batkanvovm mot 200 hasarakac tvown: 1935 twakanin drants endhanowr yekamovty gnahatvowm er mvotawvorapyes 20 milivon dolar, orits 200.000-y

Rendi Mario Pofvo (ankl. Randy Mario Poffo, nvoyyemberi 15, 1952 – majisi 20, 2011), amerikaci prvofesional
 amyerikaci brvofyesional ympshamartik (restler) yew haghordavar, aravel haytni «Macvo men» Rendi Sewig ("Macho Man" Randy Savage) ringajin
 Randy Savage) rinkayin anvamb. Aravel nsanakali kariyera e vownetsyel «World Wrestling Federation» (WWF, 1985–1994) yev «World Championship
 «World Championship Wrestling» (WCW, 1994–2000) kazmakerpowtyvownnerovm antskatsra& tarinerin:32 tarva masnakitakan kariyeraji
 masnakitakan karieraji enthackovm Syewij@ hnaravvorvowtyovn e vovnecyel nvajelvow 20 cempionakan titxvos, oroncic 6-e` tsanrkashayin

 War 3» mrtsvowjtnere Masnakcvowthyovn e vovnyetsel eryek «Reslmanianerovm»:«WWF» ew «WCW» kazmakerbvowthyownnyerowm anckacrac tarinerin

 bvortali bacmane, ew sksovm e kriwy: Kapitan Amerikjan ir wra vyertsnyelvow zorqi xyekawari partakanvowthyowny, hramayvowm e tarhanyel mardkants
 e tarhanyel mardkants ew mjvovs hervosnyeri het sharvovnakvowm e marty. Mi poqr ows hajtnwovm e Byennyer@, yev arden vyera&wac Halki`

 pagh4yel: Gor&adrvovmits oc shat jamanak aradj Fjowrin wtanki masin haytnowm e Erkathe mardvown, vov vorvosowm e pvokhyel rovmbi vovghghowtyowne

 orits hyetvo anjatvvowm yen Erkir@ kravva& aylmvolorakayinnere Sakayn ktnwelow bortali mjvows kvoxmovm, Stark@ dvowrs e galis ir
 Stharqy dvovrs e kalis ir hagovstits Na kvortsnvowm e gitaktsvovtjvovnn ow enknovm YErkir ayn gamanak ew Sew ajrin pakowm e portaly. Enknvogh
 pakovm e portaly Ynknox Starkin patrastwowm e prnel Tvore, sakajn Halkin da aweli sowt e hadjoghvvowm: Hyerosnery prkvowm en yerkir@

 sbarni, nranq nvorits kkan ognovtjanTitreric hyetvo, arajin drvakovm 4itowaranyeri arajnordn ir asgharhowm nyeroghowtyvovn e khndrowm
 nyeroghowthjovn e ghndrovm inch-vor bardrahasak ara&its 4karoghanalvov gravel Erkir@.Erkrord drwakvovm ampvoghj thime lvovr nsta& saovrma

 asvovlisovm hajtararwec Rvobyert Daowni krtseri het knka& paymanagri masin, est ori na betk e nkarahanwi stowdiayi wyerdjin cvors

 scyenarnyer@ kovnyenan vowxix kab. Ajd zhamanak Daovnin inq@ voc mi stsyenari hyet &anvoth cer:Qris Evans - Stiw Rvogers / Gabitan Amerika2010

 porzvovm en harmaretsnyel zhamanakakits ashgharhin:Mark Rovfalo - Bryovs Penyer / HalqRvowfalvow @ntrwets ays deri hamar ayn gamanak,

 thsnamin, vory himnva& e skandinavyan mifalvokiayi hamanovn herosi wra: «Tor» ew «Wrijarovnyer@» filmvowm ir kerpari tarberovtjan

 styextswel e svovbyer-atvomayin rovmbi dewov, vore karvovtsvyel e hyents ir zerkervow. Vovryemn es kar&ovm yem, vor ajn ajn jamanak, erp Lokin haytnwvovm
 erp Lvokin hajtnwvowm e  «Wrigarvovnyer»-owm, na inch vor ban e tesyel:Semovyel DJyeqson - Niq FyvovriS.H.I.E.L.D. gor&akalvowthjan tnoryen@,

 irakanatsryets gortsadovl. 2008 twakanin Marvel Entertainment-@ kildiayi het yekaw hamadajnvovthjan, orvow nrank byetq e weradarnayin

 Amyerikajin, Mrdjjvown-mardovn ev Wrizharownyerin. «Erkatye mardy» (2008) filmi hadjvogh premierajits heto stvowdian voroshets 2011 tvakanin toxarkyel
 2011 thwakanin thoxarkel «Wrigarovnerin»: 2008 thvakani septyempyerin paymanagir knqvyec Paramount-i het, ory wyerginis tvovjl twec
 verginis tovyl tvyec hing filmeri tara&ovm@ katarel Marvel Studios-i anvan tak:Lsovmnyery sksecin 2008 twakani hoktemperits,

 nkarahanvovmner@ sharovnakelvov hamar. Davovnin krknyets Starki dyery, isk CHidl@ kndapyet Jyeyms Rvoowdsin Chnayac naghkin haytararowthjvownneriin

 tsamakajin zvorqyeri djvokatyer@: Avak syerzhant Maykl Lyendsi khvoskerow, filmvowm iskakan zinwvorneri ogtakortsovme, ayn darznvovm en awyeli irakan

 erkvow orery tyexi yen vownyecel Nyvov Yorki park-awyenjovvowm yev Gentronakan zpvosaykovm: YEryeq orwa yntatskovm vizvoval efyektneri kvovordinator

Razmakan ostikanvovtyown, Zinvats owjyeri tsarayvowtyan hatowk dev, ori nbatakn e shat yerkrnervowm pahbanyel karkovkanvon
 bahpanel kargowkanvon: Nerkajvowms razmakan vostikanovtjvovn (RO) ka hyetyevyal yerkrnyerowm.Hajastani razmakan ostikanovthyownySteghtsvel
 ostikanvowthyvownySteghtswyel e 2006 thwakani dyektyemberin. Razmakan ostikanvovtjvowny gvortsvovm e Hayastani pashtpanovtjan pnagawarowm betakan

 zoramiavvorowm.Razmakan ostikanvovthjan ghndirner@irakanacnyel hetaknnovthjvown zinwac vovgervovm zinwvorakan hantsakvor&vowthjvownnyeri wyeraperyal

 ghmpin:KyensakrovthjownSaran zbaxecryel e erkrvord hvoizonakan@ 2006 thwakanin kajacats Talent Suomi mrcovythvovm, inchpyes naew  yerkrvord horizvonakann

 sepakan 5 alpvome: 2016 thvakanin Yume Records thyert@ Sarayin canacyel e vorbes Finlandiaji tarva mard:Andznakan kyankEst 2016

 hyet:Sinklyer2011 — «Blessed with Love»2013 — «You Had My Heart»2013 — «Enkeleitä»2014 — «Reach the Stars»2014 — «You Raise Me

 «Queens»== TSanvothakrovtyovnnyer 
Avtvopvovsayin ateistakan karvozarsav (ankl.` Atheist Bus Campaign), hasarakakan transbortvovm atheistakan
 transbvortvovm atheistakan vowxghvacvovtjan grovthjvovnnyeri tyeghadrowme Mec Britaniajvovm ew ayl yerkrnyervowm i patasghan avyetaranchakan karvozicneri
 avetaranchakan qarozicnyeri kristvonyeakan gvovazdi:Atheistakan ays qarozarshavn sksyel e lragrvogh ew krvogh Erian Seriny 2008 tvakani hoktyemberi
 2008 twakani hoktyembyeri 21-in Pritanakan hvowmanistakan asotsiaciaji (British Humanist Association) yew Ricard Dokinzi agaktsvowtyamb:
 Dokinzi agakcovthjamp: Kamabaniaji skzbnakan npatakn er havaqyel £5 500 Londvonowm 2009 thvakani skzbovm` 4vors sapatva @nthatskvowm
 4ors shapathva yntatsqowm 30 avtvopvovs gor&arkelvov hamar, vorvonc wra amracwac klini «Amyenayn hawanakanvowthyamp, astvac chka: Heriq
 hawanakanowtjamb, astvats 4ka: Heriq e anhangstanal, wayelyeq kjanq@» (angl. There’s probably no God. Now stop worrying and enjoy your life)
 and enjoy your life) karkaghvos@:Sakayn hasarakvowthyan koxmits ajd akciayi hamar nwiratvovthjovn@ ardyen isk 2008 thvakani hoktyemperi
 2008 thvakani hoktemperi 24-i drowtjamp hasyel er £100 000, von4@ oknyel e tara&el avtvopvovsayin karozarshav@ erkri oxdj tarackov myek:
 erkri oghdj taratskvov myek: Aktsian sksvyel e 2009 tvakani hvovnwari 6-in, yerb Mec Britaniaji amboghdj taratsqvov myek kortsarkvel e kargakhosow
 gorcarkwyel e kargaghosov 800 awtvobvovs Dranic patsi, naxateswvovm er 1000 kovazdayin wahanak teghadryel hanrajana4 atheistnyeri myegpyerovmnerovm
 atheistneri myegbyervowmnyerovm Londoni metrvoyvowm, isk yerkov me& LCD-ekran tyeghdrvel e Londoni Oqsfvordjan hrabarakowm.Ateistakan ays
 hrabarakvowm.Ateistakan ays qarvozarsawe lajn ajakcvovthyovn e ktyel ayl erkrnervovm, ori ardyownqowm bazmativ ayl erkrnervovm el ein
 ajl yerkrnyerowm el ein antskatswyel atyeistakan kvowazdajin kambanianyer:Artakin hxovmnyerpastonakan kaykAtheist Bus donation

 Humanist AssociationGerman Atheist Bus CampaignNew Zealand Atheist Bus Campaign== TSanothakrvowtyvownnyer 
Hamacancovm o4 ok chgiti, vor dvow svovn yes (ankl. On the Internet, nobody knows you’re a dog), Pithyer Shthejnyeri
 dog), Pityer Shtheynyeri nkare` hratarakwa& 1993 thvakani hovlisi 5-in The New Yorker amsakrowm: Nkarovm patkervats yen yerkvow shnyer,
 patkerwats yen yerkvov sner, orvontsits meke nsta& e hamakarg4i araj yev artasanvovm e hents ajd asacvatsky, isk yerkrvorde nstac e kvoghkin
 erkrvord@ nsta& e kvoxkin yew vovsadir lsovm e nran: 2011 tvakanic twyal nkare hamarwvowm e amenahaytni nkare The New Yorker-i egerits,
 New Yorker-i egeric, vori ardjownqovm Stejnyery askhatyel e 50 000 dolar ir kanonawor vyerathvoxarkvowmic: Nkari vrayi grvovthyovn@
 Nkari vraji krvovtjovny ankleryenowm dardzyel e asacwatsq:PatmowtyownPityer Steynyer@` «The New Yorker» amsagri nkariche, nshel e,
 amsagri nkari4e, nsel e, or i skzbanye nkarin k4yern yen vowshadrovthyvovn dardryel, bayts heto na kar&yes sksyets abryel ir kyankov, isk
 aprel ir kjankov, isk nra hexinaky irents zkac aynpes, in4pes «Gbitiki» heghinak@: Irakanovm, SHtheynery hyetakrqrva& ci eghyel hamacanci
 hetaqrqrvats 4i eghyel hamatsantsi hyet kapvats inc-or pan steghcyelvovn yew chi mtacel «bavakanin ghvory» nkari imasti masin. na nkari hamar mtatsel
 na nkari hamar mtatsyel e miajn hetaqrkir grvatsk:Nkari haytnivovthyan hyet kapva& SHthyeynere asel e. «YEs mincyew wyerdj 4em karvoghanovm
 verg 4em karoghanvovm haskanal sa. barzabes ajnbyes batahec, or na haytni e»:EntatekstNkare nshvovm e hamacanci patmowthjan
 hamatsanci batmovthyan karevvor bahy: Naxkinowm hamarvelov bacarapes pyetakan  ingyenyernyeri yew kitnakanneri knnarkman dasht` hamacants@
 qnnarkman dast` hamacantsy dardyel e molvoraki bnak4vovtjan mye&akvovjn masi khosyelvov, shpwyelow, haxordaktswelow karevorakvowjn mijvots@: Lotus
 karevvoragowyn mijoce: Lotus Software-i himnadiry yev hamatsantsajin aktivist Mitch Qyejpor@ asel e hetyevjal@. «Ayn bani irakan khvorhrdanish@,
 irakan xorhrdanish@, vor hamacanci handep hyetaqrkrowthyvowne hasel e ir kagathnakyetin, hrabarakvyel e ays amran@, yerb The New
 amrany, yerp The New Yorker-@ tpakrel e nkar@, vory patkervovm e ayd harcin tyeghekacvac yerkvow snyeri»:Nkary khorhrdansvovm e cancowm
 khvorhrdanshovm e cantsovm andnakan kyanqi haskatsvovtjovn@, erb oktatyerery karox en owxarkel yev stanal pvost` evowthjamp mnalvow ananovn:
 evovtjamp mnalvow ananvovn: Lvoovryens Lessike kartsovm e, vor «voc ok 4giti» orovhyetyev protvokolner@ oktatyeryeric chyen bahanjovm nvowjnakanacvowm
 pahangowm novjnakanatsvovm idyentifikatsia, chnaja& mi qanis@, orinak hamalsarannerowm texakaywa& hamakargi4ner@ ew karvox en pahanjyel
 ew karox en bahangel inc-vor tyeghekovtyvovnner ogtatirog masin. miayn thye ajd texekowthyvown@ sahmanapakwats e sosk tyexakan mvovtki
 svosk tyeghakan mowtki kyetov yev chi hamarwvowm @ndhanovr ardzanakrvovthyan prvotokoli mas:Morehen-Martini ew Shvovmaghyeri hetazotowtjvovnnyere`
 hetazotovthjownnery kapwats hamacanci bartadir yev khndraharvowyc oktagvortsmane, harts yen pardratsnovm ayn masin, or monitvori batcarov
 or mvonitori batcarvow inqnvorvosman ovnakovthyown@ darnovm e onlayn spman mi mase: Aystyeghic kareli e entadrel, or nkari vrayi
 yentadryel, or nkari wrayi makakrvowtyovn@ karvox e nshanakyel, vor «kibyertara&vowthjowny» azatakrvovm e, qani or, voc syer@, voch rasan,
 och syery, o4 rasan, o!ch tariq@, voch tesakyetnyer@, voc el „shovn linele“ karyevor 4en, isk yerbyemn hakarake sghal en nshvac vorvoshaki
 sxal en nsva& orvoshaki npataknyervov, oryenkow kam anorinakan». ajn krknowm e bndvovme, or@ asvel e Gvon Kilmori koghmits` 1996 thwakanin,
 kvoghmic 1996 tvakanin, linelov himnakan gvor&i4 Usenet-i patmvovtyvovnowm: Makagrvovthyowne naev yenthadrvowm e «hamakargcayin eresbastvowtjvovn»,

Oksfvordi hamalsarani hratarakcvovthjvovn (angl. Oxford University Press, krch. OUP), hratarakcovtjovn, or@
 hratarakcowtyovn, vor@ ktnvvovm e Angliaji Oksfvordi hamalsarani yentakayvowthjan tak:NkarakrvowtjvovnSa Mye& Britaniayi khoshorakovyn
 Pritaniaji ghvoshorakvovyn hratarakchovtyownnyeric myekn e ew ashkharhowm ghvoshorakvowjn hamalsaranakan hratarakcvowthyvovne, ory amenamja
 hratarak4vovthyvovne, ore amyenamya finansakan srjanarvovtyamb kerazancovm e  amerikyan aradjatar hamalsaranakan hratarakcvowtjane yew Cambridge
 hratarakchvowtyane yew Cambridge University Press-in  miasin wercrats: OUP-@ masnajjvovxer vowni ashxarhi 60 erkrnyerowm: Arajiny, 1896 tvakanin,
 Arajine, 1896 twakanin, pacwel e AMN-owm, 1905 thvakanin Kanadajovm, ajnvovhyet naev mi qani tasnjak yerkrnyervowm, in4bisik en Hndkastan@,
 in4pisiq yen Hndkastane, Pakistany, Avstralia, Nor Zelandia, Malazia, Singapvovr, Hndkastan yew Harawafrikyan Hanrapyetvovthjown@:Hratarakchvowtjan

 brendnyeri tak.  est eovthjan Oxford University Press` sat hratarakvovthjovnnyeri hamar ev Clarendon Press «hexinakavor» kitakan asxatankneri
 gitakan askhatanknyeri hamar: SHat erkrnervowm, vortyex gvor&vowm e Oxford University Press-e, hratarakcowthyown azatvyel e kvorbvoracivon
 azatvyel e korpvoratsivon harkyerits yew sahowthaharkic, kani or karvovcwa&kajin storapazhanman arowmow voc aryevtrayin kazmakyerbovtjvovn

Erik Bornstad Hagen (nvorv. Erik Bjornstad Hagen, 1975 twakan, hvowlisi 20, Veme, Hyvonyefos, Norwyekia),
 Hjonyefvos, Nvorwyekia), norwekatsi fvowtbvolist, orn awartyel e ir fovtbvolayin kariyeran: Handyes e ekel kyentronakan bashtbani dirqvowm:
 kyentronakan bastbani dirkvowm: Hajtni e nvorvegakan «Woleryenkayi» ev rvovsakan «Zyenithi» kazmowm antskacrac handipvovmnyervov: Norvekiayi fovtboli

Karawarman hamakargn irenits nerkayacnvovm e twyal erkrvowm isxanowtyan dzewawvorman ev gvoxvovovrd-ishghanvowtjown
 goxvovowrd-isghanvovtyown poghharapyerovtjovnneri hamakark: @st karawarman hamakarki betowthyvovnnyery linovm enhanrapyetvovthyownner,miabyetowthjvownnyer:HanrabyetvovthyownHanrabyetakan
 en`hanrapyetowthyvownnyer,miabyetowthjovnnyer.HanrapetvovthjownHanrapetakan karawarman hamakarki baragajovm isghanvovthjowne dzyevaworvvovm e ovxghaki kam anowxghaki yntrvowtjvovnneri mijotsov,
 @ntrowthjvovnnyeri midjvotsvow, ori debqvovm goghvovowrd@ masnaktsowm e ishxanowtyan dzyevavvorman gor&ynthatsin. Arandznatswowm en hanrapetakan
 Arandznacwowm yen hanrapetakan karavarman hamakarki 3 tesaknernakhakahakan,parlamentakan,khary kam kisanakhagahakan.Naxakahakan karawarman
 kisanakhagahakan.Naghagahakan karawarman hamakargi dyebkvovm kvorcvowm e yerkmandat karavarman hamakarge, yerb yew nakhakah@, ew xvorhrdarany yntrvovm en
 khorhrdarany @ntrvvowm en joghowrdi koxmits: Aystex naghakah@ handisanvowm e betvovtjan klvovxe, inchpes nayew kortsadir ishxanvowthjan ghyekawar@,
 ishghanovthyan ghekavare, nran e werabahwac karavarvovthjan zyevaworman iravownke yew karavarowthyowny ir gortsvownyevovthjan hamar awyeli
 gor&ownyeowtjan hamar aveli sat hasvyetvov e naxakahi arjew, kan barlamyenti. Naxakahakan hanrabyetowtjovnnerin pnorosh e orensdir yew gvor&adir
 oryensdir yew kortsadir ishxanowtjvovnnyeri ankagh gorcakcvowthjovny, inch nsanakovm e, or naghagahy iravvovnk covni cryel parlamyent@,
 cowni crel barlamyenty, isk barlamyente 4i karox anwstahowtyvovn haytnel karavarovthyany, sakajn kvoyowthyvown ownyen poxadarz wyerahskman
 pvoxadard vyerahskman yev hakakshrman myeghanizmner, masnavorapes, naxakahe karogh e wyetvo dnyel parlamenti @ndownats oryenqnyeri wra,
 endvovna& orenqneri vra, isk khorhrdaran@ ir hertin karvogh e gortsi dnyel impi4menti (aanvstahovtyvovn haytnelvow) gvorc@nthacy.Ghorhrdaranakan
 kor&ynthatsy:Ghvorhrdaranakan hanrabetvovthjownnerowm karawarvowthyan dyewaworman irawovnky patkanowm e ghvorhrdaranin GHvorhrdaranakan @ntrvowtjvovnnyeric
 KHorhrdaranakan yntrvovthjvovnnerits hyeto myetsamasnowthyvown statsa& kaxaqakan owzhe kam mi kani kaghaqakan kovsakcvowthyvownner, koalicivon skzpvovnkvov,
 kvoalicion skzpvovnkvov, dyevawvorovm en karawarvovthjvown, yev karavarowtyvovny ir kvortsownyeovtjan hamar himnakanowm hashwyetow e linvovm
 himnakanowm hashwyetvow e linowm khvorhrdarani ardjew: Xorhrdaranakan hanrabetowthyovnnerowm karvogh e korcyel nakhakahi bashtvone, vor@ yntrvvovm
 bashtvone, ore @ntrvowm e xvorhrdarani koxmits, vorvoshaki gamketvov. Na handisanovm e petovthjan klowxe, sakayn na irakanatsnovm e
 sakajn na irakanacnovm e zvovt nyerkayacvovtscakan liazvorvovtjownnyer ew ozhtwac ce irakan gortsadir l&aknyerow. Khvorhrdaranakan hanrapetvovthjvownnervowm,
 hanrabetowthjownnervovm, vorpes kanon, karavarvovthyvovnnyery aveli hajagh en popoghowthyan entharkvvowm ew kajown karavarman tyesankyvownic
 karawarman tesankyovnits avyeli xvocyeli en, sakayn nerkayatsovtscakan dyemvokratiaji abahvowman tesankyvownic` awyeli @ndovnyeli:Kisanaghagahakan
 @ndvovnyeli.Kisanaghagahakan karavarman hamakarkere nvovynbyes shat taracwac yen Kisanaghagahakan hanrabetvowthjvovnnere baganvovm yen 2
 hanrapetvowthyvovnner@ pazhanwvowm yen 2 xmpi`naxakahakan-khorhrdaranakan,xvorhrdaranakan-naxagahakanAradjini barakajowm nakhagahy aweli mets
 paragayvowm naxakahe aveli me& liazvorvowtjownner vovni karawarvowtjan dzyewawvorman gortsentatsovm. na karvogh e zevavvorel karavarvovtjovn, nsanakel
 karawarvovtyvovn, nshanakyel warchapyetin, isk khvorhrdaran@ ardyen yerkrvord pvovlowm karawarovtjan hastatman jamanak karox e anwstahvowthjown
 karvox e anwstahovthjown haytnyel karavarvovtjan@: Aydbisi karg er korcvowm HH-owm minchyew sahmanadrakan barepvoxvowmner@` 2005 th. noyyempyeri
 paryepvoghovmnyery 2005 t. nvoyempyeri 27-in Sahmanadrowthjan baryepvoxovmnyervov karavarowtjan dyewaworman gor&ynthatsowm xorhrdarani dyery aweli me&atsaw
 dere avyeli mye&atsaw Barepvoxwa& sahmanadrowtjamb naxakahe varchabet e nsanakvowm xvorhrdaranakan khvowmb-khmpaktsowthyvovnneri het
 khovmp-ghmbakcovthyownnyeri het ghorhrdaktsyelvovc hyetvo, patkamawornyeri me&amasnvowthyan vstahvovthyvovne wayyelox andzi. Rowsastanvovm, or@ nvowynbes
 Rvovsastanvowm, or@ novjnpes kisanaghakahakan hanrapetowthjovn e, war4abyeti tyeknatsvowtjvovne naghagahe arajarkvovm e pyetDowmajin, orn el
 PetDvowmajin, orn el qwyearkovm e warchapyeti okti
Ringvo Star (angl.` Ringo Starr, hvowlisi 7, 1940(1940-07-07), Liwyerpvowl, Lankashir, Anglia, Miatsyal Thakavvorvowthjvovn),
 Miacjal THakawvorvovthyovn), ankliaci erazhist, erkic, erkyeri hexinak yew derasan, arandznabyes hajtni vorbyes The Beatles-i harwacox: Ghmbi
 Beatles-i harvatsvox. KHmpi lowtsarvowmic hyeto warvovm e hagvogh solvo-kariera:Wagh tarinyer1940 tvakani hovlisi 7-in hatsthowgh Ri4ard
 7-in hatsthovkh Ri4ard Starki yew nra kin` Elsii entaniqowm vordi e cnwvovm, vore hvor het sharovnakovm e hvor awandakan asghatanky.
 avandakan ashghatanq@. Ringon hiwandot eryegha e myetsanvowm: tarrakan dbrocn awartelowc hetvo na mi ambvoxdj tari hiwandanocovm e
 tari hivandanvotsvowm e ants kacnowm` orvovaynamzi porbvoqman pattcharov, isk heto erkow tari batsakayvovm e dasyerits tvokamzi porpoqman
 daseric tvokamzi porpoqman patcharvow. Ajd patcharov Rinkon dbrvoce 4i awartvovm: 15 tarekanowm na darnowm e yerkathgtsayin kajarani karawaric`
 kayarani karavari4 Liwyerpowli ew Vowyelsi mijew Incbyes ir pvolvor hasakakicnery` na evs amyerikjan nor yerkyeri sirahar er, bayts
 ergeri sirahar er, payts skzpvowm cher erazvowm pyemakan parqi masin.The Beatles-i kazmowm1962 tvakani ogvostvosi 18-in Rinkvon pashtonabes
 18-in Rinkon bastvonapes mtnowm e The Beatles-i kazi mej Skzbvowm na ergovm er Rory Storm and the Hurricanes pit-ghmbovm, vory
 Hurricanes pith-khmpvowm, or@ ayd zhamanak Liwyerpvowlvovm hamarvowm er The Beatles-i amenaglghawvor mrcakicyRinkvon katarel e tmbovk yev
 mrtsakicyRingvon katarel e tmbvowk ev harwacajin gortsiqner The Beatles-i bvolor erkervowm bacarvowtyamb` «Within You Without You» (hndkakan harwatsvoghner),
 (hndkakan harwatsoghner), «Back in the U.S.S.R.» (Pol Makkarthni), Dear Prudence (Pol Maqqartni), «The Ballad Of John And Yoko»
 Ballad Of John And Yoko» (Pol Makqartni): Ringon lid-vvokal e katarel bolvor alpvomnyerowm, pacarvowthyamb A Hard Day’s Night, Magical
 Day’s Night, Magical Mystery Tour ew Let It Be: Na yexel e erkow yergyeri heghinak, orvonq katarvyel en The Beatles alpomvowm («Octopus’s
 albomvovm («Octopus’s Garden» ev «Don’t Pass Me By») ev exel e «What Goes On» erki hamahyexinak@ Ringoyi dayne shat angamnyer
 Rinkoji dzajny sat angamnyer lswel e @ndhanowr ergchaxmbvowm yew «Helter Skelter» erki werdjnamasovm, ortyegh na gvorvowm er «I’ve got blisters
 er: «I’ve got blisters on my fingers» («Im zyerkyerin bshtiknyer kan»).4najac nran, vor Rinkvoji dayn@ The Beatles-i dajnakrvowthyovnnyervowm
 zajnakrovthjovnnerowm hazwadyeb e lsvowm, na khaxacyel e The Beatles-i filmeri glxavor deryere YEntadrvowm e, or Rinko Stary bvolvor
 or Rinko Sthar@ bvolor 4ors «bitlnerits» ovnyetsel e amenabardr derasanakan taghande: The Beatles-i qayqayvowmic heto Ringvo Sthary
 qajqayvowmits heto Rinkvo Sthare ghaghatsyel e yevs mi qani filmyerowm.1968 tvakanin (ajn zhamanak, yerp khmpi andamneri poxharabervowtjovnnery
 pvokhharapervovthyovnnyery vattar ein)` «Spitak alpvomi» tvoxarkman zhamanak Pvol makkartnin ci tsankanvowm vijabanyel Stari het yev nran
 witchabanel Sthari het ev nran anvanvowm e «brimitiv thmbkahar». Khmi kaykayman jamanak na nkarahanwowm e filmerovm ew kvovazdnervovm:Svolvo
 gowazdnyervowm:Solvo karieraKHmpi pastonakan lowcarvovmic heto, incbes polvor bithlyer@, aynpes el Rinko Sthar@ sksvowm yen batrastyel
 sksvowm en patrastyel solo nyvovth, vore 20-50-akan tvakannerin thvogharkvvowm e «Sentimental Journey» qawyer zhvoxvova&vovi tyesqow. 70-akannyeri
 tesqvov: 70-akannyeri werjvovm` Gvoni, Pvoli ev Djorgi depyvovtic hetvo, Ringvoyi depjvovte knnarkvovm e, vorbyes anhajvox dyebjowt. 70-akannerin
 dyepyvovt. 70-akannyerin na mi qani yerazhishtneri ognvowthjamb (avyeli shat DJvorj Harrisvoni) na karoxanovm e thvoxarkyel shat hajvogh alpvomner.1971
 hadjox alpvomnyer:1971 thvakanin Rinkvon endovnowm e «Pankladesi hamar hamerki» hraver@ yev erkovm e ajnbisi hajtni ergi4nyeri hyet,

Roderik (Rvodi) Djvorj Tovms (ankl. Roderick "Roddy" George Toombs, aprili 17, 1954 - hvovlisi 30, 2015),
 - hvowlisi 30, 2015), arawel hajtni «Khovlikan» Rodi Pajer ("Rowdy" Roddy Piper) ringayin anvamb, kanadatsi naghkin profesional
 kanadatsi naghkin brvofyesivonal empshamartik (restler), kinvoderasan ev radivohaxvordavar: Ryestlinki asbaryezowm arawel nshanakali kariyera
 arawel nsanakali kariera e ownyecel «World Wrestling Federation» (WWF, ajzhm` WWE) kazmakerpowthvownowm handes galvov tarinyerin:CHnaja&
 kalow tarinerin.CHnayats &nwats linelow Kanadayovm, Pajper@, ownyenalov ghor@ svotlandakan armatner, ringvovm marmnavorel e glazgoyatsi
 marmnawvoryel e glazkvoyaci krwarar svotlandatsvov kryelvov SHotlandiaji khvorhrdanishn hamarvvogh kilthe yew ring mtnyelvow parkapzvovkayin katarman
 parkabzvowkajin katarman nyerko. Pazmathiw aritnerov rinkvowm avandakan svotlandakan casvowm@ drsyevvorelvow hamar stacyel e «xowligan»
 stacel e «xowlikan» makanovne:Masnakitakan karieraji @ntackovm handes e ekel pazmathiw pej-per-wjvow svoownyervovm, vorontsits
 shvovovnyervovm, orvoncits arandznacvovm en «Ryeslmania I»-@ ew «Ryeslmania II»-e. Endhanowr armamp kariyerayi entacqovm nvacel e 34
 ynthatsqvowm nwatchel e 34 cyembivonakan titghvos` end vorowm vo4 mi angam 4darnalvov ashxarhi warka&vow chyembivon. 2005 twakanin aragadrvyel
 thvakanin aradjadrwel e WWE parki srahMahacel e 2015 twakani howlisi 30-in` 61 tarekanvovm` kni jamanak stacats srti kathwa&i

Rvonda Gin Roovzi (ankl. Ronda Jean Rousey, pyetrwari 1, 1987(1987-02-01), Rivyersid, Kalifornia, AMN),
 Riwersid, Galifvornia, AMN), amerikatsi prvofyesional kharnamartowhi (MMA), nakhkin olimbiakan djvowdoistovhi yew kinvodyerasanvowhi, UFC kananc
 kinodyerasanowhi, UFC kananc nakhkin gertetewqasayin 4yempivon: Nyerka pahin handes e kalis «Ultimate Fighting Championship» (UFC) kazmakyerpvowthjan
 (UFC) kazmakerpowtjan kanants kerthyetyewqasayin diwizivonowm Ovni anckacrac tasneryeq brofesivonal yelvowjt, orontsic tasnerkvovsn awartel
 tasnyerkvovsn awartel e haghthanakov.Masnaktsowthyvovn vownenalvow Pekini 2008 thwakani amarajin olimbiakan ghaghyerin, dardyel e dzyowdvo
 khagherin, dardel e dzyvowdo spvortadyewvowm olimpiakan myedal nwatchac aradjin amerikowhin:Rvoovzin marzvowm e hayazgi marzichner Gvoqvor CHivicyani
 marzicner Kvoqvor CHiwicjani «Hayastan MMA Academy» (Los Angeles, Kalifornia) yew Edmvond Tarverdyani «Glendale Fighting Club» (Klendyel,

 «thyewkvotrovk» (armbar) kvo4vvogh handnvecnvox hnarqyYst mi sharq martakan handesnyeri Rovovzin hamarvvovm e hamar myek menamartowhin ashkharhvowm.Marzakan
 ashkharhowmMarzakan kariyerayic zat, handes e ekel «Forsazh 7», «Anzsbyelinere 3» yew «Antowrazh» kyegharwyestakan filmervovmWax
 gyegharvestakan filmerovm.Vax kyanqy&nvyel e 1987 tvakani petrwari 1-in Galiforniaji Riversayd shrjanowm dzyvovdvoistvowhi Anna Maria
 dzyovdoistvowhi Anna Maria de Marsi ev Rvon Roovzii yntaniqowm.1995 twakanin Rvovovzii hajr@ dvowstreri het sahnakvov ghaghalis lrgvoryen
 sahnakvow ghaghalis lrjoren wnasvowm e oxnashare. Pjishkneric tyexyekanalow, or vovni arjan makardelivovtyan het kapwats hazwadep handibogh
 kabwa& hazvadep handibvogh hivandovtyvovn, or@ ghangaryelow e vnaswa&ki abaqinmany i wyergo hastsnyelvoww andamalvovtsvowtyan, inchbes nayew
 andamalowcovtjan, incbes nayew kitaktselvov, vor apryelvov hamar qi4 zhamanak e mnatsel, Rvon Rvoovzin vorosvovm e heranal @ntaniqic yew inknasbanowtyvown
 @ntanikic ev inknasbanvovthyovn e kor&owm, yerp Rvondan 8 tarekan er.11 tarekan hasakowm mayre Rondayin hamozowm e zbaxwel dzjovdvoyvow
 e zpaxvel djovdvoyov. 1984 twakanin zjvowdoji askharhi 4empionovhi janachwac Anna Marian dstery tsanvothatsnvowm e marzazevi himnakan
 e marzazewi himnakan paghadri4neri hyetDjowdvoji karieran15 taryekanvovm Rvovowzin @ndkrkwowm e Miatsjal Nahanknyeri djvovdoyi
 Nahangneri dzyovdoji hawakakanowm Myek tari anc kananc kisamijinkasajin diwiziayi hamazgayin varkanisajin aghyowsakovm gravovm
 axyvovsakowm krawovm e 1-in horizvonakan@ darnalvow tvjal patwin chana4vats amyenayeritasard dzyovdoyistvowhin. 2004 tvakanin masnakcovm
 thvakanin masnakcowm e Athenqi amarajin olimbiakan ghagherin` darnalvow mrcvowythvowm masnakcogh amenayertiasard djvowdoistovhin: Nvovyn
 zjvovdvoistovhin. Nowyn thwakanin Roowzin oskye medalner e nvacvovm Hvownkariaji majraqaghaq Bvowdabyeshtvovm ancakvvox djowdoji ashkharhi
 antsakwvox dzjvovdvoyi asgharhi eritasardakan aradjnvovtjovnovm ew Isla Markaritaji banamyerikjan ghaghyervovm2006 tvakanin Rovowzin hadjoxvovthyamb
 Rovowzin hagoxowtjamb pastpanovm e panamyerikjan titxosy 2007 twakani Rio de Janyeyrvoji ashgharhi aradjnvowtjvovnvowm Roovzin 70
 arajnowthjownvowm Rvovowzin 70 kk kasayin karkowm nwachowm e arcatye myedal: Nvowjn tari, 4najac tsnki nyerhodajin gli wnasvackin, Rvoowziin
 vnasvackin, Rovowziin hajoxvvowm e voske medalakir darnal panamyerikyan khaxervovm:2008 tvakani Pyekini amarayin olimbiakan ghaghyervovm
 olimpiakan xaxyerovm pronzye myedal wastakyelovc heto, 21 taryekanovm Rvoovzin voroshowm e heranal zjvovdvoyistvovhvow kariyerayic:Gariyeran
 kariyerayic.Garieran yndhanowr menamarter sbvortadzyewovmDzyowdoyistowhov karierajits hetvo Rovovzin karj jamanak ashkhatowm e vorpes
 zhamanak ashghatvovm e vorpes barmenvowhi: I wyergvo, Rovowzin sepakan meqenayvow vorvosovm e meknyel Los Andjelyes: 2010 thwakani ogvostosin
 2010 tvakani ogvostosin Rovowzin mianowm e hayazgi marzic Edmond Tarwyerdjani «Glendale Fighting Club» martakan akvovmpin. Endhanvovr
 akovmbin. Yndhanowr menamartyer spvortadewi sirvoghakan meknarkajin marti jamanak Rovowzin hakarakvordi wra kiraryelow «armbar»
 wra kiraryelow «armpar» (thyevkvotrowk) hnarq@ @ndamene 23 wayrkjanowm karvoxanovm e haxthanak tanyel. Dran hadjordvox sirvoghakan yerkvow
 hajvordogh siroghakan erkvow menamartern awartwovm en novjn hnarqi kirarmamp` hamapatasxanabar avartwyelvow 57 yev 24 wayrkjanvovm.Hajvox
 24 vajrkyanvowm:Hadjvogh sirvoxakan kariyerayits hyeto Rvoovzin nowjnbisi hajvoxvovtjamb katarovm e ir brvofesivonal nvoramvovt@ 1-akan
 brvofesivonal nvoramvovt@ 1-akan rvobyeowm haxthanak tanyelvov aragin cvors handibovmnerowm 2012 thvakani martin Roowzin yndamyen@ 27 vajrkjanowm
 endamene 27 wayrkyanovm bartowthjan e matnovm Misa Thyejthin yev nwachvovm Strikeforce kananc kyerthyetewqasajin 4empivonakan gotin.Hyerthakan
 4yembionakan gotin.Hyerthakan arak haxthanake grantselowts hetvo, Rvoowzin marzakan pajmanakir e knkovm olorti aragatar aragnowthjvovne hamarvvogh
 aradjnovthyown@ hamarvvogh «Ultimate Fighting Championship» (UFC) kazmakerbowtjan het Canacwelvow UFC kanants kertyethyevqashayin 4yembion,
 gyertetewqashajin 4empion, Roowzin 2012 thvakani pyetrwari 23-in hagoxvowtyamp pashtpanovm e titxose Liz Garmowsi hyet mrcabajqarowm:
 Garmvowsi het mrcapajkarvowm Marte tevvovm e 4 rvope ev 49 vajrkyan, inch@ erkar gamanak hamarvowm er Rvovovzii masnaktsvovthyamp amenayerkar
 masnaktsowtjamp amenayerkar menamarty:Rvoovzii khare myenamarteri 12-0 an@ndmedj haxtanaknyeri sharane hatwovm e «UFC 193» iradardzowthyan
 «UFC 193» iradardvovtjan glghavor martovm, ortyex nvokaovti e entharkvvowm Hvoli Hvolmi koghmits:Svowrj myek tarwa patsakajovtyvovnic hetvo,
 patsakajvovtyownits hyetvo, Rovovzin ir yerkar spaswats veradarzy katarets 2016 thwakani dektembyeri 30-in` «UFC 207» iradarzvowtjan shrjanaknyerovm

Henrikh Daniel Rovmkorf (kerm.` Heinrich Daniel Ruhmkorff, hvovnvari 15, 1803(1803-01-15), Hannvovyer, Braovnshwayk-Lyownyepvovrg
 Braownshwayg-Ljownebvowrk - dyektyemperi 20, 1877(1877-12-20), Pariz, Fransia), kermanaci gyowtarar, meghanik, pardr larman impovlsneri
 bardr larman impvovlsnyeri aradjacman hamar sarqi Rvowmkvorfi kvotchi styex&ogh@Henrigh Daniyel Rovmkvorfe cnwyel e Hannovyerovm 1803 thvakani
 Hannovyervovm 1803 thvakani hovnwari 15-in. 1825 t. ashxatanqi e ancel Parizovm gtnwogh K SHavyeljyei arhyestanvotsvowm, isk 1840 tvakanin
 arhyestanvocovm, isk 1840 thwakanin himnel e sepakan myeghanikakan arhestanvoc ow khanvowth vorvonk irents sarqyeri vorakvov bari hambaw en vayelyel
 bari hambav yen wayyelyel Hyenrigh Daniel Rowmkvorfy mahatsyel e Parizvowm 1977 th, dyektyempyeri 20-in, jothanasvownchors taryekan hasakowm.AghpjovrnerРумкорф,
 hasakvovm.AxbjvovrnyerРумкорф, Генрих // Энциклопедический словарь Брокгауза и Ефрона : в 86 т. (82 т. и 4 доп.). — СПб., 1890—1907.Храмов

 400 с. — 200 000 экз. (в пер.)== Tsanvothakrvovtjovnner 
«Navovka» («rows. Наука», «Gitovtyvovn»), gitakan khvosor hratarakcowtjvovn GHSHM-ovm (Mvoskva), 1963-in KhSHM
 (Mvoskwa), 1963-in GhSHM GA hratarak4vowthjann en miatswel fizikamatyematikakan grakanvowtjan yev arevelyan grakanowtyan hratarak4vowtjvovnnery
 hratarakcovthyvownnere ev kocvyel «Navowka»Vovnyer 2 bazhanmovnq (Leninkradvowm yew Novosibirskovm), 2 glghawvor khmbakrowthyovn (fizikamathematikakan
 (fizikamathematikakan grakanowthjan ev aryevyeljan grakanovtyan) ew mvot 50 chyovxajin khmbagrovtyvovn «Navovka»-i entakayowthyan tak
 «Navovka»-i yenthakayovthyan tak kan 4 tbaran, «Akademknika» krki aryevtri kazmakyerpvowthjowny. «Naowkan» hratarakvowm E KhSHM GA ew nra paganmovnknyeri
 ev nra bajanmownqneri kitakan ghorhovrdneri, institowtneri vov ambivonnyeri ashxatovthjovnnyer@, himnakanovm myenakrvowthyovnnyer, in4pyes
 myenakrovtyvownnyer, incbyes naev thematik jvoxvowa&vovner, texyekatvovner yew ayln: «Navovka»-i seriakan hratarakovthjownnyerits yen` «Krakan
 hratarakvovthjvovnnyeric en` «Krakan zharangowthyvovn», «Krakan hvowsardzanner», «Kitvovtjan dasakanner», «Kita-kyensagrakan matenashar», «YErkrvord
 matenasar», «YErkrvord hamashkharhayin baterazm@ hetazvotvowtyownnyerowm, hvovshyervowm yev pastathghthervowm», «Gitahanramatceli krakanowtjovn»

GHSHM naxararnyeri khorhovrd (rovs. Совет министров СССР), pyetakan ishxanowtyan pardragowyn kortsadir kargadri4
 bardrakvowjn kvortsadir kargadrich marmin, karavarvovtjown naxkin KHSHM-owm. Gazmawvorvyel e 1946-in gvoxvovrdakan komisarneri xvorhrdi poxaryen:Gazmvel
 xorhrdi poxaren.Kazmvel e GhSHM Gyeragowyn xvorhrdi kvoxmic hyerthakan gowmarman aradjin nstasrdjanowm, hetewjal kazmvow` KHSHM Ministrnyeri
 kazmov` KHSHM Ministrnyeri ghvorhowrdi naghakah, naghakahi aradjin texakalner yew teghakalnyer, KHSHM ministrnyer, GHSHM byetakan komityenyeri
 KhSHM pyetakan kvomityenyeri naxagahnyer Ghorhowrdi kazmi myedj i bashtone mtnel yen naev miovtenakan hanrabyetvowthjownneri Ministrneri khvorhvowrdnyeri
 Ministrnyeri khorhovrdneri naxagahnyer@. Khvorhvowrdn handyes e ekyel orpyes @ndhanvowr iravasowtyan marmin, vori gerakayovthyvovnnyeri medj
 kyerakayvowtyovnnyeri myej e eghel lov&yel XSH Miovtyan tnorinovthyan@ wyerapahwac pvolor harcyery, batsarvovthjamp KhSHM Kyerakvovyn sowyetin
 XSHM Gyerakowyn svowetin ev wyerjinis Nakhakahvovthjany werapahwats hartsyeri.Kvocwac e yeghyel apahowel joghovrdakan tntesowthyan yev svotsial-msakvovthayin
 yev svotsial-msakovtayin shinararowtjan ghekawarvowm@, msakyel yew irakanacnel mijvotsarvovmner goghvowrdi parekyetsowtjan ew kvovltvovraji atchi
 baryekyetsovtjan yew kvovltvowrayi atchi abahowman hamar, zarkatsnel kitvovthyovnn vow teghnikan, racional oktakvortsel yev pahbanyel pnakan ryesvowrsnyery,
 bnakan ryesovrsnere, amrapndyel dramakan ev warkayin hamakark@, gnyeri, ashghatanqi vardzatrvowtyan, svocialakan apahvovovtjan miasnakan
 abahovvovtjan miasnakan qaghakakanowtjovn varyel, kazmakerbyel betakan apahvowakrowthjovn yew hasvarman vov vicakakrvowtyan miasnakan
 vicakakrowtjan miasnakan hamakark, kazmakyerbel ardyvownaperakan, sinararakan, kjvowghatntesakan dyernarkowtjovnneri vow miavorowmneri,
 dyernarkvovthjvovnneri ow miavorvovmnyeri, transpvorti yew kabi dernarkvowthyvownneri, bankyeri, in4pyes naew mivowtyenakan entakayowthjan ayl kazmakyerbovtyvownneri
 kazmakerbovthyvovnneri ow himnarkneri karawarvowmy:Xorhovrdn irakanacryel e nayew zinvats vovgyeri sinararvowthjan yndhanovr ghyekavarovm@,
 endhanowr xyekavarovm@, orvosyel iskakan zinworakan tsarajowtyan hamar zvorakvoci enthaka kaxaqacinyeri amenamja kontingenty, abahvowel
 kontinkent@, apahowyel artasahmanjan erkrneri het haraperowthyownnyeri @ndhanvowr ghyekavarvovme yew ayln: XSHM Ministrneri ghorhovrde
 Ministrnyeri khvorhvowrdy KHSHM oryenqneri, Kyeragovyn svovyeti ow dra Nakhakahowthyan ayl akteri himan wra, yev i katarvowmn dranc, hratarakyel
 katarvovmn dranc, hratarakyel e KHSHM voghj teritvoriayovm partadir katarman yenthaka orosowmnyer ov karkadrvovtjownnyer, stvovkyel drants katarovm@
 stovgyel dranc katarvovme Arawel karevvor hamapyetakan harceri werabyeryal voroshovmner @ndvovnyel e GHMKK Gyentkomi hyet hamatyegh: Miaworel

 petakan kvomityenyeri, iren yenthaka mjvows marminnyeri asghatankin: KhSHM tnorinvovtjane wyerabahva& harcervovm iravovnk e ownyetsel
 hartsyervowm irawovnq e vownetsel kasecnel mivowthyenakan hanrabyetvovthyovnneri Ministrneri ghorhowrdnyeri vorvosvowmneri vov kargadrvowthjovnnyeri
 vov kargadrvovthyownnyeri katarvovmy, ceghyal haytararyel GHSHM ministrowthjvownneri, KHSHM petakan komityenyeri, iryen yenthaka myvovs marminneri
 yenthaka myvows marminneri aktyery. Ministrneri ghorhovrdner ovnyen naev mivowthenakan ew inknavar hanrabyetvovthyownnery:HGHSH Ministrnyeri

 zharankovm: Dzyevanmvowshi kirarman barzakvowjn orinak e bazmaki zharankman ogtakortsvovm@ mi qani daser@ myekvowm miavoryelvow hamar Ardjvownqvovm

 mimyancic bajanowm e ajnbes, vor verginners karox pvopokhvyel mimjantsits ankakhKyeryezmanakar (ankl.` Tombstone) - objyekti "mijaka"

 ortyegh yvowraqanchjowr objekt ovni nvovyn interfyejs@.Dekorator - irakanatsman zhamanak dasin avyelacnovm e lratsovtsi4 hnaraworvowtjovn,
 lratsvovcich hnaravvorvovtjvovn, vorn apahvovowm e chkvovn ajl@ntranq daseri fvownktsinalowthyvownn @ndlajnyelov hamar:@ndardakeliovtyovn (angl.`
 hamarEndarzakelivowtyovn (ankl. Extensibility pattern) kam Framework - bard kvode takcnvovm e parz intyerfeysi hetyewovmJakat - kvoyvovthyovn
 hetevvowmCakat - kvoyovthjvown ownyecvox interfeysi hamar stextsvowm e barzecva& intefejs yndhanowr xndirnyerowm ayn ogtagvorcelvow hamarHarmaryetsnvogh
 ogtakortsyelvow hamar:Harmaretsnogh - myets qanakvovtyamb objektner vownen yndhanvowr hatkvowtjovnnyer hishvoghowthjan taratsqn ardyvovnawet ogtagor&yelov
 ardyovnawet oktagvortsyelov hamar:Khoghvovakner yev filtrer (ankl. Pipes and filters) - brvocyesnyeri sghtha, ortegh myeki elky handisanowm
 myeki elqe handisanvowm e myowsi skizb:Andnakan das (ankl. Private class data pattern) - sahmanapakowm e hasanelivowthjovne:proksi
 hasanyeliovthjvowny:prvoksi - dase handisanvovm e intyerfejs ajl baneri hamar== Canothakrvowthyownner 
Sthiv Ostin (cnva& vorbyes Stiw DJejms Andyerson Steven James Anderson, aweli vovsh` Stiven Jejms Oviljams Steven
 DJyeyms Vovilyams Steven James Williams, dektyemberi 18, 1964 t.), arawyel haytni ir «Sarcye govnd» Stiw Osthin (angl. Stone Cold
 Ostin (ankl. Stone Cold Steve Austin) rinkayin/ hyerowstatesajin anvamb, amerikatsi kinoyi yew hyervowstatesvowthjan dyerasan, naxkin
 herowstatyesvovtyan dyerasan, nakhkin profesional embshamartik (ryestlyer): Vorbyes ryestlyer handyes e yekel ajnpisi kazmakyerpvovtyovnnervovm, incpisik
 kazmakerpvovthyvownnyervovm, inchpisiq yen «WCW»-n, «ECW»-n yew «WWF»-@, ortyegh el hasyel e masnagitakan karierayi bardraketin ow hamashkharhayin
 barzraketin vow hamasxarhayin tchanacmanEst «WWE»-i gvorcadir tnoryen yev naxakah Vins Maqmahvoni` ardyovnabyerovtyan patmvowtyan meg Osthiny
 batmvowtjan myeg Osthine yexel e amenasahovtapyer ryestlyere: 2009 thwakanin dardzel e WWE-i parki srahi andamMasnagitakan kariyeraji
 andamMasnagitakan karieraji ynthatsqowm Ostinn endhanvovr armamb nwajyel e 20 4empivonakan titghvos: Patsi ayd, haghtyel e nayev 1996 t. «Ringi

 2009-owm»:== &anvothagrovthjovnnyer 
Svowitsidal tovrizm  nayew eftanazayin tvowrizm (kerm. Sterbetourismus, angl. suicide tourism, ankl.` euthanasia
 tourism, ankl.` euthanasia tourism), tvowrizmi tesak e kapvac eftanaziayi sarjman ev agaktsman hyet, vori srjanaknervovm botentsial teknatsovnyeri
 bvotyentsial tekna&vowneri hamar kazmakerbvvovm e vowxevvorovtjvovn ayn yerkrnyer, vortyegh tvovylatrvvovm e eftanazian: Eftanazian orenqvow
 eftanazian: Efthanazian oryenqov argyelwa& ce Nidyerlandnyervovm, Lyvovksempvowrkvovm, Belgiayowm, AMN-i orosh nahanknyerovm, vortex inqnakam kjankic
 vortex inknakam kjanqits hyeratsovme hamarwowm e lipyeral:Svovitsidal barn arajacel e anglyeren «suicide»  (inqnasbanvovtyown) parits:Kargavijaky
 paric:Gargavijak@ tarpyer erkrnyervowmMyeksikaMyeqsikajvowm, kendanineri ghanvovthnyerovm, wacarvovm e byentvobarbital bryebarate,
 byentoparbital pryebaraty, orn ogtagvorcwovm e tnayin kyendaninyeri eftanaziayi hamar: Mard@, ogtagor&elvov ajd pryebaraty, myek gamwa
 prebaraty, myek gamwa yntatskvowm mahanovm e: Haxordwowm e, vor asxarhi tarper masyerits tarec zbosashrjiknyery, owqer pvorzvowm yen
 zbosashrgiknyer@, owqyer pvordovm yen verj tal irenc kyanqin, bryeparati zyerk perman nbatakvov vowxyevvorwowm yen Myeqsika: Sakajn, ka kartsik, or
 Sakayn, ka kartsiq, vor efthanaziayi hyet kabwats, aystex karox yen arajanal djvarvovthjownner, kani vor pyentobarbitali vorak@ Myeqsikajovm
 bentvobarpitali oraky Myeksikayvovm 4i verahskvvowm:NidyerlandnerNidyerlandnyer@ 2002 tvakakanin orinakanacryel en eftanazian: Ays vorvoshman
 efthanazian: Ays orosman knnadatnery wakhyenowm ein, vor da karajatsni «efthanazayin tvovrizmi» («euthanasia tourism») alik:SHvejcariaEftanazian
 alik:SHvyejtsariaEftanazian 1941 tvakanic thvovjlatrvovm e shweycarakan Cyvovrikhi shrganovm ew aystegh amen tari mot 200 mard inqnakam
 mvot 200 mard inqnakam hrazharvvovm e kjankic:Mardkants me& masy, ovker efthanaziayi npatakow galis en Swyejcaria, Germaniajits
 SHweycaria, Gyermaniayits ev Myec Britaniayits yen: 2008 twakani hoktembyerin shvowrdj 100 pritanaciner oktvel en swjetsarakan «Dignitas»
 swyyetsarakan «Dignitas» ynkyerovtyan &arajowthyownnyerits, isk 690 hogi grantswyel yen orpes abaga hatchakhordner:Eftanaziayi kvojvowthjovny
 hachaxvordner:Efthanaziayi gvoyowthyowne hartsakani tak drvyets, vorvovhyetew kyanqic heranalov nbatakvov Shveycaria ein galis nayev ayn mardik, vowkyer 4ein
 ayn mardik, vovker chein tarabvowm anpvovzheli hiwandovthjamp: 2011 thwakani mayisin, Dasnajin zhvoxovrdavarakan miovtyan yew Awyetaranakan
 miovtjan yev Avetaranakan kovsakcvovtyan naxazyernvovthjamb, anc katsvyets hanraqwye, ortyex Cyvovrikhi pnakicnere kvoxm qwearkyecin anpowjeli
 qvearketsin anpowzheli hiwandnyeri hamar efthanaziayi orinakancman@, ynd vorvowm o4 miayn SHvyejcariaji bnakicnyeri, aylev yerkir ajcelats

Sthiv Ostin (cnvats vorpyes Stiv Geyms Andyerson Steven James Anderson, awyeli vowsh Stiven Jyeyms Voviljams Steven
 Gejms Voviljams Steven James Williams, dyektembyeri 18, 1964 th.), aravel haytni ir «Sarcye kvovnd» Stiw Ostin (ankl.` Stone Cold
 Osthin (angl. Stone Cold Steve Austin) ringajin/ hervovstatyesajin anvamb, amyerikatsi kinvoji ev hervowstatesvowtyan dyerasan, naghkin
 hyerowstatesovtyan dyerasan, nakhkin brvofyesional embshamartik (restler) Orbes restlyer handes e ekyel aynpisi kazmakerbvovtyvovnnyerovm, in4bisiq
 kazmakerbovthjovnnyerovm, incpisiq yen «WCW»-n, «ECW»-n yew «WWF»-e, vortyegh el hasyel e masnagitakan karierayi barzrakyetin vov hamashkharhayin

Wirdjil Rajli Ranyels krtser (ankl.` Virgil Riley Runnels Jr., hoktyempyeri 12, 1945 – hvownis 11, 2015),
 – hownis 11, 2015), arawyel haytni «Amerikyan erazank» Dasthi Rvoowdz ("The American Dream" Dusty Rhodes), rinkayin anwamb,
 Rhodes), ringajin anwamb, amyerikaci nakhkin profesional @mbis (ryestler), prvofesional ymbshamarti marzic, WWE, WCW yev profyesional

 «NXT» storapajanowmovm askhatel e vorbyes marzic, brvodjvowser yew stsenarist. Ringvowm Ranelsy marmnaworyel e amyerikyan panwvorakan dasakarki
 panvorakan dasakarki nyerkayatsvowcchiMarzakan tarineri entatsqovm yereq ankam nvatchel e NWA asgharhi canrqasajin titghvose. «Jim
 tsanrkasayin titxos@. «Jim Crockett Promotions» (hyetakajovm «WCW») tsancowm handes kalow tarinerin myek angam nvajel e Miatsyal Nahanknyeri
 e Miacjal Nahankneri titxos@, incbes nayew pazmathiw aritnyervow hrchakvyel herowstatyesayin yew ashgharhi timayin 4empion Arganatsyel
 thimayin 4yembivon. Arjanatsyel e naew mi sharq tara&ashrganayin titghvosneri spvortayin @mbsamartvov zbaxvelow tarinerin.Aradjadrwyel e WWE,
 tarinerin.Aragadrvyel e WWE, WCW, prvofyesional ympsamarti ev «Restlink obzyerwyer» tyexekakri parki srahnyer. Rvovdzi ordiner Dastin@ yew

 arjovnakits eghpayr (qeyfyep). Tarineri @nthatsqvowm eghbajrnyern vownyecyel yen incbyes hishvvox hakamartowtjvovnner, ajnpes el hadjvox timayin elovjthnyer
