Doweyn Dvowglas Djonson (angl. Dwayne Douglas Johnson, cnw.` majisi 2, 1972), amyerikatsi dyerasan, prvodjovser
 derasan, brodyowsyer ew prvofesional ympsamartik (ryestler) aravel hajtni «Gajr» (The Rock) ajcekartajin makanvampDbrvotsn awartyelowc
 makanwamb:Dbrvotsn avartelvowc hetvo DJonsonn handyes e yekel Majamii hamalsarani amerikyan fvowtpoli hamalsaranayin hawaqakanovm, vori kazmowm
 havakakanvowm, vori kazmowm 1991 twakanin darzel e hamalsaranajin arajnvovthjan cyembivon Hamalsaranayin kariyerajits hetvo handes e ekel
 kariyerajic hyeto handyes e ekyel Ganadakan fovtpvoli likayi (CFL) «Kalgari Sthyempidyers» akowmpvowm. Fovtpolisti kariyerajic heranalvow 1995
 kariyerajic heranalvow 1995 thvakanin, DJonson@ vorvosowm e sharvownakyel hor` Rvoqi Djonsoni yev mayrakan babi Pityer Maiwiayi vowghin ew mvovtk
 Maiviaji vowxin yev movtq e gortsowm profesivonal ympshamarti ardjownabyervovtjvovn Skzpnabes handyes galov Rvoqi Maivia ringajin anvamb,
 Maiwia rinkajin anwamp, DJonson arawyel zankwacayin tchanacman e hasnowm «Roqi» kerparvowm` 1996-ic 2004 thvakannerin handyes kalov
 tvakannyerin handes galvow «World Wrestling Federation» (WWF, ayzhm WWE) kazmakyerpvowthyownvovm. 2011-2013 tvakannyerin Gvonsvony krkin
 tvakannerin Gonson@ krkin vyeradarnovm e @mbshamarti asbaryez:Hamarwowm e brvofyesional ympsamarti bolor gamanaknyeri lavakowjn marziknerits
 lavagovjn marzikneric myek@ acki enknyelov the! ringajin ev tye pemakan hmtovtjownnyerov. «WWE»-ovm antskacrac tarinyerin endhanovr
 tarinerin endhanowr armamp nwajel e 17 cembivonakan titxvos, voroncic tas@` &anrqasajin (8 angam WWF/E cembivon, 2 ankam WCW
 chyempivon, 2 angam WCW 4empivon) Haghtyel e naev 2000 thvakani «Thakawvorakan myenamart@»:Nkarahanwel e «Garitchneri arkan, «Mec qajlyerov»,
 arqan, «Myec qajlyervow», Movmian veradarnovm e», «Fvorsag 5», «Forsag 6» yev ajl filmyerowm.Vax kjankyDjonsvony tsnvel e Galifvorniaji
 &nwel e Kaliforniayi Heyvvord pnakavajrovm brofesional @mpsamartik Roqi Djonsvoni yew Atha Jonsvoni (orivordakan azganown@` Maivia)
 (oriordakan azkanvown@ Maiwia) @ntaniqowm. Hajry serovm e Nvor SHvotlandia gaxta& afroamerikyan tsyexyeric, isk mayre pnik samoatsi e: Jonsvoni
 pnik samoatsi e Gvonsvoni majrakan pape nowjnbes endgrkvac e yeghel brvofesivonal ymbsamarti volortvowm` handyes galvow «Barzragowyn arajnvord»
 «Bardzragowjn arajnvord» pityer Maivia rinkajin anvamb, isk werginis kine Lia Maivian, 1982 thwakanin amvowsnov mahwanits hyeto min4yev
 mahwanic heto min4yew 1988 thwakany zpaghvel e «Polynesian Pacific Pro Wrestling» kazmakyerpowthyan shrganaknyerovm anckacwvox myenamartyeri
 antskatswox menamartyeri kazmakerbmamp Gartch gamanakvow DJvonsvonn ir mvor yntaniqi hyet bnakvel e Nor Zyelandiayi Oqlend qaxaqvovm,
 Zelandiaji Oqlend kaghaqovm, orits hyeto &nvoxneri het vyeradardzel Miacjal Nahangner:Tasnerord dasarane Gvonsvonn hacakhyel e Hvonolovlvowi
 hatchakhyel e Honvolvowlowi (Hawajan kxzinyer) Owiljam Makqinlii anvan awak dbrvotsovm, sakayn hagvord owsvovmnakan tarvowm entanyok handyerd
 tarowm @ntanyok handyerdz tyeghapoghvel e Petlehem kaxaq (Pyensilvania nahang) hor asghatanki battcharvov Jonsvonn sksvowm e hacaghel «Fridom»
 sksvowm e hajaxyel «Fridom» avak dprotse yew endgrkwowm e amyerikyan fvovtpoli dprvocakan havaqakanowm. Baci fvowtpvolic, Jonsvon@ handes
 fvowtbolits, Jvonson@ handyes e galis nayev vazki ew @mbshamarti hawaqakannerovm:Ovnyenalov bavakanin khvostovmnalic dprvotsakan kariyera amyerikjan
 dbrocakan kariyera amerikjan fvovtbvolvovm, pazmathiw hamalsaranner sksvowm yen hyetaqrkrvyel DJvonsvonov, ov i wergo orvoshvowm e yndvovnyel Majamii
 orosvowm e yndownel Majamii hamalsarani sbvortajin krtatvosaki tsragiry 1991 thwakanin DJonsoni hamalsaranayin thim@ karoxanvowm e darnal
 karoghanvowm e darnal hamalsaranayin aragnovthjan 4yempion. Vnasva&k dzerk peryelovc hyeto Jvonsvonin poxarinvovm en Fvovtpoli azkayin
 yen Fowtpvoli azkajin likayi (NFL) apaga marzik Ovvoryen Sepi hyet Mayamii hamalsaranvovm anckatsra& tarinyerin Djvonsony tsanvothanvovm
 tarinerin Jonsony canothanovm e apaka knvodj` Dyeni Garsiaji hyet, ov 1992 twakanin hamalsarann avartyelovts hyeto darnvovm e dra hogabardownyeri
 e dra hvokabardvowneri khvorhvovrdi andam DJvonsvon@ hamalsarann awartvovm e 1995 twakanin` dzyerq beryelow pakalavri astichan qryeagitovtjan
 astichan qryeakitvowtjan yew hokyepanvowtyan olvortovm Novyn tvakanin DJvonsvon@ pajmanagir e knkvowm Ganadakan Fowtbvoli ligaji (CFL)
 Fovtpoli ligaji (CFL) «Kalgari Stempidyers» akovmpi het, sakajn @ndamene mek mrtsashrjan anckacnyelvowts heto stanovm myegqi wnasvatsq
 stanowm myejqi vnasva&q yew stipwac heranvowm prvofyesivonal fovtbolisti kariyerajitsGarieran brvofesivonal @mbsamartvovmMarzovmnyer
 embsamartovmMarzvowmnyer (1995–1996)Baci DJonsvoni hvorits yev bapits, profyesional emshamartvovm en nerkrawats nayew nra bazmatiw ayl azgakanner,
 bazmathiw ajl azkakannyer, neraryal kerinyer Afan ow Sikan (hajtni orbyes «Wayri samvoaciner») ew nra zarmiknyer Afa krtsery (Manvow),
 Afa krtser@ (Manvow), Rodnin (Yvokozovna), Solofan (Rikishi), Mety (Rovowzi) yev Eddin (Ovmaga): Erb DJvonsonn haytararovm e ympish
 hajtararvowm e embis darnalow mtadrowtjan masin, hayre skzbnabes dyem e artahajtvvowm ayd oroshman@, sakayn hyetakajowm orvosowm
 sakajn hyetagayvowm oroshowm e andamb marzyel vordvown` nakhabes tyeghekacnelvow, vor 4apazants xist marzic klini: 1996 thwakanin wyetyeran embshamartik
 veteran embshamartik Pyeth Patersony Djvonsvoni hamar kazmakerpowm e mi qani pordznakan menamarter «World Wrestling Federation»
 Wrestling Federation» (WWF) kazmakerbvovthyownowm, vorontsic arawel nsanawvor e linvowm nra haxtanaky Brvovqlinjan krvarari (Stiv
 Brvowklinjan krwarari (Stiv Lombardi) nkatmamb, inchpyes nayev bartovtyvownnyere Qris Kandidoyi yew Oowyen Harthin: Pordznakan myenamartyerovm
 Pvordznakan menamartyerowm Gvonsvonn handyes e galis irakan anvamb. Dranic heto Gonsvon@ yelowyt e vownyenowm Gyeri Lovovleri «United States
 Lvoowleri «United States Wrestling Association» kazmakyerpvowthyvovnovm Flyeqs Gavana rinkajin anwamp, yew 1996 thvakani amran@ nvatchowm
 tvakani amrane nvatchovm USWA askharhi timajin 4empivonakan titghvosy (vomn ymbis Bart Sojyeri hyet) Karj zhamanak anc «WWF»-@ pajmanagir
 anc «WWF»-@ pajmanakir e knqvowm Djonsvoni het: Minchyev masnagitakan noramowt katarely, Gvonsvonn hacaxvovm e lracowcich marzvovmneri.World
 marzowmneri:World Wrestling Federation/EntertainmentRvoqi Maivia (1996–1997)Noramvovt@ «WWF»-vowm DJonsvon@ katarvovm e Roki
 DJvonson@ katarvowm e Rvoqi Maivia bemakan anvamb, inche nra hvor ew babi rinkayin anvovnnyeri hamadrvovtyvownn er. Skzpnabyes Djonsvon@ dzhkamvowtjamb
 Gvonsvone dgkamvowthyamb er @ndownvovm ir nor anvanvovm@, sakajn kazmakerpvovthyan bromotyer Wins Maqmahonin ev meknaban Jim Rosin
 yev meknaban Djim Rosin hajoxvvovm e i werjo nran hamozyel ajd hartsvovm: Rvoki Maiwiayi masnakcowtyamp myenamartery cowtsadryelis meknapannyer@
 cvovtsadryelis myeknabannyery nran nyerkajatsnvowm ein vorbyes «WWF»-i arajin errvord syerndi ymbshamartike Roqi Maivian elowyth er ovnenvowm
 Maivian yelovyth er ovnenvovm vorpes drakan kyerpar, ov 4najats ringayin porzi pakasin, scenaristnyere nran capazants mecacawal ovsadrovtjovn
 mecatsaval owshadrowthjown ein hatkacnvowm. «WWF»-vovm antskacra& arajin mart@ Maiwian antsakcnvovm e «Survivor Series» pej-per-wjvow
 Series» pey-per-vjov iradarzovthjan jamanak haxthyelow 8-hokanvots eliminatsion mart@. 1997 thwakani petrvari 13-in Maiwian bartvovtjan
 13-in Maiwian partvowthjan e matnovm Hantyer Hirst Helmsliin ev nwacvowm WWF migmajrtsamaqayin 4embionakan titxos@: Maiviayin hagoghvvowm
 Maiwiayin hajvoxwvovm e tarper arithnervov pastbanel chembivonakan titxvosy. 4nayac Djonson@ nerkayacvowm er vorbyes drakan kyerbar,
 vorbyes drakan kerpar, sakajn handisatesy nran 4er hamakrovm, yew nra masnaktsvowtjamp marteri zhamanak ardyen soworakan ein darnowm
 sowvorakan ein darnovm dahlitchits hnchvogh pacasakan sovlocnyer@.Kyerakayvovthyan azg (1997–1998)1997 thwakani abrili 28-i «Raw is
 abrili 28-i «Raw is War» haxvordman gamanak Maivian kvortsnvovm e midjmayrcamakayin titghose Ovowyen Harti hyet mrtsabajkarovm yev mi
 hyet mrtsabajqarovm ew mi kani or ants stanvowm &nki wnaswa&k Myenqajndi hyet menamartyelis. Abakinwelvovc heto Maiwian arden weradarnowm
 Maivian arden weradarnovm e orbyes bacasakan kyerbar` embisner Farowki, Di Lvo Bravovni ev Kamaji het zyewavoryelov «Gerakayowthjan azg»
 «Kerakayowtyan azk» (Nation of Domination) ghmpawvorvovme Ajd yntackvowm Djvonsvonn hrazharwowm e iryen kvocyel «Rvoqi Maivia», dra
 kochel «Roki Maivia», dra pogharen ir masin khvosowm errvord dyemqvow inkn iren anwanyelvov «Roq» (The Rock, tharkmanapar` Jajr) Rinkayin
 tharkmanapar Zhajr) Rinkajin brvomoneri jamanak Gvonsoni kyerbarn hatchakh viravorovm e handisatesin, isk kvowlisayin hartsazrowytsneri zhamanak
 harcazrvowjcnyeri zhamanak` zrovtsawarnyerin (qyeyfeb):«In Your House: D-Generation X» iradardvovtjan jamanak Rokin chi hadjoghvvovm nvacel
 ci hadjoghwowm nwachyel mijmajrcamakayin titxos@ «Sartsye byekor» Sthiw Ostini hyet mrtsapajkarowm, sakayn dran hagordox «Raw is War»
 hajordvogh «Raw is War» haxvordman jamanak Parvon Makmahvoni hrahangvov tyeghi e ownyenvovm ryewans mart. Ostiny hragarwvovm e martits yew
 hragarwowm e martic ew voroshowm e zijel titxose, sakayn dranic hetvo ansbaselioryen harva&ovm e Rvoqin ir stanyer kvocvox awartakan
 staner kocvvogh awartakan hnarkow 1997 thwakanic mincew wax 1998 thvakany Rvokn hakamartowthyan medj e mtnovm Stiv Ostini, Ken Shyemrvoqi,
 Osthini, Qen SHyemroki, incbes nayev ghmpakic Farvowqi het.Aveli vovsh Roky ew «Gerakajovtjan azky» sksovm yen hakamartel «D-Generation
 hakamartel «D-Generation X» ghmpawvorman andamneri het. Khmpaworvovmneri arajnordnyeri masnakcovthyamp aradjin myenamart@ texi e ovnyenowm
 myenamarte teghi e ovnyenovm «Fully Loaded» iradardowtjan gamanak, ore vitchaharvovyts kyerpov haghthowm e Roq@ ov ir mvot pahovm migmajrcamaqayin
 pahvovm midjmajrtsamaqajin titxvos@: Hakamartovthyovny sarvovnakvowm e «Samrslyem» iradardzovthyan zhamanak, erb sandvowghqajin martovm
 sandowghqayin martovm haghtovm e Tripl Eyce yev tirvovm cyembivonakan titghosin: «Breakdown» iradarzovtjan jamanak erakoghmani martowm
 gamanak yerakvoghmani martvovm Roqy bartowtyan e matnvovm Ken Shemrvokin ev Menqayndin vov darnovm WWF cempivonakan titghosi havaknord Ayd
 titghosi hawaknvord. Ajd ynthackowm Rok@ tardajnovthjvownner e ownyenowm ghmpakits Mark Hyenrii het, in4i battcharvovw «Gyerakajvovtyan azgy»
 «Kerakajvovtyan azk@» dadarvovm e kojvovthyovn vovnenalowc:Kvorporatsia (1998–1999)Zvarjatsnvogh prvomvoneri ev drantsits bkhvogh gvoghvovrdakanovtyan
 pkhvogh jvoghovrdakanovthjan aci snvorhiw Rvoky darnvovm e drakan kerpar yev sksowm inkn iren vorakel orpyes «gvoghovrdakan 4yembion»: «Mahacow
 «zhvoghvovrdakan cempivon»: «Mahacvow ghagh» kocvogh mrtsashari yezrapak4owm Roqe bartowthyan e matnovm Myenqajndin ev tirvowm thapvowr WWF 4yembionakan
 tapvovr WWF 4empionakan titghvosin: Orvos jamanak anc Roq@ dasnaktsowm e Wins ew Sheyn Makmahvonneri hyet yew dyevawvorvovm «Gorporacia» kocvox
 «Kvorpvoracia» ko4wvogh xmbawvorvovmy` Maqmahonin nsanakelvov vorpes ghmbabet.1998-99 thwakanneri enthackvovm Rvoq@ ew Menkajnd@ nvor
 Roke yew Menqayndy nor hakamartvowtyan myedj en mtnvovm, inci ardyownkowm tarper arithnyervov WWF titghvos@ ancnvowm e mekits mjowsinI
 ancnvowm e mekits mjvowsinI vergo Roqy kvorcnvowm e titghos@ «Ryeslmania XV»-i srdjanaknyervowm bartvyelow Sthiw Ostinin: partvvowm e naew
 Osthinin: Partvowm e naew «In Your House» iradardzvovtyan ryevansh menamartvowm. Cnayats ajd gamanakahatwacowm Jonsoni kyerbary krkin

 handisatesnyeri me&amasnovtjovn@ sksvovm e adjaktsel nran. Rvoky krkin darnvovm e drakan kyerbar, yerp nran e dawacanovm Syeyn Makmahone Hyetakajovm

 kyneqs@n yew WWF 4empionakan titxosi hyetapndvowmnery (1999–2001)1999 twakani ynthackvowm Rokn yndgrkwvovm e pazmathiv thimajin mrcabayqarnyervowm
 thimayin mrcabajkarnervowm: Mianalvow nakhkin aghojan Menqayndin, Roky dewavvorvovm e «The Rock 'n' Sock Connection» time` martahrawyer
 Connection» tim@` martahravyer nyetelvov WWF thimajin 4yembionner Andertheyqerin ew Pig Svovowin: Roqi ev Menqayndi timin hagoxwvowm e aradjin
 thimin hagvoghvovm e aradjin isk menamartowm nvacyel thimayin titxvose. Paci rinkayin menamartyeric Rvoqy yev Menkajnde miasin katarvovm

 haghvordasari «Sa qo kjankn e» ebizodn er (hamanown herovstashvoowi anvamp), ori gamanak Menkajndy ring e hrawirvowm anzac, owker inch-or
 andzats, vovqyer inch-or kap en ovnetsel Rvoki ancyali het, masnaworapyes nra dprotsakan enkervowhown, amerikjan fvowtbvoli marz4in
 amyerikjan fvowtpvoli marzcin ev ajlots. Ebizode wastakvovm e 8,4 kor&akic est Nilseni varkanisayin hamakargi yev min4 ors hamarwowm e
 min4 ors hamarvowm e «Raw» haxordman amyenaditwac ebizodnerits myeky. Rvoki zhvoghvovrdakanowthjownn acvowm er vo4 miayn rinkayin hmtovthjan,
 ringayin hmtovtjan, ajlyew nra gharizmatik bemakan khvoski ew aytseqartayin pazmathiw artahaytowtyovnnyeri shnorhiv:2000 thvakani
 snorhiv.2000 thwakani hvovnvari 23-in Rvokin hagvoghvowm e haghthyel «THakawvorakan myenamart@», inc@ nran hnaravorvovthjown e talis «Ryeslmaniayi»
 talis «Ryeslmaniayi» jamanak pajqaryel canrkasajin titghvosi hamar. Big SHoovn, sakajn, ci hamadaynvovm mrcavarnyeri vorosman het
 mrcawarnyeri vorvosman het yev bndvovm e or inqn e haghthyel menamart@, vovsti vorovshovm e kajatsvowm «No Way Out» iradardzvovthyan gamanak
 iradardzovtjan jamanak anckatsnel myenamart Svovowi yew Rvoki mijew` orvoselow titghosi # 1 hawaknvordin: Menamarty haxthvovm e Bik Sovn

 jamanak. «Ryeslmania 2000»-i klghawor iradardvovtyan zhamanak anckacvovm e qarakoxmani menamart kortsvogh 4embion Thripl Ejci,
 cempion Tripl Eyci, Miq Fvovolii, Pig Shovovi ew Roki midjew: Jowraqanchjvowr ymbsamartik ir ankjvownvovm vownyer Maqmahonneri @ntaniki

 kvoxqin Shejne, isk Rvoki koghkin Wins@: Tripl Ej4in hagvoghvvowm e ir mvot bahel titxvos@, yerb Winse dawacanvovm e Rvoqin yew boxbate
 dawajanowm e Rvokin yew poghpate atvorakow harwa&ovm nranHadjord amisnyerin WWF chyempivonakan titghvosi hamar Rvokn hakamartvowtjan mej e mtnovm
 hakamartowthjan medj e mtnowm Thripl Ey4i hyet yev «Backlash» iradarzvovtyan gamanak partvovthjan matnovm nran 4orrord ankam darnalow WWF
 corrvord angam darnalov WWF cembivon. «Judgement Day» iradarzvowtjan zhamanak Rok@ pvordowm e pashtbanel tighos@ Sthiv Osthini hyet myenamartvowm,
 Osthini het myenamartvowm, sakayn partvvowm e: Rvokin ajnovamenayniv hagoxvvovm e het wyercnel titxos@ «King of the Ring» iradardovthjan
 Ring» iradardzvowtyan srjanaknervowm Hadjord amisnyerin Rokin hadjvoghwovm e bastpanel 4empionakan kvotin Kris Pyenowaji, Kvovrt

 Mercy» iradardowthjan gamanak partwelov Kovrt Englin Miazhamanak hakamartvowthjan medj e mtnvowm Rikisii het, vowm bartvovthyan
 hyet, vowm partvowthyan e matnvovm «Survivor Series»-i jamanak. «Raw» haxvordman dektyemberi 18-i thoxarkman gamanak thimaktsyelov
 thvogharkman gamanak timakcelow Andyertejqeri hyet, Rokin hagoghwvovm e darnal WWF thimajin cempivon partovthjan matnyelvov Edgin yew Qristianin,
 Edgin yew Kristianin, sakajn tanowl talis ryevansh myenamarty «SmackDown!»-i hyertakan thvoxarkman gamanak. Timajin titghvose kortsnyelowts
 THimayin titghosy kvortsnelovts hetvo Rvoq@ krkin krkin kyentronacnowm e ovgere WWF titghosi shvovrdj «No Way Out» iradardovthjan zhamanak bartovthjan
 iradardzvovtjan gamanak bartvowthyan matnelvov Kvowrt Enklin yev ardyen wyetsyerord ankam darnalov WWF cyempivonSHvovtvov Sthiv Osthine haxtvovm e «Tagavvorakan
 haxthovm e «THakaworakan krivy» ew «Reslmania 17»-i gamanak bartvowthyan matnvovm Rokin. Osthini haghthanaki medj myets nyerdrvovm e ovnyenvowm
 nyerdrowm e vovnenovm Vins Makmahon@: Hadjord «Raw is War» thoxarkman jamanak antskacwowm e wandakayin ryewans myenamart, vori entatskvovm
 menamart, vori entatsqvowm ring e nerghovjvowm Thripl Ejchy derqin tsanr mvowrtch, vorvow harwatsvowm e Rvoqin yev oknvovm Osthinin haxthyelvov marte
 Osthinin haxtyelvov marty. Aweli ovsh Ostiny ev Thripl ejch@ dyevavorowm en nor thim` ajn anvanyelvov «Hzvorvovthyan vowghi»:Jvonsony karj jamanakov
 vowghi»:Jvonsvone kartch jamanakvov heranvowm e @mbshamartic ev nkarahanwvovm «Mvowmian veradarnowm e» kinvonkarovmCyempivonakan marter@ yew «Nerxvowgovme»
 marter@ yew «Nyerkhovgowme» (2001–2002)Rvoqe vyeradarnowm e «WWF» 2001 twakani hvowlisin: Ayd jamanak Wins Maqmahvonn ardyen zerk er
 Makmahvonn ardyen zyerk er pyeryel «World Championship Wrestling» (WCW) yev «Extreme Championship Wrestling» (ECW) kazmakerbvowthyvownnyery
 kazmakerpowtjownner@ (irakan kyankowm), oronts @mpisnern est scyenari katarel ein nerkhovzhowm debi «WWF» yew dyewaworel aybspes
 «WWF» ev dzevaworel aybsbes kvochwac «Dasink» (angl. "The Alliance") abrankanishe Roke petq e voroshvowm kayacner kam mianalvov «Dasinqin»,
 mianalow «Dasinqin», kam el mnalvov «WWF»-i kazmvovm. I wyergvo, Rok@ cankowtjown e hajtnvowm mnalov «WWF»-vovm «Samrslyemi» gamanak
 «Samrslyemi» jamanak Rvoky bartowthyan e matnowm Povker THiin ew tirvowm WCW asxarhi &anrkasayin titghvosin: Chyempionakan kotowts
 titghosin: Chyempionakan gvotowts Roky zrkwowm e «No Mercy»-i jamanak partvelov Qris Gyeriqvoyin: Hajvord «Raw» haghordman jamanak Roke ew
 haxvordman zhamanak Rvoq@ ev Gyerikvon miaworovm en jankere yev bartvowthyan matnelvow Dadlinyerin (Divon ev Bapa Dadli) darnvovm WWF timajin
 darnovm WWF timayin 4yempivonnyer:«Raw»-i nojemberi 5-i thvoxarkaman jamanak Rokin hajoxwvowm e yet nvatchyel WCW titxosy: «Survivor
 WCW titghvosy «Survivor Series» iradarzvowtjan jamanak` «WWF»-i yev «Dasinki» hakamartvowtyan shrdjanaknervowm antskatsvox 10-hvoganvots
 anckacwox 10-hoganvoc eliminatsion menamartvowm Roqy partowtjan e matnvovm «Dasinqi» kazme hamalrac Stiw Ostinin, inci ardyvownkowm
 Osthinin, inchi ardjvownqvovm «Dasinqe» lvovtsarvovm e2001 twakani avartin Roky kvortsnvovm e WCW titghvosy WWF cyempion Kris Jeriqojin,
 chempivon Qris Djerikvoyin, vow ajd kerp miavorovm e yerkov kazmakerpvowthyvovnneri titxosnere ew anwanwowm «WWF anvicharkyeli cyembion»:
 anwitcharkyeli cempivon»: Roqi hajvord hakamartowtyovn@ texi e ovnenvowm Innsvovnakanyerin me& axmovk parzratsrac «Nor hamashkharhayin
 pardzracra& «Nor hamaskharhajin kargovkanovn» (nWo) xmbawvorman andamneri hyet. I wyerjvo, «Ryeslmania 18»-i shrganaknyervovm Rvoqe menamartovm
 shrganaknerowm Roqy menamartowm e ghmbawvorman aragnvord Hvoliwowd Hokani hyet ew bartowthjan matnowm werginis Mrtsovytic hetvo DJonsonn ancnovm
 heto Gonsonn antsnovm e karch styeghcakvortsakan dadari:Verjin sjovgenyer (2002–2004)Vyeradarnalvow ring, Roqe nwacowm e ir ryekvordayin
 nvacvovm e ir ryekvordajin yotherord WWF 4embivonate` «Vengeance» iradardzovtjan zhamanak yerakoxmani martvovm bartvowtjan matnyelov Kvowrt
 partvovtjan matnelvov Qowrt Englin yew Andyertheykyerin: Nmanatib yerakvoxmani martowm, «Global Warning» iradardzowthyan zhamanak Rvok@ pashtbanvowm
 zhamanak Rvoke bashtpanvovm e titxvosy THripl Eyci ew Proq Lyeznari hyet mrtsapaykarvovm: Martic heto Lyeznarn ansbaselivoryen hardzakwovm
 ansbasyelioryen hardzakvowm e Roki vra, sakayn nran prkovm e Thripl Ej4e. Rvokin 4i hajoxvvovm ir mot bahyel chyembionakan gotin «Samrslemi»
 chembionakan gotin «Samrslyemi» gamanak (2002), yerb tanowl e talis marty Leznari hyet mrtsabajkarvowm: Paci gvotovc zrkwyelovts, Roqe zrkvvovm
 zrkwelowc, Rvoqe zrkwvowm e nayew amenaeritasard WWE cempioni ryekordic, orn amragrel er 1998 twakanin. Partvowtyvownits hyeto Roqn hrabarakajnoren
 Rvokn hraparakajnoren haytararovm e, vor mist klini zhvoghovrdi sireli chyempion@.Rvoki hadjvord hervovstatesayin yelvovjthy tyexi e ownyenovm
 yelvowythe tyexi e ovnenovm 2003 twakani hovnvari 30-in «Smackdown»-i hyerthakan thvogharkman zhamanak YElowythi enthackvowm Rokn sksvovm
 yntatskvowm Rokn sksowm e anhimn kyerbvow vatabanel Halq Hoganin ew hajtararowm e, or hadjox holivvovdjan kariera vownenalvow snvorhiw
 kariyera vownyenalov shnorhiw «WWE»-n aylews 4i karvox iryen karawaryel: Ays yelovjtvow Roky krkin darnvovm e patsasakan kyerbar (hil) «No
 batsasakan kyerbar (hil). «No Way Out» iradardzvowtyan gamanak bartowtjan matnyelvow Hvokanin, Roky drafth-vicakahanowtjan ardyownkowm tegh
 drafth-wicakahanvowtyan ardyvownkvovm tyex e gtnovm «Raw» abrankanishowm. Ayd @ntacqovm Rvoqn hacakh ringvovm katarvowm er ajspes kvo4vac «Rok hamerkner»,
 kochwats «Rvok hamyerkner», vorvonc jamanak kitarow nwakovm er horinwac erger yev tsaghrvowm marzabalati handisatyesnerin: 4karvoghanalov
 handisatyesnyerin 4karoxanalow darnal WWE 4empivonakan titxosi hawaknord, Rvoqn ovgery kyentronatsnovm e Sthiv Ostini vra, vowm het menamartvovm
 vowm het menamartvovm e «Reslmania XIX»-i jamanak: Ostini vra kataryelow miankamic yerek «rvoq bothom» kvo4vox ajtsyeqartajin hnarknyer,
 ajtseqartayin hnarknyer, Rvoky karoxanovm bartvovtjan matnel nran yew vyerdj dnel yerkaratyew rinkayin hakamartvovthyan@. Mart@ nayew linvowm
 hakamartvowthjan@. Marte naew linovm e wyerginy Osthini ringajin karierayvovm. Hajord «Raw» haxordman jamanak Roqy kazmakyerbvowm e ajsbyes kvochwac

 noramvovt@ katarats Kvoldberk@, vovm hyet mi kani sapat ants Roky menamartovm e «Backlash» iradardzvovtyan gamanak ew partwovm. Partovthyownits
 bartwvowm: partovtjvovnits hyetvo Roqe krkin hyeranovm e empsamarti asparezitsHyeranalowc hetvo Roq@ zhamanak ar zhamanak wyeradarnvovm

 howmorajin haghvordashare.Mi aritvov Jvonsvony nshvovm e, or ajd tvoxarkman hadjoghvowthjan snorhiw er, vor nranvow sksetsin hetakrkrwyel holiwvovdyan

 janabarhord@» hervowstasyerialvowm marmnavvorelvow ajlmvolorakajin embsamartiki, ov oktakvor&owm er Roki haytni rinkajin hnarknery, incpes
 rinkayin hnarknere, in4pyes naew «70-akannyeri shvoov» hervovstasitqvomvovm` marmnaworelow hor@` Rvoqi DJonsonin:Djvonsoni kinodyepyowt@ tyexi
 DJonsonin:DJvonsvoni kinodyebyvowt@ teghi e vownenowm «Mowmian weradarnvowm e» gexarwestakan filmi skzbnamasvowm, vortyegh marmnavorowm e Karijneri
 marmnavvorvovm e Karichnyeri arkayin Garicnyeri arkayi kerbary eryewvovm e nayev filmi werdjnamasovm, sakajn ardyen CGI grafikakan lovcmamb:
 krafikakan lowtsmamb. Filmi arzanakrac kvomyertsion hajvoghowthjvowne hnarawvorovtyown e talis Djonsvonin nkarahanwelvow dra sarownakowthyownowm
 sarvownakovtyvownvovm` «Garichnyeri arqan» filmvovm 2007 tvakanin Jonsvoni anowny krancvowm e Kinyesi rekvordnyeri grqvowm` orpyes
 ryekvordneri grqvowm` orbyes arajin klxavvor deri hamar amenabardzr varzatrvats dyerasan: Gonsvoni hvonorar@ kazmvovm er 5,5 milion AMN
 kazmowm er 5,5 milion AMN dolar:Djvonson@ sharvownakowm e dyerer stanal hervovstatesowtjvownvowm Djvonsvoni batsakayowtyan tarinyerin «WWE»-n
 patsakajovthjan tarinerin «WWE»-n sharvownakvowm e vatcharyel Rvoqi anwanakan sapiknyer, khaxaliknyer ew ayl abrankatesakner. Min4 ors Roki batkery
 Min4 ors Rvoqi batkyere tyesanyeli e «WWE» hyerowstasvovovnyeri naxahvolowaknyerovm «Ghaghi blane» @ntanekan katakerkovtyownovm Jonsvon@
 katakergvovtjovnvovm DJonson@ marmnaworvowm e amyerikyan fvovtpoli astgh Jo Kingmanin, isk «Larir galarnerd» martakan katakerkvovtjownovm
 martakan katakyergovthyvownovm (klxawvor dererovm Sthiv Garel ew En Hyetvovyey) vomn Gvortsakal 23-i. 2008 twakani petrvari 24-in Akadyemiaji

 efektneri hamar» anvanakargi theknatsownerin Nvowyn tari DJonsvonn aradjadrwowm e «Niqyelodevoni» «Kids' Choice Awards»-i «lavakvowjn dyerasan»

 vowsvowtsich@» kvochwox ebizodvovm. Jvonsvonn ovnenvovm e dyerakatarvovmnyer «Sapath yerekojan vowghix yeterowm» yerki&akan haxordashari mi qani epizodnyervowm,

 dvolari ekamvovt. Nowjn thvakanin Gonsone nkarahanvovm e «Empajr styejt» ev «TSaw yev zerkpervovm» filmyerowm Miyewnvovjn zhamanak DJvonsony

To be, or not to be («Linyel, tye chlinel»)    Vowilyam Seksbiri «Hamlyet» piesi gvortsvoxvovtyovn 3,  tesaran
 gorcvoghvowtyvown 3,  tyesaran 1-i hajtni menaghosovthjan anwanvovmn e, (krwats mvotawvorapyes 1600 thwakanin):Hanramat4yeli artasanowtjovne
 twakanin):Hanramat4yeli artasanvowthjovn@ vovxyektswovm e Hamleti daniakan arqajazni kerbarow, vov mtakhoh prnel e  Yvoriki gange (Jorik, «Xextch Jorik,
 (Jvorik, «Khextch Jvorik, es gitei nran, Hvoratsio...»), cnajats da teghi e vownenowm biesi pvolorowin ajl masvowm:Garyewor e naev  nshel,
 masvowm:Garevor e nayev  nsyel, vor Hamlet@  myenak ce  byemi wra  ir menaghosowtyan jamanak, pemi vra en nayew  Ofyelyan, Polonivovsy yew thakavory
 Pvolonivows@ yev takavvor@ (tarbyer byemadri4nyer  tarbyer kyerp yen tyeghakajvowm Hamlyetin, na kam  najvovm e Ofyeliajin, kam thakavvorin,
 Ofeliayin, kam thagavorin, yew Pvolvonivowsin):PnakirMyeknapanovtjovnnyerKermanatsi pilisopa Artvowr SHopyenhaowyer@ ajsbes e ghosyel ays
 Sobyenhavover@ ajspes e khvosel ajs menakhvosowtyan masin. «Myer vitchake aynkan tsawali  e or, na, ankaskac, byetq e nakh@ntri lriv aneowthjown:
 nax@ntri lriw aneovthjvovn: YEthe inknaspanvovthjvown@ iskapyes ayn mez ghvostanar ev  mer argyew  liargyek imastov aylyntranq  klinyer «linyel,
 ayl@ntrank  kliner` «linel, tye clinel», aba ayn pyetk er anpajman naxentryel, vorbyes cankali avarti  parzr  astitchan»: «Pajc mardik,
 astican»: «Bajc mardik, - krovm e Svobenhaowere, - sovvorvovtjown ovnen  4kapyel mah@  batsarzak ochnchatsman hyet. chi eghel der vo4 mi
 het. chi yeghel der voch mi mard, vow chcankanar abrel mincew hajvord or@»:Ankakh nranic, syeshtowm e  myenaghosowthyan meknapanovthyown@
 myenaghosvowtjan myeknapanvowthjovny  «kyanq-mah»  haskacvovtjownnere kam «kortsoghvowthyvovn ankvor&owtyovn» themanery, orvonk bardzracva& en menaxosovtyan
 pardzratsva& yen menakhvosovthyan myedj  (yev yndhanrapes  SHyeqsbir amboxg biyesovm),  hajax oktagvor&vvovm yen daniakan arkayaznin yev  XX dari
 arqayaznin ew  XX dari  eqzistentsialistnerin hamyematyelis:AzdecovtjvovnHacakh yentadrwvovm e, or Seksbiri ajs myenaxvosowtyovn@

 Hamlyeti myenaghvosovthjvown «Linyel the clinel…»  pnorinak ew 19-20-rd daryeri rvowsakan targmanvovthyvovnnyerovm Maksim Mvoshkvovi anvan gradaranow
Tsvowajin krianer (angl.` Sea turtles), svoxownnyeri dasin patkanvox djrajin kendaninyer, oronq srjvovm yen ovkianosnyerovmGasemedjq
 owkianvosnyervovm:Gashyemyejq krian &owayin krianyeri jvoth tesakneric amyenametsn e, or hajtnabyerwyel e Atlantjan ovkianosi  apyerin. Drants
 owkianosi  apyerin: Drants voros nerkajacovcichner ksrowm yen aweli qan 682 kk kam 1500 fvownt: Mjovs tyesaknern en Kanach krian, Atlantyan
 Gana4 krian, Atlantyan ridlin, Dyeghnakanachavown ridlin, Gishatic ktowtsy, Awstralakan kana4 krian, Glghikawor krian.NkarakrvovtjvownCowajin
 krian.Nkaragrvowthyvown&vowayin krianer@ milionawor tarinyer apryel en askharhi bats tsvovyerowm vow covapnya tsvocervowm. Nranq irenc hzor karvowcwatskvov`
 irents hzvor karowtswa&qow` vovjex loxathevervov yew myek snchvow djri tak gamits aweli mnalvov vownakvowthjamb hianali harmaryetsvovm yen owkianvosayin
 harmarecvvovm en owkianosajin kjanqin. Hskajakan, kartsr khyetsinery pastbanvovm yen nrants tsnaminyeri mets masic Sakajn kaxtsac snadzkan
 Sakajn kaghtsa& shnadzkan achqin, angam kvost krian karox e axorzhali yereval: Harzakman entarkvelis krian karox e parzratsnyel ir marminy
 bardzracnyel ir marminy ev tshnamown wakhyetsnyelov hamar loxathevyervow vovjyegh srmpacnyel djowreGrianere miasin yen champvordovm bats owkianosowm:
 jampordvovm pac ovkianvosovm: Tarwa @ntatskvovm ghvowmbe karogh e hazar mghvonits aweli ancnel. Nranq gamanaki me& masn anc en kacnowm qnats
 ants en katsnowm qna&` trwelvov djri makeryewowjti azat hvoskin. Erpemn nrank pardzranovm yen owkianvos@ tapwox gyetern i vyer yev darnovm
 gyetyern i vyer ev darnovm yen dknvorsnyeri kartyeri zvohy. Sakayn da tewvowm e karj zhamanak, vorvovhyetyev hzvor lvoghatevi myek tapaharovm ew dzknvorsakan
 tapaharvowm ew dzknvorsakan karthi tyele ktrwac eSnovndTsoverowm krianyer@ karvox yen bazmatyesak snownd ktnyel. Nranq hatchax pavararwovm
 Nrank hachax pavararvowm en miayn zknyervov, sakayn yerbemn owtvovm en naev tsowayin bowjser, khecgyetinner, kakxamvortnyer, vostrener,
 kakxamortnyer, ostryenyer, tsvovayin spvovnk, manr &owakhyetsgetin yew angam medowzaner:BazmatsvowmNrank hskayakan taracvowtyovnnyer yen
 hskajakan taratsvowtyvovnnyer en loxovm pats owkianvosvowm, sakajn amyen tari vowsh garnan@ kam vax amrane, wyeradarnovm en nvovyn apy zowgavvorwelvow
 nowjn ap@` zvowgaworwyelow yev dzow dnelvov Miacyal Nahanknyervowm nrants pnadrman taracknyere kravvowm yen Hyovsisayin Garolinayits mincev
 Hjvovsisajin Garolinajits minchev Teghas dzkwvogh tsvowyezry: Amarayin gisyernyeri enthackovm, mak@ntatsvowthyan jamanak, mayr krianery loghvowm en
 majr krianery loghovm en debi ap iryenc pown@ pvorelov yev dzvow dnyelow: Nranq ajnkan yen shrjvovm apin, min4yew ktnovm yen bvowny pvoryelvow
 ktnowm yen pvovn@ pvorelvow hamar amyenaharmar tyeghe: Mayr krian ir cvors loxatewervow mi vo4 xvore bacva&q e anovm yntrac tyexovm, apa
 anvowm entra& teghowm, apa oktakorcelow miayn hetyevi loghathyewere, avazi myeg porowm e mi klvor pvos: Mets zgvowshowtyamb na marmnvov kvoghqic
 zkvovshowtjamp na marmnov koghkic kvoghk e sarjwowm, amen angam miayn mek lvoghathevow ew shat kvokik hanyelov avaze: YErb posn aynkan xorn e linvovm,
 aynqan xorn e linovm, vor na aylevs ci karvoxanovm hasnel dra hatakin sovorapar 60 sm korowthjamp yew 25 sm lajnvovtyamp na dadaretsnowm
 lajnowtjamb na dadaretsnovm e asghatankn vow sksvovm e dwadrovthjowne.Ayn pahits, yerp dwyery sksovm en dvowrs gal, na aylyews vowsadrowthjvown
 ajlews ovshadrvovthjovn 4i darznovm kvoghqi ditvordnyerin. «Artsvownknyeri» layn shithyery hosvowm yen nra dyemqn i var, sakajn irakanvovm
 var, sakayn irakanovm na chi artaswowm Nra achqern anendhat thrdjwvowm en awazi hatiknerits pastbanvyelvov hamarEg kriayin mvot
 hamarEk kriajin mot 20 rvope e byetq 100-150 dvow dnelov hamar DZwyere katarjal klor dzew ownyen` motavorabes kvolfi gndaki chap,
 motaworapyes kvolfi gndaki chap, yew pawakanin amvowr yen, vorbyeszi bni myej @nknyelis 4kotrvyen: Vyergacnelvovn pes na pvowynn arak cackowm e`
 bvowynn arag &ackvowm e` loxathyevervow avazy hyet ltsnelov, ev shovrjn eli avaz e sax talis` bni tex@ thaqcnelvow hamar Mi qani rvope
 hamar. Mi qani rvobe hangstanalvovc hyeto, na srdjwvowm e dyepi mvovth ovkianos@, cvowlvoren trvvowm e jri makeryesi hvosankin ow apa
 makeresi hvosanqin vow aba lvoghvowm e debi bac &vovy na ir dvyere thvoxnvowm e aryevi djyermvowtjamp hasvownanalvov, isk dzagyerin miaynak lowjs
 dakyerin miaynak lovys asxarh kalov.Amarwa @ntatsqowm majr krian karox e mi kani angam «bnadryel»: Amyen mi pnadrvowmic heto na
 mi pnadrvowmic hyetvo na krkin mianowm e ir zovg@nkyeroj@ camaqits herov, djri medj Hayr krianery jric erbeq dowrs chen kalis, sakajn
 dowrs cyen galis, sakajn ambvoghj amare hamberatar sbasvowm yen api mvot, min4ev xovmpy krkin kazatwi bats &ovowm lvoghalow hamarDakerPvoqrik
 hamarZakyerPvoqrik krianyery dzvic dvovrs en kalis mvot vec or anc: Gakhwac cvowajin kriaji tesakits, nranq karox en mekic chvors
 karvox en myekits chvors djowjm linelNranq miasin, dandagh porovm vov wyer en parzranowm awazi midjvow Nrank spasowm yen mincew mvovthn

 tsnaminer yen sbasowm: Apin vghtvovm yen snovnd pntrvogh grargery, wayri snyern vov ghozere. Tsovvowm sbasowm yen myec dzknere: Vo4 oq chkitye,
 dzkner@ Voch vok chgite, thye inc e batahvowm poqrik krianerin jovry mtnelovc hyetvo: Nrank parzabyes anhetanvovm yen ev eryevan en kalis
 en ev yerevan yen galis miajn pawakana4ap myetsanalvowc hyeto.Dzakyerits sat qcyern yen hasnovm hasvovn tariqi, vorvovhetyev dzakeri miajn

GhSHM nakhararnyeri ghorhvovrd (rvovs.` Совет министров СССР), byetakan ishkhanvowthjan barzrakvowyn kortsadir kargadri4
 parzragowjn gvor&adir karkadri4 marmin, karawarowtyvovn nakhkin KhSHM-vovm. Kazmawvorvyel e 1946-in zhvoxovrdakan komisarnyeri ghvorhrdi pvogharen.Gazmvyel
 ghvorhrdi pokharen.Kazmvyel e GHSHM Keragowyn xvorhrdi kvoghmits` hyertakan gowmarman arajin nstasrdjanvovm, hetewjal kazmow` GHSHM Ministrneri
 kazmvov XSHM Ministrnyeri xorhvovrdi naghagah, nakhagahi aradjin texakalner yew texakalner, KHSHM ministrnyer, KhSHM byetakan komityeneri
 XSHM pyetakan komitenyeri naxakahner. GHorhowrdi kazmi myej i pashtonye mtnel en nayev mivowthyenakan hanrapyetvovthyvovnneri Ministrnyeri ghorhvovrdneri
 Ministrneri xorhowrdnyeri naxagahnyer@: GHvorhvowrdn handyes e ekel orbyes @ndhanvowr irawasvowthyan marmin, vori kerakajvovthjownneri myej
 gerakajowthyownneri medj e eghyel low&el GhSH Miovtjan tnorinowthyan@ werapahvac polor harcyer@, bacarvowtjamb GhSHM Kerakvowyn svovetin
 GHSHM Kyerakvowyn svowyetin yew vyerginis Naghakahovtjany wyerabahwats hartseriGo4wa& e yeghyel apahovel zhvoghvovrdakan tntyesvovtyan ew social-mshakvowthayin
 ev svotsial-msakvowthayin shinararovtjan ghyekavarovm@, msakyel yew irakanatsnel midjocarvowmnyer joxvowrdi parekyetsvowthyan yew kvovltvovrayi atchi
 paryekyetsovthyan yev kowltowraji aci abahowman hamar, zarkacnyel gitvovthjownn vow tyeghnikan, racivonal ogtagvortsel yew pahpanel bnakan ryesowrsnere,
 bnakan ryesovrsnyer@, amrapndel dramakan ev warkajin hamakargy, knyeri, ashghatanqi vardatrowthyan, sotsialakan apahvowovtyan miasnakan
 abahowowthjan miasnakan kaxaqakanovthjvovn warel, kazmakerpel betakan apahovakrowthjovn ew hashwarman ow wijakagrvovtjan miasnakan
 wicakakrovthyan miasnakan hamakark, kazmakerpel ardjvownaperakan, shinararakan, kyvowxatntyesakan zyernarkvowtjvownnyeri vow miavvorvovmneri,
 dzernarkowthjvovnnyeri vov miavorovmneri, transpvorti ew kapi dzernarkovtyvownneri, bankeri, in4pyes nayev miowtyenakan entakajvowtyan ajl kazmakerpvovtjvownneri
 kazmakerbvowthjovnnyeri ov himnarkneri karavarvowmy.KHorhvovrdn irakanacrel e nayev zinwa& owjyeri shinararowthjan yndhanovr xekavarowme,
 endhanovr ghyekavarvovmy, orvoshyel iskakan zinvvorakan carajowthjan hamar zorako4i enthaka qaghaqacinyeri amyenamya kontinkenty, abahovel
 kontinkyent@, apahowyel artasahmanjan yerkrneri hyet haraberowthyovnnyeri @ndhanovr ghyekavarovme yev ajln: GHSHM Ministrnyeri ghorhvovrde
 Ministrnyeri ghvorhvovrdy XSHM oryenqnyeri, Kerakovjn svovyeti vov dra Nakhagahovtyan ajl akteri himan wra, yev i katarowmn drants, hratarakel
 katarvovmn drants, hratarakel e KhSHM voxdj teritvoriayovm bartadir katarman yentaka oroshowmner vov kargadrovtyvownnyer, stowgel drants katarvowmy:
 stovgel dranc katarowmy Arawel karyewor hamabetakan harcyeri wyerabyerjal vorvoshovmner yndovnyel e KHMGG Gentkvomi het hamatex Miawvoryel
 het hamategh Miaworyel ew vovghghovtjovn e tvel @ndhanovr mivovthenakan yew miovtyenakan-hanrabyetakan ministrovtyovnnyeri yew betakan kvomityeneri,
 petakan kvomitenyeri, iren yentaka myvows marminneri askhatanqin. KHSHM tnorinowtyane wyerabahwats hartservovm iravovnq e vovnyetsyel
 hartservovm iravvownk e ownyecyel kasecnel mivowthyenakan hanrapetovtjvovnnyeri Ministrneri ghorhovrdnyeri orvoshowmnyeri vov karkadrvovtjownnyeri
 vow kargadrowthyvownnyeri katarowme, cyeghjal haytararel KHSHM ministrovthyovnnyeri, KHSHM byetakan komitenyeri, iryen entaka myvovs marminnyeri
 enthaka myvovs marminneri aktere. Ministrnyeri xvorhvovrdnyer ownen nayew mivovthenakan yew inqnavar hanrabetvovthyovnneryHKHSH Ministrneri

 varelanyovth yew ayl npataknyerov Arvyestvovm kirarvvovm e hnagovyn jamanakneric chartarapyetowthjan, kandakagvor&owthjan medj, dyekvorativ-kirarakan,

 batrastelis:Pajti kovnyerankneri harstowthyowne, makatyeski pazmazanvovtjovn@ hnaraworvovthjovn en ynderovm kyertwatsknyern ojtelvov dekoratiw

 tarekan pvopvokhvovtjvovnnyeri vovsvowmnasirvovtjown@ yev nrancvovm tarber tarreri izvotoberi arkajvowthyvovny thvovjl e talis batkeratsvovm kazmel
 talis patkyeratsovm kazmel hnakowjn zhamanaknyerovm klimaji ev mthnolvorti vitchaki masin:== TSanotagrowtjvovnnyer 
Ardjvownaperakan dizayni kazmakyerpowthyvovnneri midjazkayin khorhvovrd (ICSID) - himnvyel e 1957 tvakanin ardjvownapyerakan
 thvakanin ardjovnabyerakan dizaynov zbazvox kazmakyerbvovthjvovnneri khmpi gankyervow: Nra kazmovm yen avyeli kan 50 yerkri 150 kazmakerbowthjvownner,
 kazmakyerbvowtjownnyer, vorvonq nerkajatsnovm yen avyeli qan 150000 dizayneri.Kazmakerpvowthyan nbatak@ ardjovnaperakan dizayn disciplini
 ardjovnapyerakan dizajn disciblini zarkacovmn e mijazgayin makardakow Aysor ICSID-y nakhadyernovm e hamendhanvovr ardyownawet gortsoxowthjownnyeri
 ardjvovnavyet gvorcvoghvovthjvovnnyeri sharq, oronq nbastowm yen dizayni zargacman migocow bavararyel mardkanc kyanqi vorake parelavyelvov kariknyern
 paryelavyelvov kariqnyern ov aknkaliqnere.Gazmakyerpvovthjan araqyelowthyvownyAysor ICSID-e nbastowm e tarbyer kazmakerbvovthjownnyeri
 kazmakyerbovtjownneri nervovzhi yev kortsovnyevovtjan miawvormany, katarelow hyetyewjaly`ICSID-i andam kazmakerpowtjovnnyeri hamakvor&aktsovtyan
 kazmakerpvowthjvownneri hamagvortsaktsvovtjan kazmakyerpowme:Ardyownapyerakan dizajni teghakan yev mijazgajin kvorcovneovthjan agaktsvowtjan ev bashtbanovtyan
 adjakcowtjan yev pashtpanovtjan korc@.THyeoriayi, hetazvotvovthjan yev braktikaji owsowmnasirovmy krthakan pvolor makardaknerowm:Naghak&vogh,
 makardaknyervowmNakhagcvox, artadrox yev ajl shahagrgir kvoghmeri hamakvorcaktsman kazmakyerpowmy, i nbast dizajni hamyndhanvowr chana4many:==
 hamendhanowr canachman@== Hghovmner 
Azdansan «Vavov!» (rovs.` Сигнал «Вау!» kam «Ого-го!», angl.` Signal «WOW!»), radioazdansan, ore grantsvyel
 radioazdansan, vor@ krancvel e doktvor Gerri Ejmani kvoxmic 1977 thwakani ogostosi 15-in Ohayvoyi hamalsaranvowm, «Mec akanj» radioheraditakow
 akang» radivoheraditakvov asxatyelis. Ayd radioazdansani vownkndrvowm@ irakanacvel e SETI naghagtsi srjanaknerovm: Est vorosh myeknapanvovtyvownnyeri,
 myeknabanovthyownnyeri, azdanshani bnowthagrery (pvoghantsman sherte, azdanshan/axmowk harapyeraktsvovthyvovne) ham@nknovm ein arterkrajin
 hamenknvovm ein artyerkrajin &agovm vownecogh tyesakanvoren spaseli azdanshannyerin:Hiatsa& nranov, te in4qan chskrtoryen en ham@nknvovm statswac
 yen ham@nknvowm stacvats azdansani bnvovtakryery mijastxayin azdansani sbaseli bnvovthagryerin, Eyman@ endgtsyets dran hamapataskhanox
 dran hamapataskhanvox simvolnyeri xvowmbe ev koghk@ kryets «WOW!». Aydtyeghic el azdanshany stacav ir anvovny:Tbagrvowtjan verlvow&vowtyvovn6EQUJ5
 vyerlowcvowthyvown6EQUJ5 @ndkcva& kod@ nkarakrovm e gamanaki entackvovm stacwac azdanshani hajaghvovthyan popoghowthyvovn@: Tbagrvovtjan
 popvoghvovthjvowne. Tpakrovtyan jvovraqancjvowr togh@ hamabataskhanvowm e 12 wajrkjan tyevvoghovtyamp intyerwalin (10 vajrkjan ownkndrovm ew 2
 vayrkjan vovnkndrovm yew 2 vayrkyan hamakarg4ayin werlvovtsvovtyovn) Tpagrvovtyan tyexi tntesman hamar hacaghowtjvovnnyer@ kodawvorwyel
 hachakhowtyvownnery kvodawvorvel en taratwayin simwolnerow: Bacate nshanakvowm e 0 -ic mincev 0,999 hachaxowthjvown, 1-9 -y 1,000-ic min4ew
 1-9 -y 1,000-its min4yew 9,999 hajakhowtyvown Sksa& 10-its kvodavvorvovmy katarwowm e arden taryerow (A nshanakovm e 10,0-ic minchew 10,999...,
 10,0-ic min4ew 10,999..., B nsanakowm e 11,0-ic mincyev 11,999... yew ayln): Payts U tar@ handipyel e miayn myek ankam radioastxaditaki
 ankam radioastghaditaki aamboxdj askhatanqi yntatskovm (da 30,0-30,999-i migew e). Ays dyepkowm hatchaghvowtyvownnere ansahman «azdanshan/aghmowk»
 ansahman «azdanshan/axmvovk» haraberakcowtjvovnner en Axmowki hachakhakanvowtjan hamar jovrakanchjovr sertowm katrvvowm er mijinatsva&
 katrvvovm er midjinatsvats arzhyek naxvord mi qani robeneri @nthatskowm.Azdanshani hatchaxowtjan lajnovtyovn@ kazmel e 10 kHc (kani or
 kazmel e 10 kHc (qani or jvowraqanchjovr sjown hamabatasxanel e 10 kHc syertin, isk azdanshan@ kratswel e miajn myek sjvownvowm): Azdansani
 syownowm): Azdanshani hajakhowtjan orosman tarper metvodnere tvyel yen 2 tiw` 1420,356 MHc ew 1420,456 MHc, yerkovsnel 50 kHts nyejtral
 yerkovsnyel 50 kHts nyeytral gracni radiog&i sahmannyervowm (1420,406 MGts kam 21 santimyetr):Azdanshani aghbjovri tyeghadrvovthyvownKonkret
 tyeghadrowthyovnKvonkret teghadrowtjvowne ajd azdanshani aghbjovri ktnyele erknkovm djvar er nranow, vor radivoheraditak «Myets akang@»
 radivoheraditak «Myec akange» vowner erkow snvowcvox, vorvonk tarper kvoxmyer yen koghmnoroshwovm. Azdanshane statsel e nrantsic mek@, bajts sahmanapak
 meke, payc sahmanapak tvjalnyeri mshakovm@ thvowyl 4tvyec haskanal, tye voroncits mekn er da: Aydpisow, kan 2 tegher, orteghic azdanshany
 texyer, orteghic azdanshany owxarkwel e.19zh 22m 22v ± 5v (drakan snvovtsox)19zh 25r 12w ± 5v (pacasakan snowcvox)Hakowm@ pacarik

 shrjman arakovtyovny ajd azdansane kareli er lsel vowxix 72 wayrkjani @ntatskovm. Ajdpisi kyerbov, mstakan amblitovdayvov azdansan@

 zhamanakvow, vovgkownovthjamb hamenknovm er spaswvogh voch yerkrayin azdanshaniAzdanshani haytnvyelvow masin warkacnerAjd azdansane enthadrvvovm
 azdanshan@ entadrwvowm e vor ajd azdansany batahapar thvowjlits ovjexacaw. Pajc myovs koxmits da chi patsarvovm ayd azdanshani arhestakan
 azdansani arhyestakan stacvovmy, bajts mjvows koghmic, shat pvokr havanakanowtyown e, or azdanshan@ aynqan thovjl e, vor hnaravvor 4linyer
 e, or hnarawvor cliner ayd azdansany sat zkayvown Very Large Array radivohyeraditakow brnyel hnaravvor clinyer, payc Myets akangy ayd
 payc Me& akandjy ajd azdanshany prnyec, ajnyel aydkan vowzheghatsowmits hyetvo Vovris entadrvowthjovnner yen vor ayd azdanshane frovm e
 ayd azdanshane frovm e tsvowahyeni nman, yew nra hajaxvowthyovny kam barperakan pvokhvvowm er, kam mnovm er novjn@: Naew ka enthadrvowthjvown,
 Nayev ka yentadrvovtyvown, vor azdanshan@ ovgharkvyel e tyeghapokhvogh anerkrayin tiezyeranawicEymany kaskacowm er, or azdansan@ yerkrayin
 or azdanshane erkrayin ceMenq pyetq e ayd azdansane noric tesnyeink, yerp ayd azdansany eli 50 ankam porzovm einq ktnel: Shat
 pordvovm eink ktnel: Shat mtqi e bervowm, or ays azdanshany yerkrayin e yev ajn andradardaw inc-or tiyezerakan axpic:Aweli vowsh Eymany
 axbicAvyeli vovs Eymany ir paryeric hrazharwyets, ajd yenthadrowthjvowny sat qic hnaravor e, orvovhetew ajd tiyezyerakan «andradardi4y»

 hamarwovm e pashtbanwac ev chi ogtakvor&wowm voc mi radivopoxancogh sarqyerovm : Ir wergin gorcervowm Ejman@ ci owzowm «anel hervov knatsvox
 vovzovm «anyel herov gnacox dovrs berowm voc ajdqan hyervow twyalneric»:AMN-its astxagyetnery yentadrvovm en, vor hnarawor azdansani aghpjowre
 hnaravvor azdanshani axbjvowry karvox er linel djra&ine 266P/Christensen ew P/2008 Y2 (Gibbs)-i mijyev, vorvonq patsahaytva& en yexyel 2005 twakanits
 en eghel 2005 twakanits hetvo ev vorvonq vorbyes azdansani aghbjowr verwwa& chen yexel aweli wax ashxatanqnerowm. Nshanaziki astghajin hamaghmbi
 Nshanadigi astxajin hamaghmpi erknaqaryeri tranzity yeghel e hvowlisi 27-in ew 15 okostosin 1977 thvakanin Nranq gtnwvovm ein 3,8 ew 4,4
 gtnwovm ein 3,8 yew 4,4 a m herow erkric: Bayts hvodvatsi mej grvats e yexyel or pyetq e hyetakajovm erknakarakan yenthadrowthyan pvorder
 entadrovthyan pordyer kataren, orowhyetyew kartchatew tchvoxpjvowny 4i hamapatasxanowm yerkar aprvogh axbyvowrnyeri: Astghaget Antonivo parise

 depqervovm:medjbyervvogh ovrishi ovghxaki xoski skzbovm ev werdjovm.kyegharwyestakan kam kitakan yerkyeri vyernagryeri, thertheri anvownnyeri megberman

 myeqyenaneri maknishnyer@, anvanowmnyery hisatakyelow depqovm.heknakan, &axrakan yerangvow kam hakarak imastow gorcacvogh paryern andjatyelov

 yndhanvovr xvosqits andjatelvow, tarpyerakelvow hamar.Tbakir khoskovm novjn pan@ karyeli e anyel nsva& miawvornery taratyesakow endktsyelvov,

B-karki filmyer en hamarvovm pvokr byvowjejow stegh&va& filmyer@, orvontsvovm me& masamb xaghovm yen nor kam anhajt
 khaxowm en nor kam anhayt dyerasanner ew himnakanvowm ajd filmyer@ mye& massajakanovthyvovn chen vayyelvovm. P-filmyeri karkin cyen karox
 P-filmeri karkin cen karogh dasvyel arthaows zhanri filmyery, kam arawyel evs` pvornokrafik filmereTerminn araj e yekyel holiwvovdyan voskyedari
 hvolivovdjan oskyedari zhamanakashrganovm. 1950-akannyerits hyeto ajn awyeli lajn imastov skswec oktagor&wel CHnajac dran, pahpanvvovm
 CHnajac dran, bahpanwovm e voroshaki yerkimastovthyovn. mi kvoxmic ajsbisi filmy karvogh e vovnenal parzr kegharvestakan yew esthyetikakan
 kyexarvyestakan ev estyetikakan bnowjt, myvovs kvoxmic el karvox e oktagortsvyel erotik zhanry` nvovjnisk arants imasti vov pvowandakvowthyan Incpyes
 powandakvowtjan. Inchpes nayew karogh en oktagorcwel erkow vorakaworvowmnyere hamatyegh.AMN-owm min4ev 1950-akannyere ajsbisi filmery batsarzakabes

Zoragovnd kam parzabes gownd (rvovs.` Полк, ankl. Regiment), xoshvor razmakan zinvats kazmavorvowm, zvoramas
 kazmaworvowm, zvoramas (hradgayin, hetyewakajin, hecyelazvorayin, tankayin, hretanayin, awiacivon, injenerakan ev ayln)Zvorakownd
 ew ayln).Zoragovnd baryezryYst Styepan Malxasyeanci «Hajeren batsatrakan pararani»` «zoragownd» gvojakany (razmakan termin)
 goyakany (razmakan tyermin) nsanakvowm e «zorki mi bajanowm, baxkatsats 4vors govmartakits (patalion), or vowni arandzin karavarovthiwn»
 arandzin karawarvovtiwn» Est nvovjn pararani «CHvors zoragovndy kazmvowm yen diwizia» Ga «Hyetewak zorakownd» ew «Hetseal zoragvownd»,
 «Hecyeal zorakvovnd», ajd zvoramasi klovgh kangnac e «Zoragndi hramanatare»: Yst Edvoward Pagrati Axayani «Ardi hayereni batsatrakan
 hajereni patsatrakan bararani»` «Zvoragovndy» nsanakowm e «1. 4vors gvovmartakic paxkatsac zorakan miavvorvovm, gvovnd»: «2. Mek
 miavvorowm, gvovnd»: «2. Mek ampoxdjovthjvown kazmvox zorq»: Yst Ashot Movradi Sovkiasjani «Hajoc Lyezvi Hvomanishnyeri Bacatrakan Pararani»`
 Bacatrakan Pararani»` «Zvoragvownde» nsanakovm e «Razmakvovnd, kovnd (mi kani gvowmartakits kam martkvotsic paghkatsats miaworvowm)»:
 paxkaca& miawvorovm)»: Yst Nelli Rvovpyeni Parathyani «Anglyeryen-hayyeryen pararani»` «regiment» anklyeryen gojakany targmanvowm e
 gvojakane tarkmanwowm e «kownd», «zorakownd»: Est Khachatovr Haykazi Hyeqimjani «Fransyeren-hayeryen dprocakan bararani» «régiment»
 bararani» «régiment» fransyeren kojakan@ thargmanwvowm e «kvownd», «zvoragvovnd»: Yst Ararat Sahaki GHaripjani «Rows-hajeryen pararani»`
 «Rvows-hayeren pararani» «полк» rvowseren kojakane nshanakovm e «govnd», «zvoragovnd», nayev hnatsa& yew pvoxaperakan imastvov «ambox,
 poghapyerakan imastvow «ampvogh, pazmovthyvovn, zvork»:Zvoragovndy AstwacashnchvovmZoragovnde (dasakan kam mashtvotsjan vowxxakrvovtyamp «zoragvovnd»)
 ovghghakrvovtjamp` «zorakownd») pazmics hishatakwovm e Astva&asnchowm` mashtvotsjan kryervow 5-rd dari skzbnyerin araginy thargmanvats grqovm.
 aragine thargmanwats krqowm @nd orovm` ayd hishatakvowtjownnervowm zvoragovnde nyerkayanowm e vorpes mi hska zvoramiavvorvowm` 32.200-its
 zvoramiavvorowm 32.200-ic minchew 74.600 anznakazmov.27 h «Ajn jamanak kovsakali zinovorner@ Yisvovsin taran palate, ew bvolor zorakovnd@
 balate, yew bolor zorakvownd@ hawakecin nora wyeraj»:4 «yew nora zoragvovndy ev hamarowacnere eothanasvovnyewchors hazar wec harivr hoki»:6
 vec hariwr hoki»:6 «ev nora zorakownd@ ew hamarovatsnyery jisovnyewchvors hazar chvors harivr hoki»:8 «ew nora zorakvovnde ev hamarowa&nyery
 zorakownd@ yew hamarovatsnery jisownevyeote hazar cors harivr hvogi»:11 «ew nvora zoragvowndy ev hamarvovacnyer@ qarasovnewvyec hazar hink harivr
 qarasownyewwyets hazar hing hariwr hoki»:13 «ew nora zoragvovnd@ ev hamarvowatsnere jisvovn in@ hazar ereq hariwr hoki»:15 «yew nora zorakovnd@
 hvogi»:15 «yew nora zorakvowndy yew hamarvowacner@ qarasvownyewhing hazar vyets harivr yisovn hvoki»:19 «ev nvora zorakovndy yew hamarovatsnery qarasvown
 hamarowa&nyere karasvovn hazar hing hariwr hvoki»:21 «ew nvora zorakvownde yev hamarvova&ner@ yeryesovnyewyerkvow hazar yerkvow harivr hvogi»:23
 erkov hariwr hvoki»:23 «yew nvora zorakovndy ew hamarova&ner@ eryesownewhing hazar chors hariwr hogi»:Zvorakndi kazmy ew andnakazmi
 hogi»:Zvorakndi kazmy ev anznakazmi tvaqanak@Zvoragowndy (govndy) kazmvac e govmartakneric (kazakakan haryvovrjaknyerits, vashtyeric kam eskadronneric)
 vashteric kam eskadrvonneric) (ev/kam divizionnerits, Eskadrilianeric yew ajl storapaganvowmnyerits). Zvoragvovnd@ kam kvovnd@ glxaworvowm e
 kvovnd@ glxavvorvovm e Gndabyeti astican vownecvox razmakan bastonyan (rovs.` Полковник, angl. Colonel). YErbyemn kndi ew govmartaki

 kazmawvorvovm, qan gowmartake Zoragowndn ovni inqnvowrowjn shtab, abahowman ev thikownqayin stvorapaganvovmnyer Kndyeri khvovmby kazmowm e

 snerow.Patkyerasrah																																								== Canothagrvowthjvownner 
Azoti fiksovm, mthnvolvorti molekvowlajin azvoti fiqsowm, diazvotrvofia: prvokarit mikrvoorkanizmnyeri kvoghmits azvoti
 mikrvoorkanizmnyeri kvoxmits azvoti molyekovli werakangnman brotsyes yew ir kyensazankvatsi myeg nerarvowm: Klkhawvor aghpyovrn e azvoti kyensabanakan
 e azvoti kyensapanakan srdjanarowtyan mej. YErkrajin ekvohamakarkyervowm azvot fiksvoxnyer@ himnakanowm gtnvvowm en hoghvovmKensaqimiaMvolyekvovlvovm
 hvoghovm:GyensakimiaMvolekvowlvovm azoti atvomnyere kapwa& yen 3 amovr kovalent kapow, ori shnvorhiw ayn himnakanovm nvormal bajmannervovm oksidawyerakanknman
 bajmannyervovm oqsidavyerakangnman ryeakcianeri myedj 4i mtnvowm aranc katalizatorneri kirarvowtyamp yev chi karoghanvovm oktagvor&wyel pvowjseri ev
 ogtagvor&vyel bvovjseri yew kyendaninyeri kvoxmic. Mikroorganizmnery azvoti verakanknman hamar oktagortsowm en fermyentnyeri mi ampoghj
 fyermyentneri mi ambvoghj hamakark (fyeredoksin, hidrokenaz), vorvontsits amenakaryewor@ nitrvokenazn e. Nra sinthezi hamar pataskhanatov
 sintyezi hamar batasghanatow yen ajspes ko4wac nif-gener@, orvonq laynvoryen taracwats yen brvokarivotnyeri mot ( ajd thvovm arqeobakterianyeri),
 arqevobakterianyeri), payc evowkarivotnyeri mot chyen handibvowm Azotfiksovme bavakanin caghsatar e. azoti 1 mvolekovli asimilyaciayi
 molekovli asimiljaciaji hamar bahangwvowm e vo4 bakas qan 12 molekvowl AEF, aysinkn anaerob orkanizmi koxmic 1 mg azvoti oktakorcman
 mg azoti oktakvorcman hamar petq e mvotawvorapes 500 mg sagharoz:Thtwatsnic bastbanovtjvovneNitrvokyenazn arkelapakwvowm e molekvowlayin

 ditarkwvovm Hvolokvost@ zhghtoghnyeri ashkhatvovtyvovnnerovm ev nranc tyesovthjan amenakhvoceli koghmn e, qani vor dgvar e ktnyel patsatrowthyovn

 o4ncacwel:Inchbes pndvowm e rovs ashgharhakraket, krvogh Pawel Pvoljany, Hvolvokvosti joghvowrdakrakan batkyeri masin aragin lvovrdj asxatanky krel
 lowrj askhatanqe grel e amerikaci svotsivolog Frenk Hankins@ 1958 twakanin: Ays askhatanqy ci hratarakvyel hyeghinaki kyendanvowtjan
 heghinaki kendanovtjan orok` lvovjs tesnelov miajn 1983 thwakanin: Hankinse 4i zhxtyel mahatsa&neri thvaqanaky: Ays ashxatanqi glkhavor

 krvovm e oc thye Hitlyer@, ajl Stalin@: Sakajn, in4pes krvovm e Poljane, irakanvovm GhSHM-vovm hakahryeakan zankwacayin brnovtyovnneri

 hyeto: pvolyan@ knnadatvovm e Hankinsi askhatanqy skzbnaxpyovrneri hyet` tsovjts talvow, the na in4bes e skhal yezrahankowmner katarvovm:
 ezrahankvowmnyer katarowm: CHnajac dran` Hankinsy himq e styeghtsyel hyetaga gkhtoghneri hamar` cvowjc talow tsexasbanvovthjan zvohyeri zhoghovrdagrakan
 zoheri gvoghvowrdakrakan haswarki xndirnery:1983 tvakanin` Hankinsi krki lvowysencajowmic krethe anmigabyes hyeto, krogh Ovvolther
 anmijapes heto, krvox Vowolter Seninge hratarakel e «Arewyeljan YEvrobayi hryeanyeri anhyetatsvowm@» kirke, ortegh na nkarakryel e, vor evrvobakan
 nkaragrel e, or yewropakan hryeanyeri mec mas@ karoghatsyel e zartovghi midjotsnyerov (ayd pattcharvov el srdjantsyel e bashtvonakan wijakakrowtjovn@)
 pastvonakan witchakakrvovthjovne) pagh4yel GHSHM, AMN yev paghyestin: Hvolvoqvoste gkhtoxnyerits myeke` Arthvovr Batce, haytararyel e, or ipr spanwac hreanyery
 ibr sbanvac hreaner@ irakanvovm gvojatyevyel yen` hyetakajovm 4werakanknelow irenc kapyer@ min4patyerazmyan srdjani azgakanneri het:Zhghtvoghnerin
 azgakanneri het:Jxtvoxnyerin qnnadatvoxnyery matnanshowm en, or o4 mi irakan batsatrvowtjovn cka, the hatkabyes vortex en verapnakvovtjvown
 ortegh yen verabnakowtjvovn hastatyel 5-6 milivon hreanyery: Masnawvorabyes Seninky ir hasvarknervowm ogtwel e anarganahawat teghyekovthyownnyeric`
 anarzhanahavat texyekvowtjvovnnyeric` heknelov pastvonakan axpjvowrner@: Ir oktakvor&ats aghpyvowrneric na @ntryel e ajn texyekvowtyvovnnery, oronk
 texyekovtjovnnery, vorvonq hastatel yen ir aradj kashac drovjthnery` mnatsa& pastarkner@ mi koghm dnyelow: Goghvowrdagir Syerjvo dyela Pyergolan
 Sergo dela Pergvolan matnanshvovm e, vor Holvokosti ardyvownkovm sksyel e &ayrahegh nvazyel hreakan bnakchvovthyan thvakanaky voch miayn
 bnakchowthjan twaqanake o4 miayn YEwropajowm, ajlev ampvoxdj asxarhowm: Na nshvovm e, or hryeakan bnakcvovtjan qanakn ashxarhi zhoghovvowrdneri gvoxvovrdakrakan
 jvoxowvowrdnyeri jvoghvowrdakrakan batkyerowm 1939 tvakani 0.75 %-ic nwazyel e 0.23 %-i 21-rd daraskzpvovm: perkvolaji hasvarknyervow, yethe Hvolokost
 hashvarknyervov, yethe Hvolvokost clinyer, hreakan bnak4owthyan tiv@ 1990-akan thwakannyerin kkazmer 20-31 milion mard, bayts irakanvovm ajn
 mard, bajc irakanowm ajn 13 milion e:Hvoloqostn ovsowmnasirvoxner@ henwowm yen hryeanyeri pnagngman` gvojovthyown ovnecvogh hasaneli
 gvojovtyovn ownetsvogh hasanyeli vijakakrvowtyan wra, ajd thvowm SS-i marminneri kazma& pastathghthyeri wra: Jkhtvoxnyery heknvovm yen kyermanakan
 heknvovm yen gyermanakan vijakakrovthjan krethye bolvor tvyalnyere` nerarjal Hajnrikh Himleri nerkayacvowtsich dvoktvor Rixard Gvorhyeri erkov
 Rixard Gvorheri yerkov haswetvvovthjovnnyer@, vorn ardyen 1943 twakani marti 31-in pastvovm er Evropayvowm hreakan pnakcvovtjan krcatvowme
 bnakcvovthyan krtchatvovme 4.5 milionvow: Holvokosti hvovshakrakan tangarani` Jad Wasyemi tvjalnyerow` 2010 thvakanin dyektyemperi drovtjamp
 dyektyemberi drvowthjamp 4 milivon zvohi inknovthjvown@ hastatvac e andznabes:Vochnchacman wyerapyeryal pastatghtherSHvejcaraci hraparakaghvos
 pastathxterShvejcaraci hraparakaghvos Yowrgyen Kraf@ grvovm e, or Hitleri` hryeanyeri fizikakan vo4nchacman voch mi hraman ci gtnvel, i tarpyervovtyvown,
 gtnwel, i tarpyerovthyvown, orinak, anhvowys hiwandnyeri sbanman kam amerikaci odachvovneri mahapatzhi: Dyewid Irvinky pndowm er, vor Hitleri
 bndvovm er, vor Hitlyeri kyensagrowthjvovne grelis skzbnaghpjowrnyerovm och mi pastathxti 4i handipel, or kwkajyer tsyeghasbanvowtyany nra
 cyeghaspanovtjany nra masnaktsowtjvovn@: Na masnavvorapyes haytararyel e, or arajarkowm e «1.000 fownt styerlink tal cankatsats mardow,
 tal cankacac mardvov, ov karox e batyerazmakan srdjani keth mek pastatvovght nerkajacnel, vore kapacvowtsi, vor Hitlyern imatsyel e, orinak,

 hartsi wyerjnakan lvowcvovm» ezr@ orbes pnakchvowthyan mikratsia kam tyexahanowthyown, payts oc bnadjngovm:Hvolokvosti` yndhanovr canacvovm
 bnadjngovm:Hvolokvosti` @ndhanowr jana4ovm stacac tyesakyeti nerkayacowtsi4nyery matnanshowm yen, or Ewrobaji hreaneri pnadjngman tsragire kvojowthyown e
 &ragire kojvovtyown e vovnyetsel, yev Errord Rayghi xekawarnern ajd arvovmow miansanak hajtararovtyvovnnyer en kataryel: Orinak` Jvozyef

 bashtonyaner:Gvonkryet pastathovxth, vor kvkajyer hreanyeri zankwa&ajin pnajndjman cshkrit amsathwi masin, ci bahbanvel: Sakayn patmapanneri

 betowthjvowny» krkovm owsovmnasirel e Kyermaniayi ghyekavarman hamakark@: Nowjn kar&iqn e haytnowm naev patmaban Helmvovt Gravovzniky:

 kyex&vats:Patmapannyeri kar&ikvov gghtvoxneri pacatrovtyovnner@, vor natsistnyeri pazmatiw tsvovtsmvownqnyer stipvoxakan yen yeghyel, knnadatvowthyan chi

 enthadrovthjovnnyer@:Diakizarannyeri artadroxakanvovthjovnJowrgyen Grafn ir «Arasbel Hvolaqosti masin» krqvovm krowm e, or Oswentsimi diakizarannyervowm

 tarbervovtyvown nahangits araj natsistnyeri kvoxmic ochnchatswa& kazi ghtsikneri` Maydanekovm bahpanwyel e kazi ghtsik:Artazatwvox kazy` cianakan
 xcik:Artazatwvogh gazy` tsianakan ttovn, bateri tsatskovjti wra dzevavvorowm e kimiakan kajvovn miatsvovtjvovn, sakayn bati kervowki verlvovcvowthyown@,

 bacasakan ardjvovnq:Sakayn Lyeyghteri ew ajlvots hyetazotovtjvovnnyere, oronts hghvowm en katarvowm tseghaspanvovthjovny gxtvoxnyery` abatsvowtsyelow,

 arkayovthjovne pazmatiw gazaxtsikneri avyeraknyervowm»:Pndowmnere, or ghtsiknyerovm antsker 4yen yexyel gazi artahoski hamar, herqvovm

 jxtoghner@ herqvowm en irents isk koxmic aradj kashwac tesakety, tye ibr 6 milivon hrea sbanwel e henc kazi xciknerovm: Hamenajn dyeps,
 ghtsiknerowm: Hamyenayn dyebs, kitakan patmakrowtyowne nman tesakyet erbyeq araj chi qashel. kazi khtsiknervowm sbanwel e Hvolvoqsti zohyeri
 sbanwyel e Hvoloqsti zoheri mi mase miayn, isk mnacatsy mahatsyel en ayl batjarnervov` gndakaharovtjown, sow, hiwandvovtjownner: ZHghtman
 hivandovthjovnnyer: Zhxtman hamanman orinak e handisanvowm Levon Degreli «Osvencimi gazi xciknervovm orakan 24.000 spanva&neri masin

 e nra oxj kvojovthyan meg miajn myek angam` 1944 tvakani hownisi 28-in:Hvolvokvosti zhxtman ov ryevizionizmi patmowtyovn1945-1970Hvolvokvosti
 batmovtyvovn1945-1970Holvokvosti gxtman himker styeghcel en hyents nacistnyer@. yerp haskanali dardav, or hnaravvor e paterazme tanvovl tal,

 abrilin na pashtvonakan hramanagir e stvoragrel, or hamakyentronacman jambarnerowm gtnwogh voc mi pantarkjal «kyendani ch@nkni tshnamvow
 «kyendani cynkni tsnamow dzyerq@»:Indianayi hamalsaranits Ropyert Wyesty entadryel e, or Hvolvoqosti arajin gxtvoxe yeghyel e shotlandatsi
 jghtoxy eghel e svotlandaci &ayrahyegh adj qaxakakan kvor&ic Alyeksandr Ratklife (ankl. Alexander Ratcliffe), ow 1945 twakani vyerdjin

 e: Ratklify naew pndel er, vor pritanakan karavarvowtyovn@ pastaci hskvowm e hreanyeri kvoghmits, isk Hitlyer@ Evropayi prkararn e
 Ewrvobaji prkararn e polsewizmic: Vax hyerqoghnerits mekn el ankliaci krox yew lrakrogh Dvowklas Ridn e:Patmapan ev jvoxowrdakir Pawel
 ev zhoghvowrdakir pavyel polyany grel e, vor Njowrnpergjan datavarvovthyan ezrakacovthyovnnyern aragin ankam kaska&i tak e drel fransiaci

 mardkanc zangwatsajin mahwan pattchar yen yexyel razmakan khist pajmannyery ew dranc hetewanqvow mardkants hyovcwacvowthyvovnn vow hamajaraknyere:Sakajn
 hamacaraknere:Sakayn Holvokosti aragin jxtvogh@, ore hanrajanachovtjovn e dzerq pyeryel, fransiatsi Pvol Rasinjen e, vory paterazmi
 Rasinyyen e, vore paterazmi tarinerin eghel e Dimadrowthjan sargman medj ev Bowkhyenvaldi kyerineric, isk patyerazmits hyeto dardzyel e khorhrdarani
 dardel e khorhrdarani batgamawor: 1848 thvakanin na lvowjs e @ntsajyel «Sahmanneri hatowm» (fr. Le Passage de la Ligne) kirqy,
 de la Ligne) girqy, orvowm, chhyerkelvow ahabekchvovthyan kaxaqakanowthjowne ev hryeanyeri o4nchacvovme hamakyentrvonatsman jamparnervowm,
 hamakentronatsman camparnyervowm, oghj mexqe dnovm e artonyal kyerinyeri` kabonyeri vra, orvonk hskvovm ein paraknere: Rasinjen kaskats e hajtnvovm
 Rasinyyen kaska& e hajtnvowm yev zoheri thwi, yev gyermanatsineri` hryeanyeri ditawvorjal spanvowtjan wyerapyerjal:1961 tvakanin Rasinjen hratarakovm
 Rasinyen hratarakowm e «Vowlisi ghapkanq» girqe, isk 1964 thvakanin` «Ewrvopaci hryeaneri draman» grkyere: Rasinjen pordzvovm er
 Rasinyen pordzowm er apatsovcyel, or mahacel e yndamen@ 0.5-1.5 milion hryea yev krknvowm er Pardyeshi pndvovm@, or nrank mahatsel
 bndvowm@, vor nranq mahatsel yen oc te ayn pattcharvow, vor kyermanatsinyere sbanyel en nranc, ajl or chyen karoghacyel harmarvyel paterazmakan
 harmarvyel batyerazmakan dagan paymannyerin: 1964 twakanin Rasinyen jxtvoghnyeric arajine hajtararyec, or voch mi kazi ghtsik gyermanatsinyer@
 kazi ghcik gyermanacinyery chyen ovnetsyel:Ayd shrganowm Hvolvoqvosti zhghtvovme YEvrobayovm throvtsik erewvowyt er, qani or batyerazmi masin hishvoxowthjvownnyer@
 masin hishvoxowthyvownnyere tarm ein, ew sat akanatyesnyer derevs kyendani ein:AMN-vovm Hvolokvosti gxtman barart hogh er izoljatsionizm@
 hogh er izvolyatsivonizmy (vowxxowtyovn artaqin kaghakakanovthjan myej, ori himqowm enka& er ajl byetowtjovnnyeri, joghvowvowrdnyeri gortsyerin
 jvoxvovvovrdneri korcerin 4mijamtyel@), vori arawyel haytni nerkajacowtsicnyerits er batmaban-gyermanasyer Kari Elmer Parnsy: Izolyatsivonistnyeri
 Barnsy: Izvoljatsivonistneri kar&ikov AMN-n izowr er nerkashwel Germaniaji dyem batyerazmi myej, vor hrahryel ein nra thshnaminyer@` masnavvorabes
 tshnaminere` masnaworapes Lehastann ow Myec Britanian: Hamanman tyesaket e hajtnyel Dyevid Hokane ir «Partadrva& patyerazm» krqowm:
 «partadrwac batyerazm» grqvovm: Holokvosti zhghtovme nman hankamanqnyerovm arasbeli tesq e yndvovnovm ayn masin, vor pazmatiw hreanyer prkvel
 pazmathiw hreaner prkvyel en` tyexapvokhwelow ayl erkrnyer: 1968 thwakanin Barns@ mexadryel e Israjyelin ceghac hreakan diaknyeri hamar
 hreakan diaknyeri hamar Germaniajits kvovmar stanalow hamar:1970 tvakanits heto1970-akan twakanner@ nshanavvorvetsin Evrobajovm
 nshanavvorwyetsin Evrobayvowm zhghtoxakan shargman achvow. thogharkwvowm yen bazmathiv grqyer, hvodva&ner, skswvovm en hardzakovmnyer Hvolokosti klghawvor
 harzakovmner Hvoloqvosti glxavvor xorhrdanisi` Oswyencimi nkatmamp:1973 thwakanin Germaniajowm lovjs en tesnovm Tis Kristvofyerseni «Oswentsimi
 Gristofersyeni «Osventsimi svovt@», «Sti kaskaceli hamadrovmner», Emil Aryetsi «GHabyeovthjvown 6 milivoni masin» krkyery: 1974 tvakanin
 krqyer@: 1974 twakanin Myec Britaniajvovm hratarakvyel e Ri4ard Harvovdi «Ardjvoq mahacyel e 6 milivon» kirqy: Harwvovdn apacovtsvowm
 Harwvovdn abacvovcowm er, vor mahatsyel e endameny 10 000 hryea, ynd orowm` brnovthyvownnyere hatvovk vovghghvats chein hryeaneri nkatmamp,
 4ein hreanyeri nkatmamp, ajl nacistakan ryezhimi hakarakvordneri: Ays shrjanvovm ir grqern ov essenern e hratarakvovm hampowrkci irawaban
 hampvovrgci iravaban Vilhelm Shteklighe, vor@ kentronacats er Hvolvokosti masin vkayovtjovnnyery zhxtyelvow vra:Ostin Eppy zyevakerpel

 tsragrere naghatyesovm ein hreaneri tyexahanvowme YErrord rayghin patkanvogh taracknyerits, isk bnajnjman &rakir erpyek 4i exyel: «Verdjnakan
 chi eghel: «Wyerjnakan lvowcvovm» ezre nshanakel e teghapvoxvowm, och tye ocnchacovm:Anhyetacac yevrobakan hreanyeri metsamasnowtyvovn@
 hryeaneri mecamasnvovthyvowne ci spanwyel, ayl artagaghtel e AMN, paxyestin ev GhSHM: Ajd patcarvov el nrank dowrs yen mnacyel vijakagrvowtjvovnits:Germanacineric
 wichakagrovthyvownic:Germanatsinerits tvovzhac hreanyere eghyel en bartizannyer, diversantner, sabvotazhner yev natsistakan ryegimi hakarakordnyer: Nrants

 oryenqnyervow:Pastatghtyere, vorvoncvovm yerewowm e Holoqvosti mtacacin linel@, gtnvvowm yen xorhrdajin vow israyyelakan arxivnerovm ev anhasaneli en
 arxiwnerovm yev anhasanyeli en ankashar hyetazotvoghneri hamar:Hreanyeri vochnchacovm@ razmakan gamanakasrdjani dashnakicneri mtqi ardyvownq

 tchnselov hamar:«Hvoloqosti masin araspyel@» tvowyl e talis hryeanerin yew Israjyel pyetowthjany stanal barvojakan karyewvor aravyelvovthjownner
 karyewor arawelvowthjovnnyer yev njowtakan shah:Ays «xapeowtyvowne» sharvownakvovm e kvoyvowthyvown vownenal hreakan «gitakan chici» ev «azniv»
 «kitakan jici» yev «azniw» patmapanneri nkatmamb prnvowtjownnyeri snvorhiw:Ays srjani amyenahaytni girqn elyektrvonikayi masnaket Artvowr

 apatsowcvovm er, or hryeaneri shrganvovm zohyeri tiwe kazmel e 1 milivon mard, yew pndvovm er, or Vyermaghte yev SS-n chen irakanacrel hreanyeri
 irakanatsryel hryeanyeri kotora&: Nra karcikow gyermanacineri kaxaqakanvowtjvovny nbatakaovghghwa& e eghyel hryeaneri wyerabnakecman@
 hryeaneri verabnakecmany Rayghi sahmannyeric dowrs, nrants gvowjki brnagravmany ew hreakan ashxatvowji oktagvorcmany razmakan gorcarannyervowm:1978

 institowt» kazmakyerpovthjowne, orn ir araj bacahajt nbatak e dnvovm zhxtyelow Hvolvoqvosti patmowtjan` hamyndhanvovr chanachvowm stacats tesakete:

 wyeranayman institvowt@» sksovm e hratarakel Journal of Historical Review amsakir@ ew kazmakerbyel midjazgayin hamagvoghovner ajd

 nakhararvovthyvovne:1970-akan tvakannyeri kyeseric ryevizivonizme, vor naxkinovm asocacvvovm er batsarapes nyeonatsizmi hyet, inqnvovrowjn sargman

 hvodva&nery krvvowm yen harapyerakanoryen cezvok lyezwvow` apahvowyelvow myets qanakovtjamb hghvowmner skzpnaghbyvowrneric, inche nranc artaknabyes
 inche nranc artaqnapes nman e dardznvovm gitakan krakanowthjane: ZHkhtoxakan njowtheri taracman gvortsvowm klghawor dyemq e handisanvovm
 glghavor dyemk e handisanvovm Kanadajvowm abrogh kermanaci revizionist Ernst Cyvowndyel@: Stiwyen Atkinse grvowm e, or ayd sargvovmy pazmandam

 en:Hvolvokvost@ gkhtvoxnyeri nsanakalic hagvoghowtjvown@ Hvolvokosti tyemayvow bac knnarkvowmneri kvomityei vcarvovi haytarvowtyvownnyeri hratarakovmn

 vovsanoghnyeri ov dasaxvosneri naghatramadrwac lsaranvovm, aylev hasnyel ajn panin, or rewizivonistnyervov arajin angam hetaqrqrwyel yen hyerovstatyesvowtyvownn
 hervowstatyesowtyvownn ov azkajin xosor thyerthyer@:21-rd dari skzbic jkhtvoxnyern irenc gaxaparnyer@ tara&yelov hamar sksel en zangva&abar

 wyeranajman institvovt@» 50 000 AMN dvolari 4apov barkyewatrovm e khostatsyel tsankatsats mardvov, vov karox e apatsovcyel, or hreanyerin Oswentsimowm
 hryeanyerin Osvyencimvovm sbanel en gazvow: Oswyentsimi naxkin gyeri Mel Myermelshteyne, vory Movkacyewoyi bnakic e yexyel, endvownyel e martahraver@`

 dasaghos Jeyms Qikstran, qryeakan oryensgrki 281 hodva&i hamazajn (ajgm` 319 hvodva&), mexadrvyel e orvosaki ghmbi handyep atelvowthjan

 tramadrvovthyovnnyer` nyeraryal Hvolokosti zhxtovm@: Na tovkanvyel e 5 000 AMN dolarvov` zrkvelvov dasaghvosyelvov irawovnqits: Qikstraji gvortsn
 irawvownkits: Kikstrayi gvortsn arit e handisatsyel Ganadaji Gerakvovyn dataranowm knnarkel khvosqi azatvowthyan harce: Datakan vorvosvovmnyeri

 hraparakowmnyern vov yelowjthnyery, orpeszi parzapani, tye ardyvok Hvolokosti jkhtowmy mitovmnawvor bnovjth e krel` kakhwac kaghakakan hetakrkvowtjvovnneric

 tsexaspanvowthyan, ajd thwovm` Holokosti zhxtvowmy:Garyewvor e wyerakanknel tchsmartowtjowne: Mardik chein karvogh aydbisi hresajin ararkner

 cyexaspanovtjan masin, isk oc liarzheq texekatwvovtyvovn pyetk che matvowtsel, qani or da shpvothetsnvowm e mardkants:Nyerkajowms karik

 askharhy:Etye ceghaspanvowtyvovne jana4wi, apa zohyeri servovndnyer@ kahabyeken hyetabndoghnyeri serowndnerin:Zohern irenk yen myeghavor iryenc

 hakasivonakanvowtjovn@, orvonq sertoren arncvvovm yen hakasemakanovtjan@:Nevonacizm, hakasyemakanvowthjvovn ev Hvolokosti zhghtvovmHvoloqosti
 Hvoloqosti zhxtowmHvolvokosti jkhtowme khtanvogh sarzharithnyer en nyeonacizmn vow hakasemakanvovtyovn@: Holoqvosti zhxtvovm@ karyevvor der e khaghowm

 tyevowm: Nman tesaket@ taracwa& e nayev azgajnakan bazmathiw xmbavvorowmneri, masnavorapyes` natsivonal-anarkhistneri yev rasistnerishrganowm:

 pastaban Manfryed Rjodyer@ glxavvorel e «Iradardzowthjvownnyeri kyermanakan khvowmb» nevonacistakan ghmbavvorvowmy, isk amerikaci hraparakaxos

 hakasemakanowthjovnn vow Hvoloqvosti gghtvovme syertvoren poxkapaktsvac en: Depvora Lipshtadt@ kartsovm er, or mardik, vovkyer havatvowm
 mardik, vowqyer hawatvowm en zhxtoxnyerin ew krknvovm en nranc drovytner@, hakvats en hakasemakanvowtyan@: Germanatsi patmapan Yowrgyen

 zhkhtvovmKa tesakyet, ori hamadzajn sivonistnere mitowmnavor chapazantsryel yen Holvokosti zvoheri tiwy, inchy nranc barvoyakan aravyelovtyvown
 paroyakan aravyelowthyovn e tvyel Israyel pyetvowtyan himnadrman hartsvovm:Vorvos gxtoxner nayev pndvowm yen, vor pvoghhamadaynovtyvown e yexel
 pokhhamadajnowtyvown e eghel natsistneri ev sionistnyeri midjew hryeanyeri o4n4acman harcvowm: Masnaworabyes, rvovs hasarakakan gvor&ic Jvovri
 hasarakakan kvortsic Yvowri Mvovxine, pndyelvov, or YEwrvopajowm nacistner@ hryeanyerin cyen ocncacryel, krowm e, vor khvorhrdajin hryeanerin
 khvorhrdajin hreanerin spanyel en sionistneri cvowcowmvov:Haytni antisionist zhkhtoxnyerits myekn el Irani nakhkin naghagah Mahmvowd
 nakhkin naxakah Mahmowd Ahmadinyegadn e: Na bazmics artahaytyel e ajn karciq@, or Holoqvoste «svowt e` hyenvats anabacowtsyeli ov arasbyelakan
 anapatsvowtseli vow araspelakan pndowmneri vra», yew or ayd sti himqvow Paghestini tarackn okvovpacwyel e sionistneri koxmits: AMN-i, Ewramiowtyan
 AMN-i, YEvramivowtyan erkrnyeri, Rowsastani nyerkajatsovcicner@ ghstoren knnadatyel en Ahmadinegadin ev nra artahajtovthyvovnnery,
 artahaytowtyvovnner@, orvoncow jghtvovm er Hvoloqvosty ew sparnvowm «jnjyel Israyyele erkri yeresits»:Holvokosti gghtovme, vor kapwac e
 jghtowm@, vor kapwac e hakasionizmi hyet, taratswa& e islamakan yerkrnyerowm, vortyegh pnakcovthjan himnakan masy hrazharwvovm e yndownel
 hrajarwovm e yndvownyel Israyel pyetvowthjan gvojovthjvovny, hatkabyes` Siriajovm, YEgiptosvovm, Saovdjan Arabiayowm:Ahapyekcovtjan ovsovmnasirman
 Arapiajvowm:Ahapekcvovthjan owsvovmnasirman teghekatvakan kyentroni hashvetwvowtyan meg nshwvowm e, or pazmativ hodwatsner, orvonq nwirvac en Holokvosti
 nwirvac yen Hvolvoqosti gkhtmane, siriakan ZLM-nyerovm lvowjs en tyesnowm iskhanowthjownneri anmidjakan hovanavorovthjamp: Iranci kaghaqaget
 howanavvorovthjamb: Irantsi kaghakakyet Ramin Djahanbexlovn ir «Hvolvokvosti jxtovme Iranowm yev hakasemakan tramadrvovtjovnnern islamakan asgharhvovm»
 islamakan ashxarhvowm» ashxatankovm growm e hakasyemakanvowthyan, hakasionizmi yew Hvolokvosti zhghtman syert kapyeri masin arapakan vov

 endvovnelovtjown chyen ktnovm: Akademiakan kitowtyovn@ myerzhovm e gxtvoxnyerin. miak pane, orin karox yen hawaknyel zhxtoghnere, khoski azatowthyvovnn
 gkhtoxnyere, ghoski azatvovthyovnn e: TSimermani karciqvow, nranc hexinakowtjownn vov karewvorovthyovnn avyeli myets che, kan Tapak erkragndi enkyerowtjovny

 mahacyel en voc the kazits, ajl hivadvovthyvovnnerits` hghvelov Patcin vow Rasinyyein: Sakajn Mayeri ayd kirqe khist qnnadatvovtyan e arganatsyel
 knnadatvovtyan e arzhanacel kitakan shrganaknerovm:Mi xowmp hyetazvotoghneri karcikow Holoqosti gxtvovm@ pnorvosh e bostmodyernizmi apakarovcoghakan
 pvostmvodernizmi abakarowtsvoghakan kartsratipin: Rovs patmapan Alyeksandr Nemirovskin, wyerlowtselvov gghtoxneri hayacqnern ow tesakyetnyer@, hankyel
 tesaketnyery, hankyel e ajn ezrakatsowthjan, vor «rewizionistner@ hyeretikvosakan kitakan dprots 4en, o4 el keghcarar hakasemakanner.
 kyextsarar hakasemakannyer. revizivonizmy liarzhyek krvon e»: Revizivonistneri` patmowthyan nkatmamb ownyetsac mistik kapi masin e khosyel nayew
 kapi masin e khosyel nayew mshakovythi ow krvoni batmapan Leonid Katsis@:Ka naev tesakyet, vor Hvolokosti zhghtvovmn ogovt e pervowm batmakan
 ogovt e pyerovm patmakan gitovtyan@: Orinak, Daniyel Rvomanovskin asvovm er, vor vorosh ryewizivonistnyeri hyet karyeli e akademiakan banawec
 akademiakan panavyech varel: Holvokvosti nsanawvor vovsvovmnasiroxnyerits myeky` Raowl Hilpyergy, mahic o4 sat aradj asyel e, or «Holokvoste
 asyel e, or «Hvolvoqvosty zhghtvoxnyeri ow hakasyemakannyeri hyet pyetq che banavijyel, bayc nrank yerbyemn hetaqrkir harcer en araj kasvowm»:
 hartser en araj qasovm»: Qaghaqaget Vjachyeslav Likhachev@ grovm e, or rewizionistakan knnadatowthjvown@ gitnakannerin arith e twel wyeraditarkyelvow
 tvel wyeraditarkelow @ndovnvats batmakrvovthyan mi sark drvowjthner` veradzewakerpelow oc stovyk pndvowmnery:MAG-@ yew Holvoqosti
 bndvovmnery:MAG-@ ew Holokosti zhghtowmyMAK-i Klghavor asamplyean ir 60/7 banadevowm, ore 2005 tvakani nvojyempyeri 21-in yndovnwyel e Awstraliayi,
 endovnwel e Avstraliaji, Israjyeli, Kanadaji, Rvovsastani ew AMN-i nakhazernovtjamb, merzhel e Hvoloqvosti` vorbyes batmakan irvoxvovthjan
 patmakan irvoxvovthjan jghtvowmy` koc anyelow MAK-i klkhavvor kartovxarin &rakir patrastel «Holokosty yev Miaworvats azgyeri kazmakerbvovtjown@»
 azkyeri kazmakerbvowthjvowne» themayov:2007 thwakani hovnwari 26-in` Holokvosti zohyeri hishataki migazkajin orva nakhorein, MAG-i Glghavor
 naghorein, MAK-i Klkhavor asamblean hatowk banazev e endvovnel` 61/255 «Holvokosti zhxtvovm», vorvov arants naxapajmannyeri knnadatvowm
 naxabajmanneri qnnadatwvowm e Holvokvosti zhghtman tsankatsa& pord: Panadewy «kvoc e anvowm bolor andam byetvowtjownnerin anararkelioren myergel
 anararkelioryen myergyel Holokosti zhxtman cankacac depq` lini da ampoxdjakan, thye masnaki, yew cankatsac ajl kvorcoxovtyvovn ayd nbatakvow»:
 gvorcvoxowtjovn ajd nbatakvow»: Pastatghti naghagice Glkhavor asamplyeaji qnnarkmann en nyerkayacryel MAK-i 192 andam yerkrnyeric 103-e:Miak
 erkrnerits 103-e:Miak yerkir@, or@ dem e artahaytwyel 61/255 banadyewi @ndownmane, yexel e Iran@: Irani nerkajacovcicnyeri karcikow
 nerkayacvowcicnyeri kartsiqvov banazyewi hyeghinaknyery MAG-i ampionn oktagvorcel yen andznakan qaghakakan nkatarvowmnyervow: AMN-i batwirakvovthyown@
 AMN-i batvirakovtjown@ hajtararel e, or ayd pastathghthi yndvovnman arith e handisatsyel Irani dirqvorvosvovm@, ore 2006 thvakani dyektembyerin
 thvakani dyektyembyerin kazmakerbyel e gkhtoxneri masshtapajin hamagvoxow:MAG-i klghawvor kartvovghar Pan Ki Movny 2009 thvakani hvovnwari
 2009 thwakani hvownwari 26-in Holoqvosti zoheri hishataki mijazkayin orwa kapaktsowthyamb arva& hajtararovtjan myedj yndkcyel e Hvolvoqvosty
 @ndkcyel e Holoqoste gghtvoghnyeri dem tarvvox bajkare, orbeszi voghpyergvowtyvowne 4krknvi:Holoqosti jghtman qryeakan hyetabndvowmVorvos
 qreakan hetabndvowmVorvosh betvovtjovnnerovm Hvolokvosti zhkhtowmy hetapndwowm e natsional-svocializmi yev nyeonatsizmi arkyelman oryenknyerov:
 arkyelman orenknerov: Ayd betvovthjovnnyeri thwowm, vorbes kanvon, yewrvobakan pyetvovtjvovnnyern en, vorvonq towzhel yen natsional-sotsializmi
 nacional-sotsializmi gaxaparaghosvovthyownits vov kvortsoxovtyvownnyeric: Holoqosti hrabarakajin jxtvowmn arkyelvox, natsistneri kortsa&
 argyelox, nacistnyeri kvortsac hancanknyern ardaracnox hraparakvowmneri arkyelqy kor&vovm e Avstriajowm, Pyelgiayvowm, Gyermaniayovm, Litwajovm,
 Kyermaniajvowm, Litwayowm, Lyovksembvowrkvovm, Lehastanvowm, Rvovsastanvowm, Slovyeniayovm, Fransiajowm, Svejtsariayvovm, Ganadayovm yev
 Sveytsariajowm, Kanadayowm ew Israjyelvovm: Hamanman oryenkner en korcovm Lixtyenshtajnowm, Pvortvowgaliayvowm, Cekhiayovm yew Slowakiayvowm:
 Ceghiayowm yev Slowakiayvovm: 2010 thvakanin tvotalitar regimnyer@ mergogh oryenk e @ndvovnwel Hvownkariayowm: AMN-vovm Holokosti jkhtvowme
 AMN-ovm Holokvosti jkhtvovmy qrevoryen batjyeli ce, kani or sepakan tyesaket artahajtyelvow irawownke pashtpanwac e Sahmanadrvovtjan aradjin
 Sahmanadrowtyan arajin barepokhvovmov:Kyermaniayowm, Avstriayvovm, Fransiajowm, Kanadayvowm ev ayl erkrnyervowm ays orenkner@ pazmics
 ays orenknery pazmitss kirarwel yen Hvolvokosty gghtvoghneri nkatmamb: Miajn 2007-2008 twakannerin Ewramiovtyvovnvowm Holvoqosti gkhtman
 YEwramivovtyownovm Hvolokosti gghtman hamar datapartwyel e mot 10 mard: Orvosh datawjirnyer hetagayvovm vitcharkwel yen mijazkajin datakan atjannerowm:1996
 datakan atyannervovm:1996 tvakanin MAG-i` Mardvov irawownknyeri komiten «Forisonn ynddem Fransiaji» gortsi qnnman jamanak yndownel
 knnman jamanak yndvovnyel e annakhadep orvosowm, vori hamadayn Hvolvoqosti gkhtman kapaktsowtjamb mankawarzhakan kvorcvovnevovthjvovnits zrkel@
 gvorcownevowtyvownic zrkyel@ fransiakan oryensdrowtjan himan vra 4i khaxtowm Kaghakaciakan ov kaxakakan iravvownkneri midjazgayin bakt@:1998
 migazgayin pakte:1998 twakanin Mardvow iravovnqneri evropakan datarany «Lyeidyvon ew Izvornin enddem Fransiaji» kor&ov ir oroshman
 Fransiaji» kvor&ow ir vorvosman myeg endvownyel e Hvolvokvosti jghtman hamar bataskhanatvovtyown kryelow anhrajyeshtowtjowny: Isk «Garodin @nddyem
 Isk «Garvodin @nddem Fransiayi» gorcvowm (2003) datarane nsel e, or zhkhtyelov Holokoste` Roje Karvodin kvortsel e mardvow iravownqneri
 mardov iravvownqnyeri vow azatovtjan vochncacman vowxghvowtjamb, in4n amragrwac e Mardow iravovnqnyeri Ewrvobakan konwyentsiayvow. ajd
 YEwrobakan konventsiayvov. ayd batcharvow el nra havaknovthjovnnery kvonwyenciayi 10-rd keti masvow, vorvov erashghawvorvvowm e khosqi azatvowtyovn@,
 khvosqi azatvowtjovny, merzhwyel en: Aydpisi ezrakacovtjownnyeri hamar himq e tsarayel 17-rd kyet@, vory sahmanwats e yexyel «totalitar
 sahmanvac e yeghyel «tvotalitar khmbavvorvowmneri koxmits irents shaheri hamar kvonwentsiayi dzevakyerbvovmnyer@ kheghathjvowryelov hamar»:2007 thvakani
 hamar»:2007 twakani hownvarin Germaniaji ardaradatvowthjan nakharar Brigita TSibris@ Evramivowthyan bvolvor yerkrnerin aragarkyel
 yerkrnerin arajarkyel e Hvolvokosti gghtvovmy hantsanq hamaryel ev argyelel natsistakan ghvorhrdanshanneri hraparakajin covcadrowme: Mi
 hraparakajin tsowtsadrowme: Mi ghvowmb lrakrvoghner ev qaghaqagetner qnnadatyel en ajs aradjarkowtyvovn@, masnaworapyes ayn bani hamar, or arkelke
 bani hamar, vor arkelk@ khosqi azatvowtjan irawownqi khaxtvowm e ev 4i nbasti nyevonacizmi hyexinakovtjan nvazman@: Ardjovnqovm 2007
 nvazman@: Ardjvownqvovm 2007 thwakani abrilin yndvownvel e orenq, vor azgajin yev rasayakan ghtrakanovthjvovnneri hrahrvowme hamarwel e hancank
 hrahrovmy hamarwel e hancank ploki 27 andam yerkrnyeri kvoghmic, sakayn ayn 4i nyerarovm Hvolvokvosti jkhtvowm@:2007 thvakani noyyemberin Ispaniayi
 nojembyerin Ispaniaji Sahmanadrakan dataran@ 4yeghyal e hajtararel Holvokvosti zhkhtman hamar pantarkvowthyan dzyevvow patig@: Ajs oroshman
 batij@: Ajs orvosman hamadzayn` polvor andzink, vorvonq bantarkwyel ein Holvoqvosti jghtman hamar, azat yen arzakvyel: Ajs orvoshvowmy
 ardakwel: Ays vorvosvowm@ ci weraperyel hryeaneri dem vovghxvats natsistakan ahapekcvovthjvovnn ardaratsra& andanc aynkan zhamanak, qani
 ajnkan jamanak, qani der Ispaniayi Geragvowyn datarany 2011 thwakanin chi pokhel Erkrvord asxarhamartovm Gyermaniaji gor&oxvovthjownnyern

 artahaytvowtyvownnyeri orinaknyer, oronts hamar ajlevs chi kvor&vovm kryeakan hetapndman vtank@. «Gyermanacinern ovnyein hreanyerin waryelow polor
 hryeanyerin waryelow bolvor himqyer@», «Gyermanacinery yerbyek chyen waryel hryeanerin»:2007 thvakanin rvovs patgamawornyeri shrdjanowm antskatsvac

 chi karyeli arandznatsnyel fasizmi kvortsac ajl hantsanqnyeri sharkvowm: 2014 twakani mayisits kreakan hetabndovm e sahmanwel Mijazgajin

 hamar: Masnawvorabes, ajs vorosmamp hastatwel e 1933-1945 twakannyeri enthackvovm ambvoghj Ewropayowm mvot 6 milivon hryeanyeri vochn4atsman

 ovnyetsox qaxaqakan vov hasarakakan vorvos kor&icnyer, ajd twvovm` Hvoloqvost@ zhghtoghnyerin ynddimadir ajnpisi haytni gvorci4, in4bisin
 hajtni gvorcic, inchbisin Debvora Lipshtadtn e, qnnadatyel en jghtvoxnyeri qryeakan hyetabndovm@` gtnyelvow, or ajn xatarowm e khvoski azatvovtjan
 ghatharowm e khvosqi azatvovthyan iravvownqy: Inchbyes kar&owm e britanaci batmapan Timati Garton Ese «Hvolvoksti gghtman dem pyetk e bajkaryel

 bazhanmvownknyerovm ow datarannerowm»: pavyel poljane karcovm er, or khosqi azatovtjan ov atyelvovtyan qarozman payqari lvov&man lav nakhadeb e Ispaniaji
 nakhadeb e Ispaniayi Sahmanadrakan datarani 2007 tvakani orosowme, ori hamazayn hyenc ahabyekchvovthjan aradaratsvovmn e hamarvvowm
