Bernali gvovnd (angl.` Bernal sphere), aradjin angam 1929 thvakanin gitnakan Jvon Dyesmvond Byernali koghmic
 Desmond Bernali koghmic arajarkwac mshtakan bnaki4nyeri erkaratev pnakyecman hamar naghatesvac tiezyerakan bnakavayri tyesak:Bernali
 pnakawayri tyesak:Pyernali skzbnakan aragarki myej karowyce nkarakrwats e orpes 20,000-30,000 pnakcvovthyamb ev 16 km (9.9 mghvon) tramak&vow
 (9.9 mghvon) tramakcvov gndadew taghanth: Kovndy ltswac e odvow:Island One1975-1976 tvakannerin Sthenfvordi hamalsarani kvoxmic apaka
 hamalsarani koghmic abaga tiezyerakan gaghovthneri dizayni vowghghvowtyamp anckatsrac mi sark hetazotovtyovnnyerovm, dr. Jyerard K. O'Nile
 dr. Djerard K. O'Nile aradjarkel e Island One-y, vorn iryenits nyerkayatsnvowm e Pyernali kndi modifikatsvats tarbyeraky miayn 500 metr
 tarperak@ miayn 500 metr (1600 fovt) tramagcow, kndi hasarakatsvovm erkrayin amboghjakan arhestakan kravitacia irakanacnelow hamar
 irakanacnyelow hamar 1.9 ptvowyt/rvopye aragowtjamp pttwogh: Dra ardjvownqn e kndi hasarakatsow antsnox me& hvoviti nman nyerqin landsafte:
 nman nyerkin landsafte: Island One-e karvox e bnakyeli ew zhamanci tara&owthjovn apahovyel thvvow 10 hazar mardvov hamar, gjowxatntyesvowthyan
 hamar, kjowxatntyesovtyan hamar ogtakortswogh Pyvovryeghja aparank (Crystal Palace) pnakavajrov: Arevajin lowysy gndi nerqin taracowtyan
 kndi nyerkin tara&owthjan myeg e mtnowm bevernervovm tyeghadrwac mets abakinerits owxxvogh artaqin hajelinyeri migow: Kndi tyesk@ @ntrvyel
 mijow: Gndi tesq@ @ntrvyel e odi jnshvovmy bahbanyelov yew radiacion bastpanowthyan srganaknyerovm dra optimal efyektiwowthyovn@ abahvowyelvow
 efyektivvowthjown@ abahvowyelvow hnaraworvowtyan hamar:Island TwoO'Niln arajarkel e tiezerakan bnakavayri hagord syervownde vorpes Island
 syerownd@ orbes Island One-i awyeli myets tyesake: Island Two-n tramagcow byetq e lini shvovrdj 1800 myetr, ori ardjvovnkvowm hasaraka&@
 ardjovnkvovm hasarakatsy kazmowm e 6,5 km (4 mghon):Artakin hghovmnerNASA SP-413: Space Settlements - A Design Study.== Canvothagrvovtjownner
 Study.== Tsanvothagrvovthjownner 
Dryeyfovsi dat, datavarvowtjown Fransiajvowm (1894, dektemper) yev dran hagvordats svocialakan hakadrvowthjovn
 svocialakan hakadrowthjown (1896-1906) Kermanakan kaysrovthjan oktin fransiakan stabi andam, &agowmvov hrea sba Alfryed Dryeyfovsi
 spa Alfryed Drejfvovsi (1859-1935) lrtesvowthjan gortsvow Dreyfovse kex&wac pastathghteri himan wra meghadrwel e yev datapartwyel tsmah
 e yev databartwyel tsmah aqsori hasarakovthyan mej exa& hakasemakan tramadrowtyvovnnyeri azdyecovtjamp, sakajn hyetagajowm razmakan
 hyetagajowm razmakan datarani koghmic ardaracvel e: Dryeyfvowsi date nshanakalic der e ownecel Fransiayi ev Ewrobayi 19-rd daraverji
 Evrobayi` 19-rd darawerji yew 20-rd daraskzpi patmvowthjan myedj: Ayn hachakh ditarkvowm e anardar wchri arandnahatowk orinak:PatmvowtyownMyexadranq:
 orinak:PatmowthjovnMyeghadranq: 1894 twakani datawarowthyown1894 thwakani verjin, yerb karavarovtyan varcabyet@ Sharl Djowpyovin er ew razmakan
 Djovpyovin er yew razmakan nagharare Ogjvovst Myersjen, klxavvor shtapits anhetanovm yen xist kaghtni mi qani pastatghter. Vorosh zhamanak
 pastatxter. Voros zhamanak anc razmakan hetaghvowzovthjan ghyekawar gndabyet Yowber Anrin razmakan naghararowtjany aranc amsatwi yev stvoragrowtyan
 amsatvi ev storakrovtjan nakhnakan pastathvowght e nyerkajatsnowm, orow hasceatiroge texyekatsnowm er, vor vowxarkowm e razmakan gaghtni
 vowxarkvowm e razmakan gaxtni pastathxther. drank ibr haytnapyervel ein gyermanatsi razmakan lrtes gndapet SHvartskvopeni thghtyerovm: Gndabet
 Swartskvopyeni thghthervovm: Kndapyet Fabr@ yev naxararovtjan razmakan porzakete tchana4vowm yen spa Dryeyfowsi dzeragiry Wyerdjins dzerpakalwvowm e
 Wyerdjins dyerbakalvowm e 1894 twakani hvoktemberi 15-inArtaqin kortseri nagharar Ganvotvon chi havatowm nerkayacva& anstvoragir pastathxtyerin
 anstorakir pastathxterin yew dyem e artahajtwowm datakan gorts harovcelvovn, sakajn chi hamardzakvvowm bndel da: Hamvozwac linyervov, or
 Hamozvats linyervow, or Dryejfvowsn anmegh e, na, ajnowamyenayniv, razmakan naghararovthyan teladranqvow korc e harvowtsvovm Razmakan
 harovcovm: Razmakan nakharar Mersjen gndabyet Anrii ev majvor pati dye Klami azdyecowtjamb artahajtwvovm e Dreyfvowsi dem pahangelvov
 Dreyfvovsi dem bahangelvov nran hanznel razmakan dataraninDrnpak datn enthanvovm e Parizvovm 1894 tvakani dyektyemperin. Dreyfvowsi
 dyektemperin Dryejfowsi myexawor linyele hamaroryen pndvovm ein gyeneral Pvovadyefry, nra oknakan genyeral Kvonz@, pati dye Klame, Anrin
 Pati de Glamy, Anrin yev ajlq: Datawvornyere tatanvvowm ein. hancanishyere bavarar 4ein. Ayd gamanak el qnni4e, hamadzajnovthjan kalov
 hamazaynovtyan kalow razmakan naghararvovtjan het, batrastowm e kyexts pastatghter, vorn ibr gryel er kermanatsi desbane` hastatelvow
 desbany hastatelvow Dryeyfowsi hamagvortsakcvovtyovne gyermanacinyeri hyet. Drejfvovsy, meghadrvelvov lrtesvovtjan yew betakan dawatchanovthyan

 vow tokvotriyenolnery. E vitamini shat tarbyer tyesakneric γ-tokvofyervoln amenatara&vatsn e Hyowsisayin Amyerikayi diyetnerowm. γ-tvokofyervol

 jamanakFvovnktsianyer@E vitaminn vowni bazmathiw kensabanakan fvovnktsianyer. E vitamini fvovnktsianyeric amyenakaryewvorn antioqsidantn

 e pdjjajin myembranov, vor@ yew bashtpanvowm e nran tthwetsman vtankits: Sakayn kan ajl fovnktsianer ews, vor nvovynbyes karyewvor yen hamarwvowm.
 karewor yen hamarvovm. α-Tvokofyeroln owni kargavvorox nyerkvorcvovtjvown enzimajin ryeakcianeri wra. Orinak, C prvoteinkinase (PKC),
 protyeinkinasy (PKC),  vore karyevvor e mkanneri aci hamar, karox e arkyelakvi  α-tokvofyervoli koghmic: α-Tvokvoferoln vowni khtanich azdyetsvovtjvown

 tepotva&owtjownpatmvovtyown== &anotagrowtyvovnner 
Spvortajin barahandyesayin paryer, taratyesak zovgaparer, vorosnern ownen jvoxvowrdakan armatnyer: Gatarvel yen
 armatnyer. Katarwyel yen parahandesnyerovm, oronq antskatswovm ein manrahataki arkayvowthyamb sinovthjownnyerowm Elitar bareri pazmazanowthyvovnic
 bareri pazmazanovthjvownic barahandesajinnyeri sarkin en patkanowm ajn baryere oronk pnvovtakrvowm yen 2 aranznahatkowthyvownnyervov bolor
 aranznahatkvowthjownnyerow` pvolvor parery katarwvovm en zvovygerov ew zowyg kazmvowm en tghamard yev kin, bayts kan batsarvowthjownnyer, kani vor Ankliayvovm
 batsarvovthjovnnyer, qani or Angliayvowm ardyen tovjlatrwvowm e parel miaser zvovjkerow «parahandesayin baryer» parakapakcvowthjan tak ajgm haskacwvowm
 tak ajgm haskatsvovm e «sbortajin baryere» (SPP, «spvortayin barahandesayin baryer») yev «parayin sbvort» Da artahaytwovm e tarpyer
 artahajtvvovm e tarbyer parajin kazmakyerbvovthjvovnnyeri anvanowmnyerovm, orinak` «Sbvortayin pareri Mvoskvovjan fyederatsia»:Nyerkayvovms
 fyederacia».Nerkajvovms barahandyesajin bareri sarkin yen patkanvovm 10 tarber paratesakner, bazhanvac` yerkov xmbi: Ampvoghg ashkharhovm
 ghmbi. Ampvoghj ashgharhvovm sbvortajin pareri mrtsvowytner@ pajanwovm yen yerkvow khmbi Ewrobakan (Standard, Modern kam Ballroom), Latinaamyerikyan
 Ballroom), Latinaamerikyan kam nranc hajakh anwanovm yen parayin tasnyak 1960-akan tvakannyerin XSHM-@ stex&yec ir «jvoxowrdakan cragir@»,
 «zhvoghvovrdakan cragir@», or@ katarvvovm er parahandyesnyerovm, isk mrtsvovjtnern ants ein katswvowm incpyes` 2 himnakan, ajnbes el 3 cragrerow.
 ajnbyes el 3 crakryerov. hamabatasghanapar. Ews yerkvow baratesak bvolkan yev mvodajik rvoq@ kazmvowm en 4vorrord hawelyal tsrakir@, ory
 havyelyal tsragir@, ore katarvvovm er norekneri koghmic: YEvrvopakan &rakri medj yen mtnvovm` Wiennakan vals@, qowikstepy (arak foqstrot),
 koviqstep@ (arag fokstrvot), tankvon, dandax fokstrvot Latinaamerikyanvowm` Samba, ca-4a-cha, rowmba, basadvopl, djajv Tevoriabes barahandyesajin

 yvovrahatvovk bari hamalir: YEvrvopakan mshakowtajin zarkatsman oghg entackvovm parahandesayin paryeri wra azdyel yen etnik aghbjowrnyeri pazmazanvowtjvowny,
 aghpyvowrnyeri pazmazanvowthyvowne, inchbes naev prvofyesional paryer@: XX dari barahandesayin barere dewavorvel en yewrobakan pareri himan vra,
 ewrvopakan baryeri himan wra, voronts 19-rd ev 20-rd dareri afrikyan ew latinaamerikyan yerazhstvovtjvown@ yew barajin msakvovyt@ nvor shovnch e
 mshakvovythe nor shovnch e haghordowm: Zhamanakakits parahandesayin baryeri me&amasnvovthyvowny afrikyan «armatner» vovni, vorvonk lav taqtsvats
 owni, orvonk lav takcvac yen ewrvobakan barayin dbrotsi tekhnikakan msakman shnvorhiw: 1920-akannerin Angliajovm` kaysyerakan parvowsowjtsnyeri

DoS (angl. Denial of Service - tsarayowtjan gghtvowm), haqyerayin hardzakvovm hamakarg4ajin hamakarki vra
 hamakargcajin hamakargi vra ajn npatakvov, or hamakarg@ beri khapanman, ajsinqn` paymanneri styegh&ovmn e, orvonts hamadajn hamakargi
 vorvonc hamazayn hamakarki parexightch ogtwoxner@ chyen karox stanal mowtk depi tramadrwa& hamakarki ryesvowrsnery (syerwyernery), kam mvowtk
 (syerwyernyere), kam movtk gorcely djvar e:Nyerkajvowm Dos yew DDoS harzakvowmnern amyenataratswatsnyerits en, kani or nrank tvowyl yen talis
 nrank thvovyl yen talis khapanel kryete tsankatsats hamakark` thvoxnelvov irawapanoren oc hamabatasghan abatsvovytsner.DoS harzakman pashxovmYEte
 hardzakman bashghowmEte ​​hardzakvovmn irakanacwovm e miagamanak myets tvov hamakarkichnerow, apa ayn kvo4wovm e DDoS hardzakvovm (angl.
 DDoS harzakvovm (angl. Distributed Denial of Service - baskhvats carayovtjan gghtowm): Nman hardzakovm e irakanacvowm, ethe bahangvvovm
 irakanacwvovm, ete pahandjvovm e lav pastbanwa& enkerowtyan kam hasarakakan kazmakerbvowtjan &arayvovthyovny ghapanyel Aragin herthin caragvorcy
 Aradjin hyertin caragor&@ tesatsrvovm e me& cancy` hatvowk batrastwats stsyenarneri oknovthjamb, vorvonk bacahajtel er towyl hankovjtsnere.
 thvovyl hangowycner@. Yntrwa& kajqyer@ yentarkvowm yen hardakman, ev 4aragvor&@ stanvowm e administratori iravvovnkner@ Hangowjtsneri
 irawownknyery Hankovjtsneri gravman hamar teghadrwvowm en trvoyakan crakryer, orvonk askhatvowm en kaxtniHima ajdpisis hamakargi4nyerin
 ajdbisis hamakargicnerin anwanvowm en hamakargi4-zombiner yev drancic ogtwoghnyere chyen el karvox kitaktsyel, vor iryenk ownen pvotyencial
 irenq vownyen potentsial hnaraworowtjvovn DDoS harzakmanHadjvorde qajln ayn e, vor 4aragorcy owgharkvowm e orvosaki hramanner krawjal
 voroshaki hramannyer krawyal hamakarkichnyerin yev nrants, vowqer, iryents hyerthin, irakanacnovm en mi hzor DoS hardzakvowm nbatakayin hamakargci
 nbatakajin hamakargchi vra: Goyowthyvown vownen nayew cragryer DDoS hardzakman kamawvor masnktsowtjan hamar Orvos dyebkyerovm, pastaci,
 depqyervowm, pastatsi, DDoS hardzakvovmy aragacnovm e antsankali hetyewanqner, orinak, tyeghadrelow hajtni internet resvowrsneri hxovmnyer
 ryesvowrsneri hxowmner ajnpisis kajkerowm, oronk ktnwowm yen mi syerweri voch ardyvovnawyet hskoxvowtyan tak.Kani vor hatchakh syerwernyeri
 or hachax syerwyerneri wra oktvoxnyeri nyerhvoske gerazantsowm e sahman@, hetewabar serwyer@ karvox e merzhyel hartsowmnerits mi qanis@pashtpanowtyvownTSantsajin
 qanise.pashtbanovthyvownTsantsayin hardakvovmnyeri bastbanowthjan hamar dimowm yen filtreri sharkyeri, vorvonk kapvats yen internet-hervowstaalikin
 intyernyet-hyerowstaaliqin mec tvoxovnakvowtyamb. Ztichner@ gorcovm yen aynpisi yeghanakvov, ory hyetewvoghakanvoryen verlvovcovm e ancnogh cancajin
 vyerlov&owm e antsnvogh cancajin sargowmy` bacahaytyelov voch standart cantsi kortsvovnyeovthjovn@ ev sghalnyer@. Verlow&wa& kaxaparnyervow voc standart
 kaxaparnervow o4 standart tsancayin sargowmnyeri tive nyerarovm e polor ayn nerkayvowm haytni hardakowmnyeri methodner@, ajd thwvovm nayew,
 myethvodnyery, ayd thwovm naew, pot cantser@:Ogtakvortsman npataknerTyeghyekatvakan anwtangvovthyan porzagetner@ bacahaytyel yen mi qani battcharnyer
 en mi kani batjarnyer DDoS harzakvovmn ogtakvor&yelow hamar:Andnakan thshnamanqAjs patchary hachakh tsarajvovm e patrvak xosor arevtrayin
 batrvak` khosvor arevtrajin ew karawarakan kazmakyerbowtjvovnnyeri, in4bes nayev enkyerowtyovnnyeri wra hardakvelvow hamar Ajspyes, 1999
 hamar Ajspes, 1999 thwakani yntatskovm hardzakman en entharkvel HDB wyep-kajker, orvonk awyeli vowsh yeghyel yen anhasaneli sabathner
 anhasaneli sapathnyer sarvownak. Hardakman sarzharith e handisacyel Dashnajin Hyetakhvovzakan TSarayvowtyan kvoxmic haqyerneri dem wyerjyers
 hakerneri dem wyerdjers harzakowme:ZvarcowtjvownAysor aveli shat mardik en hetaqrqrwowm DDoS harzakvowmnyerov, ew bolorn el tsankanovm
 bolorn el cankanvovm en pordel irents ayd kvor&ovm, owsti shat sksnak 4arakvortsner irakanacnvowm en DDoS harzakvovmner zwarjowtjan

 myec hagoxovtyvown byeryec Gabriela Mvonthyesi dere, vorvow na handyes yekaw Bardzragovyn dproci mjovzikl filmvowm:Minchyew ayd na nkarahanwel
 filmowm.Min4ew ajd na nkarahanwyel er kanaci nyerknasoreri kovazdnyervovm ajd isk enkerowtyan hamar: Hyeto nran aradjarketsin nkarahanwyel «Disneji»
 nkarahanwel «Disneyi» hamar ev sranov na sksec ir ergcowhvov kariyeran. Nra arajin albvom@ «V» anwamp thvogharkvets syebtyemperi aragin
 tvogharkwyets septemperi arajin masvowm. Na baymanagir knqec «Hvolivowd rekvordsi» hyet, zajnakrman het kapwac2007 twakani okvostvosin «Teen

 hastatyec, vor handipowm e Zaq Efrvoni hyet:Showbuzz.comSkandal2007 thvakani septemberi 6-in nra skandalajin, merk lvowsankarnere
 skandalayin, merk lvovsankarner@ hajtnvecin internetvovm: USMagazine.comDranits heto na neroxvowthyown khndrec dranc hamar People.com.«Disney

 hyeraxosov: Party.Com.Ua:2010 twakani hovnisin, yerp na harcazrowyts er talis «Glamour» amsagrin, na ankextsatsav, vor der tarabovm e ayn

 erkrnerovm.TSakvovmnapanvovtjvovn«Dvolar» bar@ gyermanakan thalyer drami anvan ankliakanatsva& devn e (@st yeryewvovytin anglyeryen lyezvov e mowtk gortsyel hvolandakan kam daniakan
 hvolandakan kam daniakan «daler» tarpyerakits). Talyere hamatarats dramakan miawor er mignadaryan gyermanakan pyetvovtjovnnervowm yew amboghj
 pyetvovtjvownnerowm ev ampoxj Arevmtyan YEvrobajowm endhanrabes, ayd tvovm ajn jana4vac er Ankliajovm Zhamanakakic asgharhowm «dvolar»
 Zhamanakakits ashxarhovm «dvolar» anvown@ hampaw e dzerq byerel masnavorabes AMN dvolari shnorhiw, ory «dolar» anwanowme krvox pvolvor taradramnyeric
 bvolvor taradramnyerits amyenataracwace ew amyenajana4va&n eOgtagor&ovmDolary tarpyer erkrnyervowm artadrvyel ew srjanarvovtyan myedj

 tmpkahar4artyer== Tsanvothakrowtjovnner 
Hyenri Ford (hvowlisi 30, 1863(1863-07-30), Dirborn, Owyeyn srgan, Michigan, AMN - aprili 7, 1947(1947-04-07),
 7, 1947(1947-04-07), Dirbvorn, Vowyeyn srdjan, Micikan, AMN) amerikaci ardjownaberakan ew biznes magnat, Fvord Mvotor Qvompanii
 Ford Motvor Kvompanii himnadirn ow zangwa&ayin artadrovtjvownowm havakman hoskak&yeri kirarman texnikayi zarkacman hvowanawor@:CHnayac
 zargacman hovanavory:4naja& Forde chi hajtnagortsel awtomobilayin hawaqman hvoskagitse` na naxaktsyel ev artadrel e arajin avtomyekenan,
 arajin avtvomeqenan, or@ karogh ein iryents tvowjl tal migin khavi shat amerikacinyer: Ajd qaylvov Fvordy avtomeqyenan tankarjyek hazwakyvowt
 tankargeq hazwagyvovt ararkayits vyera&ets praktik pvokhadramijotsi, in4e myetsabyes azdyets 20-rd dari batkyeri wra:  Nra` T mvodyel  avtomyeqenayi
 mvodel  awtvomyekyenaji nerkayacovm@ hexapvokhets amerikjan ardyovnapervowtjvownn ov transporte: Orpyes Fvord Mothvor Qvompanii sepakanater`
 Qvompanii sepakanatyer na darzav ashgharhi amenaharovst ew chanachvac mardkantsits mek@: Matcyeli abrankneri artadrvovthyown@, or@ zvowgakcvovm
 artadrowtjowny, vor@ zvowgaktsvowm e asxatvoghneri bardzr askhatavarzvov, i bativ nra kvo4vyec «fvordizm»: Fvord@ glvopal teslakan ovner, vori himkowm
 teslakan vovnyer, vori himkvowm sbarovmn er orbes ghaxaghvowthyan hasnyelow migoc: Nra snorhiw barberapar nwazox gnere azdetsin shat tyekhnikakan
 azdetsin sat texnikakan yev piznes noramvov&vowthyownnyeri vra` nyerarjal franchajzinki hamakarge, or@ thvowyl twyec avtvosrahnyer batsyel
 twets awtvosrahner bacel Hyovsisajin Amerikaji myets masvowm ev vec mayrtsamaqneri xosvor qaxaknyervowm: Fordn ir hskajakan karvoghvovthyan
 hskajakan karvoxvowtyan mets mase thvoghets Fvord himnadramin. kazmakerpvovthyvovny mstabes xyekavarelvow er nra yntaniq@:Forde naew hajtni
 yntanike:Ford@ nayew hajtni e arajin hamashxarhajin batyerazmi tarinyerin ir drsyevora& batsifizmi yev ir «Dirporn Indipendenth» tyertvovm
 Indipendyenth» therthvovm hakasyemakan povandakvovthyamp hodvatsner (nyeraryal Sivoni awaganvov arzanakrvovtjowne) taracelvov hamar: Nran
 taracelvow hamar: Nran mye& chanachvowm e byervowm ir` 1920-1922 thvakakannerin hratarakats «Midjazgayin hryeakanvowthyown» girky:Vagh
 hreakanvovthjovn» kirky:Wagh tarinyerHenri Fvordy cnwyel e 1863 thwakani hvovlisi 30-in Mi4igani Grinfild THavovnship akarakovm: Nra hajry`
 akarakvovm: Nra hayry` Oviljam Fvord@ (1826-1905 thwakanner), &nwel er Irlandiayvowm Kaownti Kvorkvovm: Verjinis @ntaniqe cagowm
 Werjinis entaniq@ tsakvovm er Ankliayi Somyersyet shrdjanic: Nra majry Myeri Fvorde (orivordakan azkanvovn@` Lithokvoth; 1839-1876 thwakanner)
 1839-1876 tvakannyer) tsnvyel er Michiganvowm ev pyelkiakan emikrantneri entaniki krtsyer yeryeghan er; nra &nvoghnyery mahacel ein, yerp
 tsnoghnyer@ mahacyel ein, yerb na der eryegha er yew nran ordyekryel ein harewannery O'Herner@: Henri Fordn ovnyer 2 qovjr` Margaryeth Fordn(1867-1938
 Markaryeth Fvordn(1867-1938 thvakannyer) ow Geyn Fvord@(1868-1945 thvakanner), yew 2 yeghpayr Owilyam Fordn(1871-1917 tvakannyer) vow Rvobyert
 twakannyer) ow Rvopert Forde(1873-1934 thwakanner):Hayre jamatsvowyts e nvirvovm Hyenriin, yerp na dyer yeryekha er: 15 tarekanvowm Fordy
 15 tarekanovm Fvordy kandvowm ev havaqvowm er @nkyerneri ev haryevannyeri jamacvovytsnery bazvowm angamner` stanalvov gamagortsi hambav:
 stanalvov gamakvor&i hampaw: 20 taryekanvovm Forde, 4 mxon qaylelvov, amen kiraki knvovm er irents YEpiskobosakan yekeghetsi:Fordy tsanr harvats
 yekexetsi:Fvorde tsanr harvats statsav, erp 1876 thvakanin mahacaw nra mayr@: Hajrn aknkalovm er, vor Hyenrin wyergapyes ksksi zbaxvyel entanyekan
 ksksi zpaghvel yntanekan akarakvow, bajts na arhamarhowm er kjowghakan ashghatanqy: Hyetakayvowm na krvovm e. «YEs erbyeq cem siryel akaraky,
 erpyeq chyem siryel agarake, es sirovm ei mors,ov ktnvowm er ajdtegh»:1879 twakanin Fordy toghyec hajrakan tvowne Dyetrvojtovm mexaniki
 Dyetroythowm myexaniki ashakert ashxatyelvov hamar: Skzpovm na ashghatowm er Djyeyms F. Flvovovyer yev Pros., apa Detrojth Dray Dvoq Ko @nkerowtyvownnyerowm:
 ynkyerovthyownnervovm: 1882 twakanin na weradarnowm e Dearbvorn @ntanekan agarakvowm ashkhatelvov npatakov: Ajstyex na darnowm e
 Ajstegh na darnvovm e Vesthinkhaovsi shargakan shvogesharzhichi hmowt karavarich: Hyetagayvowm nran vardzvowm yen Wyesthinkhavowsi sokyesargicnyeri
 Westinkhaovsi shvogesargichneri spasarkman hamar: Ajs zhamanakashrdjanovm Fvord@ Dyetrvojti Goldsmit, Prayant yew Sthrathon biznes kolyegvovm svoworowm
 biznyes qolyejvowm svovorvowm e hashwapahakan hashvarowm:Amvovsnowthyvovn yev yntaniqFordn amvowsnatsyel e Klara Jyeyn Prajanthi (1866-1950
 Prayanthi (1866-1950 thwakanner) hyet 1888 twakani aprili 11-in: Nrank hvogovm ein irenc abrvowsty kjowxatntyesovthyamp zpaghwelov
 kjowxatntesovthjamp zbaghvyelvov ew sghvotsaran askhatyecnyelov: Nranq vovnein mek erexa Edsyel Fvordy (1893-1943 thvakannyer):Ashghatankayin kor&vovnevowtjown1891
 gvortsvownevovtyovn1891 tvakanin Fordy darnvovm e Edison Ilyvowminyeytink Qompanii inzhyener: 1893 thvakanin awag injyener darnalvowts
 avag ingenyer darnalovc hetvo na arden ownyen bawarar govmar yev gamanak pyenzinajin shargichneri hyet kabva& ir pordzarkowmnyern irakanatsnyelov
 pordarkowmnern irakanatsnyelow hamar: Ays pordarkovmnyeri kagathnakyete darzav 1896 tvakanin inqnaknac pvokhadramigvoci styeghtsvowme, vore na
 poxadramijotsi styextsovm@, ore na kocets Ford Qvowadrisaykl: Hownisi 4-in texi ovnyecaw dra pordnakan varvovmy: Bazmativ pvordnakan warvovmneric
 pordnakan varvowmnyerits hetvo Fvorde mtakrvohi yeghanakvow porzec ktnyel Kovadrisayqli barelavman ovxinyer:1896 thwakanin Ford@ nerka
 tvakanin Fvord@ nyerka gtnwec Edison Ilyvowminejthing Qompanii xekawarvovthjan handipowmneric mekin, vortyex na &anotatsaw Tvomas Edisvoni
 tsanvotacav Tomas Edisoni het: Edison@ hawanvowthyown tvyec Fordi awtvomvopilayin porzarkvovmnerin: Qagalervelvow Edisvoni hawanvovthjownic`
 Edisvoni havanvowtjovnic Forde naghacowm e yerkrvord pvoghadramijotsy` avartelow ayn 1898 thwakanin : Finansavorvelov Detroyti antaranyovt
 Detrvojthi antaranyvowt ardyovnahanox Vovilyam H. Myerfii koghmits dvovrs e kalis Edison Qompaniic yew 1899 twakani ogvostosi 5-in
 twakani ogvostosi 5-in himnadrovm e Dyetrvoyt Aovthvomvopajl Kompanin: Sakayn artadrwa& myekyenanere Fordi nakhatesatsits aveli pardr
 naxatesatsits awyeli barzr gin ew tsa&r vorak ovnyein: Vyerdjivyergvo, ynkyervowtjvovny hagvoghovthjan chhasaw ew lvov&arvets 1901 thwakani hvownvarin:Harold
 tvakani hvovnvarin:Harvold Ovilsi ognowthjamb Fvordy naghaktsets, karvowcets 26 ziaowzh ownyecvogh avtomeqyena yew 1901 thvakani hoktembyerin hajvoghowthjamp
 hoktempyerin hadjoxvovtyamp ayn nyerkayatsryets mrcavazki gamanak: Vokeshnchwyelvov ayd hajoghovtjamb` Merfin yev Dyetrvojt Avowthomvopajl Kompanii
 Aowtvomvopayl Kompanii myovs pajnyetyerery 1901 twakani nojempyeri 30-in styegh&etsin Hyenri Ford Qvompanin, vori glxawor injyener@ Fvordn
 glghawvor injenyery Fordn er : 1902 tvakanin Myerfin enkyerovthyown e pyerovm Hyenri M. Lyelandin orbes ghvorhrdatvov, inchin i pataskhan
 khorhrdatvow, inchin i batasghan Forde lkvowm e ir anowne krogh ynkerovtjovne: Fvordi knalvovc hyeto Merfin enkyerovthjvowne veranwanovm e Qadilak
 wyeranvanvovm e Qadilak Avowthomobajl Qompani:Miavvorwelvov naxkin mrcavazqajin hyetsanvvord Thvom Kovperi het, Fvordn artadrovm e  80+
 Fordn artadrvovm e  80+  dziaowg ovnecox mrcavazkajin awtomyekena`  «999», or@ Barni Oldfildy varvovm e 1902 twakani hoktyemperin
 thwakani hvoktembyerin ir haghtakan mrtsavazqi jamanak. Fvordy oknowthjvown e stanowm ir waxemi canotic`  Alyeksandr Malqolmsvonits,
 Aleqsandr Malkvolmsvonic, vow Detrojthi shrjanvowm zpaxvvowm er a&xi ardjvownaberovthyamp  Nrank styeghcovm en ynkerovthjovn  «Ford ev
 enkerowtyvovn`  «Fvord ev Malkvolmson SpE»-n, ori nbatakn awtvomekyenanyer artadryeln er. Fordy vorvoshvowm e mat4eli awtomeqyena nakhag&yel,
 avtvomyekena naxaktsyel, yew nranq kvortsaran yen wardakalovm ev pajmanagir knkvovm Jvon ew Horas Dodjyeri awtomasyeri xanovti het, yst
 awtvomaseri khanvovthi hyet, yst vori Fordi @nkervovtjovny avtvobahestamaseri  dimac  mas-mas wcharyelov er 160000 dolar Artadranqe dandagh
 dolar. Artadranke dandagh er iracvovm, ev yerb Dodgyery pahangvowm en apranqi aradjin khmpakanaki vchar@, enkervowtjan tchknajamn awyeli
 ynkervovtyan chgnagamn awyeli e xvoranowm.Ford Motvor KompaniI bataskhan Dvoddjyerin` Malkvolmsvone ynkyerowtjvovn e pyerovm nvor nyerdroghner
 pyervowm nvor nyerdroghner . 1903 tvakani hovnisi 16-in Ford yev Malkvolmsone wyeramiavvorwvowm e orbyes Ford Motvor Qompani  28000 dvolar
 Kvompani  28000 dolar kapitalvow: Skzpnakan himnadirnern ein Forde ev Malqolmsvone, Dvoddj yexpajrnyer@, Malkolmsoni keri DJon Grejy,
 Malqolmsoni qeri Jon Krey@, Malkolmsvoni gor&awar Jejms Qvovowzense ew Malkolmsvoni 2 pastapannere` Jon Andyersvonn ov Hvoras Ryekhyem@ Orvos
 Hvoras Ryekhyem@: Vorvosh zhamanak anc Fvorde nerkayatsnvovm e nor tyekhnvolvokiayvov nakhak&wa& awtvomyekyena   Sovrp Qlyer lchi sarovjtsi wrajvov
 lci sarovytsi wrayvow 39,4 wajrkjanowm  1mghon (1,6 km) antsnyelvov: Aydpisow na  camaqayin arakovtjan nor rekvord e sahmanvovm
 ryekord e sahmanvowm 91,3 mxvon /zh (146.9 km/g) Okyeworwats ajs hagvoxvowthyamb mrtsarsavvord Barni Oldfild@ (hyents na e anvanovm
 (hents na e anwanvovm ays nvor mvodele «999»` i bativ iryenc zhamanaki amenaarak shvokeqarshi) an@ndhat sksowm e warel ays meqenan`
 e varyel ays myekyenan`  Fvordi abranqanise janacheli dardznyelow oghdj AMN-vowm. Batsi ayd, Fvorde nayew Idianapolis 500-i aragin agakitsnyeric
 500-i aragin agakitsnyeric myekn er.T modelT modyely nerkajacwel e 1908 thwakani hoktemberi 1-in Mekenayi ghyeky ktnwovm er zakh

 vorakaworwa& txamard ashghatoghnyeri nvazagvowjn ashkhataward@ pardracrec 2:34-ic dvolarits 5 dolar .Dyetrvojthowm asghatavardy aranc

 kortsnyel irents lawagovyn asghatvoxnyerin: Fvordi kaxakakanowthjowny cvowyc tvyets, or ashkhatavardzyeri barzracovme thowjl kta nra ashkhatvoxnerin

 Fvordy ashkhatawardyeri bardracmane nayowm er vorbes shahowythi baganvovm. ajdpisov na parkewatrvowm er ajn ashkhatvoxnerin, vovqer amyenaardjvovnavetn
 ovkyer amyenaardjovnawyetn ein: Gan varka&nyer, or Jyejms Qoowzensn e hamozyel Fordin kiraryel 5 dvolaranots ashghatavardz@:SHahvowjti irakan
 asxatavardze:Sahowjti irakan baganowm aragarkwvovm er ayn askhatvoxnyerin, vowkyer 6 ew avyeli amis ashghatel ein enkyerowtyownovm, ev amenakaryevvor@,
 @nkerowtjownovm, yev amyenakarevvore, warvowm ein iryents kjanqe Fvordi «Svocialakan stvorabaganman» yndvovna& chapanishnerin hamadzajn: Nrank dyem ein
 hamadzajn: Nrank dyem ein tvownd xmicqneri ogtakvorcmane, mvolakhaxyerin ew «datarkabort» hayrerin (deadbeat dads): Ashghatvoxnyeri standartner@

 skzbowm askhatanqajin er, voros gamanak ants ajn dardaw azat or): Ford Kvompanii korcaranajin banvvornyern ancan 5-orya ashkhatankayin

 Fordi xvoskyervov` na da anvovm er nayew mardasirakan nkatarovmnyerits yelnyelvow.  «Zhamanakn e azatvel ajn gaxaparits, or panvvorneri
 kaghaparic, or panwvornyeri hankisty «kvorcrats zhamanak» e kam dasakargajin artonvovthyovn»:ArhmivovtyownnereFvordn liovin dyem er arhmivowthyvownnyerin:
 er arhmiovtyownnerin: «Im kyankn vow nwachvowmnery»  grki 18-rd klkhvowm na myeknabanowm e arhmivovthyownneri nkatmamp ir verapyermvownk@:
 nkatmamp ir verabyermownke: Forde karcvovm er, or dranc vra chapits sat ein azdvovm orvos liderner, owqer, 4naya& iryenc twacyal bari
 4naja& iryenc tvatsjal pari mvotivnyerin, vergnakan ardjvovnqvovm askhatoghnyerin awyeli shat wnas ein talis, kan ogovt: Arhmiovthjvownnerits
 okovt: Arhmiovthyvownnyeric satere cankanowm ein sahmanapakyel asghatoxnyeri artadrvoghakanovtjown@ zbaxwa&ovthjvovn@ me&acnelvow npatakvow,
 mecacnyelvow nbatakov, pajts Fordy gtnvowm er, vor da korcanarar klini, kani or ardyvownawetowthyowne anhrazhyesht e tsankatsa& tntyesvowthjan
 tsankacats tntyesovtjan barkawatchman hamar:Na hamarvovm er, or artadroxakanvovthjan ajy, in4i hetevanqow kchanovm en asxatategher@,

 wajryerovm: Fvorde naew karcowm er, vor arhmivowthyvownneri aragnvordnere shahaditakan drdabatjarnyervow en pvorboqovm mshtakan social-tntyesakan

 sahovjty: Aynvowamyenajniw, Fvordn @ndvovnvovm er, or sat menegyernyer capic dvovrs wat ein karavarowmits ajs pasty haskanalow hamar: Payts
 haskanalvow hamar: Bajts Forde havatowm er, vor yete ir nman law myenyejerner@ asticanapar karoghanajin azatvyel amen patyeh ew anbateh

 arhmiovtjvownnyer@:Mivovthyenakan gvortsovneovthjown@ kankhyelvow hamar Fvordy Hari Penethin, ov AMN-i razmacovayin vowgyeri nakhkin brncqamartik
 nakhkin brntsqamartik er, nsanakowm e servisi stvorabazhanman xyekawar: Penyethy ahapekman tarbyer martavarvovthjvovnner er kirarvovm`
 martawarovthyownner er kirarovm` arhmiowtyvownnyery vyeratsnyelow hamar: Ajd baykari amyenahaytni midjadyepn e 1937 thvakani mayisi 26-i debqe,

 tvvovm` Vowvolthyer Rovthery) &eckrtovki ein brnvyel: Ayd zhamanak depqi vajrvowm vyerahskox vostikanapyety Garl Brvovqsn er` Peneti syerwisi

 tchakatamart»:1930-akanneri verjovm yew 1940-akanneri skzbvowm Edsel@, ov kazmakyerpowtyan xyekawarn er, mta&vowm er, or hayry stibac
 er, vor hayry stipac e arhmivowtjownneri hyet orvosaki hamadzajnovthyan gal, kani or ajd brnvovthyovnnyere ev askhatanqayin khapanowmnere
 asxatankajin xapanvovmnere hawyerzh 4ein karogh sharvovnakwel: Bajc Fvorde, ow cnaya& kazmakerbvovtyan ghyekawar chlinyelown` deryevs pastatsi
 4linelovn` deryevs pastaci pahpanowm er vyergnakan orvoshman ir iravovnqy, hrazharvvovm e hamagortsakcel: Mi kani tari na sarownakvovm
 tari na sarvovnakvowm e bahel Penyetin` orbyes Fvord Mvothvor Qvompanii asghatankin xarnwyel pordzvogh arhmivovthjovnneri het kabwa& hartseri
 arhmivowthjovnneri het kapvac hartsyeri batasghanatvow: Sorensyeni hovseric parz e darnvovm, vor Fordy Byenetin nsanakyel er patasghanatow, orpyeszi
 pataskhanatow, orpeszi hamvozva& lini, vor voc mi pajmanavorwatsovtyvovn dzyerq 4i pervel:Ford Mvotor Kvompanin Detroyti wergin awtvoartadroghn
 vyerjin avtoartadrvoxn er, vor@ chana4ets Miaworwa& awtoasxatoxnyeri miovtjvowny (UAW): 1941 twakanin UAW miovthyan nstatsovjtsi patcarow
 nstatsvowyci patcarvov pakvel er Riwer Rovzhi gvor&arane (Ford River Rouge Complex): Svorenseny patmvowm e, vor khyelagarwac Fvord@
 or xyelagarvac Fvordy batrast er mincew vyerj gnal @nkyervowtjvowne kor&anman wtangi yentarkelvow, payc chamagorcakcyel: Fvordi kine
 4hamagor&aktsel: Fordi kin@` Klaran sparnvovm e thvoghnel nran, etye wyergins o4ncatsni entanyekan biznyesy: Klaraji kar&iqvov` da 4arger ajn
 karciqov da carjyer ajn qavose, ore ardjownkowm kstyegh&wyer: Ford@ entarkwyets knvoj ovltimatvovmin yev novynisk hetagayvovm endvovnyec,
 hetakayowm @ndvovnec, or knodj orvosvowme tchist er: Mi gisyerwa enthackovm Ford Mvothvor Qompanin amenahamar enddimadir avtvoartadrvoghic
 ynddimadir awtvoartadrvoxic dardzav UAW-i hyet amyenanpastawvor paymannyervov pajmanagir vovnetsvoxy: Pajmanagiry knkwyec 1941 thwakani hvownisin:Fvord
 tvakani hownisin:Ford Eyrplyeyn QvompaniFvordy, ajl avtvomyekyenashinakan @nkyerovtjovnneri nman, mtaw awiatsion biznyes aragin hamaskharhayin
 arajin hamasxarhajin paterazmi jamanak` Libyerti sharzhi4nyer artadrelvow: Patyerazmic heto enkerowthjovny krkin wyeradarnvowm e avtoartadrovthjany,
 e avtoartadrvowthyan@, minc 1925 thwakanin Forde dzyerk e byervovm Sthovovth Myethal Ejrpleyn Qvompanin:Fordi amyenahadjoxva& inqnatiy
 amenahagoghwac inknatie Fvord 4AT Thrimvotorn er, orin &alqawvor metaxakan karvovcwatski batcarov hachax «Anage Sag» ein anvanvovm:

 hakazdecvowtjvowny hamadrvowm er dyowraljvovmini amrowtyan het: Inqnathire nman er Fvokyeri V.VII-3m-in, ew vomanq asvowm en, vor Fvordi ingyenyerner@

 terthi orinaknere.1927 t. Forde ardaratswets:Nvovyn thwakanin namakneri cors hinkervordy,orvonk krwyel ein hreanyeri koghmits hasceagrwats

 namake,ory grwyel e vowrishneri kvoghmic ci storakrel Fvord@,avyelin nra stvorakrovtyovny kyegh&yel er Hyerri Byenety,Forde  erbeq chi vyerakangnel

 amjaki kapaktsvowtyamp nran nvirel e Gyermanakan ar&wi shkanshan- ayn hamarwovm e amenabatwavor shqanshany Kermaniajovm ,vore karvogh

 pvoxnakhagahe nvowjnbes stacyel e nmanatip Kyermanakan arcwi aragin karki sqanshan :1942th:hvovnvari 7–in Fvorde namak krets Hakadifamatsion
 gryec Hakadifamatsion ligayi himnadir yew nakhakah Sigmovnd Livinkstonin: Namaki glxawor npatakn er parzabanel vorvos tjovr kartsikner
 orvos thjvovr karciqner yev batkeratsvowmnyer,oronc het na arn4vovthjvovn e ovnyecel«Cankatsac ghrvowovtyvown ore  karox e ghthanyel tsnamowthjvown
 xtanyel tshnamvowthyvovn hryeanyeri nkatmamb».Na ezrapakyets namak@ hyetyevyal kerp«YEs ankeghtsoren hovsvov em, or ays yerkrvowm incbyes
 or ajs erkrvowm incbyes naew ampoghj asgharhvowm, erp awartvi baterazme kdadari atyelowthjvowne hryeanyeri in4byes naew ajl rassajakan
 in4pes nayew ayl rassayakan ev krvonakan khmberi nkatmamp».Migazgajin biznyesFordi pilisvopayvowthyvovny AMN-i hamar tntesakan ankaxowthyan
 tntesakan ankakhowtyan tesak er: Nra Riwyer Rvowzh Plyenthy dardav asxarhi amename& ardjvovnaberakan kombleqse, vore zktvowm er ir
 kvomblyeksy, vory dgtovm er ir ovxghahajats intekratsovm@ hastsnyel ajnpisi makardaki, or nrank karvoxanan artadrel iryents sepakan bvoxbate.
 irenc syepakan pvoghpate. Fvordi nbatakn er sepakan vowgyerow artadrel poghadramigvoc arants artaqin arewtri wra hvowjs dnelow: Na havatvovm
 dnyelov: Na hawatovm er, vor ir ynkyerovtjvown@ mijazgayin taratsowm kvovnena: Fordy ktnowm er, vor midjazgayin aryewtvowr@ yew hamagor&akcowm@
 aryewtvowre ew hamagor&aktsvovme pyerowm en hamashxarhayin ghaxaxowtjan, yew na oktakvortsvovm er hoskak&ayin gvor&ynthats@ ev T modyeli artadrvovtyovny
 modyeli artadrvovtjvovny da cvowyc talov hamar.1911 tvakanin na batsovm e «Fvord» hvoskagtsyeri gorcaran Mets Britaniajvowm yev Kanadayowm
 Britaniayovm yew Ganadayowm  ev shvowtvow darnowm e ayd yerkrnyeri amyenakhosor avtvoartadroxy 1912 twakanin Fvorde hamakor&akcovm e Fiati
 hamakor&aktsvovm e Fiati himnadir Giowanni Agnelii het` aradjin italakan avtvomat hvosqakcayin korcarannyery stegh&yelov nbatakow:
 styexcyelvov nbatakvow: Kyermaniayowm aragin kvorcarannyer@ karovtsvvovm en 1920-akannerin Herbyert Hvovweri ev Gomyertsion Dyebartamenti
 Gomyertsivon Dyepartamyenti ajakcvowthyamp, vorvonk Fordi hamashkharhayin ghaghaxvovthyan hastatman mej mijazkayin biznyesi eakan dyeri masin
 piznyesi eakan dyeri masin tesovtjan kvoghmnakicnern ein. 1920-akannerin Fvorde gvorcarannyer e bacvowm naev Awstraliayovm, Hndkastanvovm
 Avstraliajovm, Hndkastanovm ow Fransiayvowm, yew ardyen 1929 thvakanin na hajoxvats arewtrakan harabyerovtyownnyer vovner 6 mayrcamaqnervowm
 ovnyer 6 majrcamaqnerovm: Fordy kvomyertsivon bnovjt krox retine blantacianyeri porzarkvovm e irakanatsnvowm Amazvoni Fordlandia kvocvvox
 Amazvoni Fordlandia kvo4wox jvowngliowm: sa Fvordi sakawativ daghvoghovmnyeric mekn er.1929 thwakanin Fordy hamadajnagir e knkvovm Sovyetakan
 hamazaynagir e knkowm Svowetakan Miovthjan hyet Nigni Nvowkorvordi (Gorkvow) mvot gtnvogh aragin svovetakan awtvomopilayin gvorcarani (KAZ) karvovtsman
 kvor&arani (GAZ) karowtsman hamar 9 tari texnikakan agakcvovtyovn tramadryelov masin (1929 tvakani ogvostvosi 23-in korcarani naghaktsman
 gorcarani nakhagcman hamar haweljal pajmanakir e knkwovm Osthin Qvompanii het): Yst baymanagri  gvorcarani ashxatanki aradjin
 kvor&arani asxatanki aradjin 4 tarwa @nthackovm knwelov er 30000000$ arzhoxvoxovtjamb wthari entharkwa& Fvord myeqyenanyer yew pernatarner hawakman
 pyernatarnyer hawaqman hamar, in4ic hetvo gvor&arann astijanapar ancnyelov er xvorhrdajin artadrvowthjan awtvomasyeri: Fordn vovgharkyec
 awtvomaseri: Fordn owgharkyec ir injyenernerin yev teghniknerin Sovyetakan Mivovtyown` sarqavvorvowmnyeri teghadrman harcvowm oknyelvov yev asghatvowj@
 ognyelvow ev ashkhatovgy marzyelvov, minch harjowric awyel khvorhrdayin ingyenyerner ev tekhnikner teghabashxvyetsin Fordi Dyetroythi ew Dirborni
 Dyetrvojti yev Dirporni kvortsarannerovm «ynkervovthjan kor&arannerowm artadrvovtyan methodnyeri ov pordi yev havakman vovsvovmnasirvovthyan
 hawakman owsvovmnasirovtjan nbatakvow»: Fordn asowm er «Nshanakvovthyown cowni, the ortyex e barkawachowm ardjovnapervowthyovny` lini da
 ardyownabervowtyvown@` lini da Hndkastanvovm,Chinastanvovm te Rvovsastanvowm-aydpisvov aweli mec sahvovjth klini bolori ajd thvvovm nayev mez
 bvolvori` ayd thwvowm nayew myez hamar. Oxg ashgharh@ sahman e, voric karyel e inch-vor ogowt qaxyel»:Ardyen 1932 twakanin Fvordn artadrovm
 thwakanin Fordn artadrvovm er voghdj ashxarhi avtvomyeknenanyeri mek yerrvorde: Forde himnadryec bazmatiw dowstr zyernarkovthjvownner, orvonk
 zernarkovthyvownner, oronq havakowm kam wacarowm ein Fvord avtomyekyenanern ow byernatarnere-Fvordi kerbar@ antarbyer 4thvoxets ewropacinyerin
 chthoghec yewrobacinyerin` hatkapes kyermanatsinerin, omanc mot arthnatsnyelov vagh, myvowsnyeri mot` hrapovrvatsvowtjvown yew hiatsmvovnk bvolori
 hrabvowrvacvovthjovn ev hiacmovnk bolvori mot «Fvordizm@» qnnarkox kermanaciner@ hajax hamarowm ein, or da irenits nerkajatsnvovm e tibik amerikjan
 nyerkayatsnovm e tipik amerikjan in4-vor ban: Nrank ditarkovm ein Ford Vorksvovm nerkayatswogh artadrvowthyan chapere, tembe, standartatsovmn
 tyempe, standartacvovmn vov pilisopayvowtjvovne vorbyes azkayin &arajvovtyown «amerikjan ir», vor@ artacolvovm er AMN-i mshakvovyth@
 er AMN-i msakvovyte Ew koghmnakicner@, ev knnadatner@ bndowm ein, or fvordizm@ marmnavvorowm e amyerikyan kabitalizmi zargacvowm@,
 kabitalizmi zargacovmy, yev AMN-i tntesakan yew svocialakan harabyervovthyvownnery haskanalvow panalin awtvomopilayin ardjvownabervovthjvovnn
 ardjownabyerowtjvovnn er Mi germanaci patsatryel e- «Avtvomyeqenanern livowin pvokhel en amerikatsinyeri aprelakyerb@. ajsor dzhwar
 abrelakerp@- aysor djwar e batkeracnel nrancits inch-vor myekin arants mekyenaji Dzhwar e vyerhisyel, tye in4pisin er kyanqy min4 ajn,
 er kjanky minch ajn, erb Paron Forde sksyec taratsel «prkowthjan» ir hamozmvovnqnyer@» Sat kyermanacineri hamar Fvordy marmnavvorvowm
 hamar Fvorde marmnavvorvowm er hagvoxvac amyerikanizmi eowthyvowny.«Im kjanky yew nvacvovmnery» grqowm Ford@ kankhatyesowm e, vor yetye akahovtyvovne,
 vor yethye akahovthyovn@, rasizme yew anheratesowthyvowne haghtaharvyen, aba tntyesakan yew tyekhnolvogiakan zarkacvowmy voxdj ashxarhovm khasni
 voxdj ashxarhowm khasni ajn ketin, or midjazkajin arevtvovre ajlyews himnwa& chi lini gaxvovtayin kam nyevogaghvowthajin mvodelneri vra,
 nevokaghovthayin modelneri wra, ev pvolvor mardik iskapyes ksahen dranits: Krqi ajs masovm nra gaghaparnyern anoros ein, payts idyealistakan:MrtsarshavnyerFordy
 idyealistakan.MrtsarshawnerFvord@ sharvovnakowm er hyetaqrqrwyel avtvomrcarsavnyerow 1901-1903 thwakannyerin ev sksowm e nerkravwel sbvortvovm ew!
 nyerkrawvel sportowm yew! orpyes karowcvogh, yew! vorpes varord. hyetakajovm sksvovm e nayev varvordnyer wardel. Na mrcarsavnyer nyermvov&yets
 mrtsarshawner nyermvowcets sarkits dowrs ekac T modelnyer, vorov ev haxthovm e 1909 thvakani «owkianosic owkianvos» (ajn endkrkowm er
 owkianvos» (ajn @ndkrkvovm er AMN-i voxj tara&ke) mrtsarsavvovm (hetagajovm orakazrkvvovm e): Miagamanak 1911 thvakanin Dyetroythi covtsahandyesaajin
 Detrojti cvovcahandesaajin hamalirovm mrtsasavord Frenk Govlike T modyelvov dyewazev arakowtjan rekvord ardanakryets mek mxvoni wra (1,6
 ardanagryets mek mxvoni vra (1,6 km): 1913 tvakanin Fvorde pordzec Indianabvolis 500 mrcarsaw nermov&yel dzyevapvokhwac model T meqyenanyer, bajts
 modyel T myekyenaner, bajts myergowm stacav. myekyenayi qas@ 1000 fvowntvov (450 kg) kich er nvormayic: Ford@ dvovrs mnats ayd mrtsasarits
 dovrs mnac ajd mrcasharic yev shvowtvov liowin dadarets masnaktsyel mrcarshavyerin` djgvohelov spvortayin kanvonnerits yev pattcharabanelov, vor
 ev batjarabanelvow, or modyel T-eri` hskajakan masstapneri hasats artadrovthjowny xlvovm e ir voghdj gamanak@, ev  na mrcarshawnere
 jamanaky, yev  na mrtsarsavnyere animast kvortsvownyeowthjovn e hamarvovm:«Im kjanke ev nvachvovmner@» krkvovm Fvord@ pavakanin arhamarhakan tonov
 bavakanin arhamarhakan tvonvow e xvosvowm mrtsarsawnyeri masin, hamarelow, or ayn avtomekyenayi knahatman shat sxal midjvoc e: Na iren nyerkayacnvowm
 Na iryen nyerkajacnovm e orbes meke, ov 1890-1910-akan thvakannerin stibwac e masnaktsel mrtsarsawnerin, qani vor keriskhvogh antexyakvovthyan
 gyerishghvogh antyexjakovthyan patcharov kartsik er tara&vyel, or mrtsarshavnyer@ meqyenaji arjeqy apacovtsyelvov janabarh yen: Fvorde hamadzajn
 canaparh en: Forde hamadzajn cer: Pajc na orosyec, vor kani der da hagoxvowthyan marmnatsvovm er hamarvvowm (sxalakan, payts ajnvowamyenayniv
 pajts aynovamyenajniw aydpyes er sahmanwats), apa ir myeqyenanery klinyen lavagvowjny mrcarsawnyervovm: Voghg krqvowm na sarovnakabar
 grkovm na sarovnakabar andradarnovm e transbvorti, artadrvoxakanvowthjan ardjvownavetowthjan, matchelivowtjan, hvovsalivowtyan, wareliki
 hvowsaliovthjan, vareliki ardyvovnawyetvovthyan, tntyesakan barkawatchman ev gyovghatntesovtjan vov ardyvovnabervovtyan olortnerovm &anr asghatanqi
 volortnyerovm &anr asxatanqi awtomatatsman gaghaparnyerin, payc shat hazwadyeb e nsowm parzabyes A ketic B kyet arag hasnelvow mitke:Ajnowamyenajniw,
 mitqy:Ajnvowamenayniw, Forde ir mrcarsavajin tarineri @ntackvovm me& azdyetsvovtyvovn toxets awtvomrcarsavneri vra, yev 1996 thvakanin
 wra, ev 1996 thvakanin na ir tyegh@ ktav Amyerikaji mvotvospvorti parqi dahlitchowm:Vovsh ashxatankajin gvorcvownyevovtjownn ov maheYErb
 gorcvownyevovtyvownn ov maheYErb 1943 thvakani mayisin Ford Motor Kompanii naxakah Edsyel Ford@ mahatsaw kaghtskeghits, taryets yew vatarvoghg Henry
 taryec yew watarvoxj Henr@ Forde vorvoshets standnyel naxakahvowthyovny: Ir kyanqi ayd pvovlvowm na ardyen mi kani srtanothayin kathvacner
 srtanothajin kathwacnyer er taryel (nswvovm yen vorpes srti katvacnyer kam insvowlt) ew patsi ayd, dardzel er kaskatsamit, hokyebyes anhawasarakshrvats
 hvokyepes anhawasaraksrwa& yew yndhanrabes i witchaki cher ajdbisi mec bataskhanatvowthyvown krel:Tnorennyeri mets masy dem er nra naghagahvovthyany:
 nra naghakahvowtyan@: Bajc 4najats naghvord 20 tarineri @ntatsqowm na voryewe ghyekavar pashtvon cer zpaghecnvovm, Fordy misht el pastatsioryen
 mist el pastatsivoren wyerahskovm er enkyervovthjvovn@: Khvorhowrdn ov ghyekawarowthjowne svovvorabar nran hnazandvvowm ein, yew ajd depqy
 hnazandwowm ein, ew ayd debky patsarowthjvovn ceghav: Tnoryennern yntryets Fvordin, yev na naxagahets min4ev batyerazmi avart@: Ajd jamanakashrdjanvovm
 Ayd jamanakasrganowm enkervovtyovn@ sksyets ankvowm abrel amsakan kvortsnyelov 10 milivon dvolar: Nakhakah Franklin Rovzwyelti warchakazmowm
 Rowzwyelti warchakazmvowm qnnarkwowm er batyerazmakan artadrovtyan sharovnakman abahvowman nbatakov karavarvovtjan kvoxmits Ford ynkervowthyovne
 kvoghmits Fvord ynkerovtyovne wyerahskvoxovtjan tak arnele, sakayn kaxaparn ajdpyes el chiragvorcwyets:Wattaratsogh arvoghgvovtyan patjarow Ford@
 arvoxgvowthyan patjarov Forde 1945 thwakani septyemberin zidjovm e naxakahvowthyowny thorany Hyenri Ford II-in yew antsnvovm thvosaki: 1947 thvakani
 toshaki: 1947 thwakani aprili 7-in Dirbvornovm` ir Fyeyr Lyeyn akarakvowm,vovghyeghayin aryvovnazyeghman patcarov mahanovm e Fvord@. ayd
 mahanovm e Fvord@. ajd jamanak na 83 tarekan er: Hanrayin hvovxarkavorovtjovny texi ownecav Krinfild gjowghovm, ortyegh amen jam
 gjovxvowm, ortyegh amen zham mvot 5000 mard er ancnowm nra ajyownasapvori motow: Sgo araroxovthyownner@ irakanacwyecin Dyetrvoyti tacari
 irakanacwecin Detrvojthi tajari Sb. Pol yekyeghecovm ew na taxwets Detrojthvovm ktnvvox Forderi kyeryezmanatany:== Tsanvothagrowthjovnnyer 
Dvoov-Jonsi ardjownabyerakan cvovtsanis (angl.` Dow Jones Industrial Average, hnc-: [ˌdaʊ ˈdʒoʊnz ɪnˈdʌstɹɪəl
 ˈdʒoʊnz ɪnˈdʌstɹɪəl ˈævəɹɪdʒ]), fondayin tsvowtsanisnerits mek@, vor styeghtswyel e The Wall Street Journal  amsakri khmpakri yew Dow
 amsakri khmpakri ev Dow Jones & Company @nkerovthyan himnadir Carlz  Dvoowi kvoghmits (ankl.` Charles Dow).Tsovcanishi masinDoow-Gonse
 Dow):Tsovcanisi masinDovow-Djonsy hamarwvowm e koyowthjvown vownecogh amerikjan shovkayakan tsvovtsanishnyerits amenahin@: Ajs cvowtsanis@ styextswel
 Ays covtsanis@ stextswyel e amyerikjan fondayin svowkaji zargatsvovme hetevelov hamar.TSvowcanishe nyerarowm e AMN-i 30 ghvosvor @nkyerovthjvownnyery:
 xosor @nkyervowthjovnnyere «Ardjvovpyerakan» anvanowm@ batmakanvoryen e trwa& nyerkajovms cvowcanisvowm nerarwats ynkyervovtyvownnyeri mye&amasnowthyvown@
 enkerovthyovnneri metsamasnowtjovn@ 4i batkanowm ayd volvortin. Skzbnakanvovm cowtsanishy hashvwovm er vorpyes enkyerovtyan bazhnyetvomseri kni thvapanakan
 bazhnyetomsyeri gni thwabanakan migin: Hima haswarki hamar ogtagorcvvowm e lajna&awal migin`gneri kvovmar@ paganvovm er bazhanarari wra,
 pazhanwovm er paganarari vra, or@ amyen ankam poghwovm e, yerb cvowtsanisi mej nerarvac pazhnetvomsyere yentaka en linvovm masnatman kam miavvorman:
 masnatman kam miaworman: Sa tvowyl e talis pahpanyel tsvovtsanishi ev nra kazmvowm nyerarwats bagnyetomseri hamadryeliowthyvown@PatmvowtjvovnTSvowcanisi
 hamadrelivovtyownypatmovthyvovnTSvovcanishi aragin tarbyerakner@ haytnvyel yen 1884 thvakanin ev nerarovm ein erkathg&ayin yev yerkvov ardyvownapyerakan @nkerowtjownneri
 ardjvovnabyerakan enkerovthjovnneri bajnetvomseri kner@: Covcanisi ajs tarpyerak@ 4i hrabarakwel yev &arayel e miajn nerkin werlowtsowtyan hamar.
 verlvovcvovtyan hamar Aragin ankam tsvovtsanish@ hrabarakvel e 1896 twakani majisi 26-in arden isk «ardjvownapyerakan» anvanvovmow:
 «ardyvownapyerakan» anvanvovmvow. Ayd pahin tsvowcanish@ nyerkajatsnowm er 12 amyerikjan ardyvovbyerakan ynkerowthyovnnyeri pajnetomsyeri kneri twabanakan
 bazhnetvomseri kneri tvabanakan midjiny, orontsits nyerkayis tsovtsanishowm nyerarvac e miayn «General Electric» ynkerovtjowny: Dranic paci
 enkyerovtjvowny. Dranits paci tsvovcanisi meg nyerarwa& ein hetyevjal enkerowthyvovnnereAmerican Cotton Oil Company, Bestfoods @nkervowthjan
 Bestfoods enkerovtyan nakhordy, vorn ajsor Unilever enkerowtyan mi masn eAmerican Sugar Company, ayjm Domino Foods, Inc.American
 Foods, Inc.American Tobacco Company, masnatwac 1911 tvakaninChicago Gas Company, gnwats Peoples Gas Light & Coke Co. enkervovtyan
 Coke Co. ynkerowtyan koxmits 1897 thvakanin (ayzhm Peoples Energy Corporation)Distilling & Cattle Feeding Company, ajzhm Millennium
 Company, ajzhm Millennium ChemicalsLaclede Gas Light Company, The Laclede Group anovnov goyvovthyvown vownyetsvoghNational Lead Company,
 ovnecvoghNational Lead Company, ajjmNL IndustriesNorth American Company, masnatwats 1940 thvakaninTennessee Coal, Iron and Railroad
 Coal, Iron and Railroad Company,knvats U.S. Steel enkerowtyan kvoxmits 1907 thwakaninU.S. Leather Company, dadaryel e kvoyvovthjovn
 dadaryel e gojovthjvovn ovnenal 1952 tvakaninU.S. Rubber Company, anwanapoghvac Uniroyal 1967 tvakanin yev  gnvats Michelin enkyervowtjan
 Michelin enkyervowtyan kvoghmits 1990 thwakanin1916 thvakanin @nkervovtyownnyeri qanake hastswyets 20-i, isk 1928 hvoktyemberi 1-in` 30-i:
 hvoktyemperi 1-in` 30-i Himnakanvovm cowtsanishi vyerahasvarki zhamanak amyen angam poxvvowm e 1-2 enkyervowthjvovn: «Amyenabowrn» jamanakahatvatsy
 «Amenabovrn» jamanakahatva&e yeghel e 20-rd dari 30-akan thvakannyerin` Myets tchgnazhamin: 1930 tvakani howlisi 18-in covcanishowm pvopvoghvecin
 cvowcanishvovm pvopvoxwyetsin miangamic yvoth ynkyerovtjvovnnyer, isk 1932 thvakani mayisi 26-in ovth. Erkov jamanakahatvats e yexel miayn
 gamanakahatwats e exyel miajn (1939—1956 ew 1959—1976 tvakannyer), vor 17 tari cvovcanishi kazmvovm voc mi ynkerowthyan popokhvowthyvown 4i eghel:Tsowtsanisi
 pvopvoghovtyvown chi yeghyel.Cowtsanishi arajin hraparakwac arzhyek@ exel e 40,94 1000 tarrerits nsane, ore pwatchwyec 1966 thwakani skzpin, 15 tari
 thvakani skzbin, 15 tari darzaw sandxaki gakatnakyete, vori @nthatskvovm tsvowcanishe krets chvors dagan «argajin» mitvowmner, srgancelvov
 mitvovmner, srjantsyelow ir arzhyeky midjinvowm yeryek angam: 80-akannyerin, ev hatkapes 90-akannyerin nkatwec tsvovtsanisi bvovrn ac 1995
 tsvowtsanisi bovrn ac. 1995 thwakani noyemperi 21-in ayn arajin ankam hatyec 5000-i sahman@(5023,55), isk 1999 thwakani marti 29-in
 thvakani marti 29-in 10000-i arjeky hatyets(10 006,78) Endameny myek amis ants 1999 twakani marti 3-in, covcanishi arzheqy hasav
 tsvowtsanisi arjeqy hasav 11 014,70-i. 2000 twakani hovnwari 14-in Dvoow-Gvonsi cvowcanisi argek@ hasaw ajd bahin egha& arawelakvowyn
 pahin yexats aravelakowjn argyeqin`11 722,98. Ajnowhyetyew cvowtsanisi arjyeqe sksyec ynknyel yev 2002 twakani hoktyemberi 9-in  hasaw nvazagvowyn
 9-in  hasav nwazagvowjn argyeki`7286,27: 2013 thvakani martin arjyeqe hatets sahmanwa& orakan rekvorde , hasnyelvow 14198,10-i:Patmakan

 talis watagowyn tarinere sksa& 1885 thvakanic, dasaworva& popvokhvovtyan tvokosayin asticanvov:Aghpjovr@ Dow Jones & CompanyTHyervowtyownnerDovov-Jonsi

 carajowthjown)SMS-neri lezvovn kam Textese-@ (hajtni e naev chatspeak, txt, txtspk, txtk, texting language kam txt talk anvanvovmnyerov) anklyeryeni
 anvanvowmnyerow) anglereni garkvon e, orn ogtagvor&wvovm e pgdjajin heraxvosneri SMS-nyerowm, sotsialakan tsancerovm yew anhapax haghordagrman
 anhapagh haghordagrman gamanak: Da ankleryeni hamarot dev e nman rebus-in (predictive text)-i kirarman astichanakan avelacman
 astichanakan avelacman het dra kirarovmy nvazvowm e: Nman lezvovn o4 misht e entarkwvovm kam hyetevovm @ndvovnwac anklyeryeni qyerakanakan
 angleryeni qerakanakan kanonnerin. Avyelin` ajs hamakargovm kortsa&wats paryer@ karvogh yen pacakajel svoworakan bararannerowmNshanakowtjvovneTextese-i
 pararannyervovmNsanakvowtjvovnyTextese-i nbatakn e oktagorcel hnaravorins qich granshannyer haskanali haxordakrowthyvown pvoxantsyelvow hamar. Owsti`
 pvokhancyelov hamar. Owsti kyetadrowthjan, kyerakanovthyan yew mecataryervow vovxghagrvowthjan kanonnere hajagh antyeswvovm yen. Ays taralezvown
 en. Ays taralyezvovn vovni pvoqrativ hiervoglifner (irazyekwatsnerin haskanali kvoder) yew mi sarq taratesakajin paymanansannyer.
 taratyesakayin baymananshannyer: Yst hetazotovthjvownnyerits meki theyew ajs taralezvov awyeli arak karyeli e gryel, ajn kardalow hamar aweli
 kardalow hamar avyeli erkar gamanak e pahandjvowm, kan soworakan anglyeryenvov. @st doktvor Nanag Qyembi (Thasmaniayi hamalsaran)
 (Thasmaniayi hamalsaran) hyetazotvovtjvovnneri Textese-i zarkatsowmn anqaktyelivoryen kabwats e qyerakanvovthjan vow hn4jvownabanovthjan xvor
 hncjvovnabanvowtyan ghor ymprnman hyet.patmvovthyownTextese-n angleryeni dewavvorwvogh barbar e` gerhamarot barer ew artahajtvowthjownnyer
 ev artahajtovthyvownnyer kazmelow hamar tareri vow thvyeri ansowvor paymanakan kirarmamp: Barpari &akovme karyeli e kapel pjdjaheraghvosayin
 kapyel pdjjaherakhvosayin haghordakrvowthyownneri stexcman hyet, teyev grarman elibtik (sghman) hamakarge styexcwel e anwazn telegraphese-i
 anwazn telegraphese-i (herakrayin lezwi) orerin. SMS-neri lyezvvov kryelow standart kanonner ckan, sat barer karox yen naew krchatwyel,
 karvogh yen naew krcatvyel, orinak "text" bare karox e vyera&wyel "txt"-i: Paryern aveli karj darznelvov hamar drancvowm karvogh en ogtakvortswel
 karvogh en oktagortsvyel naew twer, orinak"later" pary karvox e krwel "l8r" teskov: Ajs lezvown aragatsnovm e baryeri grarovm@, npastvovm
 bareri grarvowme, nbastovm e tareri thvi aravyelakowjn krjatmany yew teqstajin haghvordman taracqayin sahmanapakman khndri lvovtsmany:Ajn
 xndri lov&manyAjn nman e AOL speak ew Telex speak lyezvovnyerin ev &agyel e internetajin zrvowcasrahneri (chatroom) sxagrajin
 (chatroom) sxakrajin tarperakic, or@ betq e harmarver towjlatrvats kranshannyeri pvoqr twin (vagh shrdjani SMS-nervowm karyeli er
 SMS-nyervowm karyeli er oktakvor&el yndamene 160 gransan, isk voros prowaydyerner vcar@ gandovm yen est vovxarkvats kranshanneri) yev
 vovgharkwa& gransanneri) yev harmar lyezov er pgdjaheraghosneri pvoqr stexnasharneri hamar.Barayin kazmMyek tar@ karox e pokharinel parinbe
 pokharinel barinbe pary darnovm e bsee bar@ darnovm e care par@ darnovm e ryou bare darnvovm e uwhy pare darnowm e yMyek

AMN dvolar (nshan $, arzhovjthi kvod` USD,  krchat krarvowme` US$, incbyes naev hishatakwvovm e orbyes dolar, AMN
 e vorbes dolar, AMN dolar kam amerikyan dolar), Miacyal Nahankneri Sahmanadrovthjan hamazayn` AMN-i ev nra tara&knyeri bastvonakan
 taratsqnyeri bashtonakan arjovythn e sksa& 1792 tvakanits. Myek dolar@ hawasar e 100 centi (¢), sakajn yerbyemn haswarman hamar ogtagortswvowm
 hashvarman hamar ogtagorcvowm e naev 1$=1000₥ (mill): Shrganarvogh tghthadramnyer@ paxkatsa& en Dashnayin bahowstajin fondi bankvotnyeric, vorvonk
 fvondi bankotneric, voronk vyeranvanvyel en AMN dvolar:AMN dvolare aravyel hacakh oktagor&vvowm e mijazkajin gorcarqnervovm, inchvov  baymanavvorvats
 incow  baymanaworvats ajn  handisanvovm e himnakan bahvovstajin arjvovjth : 1971 tvakani dadarits hyetvo orosh erkrnerowm ayn oktagvor&wvowm
 yerkrnerovm ayn ogtakvorcvowm e orbyes  pastonakan arjowyth, isk sat ayl yerkrnerowm ajn bashtvonakan argovyth e Patsi Miacjal Nahanknerits,
 Miatsyal Nahangnerits, ayn orbes miak argvovjt  ogtagvorcwvowm e nayev  Karibyan awazani  yerkov britanakan  taratsknervowm Britanakan
 taracqnyervowm Pritanakan Wirdjinia,  Thyrks yew Kajkvos kzghinowm. Mi kani erkrnyer oktagortsowm en dasnovtyan bahovstajin txthadramnyer@
 pahvowstajin thghthadramnere , dra hyet myektyegh  toxarkvovm en iryenc sepakan metaxadramnere, kam el @ndovnovm en amyerikjan metaghadramnyer@
 amyerikyan myetaghadramnyer@ (inchbisiq en  sakakavean kam nakhagahakan dvolar@) 2018 thwakani hvovnisi 27-i drvowtjamb, shrdjanarvowthyan
 drvovtyamb, shrjanarowtyan meg e yexel mot 1,67trilivon $, orits 1,62trilivon $-y Dashnvowtjan pahvovstajin tghtadramnerow(mnatsa& 50pilivon
 thxthadramnervov(mnacac 50bilivon $-@ myetaxadramnyerov).AknarkAMN sahmanadrowthjan hodva& 1, bagin 8-ow sahmanvowm e, or Konkryese ishghanovtjovn
 Gongryes@ isghanowtjovn vovni pogh thogharkelov Ajs isxanvovthyvowne sahmanvogh orenqnyere aygm  nerkayacva& en Miacyal nahanknyeri orenskrqi
 nahanknyeri orensgrki 31-rd klxi 5112-rd  pazhnovm, orow  nakhatesvvowm e dolari togharkman himnakan zever@  5112-rd pagni hamadzajn
 5112-rd bagni hamazajn  irakanatswvovm  e  nayev ajl metaghadramneri thvoxarkowme, voronts argeq@  mek cyentits  e hasnvowm min4yew 100dolari
 hasnowm minchyew 100dolari Sahmanadrowthyovne naghatyesvovm e ` «barpyerapar  hrabarakel hanrajin poxyeri mvovtkeri ew yelqeri hyerthakan
 mowtqyeri yev yelkeri hyertakan hashwyetwovthjvovny yew hashiv@» : Ays drvovjthe Sahmanadrovthyamp hstakecvvovm e Miacyal Nahanknyeri orensgrki
 Nahangneri oryenskrki 331-rd pajni 31-rd vernagrvowm:  Tyexyekakrvowm nswats govmari 4apy ajjm artahajtvowm e AMN dvolarov, (orinak`
 AMN dolarvow, (orinak nayyel 2009thwakani AMN finansakan hashvyetwvowthjown@)«Dolare»  Sahmanadrvovtyan aragin glkhi 9-rd pazhni
 aragin glxi 9-rd bajni 1-in hodvatsvovm nerkajacwac tyerminneric mekn e. Dolar@ sahmanvowm e hyetyevjal kerp- ayn ispanakan dolari
 ajn isbanakan dvolari himan vra styegh&vac  myetaghadram e, orn owni  8 ispanakan arjovyti kam realin hamarzhek dramakan argyeq
 hamarjek dramakan arzhyeq 1972 thvakanin Miatsyal Nahangnyeri Gvongryesy hastatyets «dramakan orenk@»: Ajd oryenki 9-rd pazhnvov tvovjlatrvowm
 bajnvow tvowjlatrvowm e tarpyer metaxadramneri artadrvovthyowne, ayd thwvowm «dvolar kam yovnion», orvoncic yowraqanchyvowr@ betk e
 jvowraqancyowry byetk e lini argoghvovtyamb hamargeq isbanakan  dvolarin, inchbes  hima e, yev parownaki yeryeq harjvowr jvothanasovn mek
 haryowr jvotanasvown mek gran ev cvors tasnvecyervord mas@  maqovr gran, kam chors harjvovr tasnwyets kran standart ar&at». Orenki 20-rd
 arcat» Oryenki 20-rd bajine naghatesowm e, vor Miatsjal Nahangnyeri hasvarkajin gvowmary artahaytwi dvolarov kam jvovnitow, ev  pvolor
 kam jvownithvov, ev  bvolvor hasivnyery betakan hastatowtyvovnnerovm byetq e pahven yev irakanacvyen ajd kanvonnyeri hamadajn. Ajl kyerb asac
 hamazajn Ayl kerb asats ajs oryenky canachovm e AMN dvolare vorpyes Miatsyal Nahanknyeri miasnakan arjvowjtI  tarbyervowtjovn isbanakan
 tarpervovtyovn isbanakan dvolari AMN dolari himkovm arzhvowyti tasakan hamakargn e. I havelvowmn dvolari` dramakan orenke vorpyes dramakan
 oryenky vorpyes dramakan miavvor  pashtonabyes  sahmanowm e  mill@ kam 1/1000 dolar@ (nsanakowme ₥), centy kam 1/100 dvolary (nshanakvovm@
 dvolary (nsanakvovme` ¢), in4bes naev deman kam 1/10 dvolary, arcive kam 10 dolary nerkajatsnyelow kas@ yev oskow, arcati, bvoxbati
 oskvow, arcathi, poghbati kazme jowraqan4jovri hamar: 1800-akannyeri kyesyerin arajarkvyec 100dvolar@ nyerkayatsnyel orpes  «yownivon»:
 nerkajacnyel vorbes  «yvownion» Aynvowamenayniv, orpes dolari taratesak, amyenorya kirarvowtjovn vowni miajn cyent@, isk dyemin oktakortsvvowm
 isk demin oktagvor&wowm e miayn vorpes 10¢ metaghadrami anwanovm, mincder artsiwy kam mille hanrovtyan shrdjanaknyervovm haytni chen,
 srdjanaknyervovm haytni chyen, sakajn miller@ hachax ogtagvorcvvowm en harkayin wcharnyeri parakayovm, isk penzine, vorbyes kanon,  nerkayacwovm
 kanvon,  nyerkajatsvvowm e $X.XX9 jvovraqanchjvovr kalvony, orianak  $3.599 hajakh krarvowm e  $3.599⁄10 tyeskvov.  Nyerkajvovms thvoxarkwvovm
 Nerkayovms togharkwovm yen  mek dolaranoc myetaxadramnyer yew tghthadramner, cnayac tghtajin tarpyerakn aveli shat e handibvowm. Nakhkinowm
 handibvowm Nakhkinovm thghtadramnyere anwanakan arjyeqic avyeli cacr ein sahmanwvowm,  qan dvolar@ (haraberakan arjvovjt), isk  oske
 arjowjth), isk  oskye myetaghadramner@ sahmanwvowm ein  $20 -ic awel  arjyeqi dyebqvowm (1930 twakanin arjezrkvac krknaki arciw@).
 arjezrkwats krknaki artsiwy) «Arciw»  terminy ogtakortswyel e  1792 twakani dramakan oryenqovm $10 anwanakochyelis , isk hetagayovm oktagvor&wovm
 hetagajovm ogtagortsvvowm er voskye metaghadramneri het Mek dvolaric avyeli qic anwanakan arzhekvow tghtadramnyery haraberakan argvowjthnere,
 harabyerakan arzhvowytnere,  hajagh anwanwvovm ein «ca&rarjyeq kam sin&ov»  pvogher 1854 twakanin DJejms Katrin ajd jamanak finansneri
 ayd gamanak finansnyeri naxarare, arajarkyec thvogharkel  $100, $50 yew $25 voske metaxadramnyer, vorvonk anvanakvochwvovm ein hamapatasghanapar
 ein hamabataskhanapar «yovnivon», « kyes yvownion»  yev « qarord yownion» sahmanelov  1jvovnivon=$100: Nerkayovms AMN tghtadramnyery
 Nyerkayvowms AMN thghtadramner@ batrastvovm en pampaki manratyelerits, i tarpervowthjvovn shat hatchax handipvox tghti, ore batrastvvowm e payti
 batrastwovm e payti taseghnerits Miatsjal Nahangneri metaxadramnyery hatvovm e Miacjal Nahangneri dramahatarany. Isk amyerikjan
 dramahataran@ Isk amerikjan dolary tpakrvowm e Pvorakrovthyan yew tpakrowthyan pjovroyi koghmic yew 1914 thwakanits pac  thoxnvvowm Dasnajin
 pats  thoghnvvovm Dasnayin pahvowstajin hamakarki koghmic:Amyenamets capsyern ownetsvox thghthadramnyere tvogharkwyetsin min4 1928 thvakan@ 188,5
 minc 1928 thwakane 188,5 x79,4 mm caperov, ajd tarinyerin toxarkwats pvoqramasstab txthadramnyer@ ovnein 155,96x66.29x0.11mm 4apyer:
 155,96x66.29x0.11mm chaper. YErp nerkayis pvoqramasstap argovyty patrastvyec, ajn anwanako4wets  filipinyan chapservov arzhvowjt, kani vor
 chapsyerow argvowyth, kani vor Filibinnyervowm  aveli wax thvoxarkwvovm er  nvovjn chapsyerow arjowjt@` filibinjan bessvonStvowgabanowthjvown16-rd
 pyesson.Stvowkapanowtyovn16-rd darvovm, Bohyemiayits  Hyenvonimi SHikt@  sksyets toxarkel metaxadramner, vorvonq hajtni en orpes DJoakimstaler

 thagavvorvovthyan mas). Goakimstale hetakayvowm pvogharinvets kermaneryen Taler-vow , mi par , vory werjiwerjvo statsav ir hamarjyek  tarpyeraknere
 hamarzheq  tarperakner@ sat lyezovnerovm ajd twvowm daniyerenovm yev shvyederenvovm vorbyes daler, nvorwekiyeryenovm dalar ew  daler, holandyeryenovm`
 daler, holanderyenvowm daler kam daalder, yethvowbyeryenvovm ታላሪ (talari), hvowngaryervonovm tallér, italyeryenowm` tallero, angleryenovm
 tallero, anklyerenvowm  dollar   . Ajl motyecmamb, thaler-@ tsakel e kermanakan metaghadramits `Guldengroschen («great guilder»
 Guldengroschen («great guilder» mets kildyere linelvow artsathe hamarjeq e mek voske kildyeri), patrastwats  Djoaqimstali ar&atitsJoachimsthal-vowm
 artsatits.Joachimsthal-owm hatva& metaxadramnere svovtvov iryenc anvanvovm@ poxancecin ayl vayryeri hamanman 4apserov yev qasow  myetaxadramnerin.
 qashov  metaxadramnerin. Aydpisi orinak e , holandakan myetaxadrame, vori vra patkervac er arjovts ev hyetyewabar ajn  hvolanderenow
 hetyewapar ayn  holanderenov ko4vowm er  liwendaler (angl: «lion dollar»` trgm. arjvowci dvolar):Liwyendalery (the leeuwendaler) thvovjlatryeli
 leeuwendaler) thvovylatryeli  parvownakvovthjvovn@  0,75 maqvovr artsathi 427,16  dzvowlaktvor. Ayn aweli tyethev er, kan shrganarwogh mjvows metaghadramnery,
 mjvovs metaxadramnere, ajd isk patcharow el holandaci aryewtrakannyeri  hamar avyeli shahekan er  otaryerkrya partavvorvovthjvowny marel
 partawvorovthyvovny maryel drantsov, yev ayn darzav  artaqin aryevtri irakanatsman mijvots.Livendalyere haytni er  Hvolandiayin batkanogh
 Holandiajin batkanox Areveljan Hndkastanovm  yev Hyvowsisamerikyan Nor Niderlandnyer gaxovtvovm (Eryeq nahangayin taratsq) ev 17-rd
 nahangajin tarack) yev 17-rd daric min4ev 18-rd dari skizpy shrganarwvowm er 13 gaghovthnerovm Ajn arandnabes hajtni er nayew Aryevyelyan
 haytni er naev Aryeveljan YEvropaji srgannerovm, vortyegh  dardaw rowminakan ew mvoldvovakan arzhvovjtnyeri naghatiby anvanvelov «lyeow»(leu`
 anwanwelvov «leov»(leu` paracivoryen «arjvow&») Ankliaxvos hamajnqi shrganaknyerovm endovnvac tyesketi hamadajn`  holandakan myetaxadramy
 hvolandakan myetaxadrame aradjatsyel e haytni «lion dvolarits» yew ajn ankliakan dvolari naghatibn  e Nyerkayis anglo-amyerikjan dolari
 anglo-amyerikjan dvolari tsagvovme awyeli mot e 17-rd dari holandakan «daler»-in (daler )Aryvowci dolari het hamematelis isbanakan
 hamematelis isbanakan besson,  ownyenalow  novjn qas@ yew vovrwakice, 18-rd dari kesyerin haytni ajn dardzaw orbes ispanakan dvolar
 vorbes isbanakan dvolar yev pokharinwyec isbanakan dvolarov, vore layn tara&vowm stacav Nvor ashkharhi ispanakan gaxvowtnervovm ev Filipinnyerowm
 kaghvowthnerowm ew Filipinnerovm: I vyerdjo dvolare dardav  amerikyan aradjin arjvowythi anvanvowme:Ayl anwanowmnerBak («Buck»(s)) artahaytvowtjvown@
 («Buck»(s)) artahaytowthyvovne (sat nman e pritanakan  «quid»(s, pl) barin) hajax ogtagorcwowm e tarpyer azkyeri dolarner@ tarberakelis,

 kaghvowtajin arevtri shrganvovm: Ayn karox e arajatsats linel naev bvoker terminits: Myek ayl tarberak e «grinbak@»(«Greenback»), vorn i skzbane
 «krinbaky»(«Greenback»), vorn i skzpane kirarwyel e 19-rd darowm Abraham Linkolni kvoxmic thogharkva& tspahanj partatvomseri hamar , vori npatakn er
 hamar , ori nbatakn er finansaworel Hjvovsisvowm Qaghaqatsiakan batyerazmi caghsere: Irakan bartatomsi dardzeresin tpvvowm er sewov

 yerkrnyeri dvolarneri). Ajl hajtni tarpyerakner yen «krinmajl (greenmail)»,«grin (green)» yev «ded pryezidenths(dead presidents)»  (verjin

 nshanakovm e $10,000) Sakayn $1,000 txthadramnere aylevs 4yen oktagor&wvowm Larj kam sthaq(large kam stack)  paryern artahajtvowm

 Isbania-Amyerikajowm 16-19-rd darervovm Aragin dvolar metaghadramner@, togharkwats Miatsyal nahankneri dramahataranowm (himnadrva&
 dramahataranovm (himnadrwac 1792tvakanin), 4apservow ew karvowcvacqvow nman ein isbanakan dolarin, or@ hatvovm er Meksikayovm ev  pyerowovm:
 Meksikajovm yev  pervowvovm: Isbanakan dvolar@, Miacyal nahanknyeri dvolare yev hetagayowm Myeqsikayi artsatya pesson shrdjanarwowm ein Macjal
 srdjanarvvovm ein Macjal Nahanknyervowm, orvontsits isbanakan dvolare yew meksikakan byessvon orinakan kerpow kirarvecin minchyev 1875twakan.
 kirarwyecin min4ev 1875thvakan: «Livon dolary» hajtni er Hvolandakan Nor Nidyerlandner gaghvovtvovm (Njvov Yvorq), sakayn ayn 17-18-rd skizbe
 ajn 17-18-rd skizp@ kirarvvowm er nayew Angliakan gaxovthnyervowm. 1792 thvakani «Dramakan oryenqow» sahmanwec amyerikjan dolary,
 sahmanvec amerikyan dolary, vori hamazajn dvolari himkowm drwowm er isbanakan dvolar@, 371 kran kam 4/16 mas@ maqvowr, kam 416 gran(27kram)
 kam 416 kran(27gram) standart arcathits, isk «ar&iv@» 247kam 4/8mas granic kam 270 gran oskvowc: 371 gran arzheki himqvowm  Aleksandr
 arjyeki himqvowm  Alyeksandr Hamiltoni  voroshvowmn e nvor amyerikyan miavori styeghcvovm isbanakan dvolari mijin kshri himan vra. Nor isbanakan
 himan wra: Nvor ispanakan dolarnyer@ ksrovm ein mvotawvorabyes 377 gran, hetyewabar nor amyerikjan dvolar@  annsan tarbyervowthyovn ovner
 tarperovtjown ownyer ispanakani hamyemat.Nvovjn dramakan aktow sahmanvowm er 1 arcwin 10 dvolar arjyek@, ev 1 dolarin hamapatasghan
 dvolarin hamapataskhan 1/10 artsiv. 90%-anvoc ar&ate myetaghadramnyeri anvanakan arzheqnyere sahmanvovm  ein 1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10, yew
 1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10, yew 1/20  dvolar, isk 90%-anots oskye myetaghadramneriny` 1, 1/2, 1/4 yev 1/10 artsiv Dolarvovm barvownakvvogh oskvov
 Dolarovm parovnakvvogh voskov kam arcathi argyeqe hetagajowm pvoxarkvec tntesvowthyan myeg apranknyeri gnman kam wajarki arjyeqvow. Sa thowjl
 vacarki argyekow Sa tvowjl twec, or  apranknyeri arzhyek@ mna anpopogh, patsarovtyamb azkajin tntyesvowthjownvovm ar&ati kam oskow nerthapancman
 kam voskow nyertapancman kam artahvoski ardyovnkvovm arajaca& pvopoghvowthyanVax zhamanakashrgani  amyerikyan dvolari wra  naghakahnyeri
 dolari vra  nakhagahneri dimankarnery chein patkervowm, in4pyes arwowm e hima, 4naja& aysor oryenkov sahmanwac kargov  miayn mahatsac
 kargow  miayn mahatsats andanc dimankarnyery karox yen hajtnwel miatsyal nahangnyeri argovythi wra: Pastoren, nvor dyevawvorvac karawarovthyown@
 zyevawvorwats karawarvowthyvowne dem er arajnordnyeri dimankarnyervov argovyth vovnyenalovn, ays braktikan hamyematvowm e evrobakan miapyetnyeri

 nerkayis tesky min4yev 20-rd dari skizp@, naghqan da dimyeresin ogtagvorcvowm ein demki profilnyer ew kaylvox, nstats kam kanknac  batkerner
 kam kangnac  batkerner Hovnakan kam Hromeakan dicabanvowthyowni, in4pyes nayew  pnik amerikacinyeri batkyernyer Wergin metadramnyer@

 kvownawor myetaxnerov abahvovman txthadramneri ogtagvortsowmy irakanatswovm er Hamadashnovthyan 1777-1788 hvodwa&nyervov: Mayrcamaqayin
 hodwacnerow: Mayrtsamakayin arzhovythnyere, linyelvov aranc apahvowman ew hest kexceli, aragvoren korcryecin irenc arjeky, in4i ardyvovnqovm
 arzhyeky, inchi ardyvownkowm taracvowm stacav «krvoshi argyeq 4owni» artahaytovtjvowny. Sa dardzaw himnakan patcary, or Miacjal Nahangnyeri
 vor Miatsyal Nahangnyeri Sahmanadrovthyan hvodwats 1, pagin 10-vov sahmanwyets  vo4 mi nahang  chbetk e batrasti voskovc yew ar&ate myetaxadramneric

 gamanakaworapes dadaryecnel wtcharvowmnyery: Hajord tarwa petrvarin Kongres@ hastatyets 1962 twakani vcarayin mijotsnyeri masin orenky,
 migocneri masin orenqe, thoxarkelov miatsyal nahankneri partatomsyere, vorvonq 4ein wcharvvovm marman bahandjov yev hyetyevabar hetakrkrvowtjovn
 hetyewapar hetaqrkrovtyovn 4ei aradjacnvowm, bajc orinakan  wcharayin migocner ein, inchy nshanakvovm e varkatvovnyer@ dranq petq e yndvovnein

 tpagrovtyan yew pvorakrvovtjan bjvowroyi, amenamyec bartatvomse, or yerpewe togharkvel e, 100 000$ voske vkajagrirn e 1934 thvakani sharky.

 tvakaninAmyerikjan oske arciw  $5 (1⁄10 trvojakan vovntsia), $10 (1⁄4 trojakan ovncia), $25 (1⁄2 trojakan vowntsia), ev $50 (1 trvojakan vovntsia)`
 (1 troyakan owntsia) togharkva& 1986 tvakanin.Amerikjan platinye ar&iwner $10 (1⁄10 trvoyakan vowncia), $25 (1⁄4  trvoyakan owncia),

 twakanin.Amyerikyan baladiowmye artsivner $25 (1 troyakan vovncia) `thoxarkwa& 2017 thvakanin.Miatsjal nahanknyeri hovsadramner hatvowk
 hvowsadramner` hatowk patwerow metaxadramner$50.00 (Gyes yvownivon)` 1915 thvakan:Naghakahakan hawaqacow` thoxarkvac 2007 tvakanin.Tekhnikapes,
 thwakanin:Tekhnikabyes, ayd polvor myetaghadramnyer sarvovnakvowm en orinakan vcarajin mijoc hamarvyel  anvanakan arzhyekow, tyeew vorosnyer@
 arjyekow, theev oroshner@ sat aveli argekavor ajsor irenc nmovshajin  arzhekow, inc wyeraberovm e oskye vov arcatye myetaxadramnyerin,
 artsathe metaghadramnerin, nranc arzheqi himqowm tankarjeq metaxn e. 1965-1970 tvakannerin Qyenyedii kes dolaranvocy arcati parvovnakvovthjamp
 artsati barvownakvowthyamp miak  metaxadramn er , ory shrganarovtjvownits hanvec  e 1971 thwakanin, yew poxarinwyec bvoghbati ew nikeli hamazovlwa&kvov:
 nikyeli hamadzvovlvatsqov. Ajnovamenayniw, 1992tvakanits Miatsjal nahangnyeri dramahataran@ togharkets hatowk artsate howsadramner: 1879
 arcate hvovsadramner: 1879 twakanin  thoxarkwyec pvordznakan $4.00 (Styella) , sakayn erpeq chshrganarvyec medj , kani or aveli shat dzevanmovs
 or aweli sat dyevanmvovs er, kan anwanakan arjyekov arjowyth.$50 myetaghadrami toxarkovme nvirwac er miajn 1915 thwakani Panama-KHaghagh
 tvakani panama-KHaxagh ovkianvosyan migazgajin  tsvowcadrvovtyany, orow nshvvowm er panamayi djrancki bacowm@: Ays metaxadramneric
 Ajs myetaxadramnyerits batrastvyel e 1128 orinak, orvontsits 645-@  vovtankjvovn, ajn  miak amyerikyan metaxadramn e, vory klvor che,
 metaghadramn e, ory klor che, inbes naew amenamyetsn vov amenacanry erpewe thogharkwatsnyeri myeg. $100voskye metaghadrame thogharkwetsin 2015 thvakan
 togharkvyecin 2015 twakan ynthackowm, himnakanvovm kolyekcivonernyeri , ayl och thye srjanarowthjan meg dnyelvow hamar .1934 thvakanic  minc
 :1934 tvakanic  minc ajgm miayn srganarovthyan hamar tvogharkvac anvanakan argovythner@ pyennin, nikyele, dajm@ , kes dvolare ew
 dajmy , kes dvolar@ yev dvolarn yen. Nikyele minch ajgm oktagvor&vogh  miak metaxadramn e , vory eakanvoren chi tarpyerwvowm ir nakhnakan

 ganqer en dzernarkvel dranq srganarowtjownits hanelvow ovghghovtjambGvolyekcivon myetaxadramnerMiatsjal Nahankneri dramahatarany
 Nahanknyeri dramahatarany steghcyec havakatsowner kvolyekcivonerneri ev sbekovljatornyeri hamar.Arcati havaqa&vown, vorpes kanon, standart
 orpes kanvon, standart e` daymy, qortyery vov kes dvolar parvownakovm yen 90 % ar&ath 1983 thwakanits min4yew 1997 thwakany dramahatarany
 thwakany dramahataran@ steghtsets hawaqa&owner, oronk parownakovm yen tarwa hvowsadramajin metaxadramnyere ev srjanarwogh metaxadramnyeri
 srdjanarwvox myetaghadramneri hyet miasin: Tarperwox havaka&vow e Naxakahakan dolarnyeri hawaqatsovi pateth@, ortyegh kan chvors hatowk $1
 vortegh kan 4ors hatovk $1 myetaxadramnyer, oronq amyen tari tvogharkvovm yen naxagahi masnakcowthyamp: Byvowdjyetajin xochendvotneri yev  hamyematabar
 khoc@ndotneri yew  hamematapar  myetaxadramneri basharnyeri ajvogh anbawararowthjan patjarow  shrdjanarwox nor nakhagahakan dolar myetaghadramnyeri
 dvolar myetaghadramnyeri artadrvovthyvovne kasyecwyec 2011 twakani dyektemperi 13-in, AMN gandapyetarani qartvovxar Timif F. Kejthnyeri

 myetaghadramnerArajin amerikjan dolar@ thogharkvel e 1794 tvakanin Ajn hajtni er «thapvogh mazerov dvolar» anvanvovmow, kazmwac
 anwanvowmvov, kazmwats er 416 gran standart ar&athits(89,25% arcath yew 10,75% kabar), ev nerkayatswvowm er 1972 twakani dramakan orenki
 tvakani dramakan orenki 13-rd bagnvovm. Ayd oryenqi  9-rd pagnowm ayn sahmanwvovm e vorbyes ispanakan dvolari hamarargyek.Dvolar metaxadramnere
 hamararzhek:Dvolar myetaghadramnyery sat hajtni ein Miatsjal Nahangnyervovm: Artsate dvolarnyery hatvvovm ein 1794-1935 twakannerin,  Dovayth Ejzenhavoveri
 Dvowayt Eyzyenhavoweri patkervov bvoxbatye-nikyele dvolarne@, orvonq vownyein nvowjn 4apsyere yew hatvvovm ein 1971-1978thvakannerin.19-rd
 1971-1978thvakannyerin:19-rd darvovm krkin sksetsin thvoxarkwel oskye dvolarnyee. Syovzan Entvonii metaghadramner@  nerkayacvetsin 1979 tvakanin,
 nerkajacvetsin 1979 tvakanin, ajn  haytni 4dardzaw, kani or  hatchakh ein shpvotovm kvoworthyeri hyet, nrants gretye nowyn  4apyeri, yezrag&eri
 novjn  chaperi, ezragtsyeri yev nvowjnatib kowyneri batjarvow 1980 thvakanin shrganarovtjan  hamar ays dolarnyeri hatvovmy dadaretswyets,
 hatovme dadarecwyec, sakayn mnatsa& pvolvor nakhkin dvolar myetaghadramneri hyet miasin, nranq orinakan wjarajin midjoc yen hamarwovm
 mijoc en hamarvovm. 2000 tvakanin thoxarkwetsin nor amyerikyan 1$ myetaxadramner@ Sakagveaji batkerov, orovm ovghghvyecin Entoni
 orovm owxxwetsin Entvoni dvolari orvos thervowtyownnyer, ajn vovner hart ezrer yev oskye kovyn: Aynovamyenayniw ajs nvor metaghadramnere
 ajs nvor myetaxadramnery joghvovrdakan taracowm 4stacan ew amyenorya gvor&arqnervowm hazwadep ein ogtagorcvvowm2007 twakani petrwarin
 oktagorcvovm.2007 thvakani pyetrvarin Miatsyal nahangnyeri dramahatarane, 2005 thvakani Nakhakahakan $1 myetaxadramnyeri masin orenki hamadzajn,
 masin oryenki hamadzajn, thogharkets nor $1 myetaghadramnyer: Himnvelvow "50 nahangneri qortyer" sarki hadjoxovtyvownnyeri vra, nor myetaghadramneri
 vra, nor metaghadramneri dimyeresin  batkerwvowm ein   nakhakahnere  irenc yerdmnakalvovthjan  hadjordakan karkvov sksats Jvordj Washingtvonits:
 sksac Djorj Washinktonic Hakarak kvoxmovm patkyerwvovm e Azatowtjan arzan@: Thovjlatrvvowm er batkerel avyeli myec, aweli manramasn
 mye&, aveli manramasn dimankarner, «E Pluribus Unum» yew «Myenq hawatovm enq Ast&vown» avandakan krarowmnyer@, hatman kam tvoxarkman
 hatman kam thoxarkman taryethivy  yev dramahatarani  nsany, oronq teghadrtwvowm en  myetaghadrami ezrin dimyeryesi pvokharen: Ays arandznahatkowthjown@
 arandznahatkowtyowny  nman e Pritanakan £ 1 metaghadrami  ezragcerin , vore svovorabar kvojowthjown ci ownyetsel AMN metaghadramnyeri
 ovnyetsel AMN metaxadramnyeri nmowsnerovm: «Azatovtyvovn» makakrvovtyvown@ pvogharinvel e «Azatovthyan arzan»-vow Paci ayd, AMN myetaxadramneri
 ayd, AMN myetaxadramneri pnvovjthits yelnyelov, sa arajin angam e, erb shrganarvowm en tarper anwanvovmnyervow AMN  myetaghadramner dimyeresin
 metaxadramnyer dimyeryesin  voreve nakhagahi dimankarow (LInqoln/penni, Djefyersvon / nikyel, Franklin D- Rvowzvyelt/ daym, Washinkton/ qovvorther,
 Vasingtvon/ kowvorter, Qennedi/kyes dvolar ew Ejzyenhaower/dvolar) Myek ayl ansvowvor past yevs nvor $1 myetaxadrami masin, Krower Glivlandnin
 masin, Grower Kliwlandnin vovni erkow metaghadram, yerkvov tarpyer dimankarnyerow, yev sa ajn patcarvow, or na miak AMN naxakahn er ayd
 AMN naghagahn er ajd tarinyerin, vow erkvov ankam an@ndmyej @ntrvel e :Vaxagamkyet tvoxarkwa& Vashingtoni myetaghadrame barownakvovm
 metaghadrame barvownakovm er vribakner, oronq  himnakanowm Filadelfiaji dramahataranic  Floridaji yev Thennyesi bankyerin vowgharkwacnerovm
