 grarvovmy bacakayvovm erDramahatarani nsanThghtadramnyerMiatsjal nahankneri sahmanadrvovthyvovny sahmanowm e, vor Gvongryesy iravownq
 vor Gonkresy irawvovnk owni «Varkayin mijocner nyergravvyel i hasiw AMN-i» . Kvongresn  ayd ishxanvovtjvovne irakanacnovm e dasnajin
 irakanatsnovm e dashnayin pahvowstajin bankyeri  mijocvow`  dasnayin pahovstayin bartatomser thvogharkyelow tchanabarhvov: Ajd bartatomsyer@
 janabarhow: Ajd partatvomsere «AMN-i bartakanovthjvownnyern en» yev «byetk e marven bahanjwa& orinakan kvowmarvov  AMN-i Ganzapetakan stvorabajanvovmvowm
 Ganzapetakan storabaganvowmowm Vashinktvonovm, Kolovmpiaji srdjanvovm kam voreve dasnayin bahvovstayin bankvowm» . Dashnajin bahvovstajin bartatomsyer@
 bahvowstajin partatvomsyere oryenqvov naghatesvats en vorpyes «orinakan wcharayin midjotsner» partqeri marman hamar : Konkresy naev thvowylatryel
 Kvongryesy nayew tvovylatryel e thoxarkyel aweli qan 10 ayl tyesaki tghthadramner, ayd twvowm `gandzabyetakan partatvomser  yew Dasnayin bahovstayin
 Dashnajin bahvovstayin bankajin krarvovm: Gandzapetakan bartatomse miak tesakn  e, ore 70-akan thvakannyerits shrdjanarvovthyan mej
 twakannerits srjanarvowthjan meg e:Werdjin zhamanaknyervowm tbagrva& anvakan arjyekov thxthadramnern yen ` $1, $2, $5, $10, $20, $50, yew $100.
 $10, $20, $50, ev $100 1946 tvakanits dadarecin shrjanarvyel $100-ic awel anvanakan arzhekow txtadramnery, isk bastvonapyes shrdjanarvowtjovnic
 pastvonapyes shrganarowtjovnits hanvyecin 1969 thvakanin. Ays thghtadramnery himnakanovm oktagor&wvovm yen migbankayin poxantsowmner irakanacnelis
 poxantsowmner irakanacnyelis kam kazmakyerpwac hantsagorcowtyovnnyeri  koghmic, dra werdjin ogtagor&vowmn el stipec  nakhakah Ri4ard Niqsvonin
 nakhagah Ri4ard Niqsvonin 1969 thwakanin kargadrel dadaryetsnyel nrants oktakor&vowme. Elyektrvonajin pankingi i hajt kalovn byes drank
 hajt kalovn pes dranq dardzan avyeli ki4 anhrazhesht $500, $1,000, $5,000, $10,000, ev $100,000 anvanakan argeqvow thghtadramnere
 argyekow tghthadramnyere thoxarkvyel yen miyevnowyn gamanak: Patsarvowtjamb $ 100,000-i, or@ thvogharkwel e 1934 thwakanin orbyes «Gold Certificate»
 vorbes «Gold Certificate» ev yerbek hraparakaynoren srdjanarvovthjan myeg 4i drwel: Ays thxtadramnere ajgm havaqatsvownyeri tarrer en yew
 havaka&vownyeri tarrer en yev  ovnyen anwanakan argyeqic aweli pardr en knahatwovm:CHnajats  himnakanowm ogtakor&vvowm e  kanach kvowyne
 oktagor&vvowm e  kana4 gvovjny`  2004-its hetvo thvogharkva&  sark@ nerarvowm e naev ayl kvowynyer aweli hyest  tarperyelvov hamar: Amerikayi kovyreri
 hamar: Amerikaji kovyryeri khvorhrdi koghmits matowtswogh hasaneliowtjan hajci ardjvownkovm 2008 thvakanin  @ndownvac vorvosmamb porakrvovthyan
 vorosmamp pvoragrvovtjan yev tbakrovtjan pyvovron naghatesvowm e zarkacnel  shvosapyeli hatkovthjownnere  herthakan werapoghovm zhamanak
 hertakan vyerapvoghovm zhamanak , patsarvovthjamb $ 1-i ew nyerkajis 100$ arzhvoxvovtyamp thxtadrami: Ajn naew naxatesvovm e aweli myec capserov,
 awyeli me& capsyervov, me& hakadrowtyvown  ovnyetsvox tver,  kvovnajin tarbyervovtyvownnyer, in4bes naev gvowmare kardatsogh sarqyeri taracvowm,
 kardatsogh sarkyeri taratsowm, voronk koknen tyesoxakan khankarowmner ovnecoxnyerin antsvovmajin srganowm:Mijvotsneri tramadrvowmDramakan
 tramadrowmDramakan bazan baxkatsa& e metaxadramnyeric ew dasnajin bahvowstayin krarowmnerits, voronq shrdjanarvovm yen Dasnayin
 shrganarwvowm yen Dasnayin bahovstayin bankyeri yew AMN gandzaranic dvovrs, incbes nayew debozitvorianyeric Dashnajin pahvovstajin bankeri
 pahowstayin pankeri  statsva& awandneric: Hashwarkvats dramakan pazan ajyel e 1994 tvakan mot 400 miliard dolarvov, 2005 thwakanin`
 dolarvov, 2005 tvakanin` 800 miliardvov ev 2013 twakanin` avyeli qan 3-000 miliardov  SHrdjanarowtyan myeg dramakan mijotsneri  tsavale
 dramakan midjvocnyeri  &aval@ avyelanvovm e (kam nvazowm e) Dashnajin bahvovstayin hamakarki gvor&voxovthyvovnnyeri ardjvovnkvowm: Tarekan 8
 ardyvownkvovm: Tarekan 8 ankam 12 andzic paghkacats dasnayin pats showkayakan handnajvoghvovy oroshowm e amyerikyan dramakan kaghaqakanvowtjvowny:
 dramakan kaghakakanovthjvowny: Jovraqancyvovr asxatankayin or, Dasnajin pahowstajin hamakark@ pac svowkayi gvor&arnvowthyovnnyer e irakanacnowm
 kvorcarnovthyovnnyer e irakanatsnowm  dramavarkayin kaghakakanovtyan srganaknerowm :  Ethye Dasnayin pahowstayin hamakarge cankanovm e myecatsnyel
 tsankanvowm e myecacnyel dramakan zankwa&y, aba arjyetghter dzerq kperi (orinak` AMN kandabetakan bartatvomsyer@) ananvovn bankyerits,
 partatomsyery) ananovn bankyeric, dvolari dimac: Yndhakaraky, pankerin argyethghthyer vatcharelvow mijvotsov dolarner khani  shrdjanarovthjownits:YErp
 srjanarvovtyvovnic:YErb Dashnayin pahovstajin hamakarg@  gnvovmnyer e katarowm, kreditagrowm e vatcharoghi bahovstayin hasivy (Dashnayin
 pahvovstayin hashiv@ (Dasnajin pahowstayin fondi het): Ays gvowmar@ chi pvoghancwovm voryeve kvojvowtyvovn ovnyecogh fondic, henc ajs makardakvowm
 hyenc ays makardakvowm e, or Dashnajin pahovstajin ynkerovthyvowne styeghtsvowm  e nvor kataryelakor&vac  pvoxer: Aryevtrajin bankyer@ karogh
 Arevtrayin pankyery karvogh en irents pahvovstajin haswits  azatvoryen kanghikacnyel Dashnajin bahowstayin fondi  avelcowkayin bahovstner@:
 avelcvowkajin bahvovstnere: Ajd pahanjnere kataryelvov hamar Dashnayin bahvovstajin hamakarke   dimovm e nerkayacnowm AMN Finansnyeri
 nerkajatsnvovm AMN Finansneri naghararovtjvovn tbagrvac kvovmar hamar . Ganzapyetaran@ ir hyerthin vowgharkvowm e ayd bahanjnyer@ Pvoragrvovtjown
 pahandjnere Porakrvovthjown yew Tpagrman warcvowtjvovn (dvolari nor orinaktser tpyelov hamar) ew dramahataran (myetaxadramnyere knikelov):KnvoxvovnakvowthyovnAMN
 knikyelvow):GnvoxvovnakvovthjownAMN sahmanadrvowthjan 6-rd klkhi 8-rd pajni 1-in hodwa&@ sahmanvovm e, vor AMN Gvonkryes@ iravasov e pvogh toxarkel
 irawasvow e pvox toxarkel yev nyerkin ov artakin myetaxadramneri arzhyeqy karkawvorel Kvongres@ irakanacryets ajd liazorowthjvovnner@, erp
 liazorowthyovnnyere, erp 1792 thwakanin  sahmanvyets dramakan orenk@ Orenky  nakhatesowm er arajin amyerikyan dolari thvogharkvowme yev
 dvolari thoxarkowme yev  or AMN dolar@ byetk e vovnyena «ispanakan  dvolari nerkajis novjn arjyeqe» Adj kvoghmvovm nyerkayatsvac axjvowsake
 nerkayacva& aghyvowsak@  cvovjc e talis abranki hamarzheq kovmary, ore vorvoshaki tarvowm karvogh e derk berel $ 1-ow: Axjowsaky cowjts
 1-vov: Axjowsak@ tsvovyts e talis, or 1774-its min4yew 2012 twakane AMN dolare kvortsryel e ir knoxvownakovtjan mot 97.0% -y:AMN dvolari
 97.0% -e.AMN dolari knvoxovnakovtyan ankvowm@ hamabataskhanvowm e infljaciajin, or@ gamanaki entacqvowm tntesovtyan mej hankecnvovm
 tntesowtyan myedj hankecnvowm e aprankneri ew &arajovtyownnyeri kneri bardzratsman. Sbaroxakan  kneri indyeqs@ (SGI) tsowjc e talis tnajin
 tsvovjts e talis tnayin tntesowtjvovnnyeri kvoghmic dzerq pyerva& sparoghakan abranqneri ov &arayvowthjvovnneri midjin gine. Miatsyal Nahangneri
 gine: Miacyal Nahankneri sbarvoghakan knyeri indyeqs@,  hrabarakwac Asghatanqi vijakagrovtjan war4vowtyan kvoxmic, Miatsjal Nahanknerowm
 Miatsyal Nahanknyerowm sbaroxakan aprankneri ev carajowtyovnnyeri mijin kiny knahatvox tsvowtsanish e: Ayn artatsvolowm e knatch@, vory
 artacolowm e knace, ore krvovm yen sbarvoghner@  iryents amyenorya &akhserovm . Grafike cvovjts e talis  sbaroxakan kneri  indeksy  AMN
 gnyeri  indeqsy  AMN 1982-1984 twakannyerin, isk taryekan ktrvackvow pvopvokhovthyovn sparvoxakan kneri indeksi cowtsadrwa& e storew.paterazmi
 tsovcadrvac e storev:Paterazmi tarinyerinyerin AMN doalri  arzheke eakanoryen nwazyec ` hatkabyes  Amyerikjan qaghaqaciakan baterazmi, Hamashkharhayin
 paterazmi, Hamashxarhayin aragin yev yerkrvord baterazmnyeri ynthatskvovm.  Dashnajin pahvowstnyere, oronk himnwecin 1913 tvakanin, naghatesvats
 thwakanin, nakhatyesva& ein  «jkvovn» arzhovytvov apahovelow hamar hashvi arnelow «karj jamanakahatwacvovm zkali popoxvovtyownnyer»,
 zgali pvopoghvovtyownner», ince zgalivoren tarbervvovm er pardzrvorak pogheri naxkin deweric, incbisiq en voskin, azgajin bankayin nshvovmnyer@
 azkayin bankajin nshvovmnery yew ar&ate myetaghadramnyer .  Voskvov standarti shrganovm` tevakan zhamanakahatwa&owm knyere pahpanetsin kajvownovtyovny:
 pahbanyecin kajvovnvovtjvovne orinak knyeri makardaky ev  AMN dolari gnoxovnakvowtyovne  1914thwakanin  shat cein tarbervvovm 1880 thvakani
 tarbyerwvovm 1880 twakani gneri makardakits: Dashnayin pahvowstin i skzpane  hajvoxvets bahpanyel AMN dolari ev gnyeri kayvovnovthyan` hakadarzyelvow
 kayvownowthyan` hakadardzelvow Arajin hamashxarhajin baterazmi hetewankvow aradjatsac gnace yew kayownacnelov dvolari knoxvownakvowthjovn@ 1920-akan
 knoxvovnakowtyovny 1920-akan thwakanneric  min4ew 1930-akan thvakannere, mincyew 1930 tvakani dyeflyatsian.Erkrord hamasgharhayin paterazmits
 hamasxarhayin batyerazmic hetvo styextswac Preton Vvovdsyan hamakarki hamadzayn, voskvov arjyeqy amrakrwyec $ 35 mek vovnciaji dimats, vovsti
 ownciayi dimac, owsti AMN dolari argeki howmqovm oskow arjyeqn er: 1960-akan tvakannerin Garavarovthjan achvox cakhsyery, sakayn
 achvox tsaghsery, sakayn kaska&nyer ein  arajatsnovm, vor Miacjal Nahangner@ kkarvoghanajr bahpanel ayd pokharkelivowthjan makardaky,

 poghanakel dvollarnere voskov, ori ardjownkovm dolari arzhek@ sksec nwazyel: Andradarnalvow zargacvogh argowtayin cgnajamin ev ayn wtankin,

 nerkayatsowme== Canvothakrvowtjvovnner 
Emvotikon, grafikakan patkyer, vorn artahaytovm e emvocianyer@. Ayn himnakanovm baghkacats e tpakrakan nsannyeric:
 tpakrakan nshannerits: Layn taracvovm e ktel hamatsantsvowm yew haghvordakrvovthjownnyervowm, sakayn werjin jamanaknervovm ajn ogtakortswvowm
 jamanaknyerovm ajn oktagortswvowm e amenvovryeq.Emvotikonnery vovnyen mijazkajin haskacowtjown: Ajd isk patcharvov ayn 4vowni kyerakanakan, hn4jownakan
 kyerakanakan, hnchyovnakan kam ayl lezvin hatovk argeq Emotikvonnerin karyeli e dasel ayn haxordaktsman mijotsneri sharkin, vorvonq chvovnyen
 sarqin, orvonk 4ovnen khvoskayin argeq. Emvotikvonnery nakhateswats en artahayta& mitqn aweli harowst ow haskanali dardnelov, hnchyerankn
 darznelov, hncherangn artahaytelvov hamarpatmowtjovnEmotikvonneri aybvowbyeny khist sahmanapak e Ajn nyerarvovm e miajn harcakan
 nerarovm e miayn harcakan (?) ev pacakan4akan (!) nshanner: Ayn nshanner@ i vicaki chen artahajtyel emotsianeri oghj bazmazanvowthjovne
 oxdj bazmazanowthyown@ Avyeli emvocional yen smayliknereDyeryews 1969 thwakanin Vladimir Napokvove ir hartsazrvowjtsnyeric meki jamanak
 harcazrovjtsnerits myeki gamanak nshyel e, vor arzhi styegh&el hatovk ketadrakan nshan emocian grafikvoryen artahaytelvow hamar:«Hajax mtatsvovm
 hamar«Hacax mtatsovm em, or petk e styex&el mi aynpisi tbakrakan nshan, or artahayti gbit, ev vor@ kogni indz pataskhanyel dzyer harcin:»Sakajn
 dzer hartsin:»Sakayn 1982 twakani syeptyempyeri 19-in Skvot Falmane aragin angam ashxarhin aragarkyets smajliki ajnpisi tyesq, ore
 smajliki ajnbisi tyesq, ore ogtakvorcwowm e hima«Arajarkowm em oktagorcyel aysbisi simwvol haghordagrvovthjan myedj katak artahajtyelov
 myedj katak artahaytelow hamar: :-) Isk ayn haxordagrowtyvovnnere, voronq katak chyen artahaytvowm, ogtagvorcyel-( dzeve»:Dasakan smajliknyerDasakan
 dzew@»:Dasakan smajliknyerDasakan smaylikneri aranznahatkvowtyovne marmni ew demki hvorizonakan dirkn e. Ays smajliknyery artahajtovm en emvotsia,
 artahaytvowm en emvocia, mimika, jestyer, kvorcoxvowthjvown yev mardov wichak, in4bes naev tarbyer ander: Hatchagh kthi «-» simwvoly chen dnvowm
 «-» simwole cen dnvovm hesht havakyelvov hamar: Orinak, barzabes hawakvowm en.) kam.(: 90-akannyeri kyeserits vyerjaketi poxaren hatchakh
 vyergaketi pogharen hajax sksel yen ogtakortsyel havasarvovthjan nshany: Aysinkn, :)-i poxaren =): Orpes kanvon, qit ays smajliknyerovm
 qith ays smayliknyerovm nowynbes 4i drvvovm: Erpemn naev smajlikner@ hawakovm en achqery agits: Orinak, (-: kam )-:: Ays smajliknyervowm
 )-:: Ays smajliknerovm imaste 4i pvoghvvovm:CHaterowm hacagh handipvowm en ays tibi simvolnyer` nsanakogh pyeran. ), (, D. Paci ayd,
 byeran. ), (, D: Baci ayd, ajd simwole krknwowm e )))), ((((,DDDDD. Nshanneri qanake sastkatsnvovm e emvocian. Erbyemn krknvovtyvovnner

 zyernarkowm":KortsatsvovthyvovnyGorcatsvvovm e tvansannyerow artahajtwac tveri kvoghqin, orinak` 42.3%. Yst Miavorneri migazgajin hamakarki pahanjnyeri,
 hamakarki bahandjnyeri, tvi ev tokvosi nsani mijew petq e thoghnyel aranqGortsacwowm e naev "tvokvosanoc" bari krcat krvovtjan hamar,
 krtchat krowtjan hamar, orinak 23%-anots ardyovnq:‰ yew ‱Aynpyes, inchpyes %-ow artahajtvovm e thwi harjvovrerordakan mas@, nvovyn

 orinaknyer`32‰=0.32, 3.68‰=0.0368, 0.022‰=0.00022 ew ajln;32‱=0.032, 3.68‱=0.000368, 0.022‱=0.0000022 yew aylnWindows-vov hamakark4i

 nyerkajacvowmy== TSanvotakrowthyovnnyer 
Pazisajin miavor@ kam Pazisajin kyet@ (hatchagh anklyerenovm handipvowm e bp, yew artasanvovm e "pip") myek tokvosajin
 "pip") mek tvokvosajin miavvori harjvowrervord masn e:Nkarakrvovm1 pazisayin miavor = 1 bermiriad = myek harjovrerord tokvos1
 harjvovrerord tokvos1 bm = 1‱ = 0.01% = 0.1‰ = 10−4 = 1⁄10000 = 0.00011% = 100 bm = 100‱Bazisayin miavory oktakvor&vvowm e
 miavvore oktagortswowm e ayn hashvarknervovm, ortegh erkow miavori tarpyervowthyovny pvoqr e 1%-ic: Sat hatchagh handibovm e tvokosadrvovyknyeri
 handipovm e tvokosadrvovyqneri haswarknervowm, ortegh tokvosadrowjnqnyeri tarperovtyvowny 1%-ic kich yen: Orinak 0.10 tvokos tarperovthjvown@
 tokos tarbyerowtjovny nsanakowm e 10 bazisayin miavvori popoxvovthyown (or. 4.67%-its tokvosadrovjke dardzel e 4.77% nshanakvovm e
 e 4.77% nshanakowm e avelatsyel e 10 pazisajin miawvorow kam ketvov): Myovs kvoghmits 100 pazisajin miavorow ajy nsanakowm e 1%-ov
 ach@ nshanakovm e 1%-vov atch:Nerkayvovms bazisayin miawor haskatsvovtjowny oftagorcvvovm e finansakan kvortsiki tvokosadrovyqi popoghowthjovne
 tvokvosadrvowjki pvopokhowtyowne kam (spred) erkow tokvosadrovjknyeri tarbyervovtyvovne covjts talow hamar:Kani vor bartavvorvowtjownnyere kam
 bartavorvovtyownnere kam bartatvomsy karvogh en nerarvyel myek @ndhanvowr indyeksi nyerkvo, drants pvopoxvovtjovnnery trwowm e bazisajin
 pvopvoxowtjownnyere trvvowm e bazisayin miavvorvov: Orinak yetye partawvorovtyan yekamtaperowtjvown@ tarekan 0,50%-vow barzr e Londvoni mijpankajin aragarki
 mijpankajin aragarki tvokvosadrowjqits (LIBOR) asvowm en or 50 bazisayin miawor myec e LIBOR-its kartch krowm en "L+50bps" kam "L+50":PermiradMiawori
 "L+50":pyermiradMiawori mek tasy hazaryervord mas@ 1⁄10,000 sowvorapar kvocvowm en permiriad: Kor&nakanvovm mek pazisajin miavvor@
 myek bazisajin miawvor@ havasar e myek bermiradi kani vor myek pazisajin kety tvokvosi myek haryovryerord masn e, isk mek tokos@ mek
 e, isk mek tvokvosy myek miawori myek harjvovryerord masn e:Tes nayewTvokvosajin kettokvos (%) 1/100 mas== &anotagrovtyovnner

.tk Tokyelavow kxzinyeri vyerin makardaki azgayin domyene:Domyeni stexcman npatakn asxarhvowm Tvokyelavow kxzineri
 ashkharhovm Tvokelavow kghzinyeri jana4yeliovthyovny barzratsneln e, inchbyes nayew ajnpisi kazmakyerbvovtyownneri hyet haraperovtjvovnnyer hastatele,
 harapyervovthyovnner hastatele, voronq karogh yen twjal taratsashrganin apahvovyel kapvow, krtvovthyamp ev pgskakan ognowtjamp kam el anmigakanvoren
 kam el anmigakanoren finansavorel kghzinere..tk gvotow dvomennere trwovm yen kam anvcar (ays debkvovm dvomyeny kkrantsvi krancwogh
 dvomeny kkrantswi grantswox ynkerowtjan anvovnov) kam wtcharowi (grancvovm@ kkatarvi knvordi anvovnov, aydvowhandyerz myec vtang ka, vor dvomene
 vtang ka, or dvomeny kwerawajarvi).TSanvothagrovthjownnyerArtakin hxvovmnyerIANA .tk whois texekvowthjovn.tk Krantsvo
Et cetera (latineren kardatswvovm e` [et ketyera], angleryen [eth sethera])` latinyeren artahaytvovthjvovn e,
 latineryen artahajtovtyown e, thargmanabar nsanakvovm e` «ew aydpyes sarownak» Grtchat etc. kam &c. zewyervow kvor&atsvvovm e mi sark yevrobakan
 e mi sharq ewrobakan lezvownyervovm, ajn novyn imastow, inch hayereni «ev ajln» artahajtovthjowny.Hajeryenovm nvovyn imastn e artahajtovm
 imastn e artahajtvowm naew kakhman ketyer (...) kyetadrakan nsanyLezovnyer, vorontsowm gvorcacwowm e etc. kam &c. dyewy`anglerenispanyerenkatalvonyerenbvortvowkalyerenfranserenMi
 dewy`angleryenisbaneryenkatalvoneryenbvortvovkalyeryenfransyeryenMi qani ayl lezovnerowm handipox hamarzheknereambvoxjakan canky` angleryen hvodwacvowmTye's naewVergabanLatinyeryen
 naevWyergabanLatinyeryen artahajtovthjvownneri tsank «E»== &anothagrovthyovnnyer 
Et cetera (latineryen kardatsvvowm e` [et kyetyera], angleren [eth sethyra])` latinyeren artahajtowthyvown e,
 latineren artahaytvowthyvown e, thargmanabar nsanakvovm e` «ev ajdbes sharvownak»: Grtchat etc. kam &c. zyevyervov kortsatsvvowm e mi sharq yewrvopakan
 e mi sharq yevrobakan lezownyervowm, ayn nowjn imastov, inc hayereni «yev ayln» artahajtvovtjvovny:Hayyerenvovm nowjn imastn e artahajtvovm
 imastn e artahajtowm nayew kaxman kyeter (...) kyetadrakan nshane.Lezovner, orvontsowm kvorcacwowm e etc. kam &c. dzyew@`anglerenispanyeryenkatalvonyeryenbvortowgalyeryenfranserenMi
 dzewy`anklerenispanyeryenkatalvoneryenpvortvovkalyerenfransyerenMi kani ajl lezvownerowm handibox hamarzhyeknyer@amboghdjakan tsanky` anglyeryen hodwa&vowmTye's naevVyerdjapanLatineryen

 portovgalakan kajsrovtyovnits, yerp pvortowgaliayowm hastatvyetsin jvoghovrdawarakan karger: Afrikayvovm aynvowamenayniw sharovnakvetsin anvyer

 ryegimi tapalovmn er, vorin hagvordyecin kaxakatsiakan baterazmnyery ew prnowtyvownnyere:Zargatsats erkrnyeri tntyesvovthyvownnyer@ tasnamjaki
 tntyesvovthyownnyere tasnamjaki arajin kesin sarvownaketsin ajy Ganach hyexapoxowtjan ardjvownkovm: YEwrvobaji tntyesowtyvowne sarovnakvowm er
 tntyesowtjowne sharvovnakvowm er vyerakanknwel YErkrord hamashxarhajin paterazm hyetevanknerits hamadayn Marsali blani, sakayn tntyesakan atche
 sakayn tntesakan ac@ dandaghets 1973 tvakani chknazhamits hetvo:QaghakakanowthyownpatyerazmnerTasnamjaki amyenansanakali hakamartowthyvovnnyer@

 thvakanin Saygvoni ankmamb: Hajvord tari Wiyetnamy pashtvonapes wyeramiavorvyets:Afghanakan paterazm (1979-1989) – CHnaja& nra mets masy

 hetyewyaln yen.Glxawvor hakamartvowthjvovne kabitalistakan yew komvovnistakan mi kani yerkrneri migyev hakamartovtyvownnyern ein, minchdyer
 hakamartovthyvownnyern ein, min4dyer hakamartvowthjan himnakan koxmyer@` GHSHM-@ yew AMN-n yerkkhosvovtyvovnnyeri seghanin nstetsin` nwazyecnelov atvomayin
 nvazyecnelvow atvomayin zenki artadrowthyvown@:1976 twakanin vovsanvoghnyeri xaxax cvovyce  Harawafrikyan hanrapyetovtyan Svoovyeto kaxakvovm
 hanrapyetvovthjan Sooveto qaghakovm vera&vyec apstampovthyan, vori zhamanak aweli qan 700 sewamvorth dbrvocakan eryekha sbanwyetsin ostikanowtjan koxmits:Andjatoxakanvowtyan
 kvoxmits:Anjatoghakanvowtyan ach Ganadaji Kwebek nahankvowm: 1970 thwakanin armatakan azkajnakannere yew marqsistnyery arevangecin Qvepeki

 Poti glxawvorowtyamb hyeghapvoghovtyown tyeghi ovnyecav amyerikamyet karavarvowthjan dem Lvon Noli klghavorowthjamp: 1975 tvakani abrili

 dirqyere: Garavarvovthyvowny kazmakyerbyec Gampvogayi tsyexasbanovtyown@, ori zhamanak zinwats khmpawvorvowmner@ mtan kaxaqnyer ew gyowxyer vorbeszi
 kaxaqnyer yev gyovghyer orpeszi himnyein marksistakan gjvovghatntesakan hasarakowtyvown: Bovddist hvogevvorakannere yev bvolvor nranq owqer khvosowm
 bolvor nranq vovkyer ghosovm ein otar lezvownyervow, ownein oryeve krthvovtjvown, barnowthjownneri entharkvyecin kam spanwecin: Ardjonkovm zohvyecin
 Ardyvonqowm zohwecin mot 3 milion mard: Wietname nyerxvovjets Kampogia 1979 tvakanin werg dnelvov Pol Pvoti isxanvovthyan@ yew himnets

 Chinastani het nvowyn tarva petrwarin:1979 thwakani Irani islamakan hyexapvoxvovtyan ardyvovnkvovm gah@nkec arvyec arevmtamet miabet sah
 aryewmtamyet miabet sah Mohammad Reza Pahlawin, ev ishkhanovtyan yekav kronabetakan islamistakan karavarovthjvown@ Ayatholla Ghomyeinii
 karawarvovtjvovn@ Ajatolla KHvomyeinii glxavvorvowtjamb: Arewmtjan ishkhanvovthyownneri ew hyexapoghakanneri migew taradzaynvowthyvownneri ardyovnkowm 1979
 tarazajnowtyvownnyeri ardjvovnkovm 1979 tvakani nvojyempyeri 4-in sksvec Iranowm batandnyeri tchgnajame, vori ardyvownqowm 66 divanagyetner, himnakanowm
 diwanagetnyer, himnakanvowm AMN-ic, patand bahwyecin 444 or:Harawslaviayvowm srwec nyerkin drovthjowne, orits skizp arav Khorvathakan
 skizb araw Ghvorvatakan karvown shargowmy 1971 thwakanin, ory bahangovm er Harawslawiayi kazmi myej mtnox hanrabetowthjvownnyeri abakyentrvonacvovm:
 hanrabetvovtyownnyeri abakyentrvonacvovm: Harawslawiayi kvomvovnist aragnord Ivosip Titvon myerzhyets shargman bahangnyere` derpakalyelvov nra arajnordnerin,

 abakyentrvonatsrets iskhanvovtjvowny ew tovlacryec Serbiayi dirqere: Batsi ayd nvor sahmanadrvowthyamb na hastatyets ir diktatowran` nsanakyelov iryen

 ac ampoxj ashgharhvowm: YEwrobajvovm Garmir prigadneri, Garmir panaki kovsakcovthjan yew ayl ahapyekchakan kazmaworovmneri kvoxmic irakanatswyetsin

 darnowm ein awyeli vov aweli anhasanyeli:KhSHM-e ir arajnord Leonid Pryejnevi klxawvorowtjamb, orn vownyere amyenamye& zinvats vowgere yev atvomayin

 ghekawarvovm er 1963 tvakanits, mahacaw: Nran pokharinets Kardinal Alpinvo Lowcianvon, vow anwanakvochwyec Hvowhannes pvoghos I: Sakajn yndamyeny

 ishghanazrkvets yew mahapatzhi yentarkwyets:ZHan Pyedyel Bvokasa, ow karawarowm er Kentronaafrikjan Hanrapetovtyownvowm 1965 thvakanic, 1977

 kajsrovtjown: Na kahynkyets arvec yerkow tari anc yew aqsvorwec:Nshanakali hamasxarhajin arajnordnyeri patkerasrahNsvovm` tawatarow nsvats
 batkerasrahNshowm` tavatarvow nswa& yen yerkrneri ajn aragnordnere, voronq mnatsyel en iskhanvowthyan tasnamyaki wyerji drvowthyamb:AghetnyerBnakan
 drvovtjamp:AghetnerBnakan aghyetnyer1970 twakani hvovnvari 5-in 7.1 balanvoc Tvonkayi yerkrashargy texi vovnyecav Jvovnan nahangi Tonkay

Sirivows (lat.` Sirius)ˌ in4pyes naew α-Myec shan (lat.` Canis Majoris), kisherajin yerknqi amenapaycar astx@:
 erknqi amenapajtsar astghy: Teew nra lowsatvowthyvown@ 25 angam kyerazantsowm e Arevi lovsatwowtyan@, ajnvowamyenajniv, astxeri asxarhowm
 aynvowamenajniw, astxyeri asxarhowm ryekord chi hamarvvovm. Sirivovsi pardr tyesaneli bay&arowtjown@ bajmanavorwats e nra haraperakan motikvovthyamp
 harabyerakan motikovthyamp. Siriovsin karyeli e tyesnel YErkri tsankatsa& shrdjanic, batsarvowthyamb tsajr hjvovsisayin shrjannyeric: Siriovsy
 srjannyerits: Siriowsy Aryegaknayin hamakarkits hervov e 8-6 lvovsayin tari yew hamarwovm e mez amenamot astgherits myeke: Ayn handisanovm
 myeky Ayn handisanvovm e A1 spyektral dasi himnakan hagvordakanvowthjan astx. 1844 tvakanin Fridrigh Besyele entadrets, or Siriowse
 yentadryec, or Siriowse krknaki astx e. 1862 tvakanin Alwan Klarke hajtnaberyel e vovghyekic astx, orn statsel e Sirivovs B anwanvowme
 Sirivows B anvanvowmy (ajstyex latinatar B, qani vor astxeri paxadrichnery kvochvvovm en myetsatar latineren taryervow). Tesaneli astxy
 tarerow): Tyesaneli astxe yerbyemn ko4vovm yen Sirivows A. Erkvow astxer@ bttwvovm yen @ndhanvowr zangwatsneri kentroni showrdj` 20 astghagitakan
 sowrdj` 20 astxakitakan miawor hyerawvorvowtjamp, or@ kazmvovm e mvot 50 tari 1915 tvakanin Maovnth Wilsoni astghaditarani astxaketnery
 astghaditarani astxakyetnyery bacahajtyetsin, or Sirivows B֊n sbitak tzowk e (sa aragin haytnaberwa& spitak tzvowkn e): Hetaqrqirn ajn
 tzvowkn e) Hyetakrkirn ajn e, or sranits kareli e hetyewovthjvown anyel, or antsyalovm Siriovs B֊n byetk e sat awyeli mets linyer, kan Sirivovs
 myec liner, qan Sirivovs A֊n, qani vor ewoljvowtsiaji gorts@nthatsovm ayn arden hyeratsel er himnakan hagvordakanvowtyvownic: Sirivowsi
 hadjvordakanvovtjvovnic Sirivovsi hamakarki tariqy, yst jamanakakic owsowmnasirovthyvownnyeri, kazmovm e mot 230 mln tari (knahatovmnery
 tari (knahatowmner@ tarpyerwowm yen 200֊ic mincyew 300 milivon tari) Skzpvovm Siriowsi hamakarge baghkaca& e yeghyel B dasi erkvov
 e yeghel B dasi yerkvov sbitak֊kaptawovn astgheric- myek baxadrici zankvats@ (Siriows B) 5 aryekaknayin zangwac er, erkrvordine (Siriovs
 erkrvordine (Sirivovs A)` 2 aregaknayin zangwa&. Aynowhetyev, shvowrj 120 milivon tari araj, awyeli mets zankvatsow Sirivovs B֊n ajrvets
 zankva&vow Sirivows B֊n ayrwets yev dardaw karmir hska, isk hyeto ktsec artakin shyerte yev wera&vets nyerkayis spitak thzvovk witchaki: Sirivovs B֊i
 wijaki Siriovs B֊i zangvats@ kazmvowm e arewi 1.02 zankvats@, ayn amyenacanr haytni sbitak thzovknyeric e (tibik spitak thzovknyeri
 (tibik sbitak thzvovknyeri zankvats@ 0.5֊0.6 ☉ arevayin zangvac e):PatmovtjvownShat hinawvowrc mshakvovjtnyer Siriowsin hatovk nshanakvowthjovn
 hatvovk nshanakvowtjovn en twel Neghos geti hovti pnakichnere erkrpakvovm ein nran dyerevs wax thagavorowthjan gamanak, incbyes erkrbagowm
 jamanak, incpes erkrpakvovm ein Svopdeth (hownaryen Sothis, Σῶθις) astvatsvowhown Isidayi erknayin marmnavorman@. Siriovs@ hajakh patkyerowm
 Sirivowse hacakh patkervovm Isidayi tyesqov` kankna& erknajin nawaki vra, hnkathyev astghe klghawyeryevovm, klowghe debi ag kvoghmovm kangnac
 debi aj koghmowm kangnac Osiris@ (ore, ir herthin, asvocatsvovm er Orioni kotvov astxyeri hyet). Paci ajd, Siriowsi het ein kabvowm
 Sirivovsi hyet ein kabvowm naew Hathor astwatsvowhin, vor@ patkyerwovm er kovi tesqow, vori exdjyvovrneri midjyev gtnvovm er Sirivovs@: Sirivowsi
 er Sirivowsy Sirivowsi hyeliakal &akman owsvowmnasirvovthyvovnnyeri hamadzayn` erknqvovm ir 70֊orja batsakajowthyvownic hetvo yegibtatsi
 patsakajovthyvownic heto yegiptaci krmyer@ jshgrtvoren kanxatesvovm ein Nexosi vararman skizb@: Hin Egibtosvovm oratsowtsayin tarin hamarwvovm
 oratsovcayin tarin hamarwowm er Sirivowsi yerkvow heliakal cagovmneri migev enkac gamanakahatva&e.Svovmyera-aqkadakan astxagitvowthyan meg
 zhamanakahatwatsySHvovmyera-aqkadakan astghagitowtyan mej astxn anvanvovm ein Nyet ew kabovm ein Ninowrta asttsvo het. Thiglatpalasar Ι-i (m.th.a- 11-rd dar) hvovsaqari
 11-rd dar) hovsakari krarovmy asvowm e «Sare oryerin, sarnamaniqin, sarowjtsin, Nyet astxi hajtnvyelow orerin, vory pvosvoragovjn
 oryerin, vore posoragovjn e, incpes pxinz@»: ajstyex nkarakrvovm e Siriovsi akrvon &agvowm@, vory Migin ev Nor Asvorakan shrjannerovm
 Asorakan srgannyerowm dzmran kyesin erSiriowsi zhamanakakic anwanvovmy cagowm e hvownaryen Σείριος («paycar»٫ «pajlown») pari
 («paytsar»٫ «pajlvovn») pari latinyeryen Sirius gryelazyewits. Antik jamanaknyerovm Siriovsin anwanel yen SHan astx (inchbyes protsionin) prvotsivon@
 protsivonin): prociony yev Sirivovs@ hnowc hamarwvovm en «shan» astgher Hovnakan dicapanowthjan hamadzajn Sirivows astx dardaw Orivoni
 Siriows astgh dardaw Orioni kam Ikarivovsi shvovny Iliakanovm (XXII 30) Hvomyervosn ayn anwanowm e «Orioni shvown». Hvovjner@ nvovjnpyes Sirivovsn
 Hvowynery nowjnbyes Siriovsn asocacnvovm ein amran tapi het. astghi anvovne tsagvovm e «tak or» parits: Est m.th:a 3-rd dari hovyn panastyeghc
 dari hvovyn banastexc Aratowsi astghn aydbyes e kvocvovm ayn patjarvov, vor ayn pajlovm e «kowracnox bajcar pajlov».Sirowsi latinyeryen
 paylvow».Sirowsi latinyeren anvowny` Canicula-n, nsanakvovm e «pvokrik svovn, shnik». Hin Hrvomowm amran shvoki shrgane, vor@ hamenknvovm er
 srgan@, ore hamenknvowm er Siriovsi arawvotjan tesanelivowthjan hyet, anwanowm ein «dies caniculares»` «san orer», aysteghic el aradjacyel
 aystyeghic el arajatsel e rvovseren «Каникулы»` ardzakovrd pare. Sirivowsi het e kabvac mi xorhrdawor batmvowtyvown Hnakowjn grarvovmnery
 Hnagvovjn krarvowmnyery Siriowse nkaragrvowm en vorbes karmir astgh, teew ajsor ajn vowni kapta֊sbitakawvovn kowyn. Haytni hrvomyeatsi
 kvovjn: Haytni hromeatsi pilisvopa Syenekan ew asgharhi hamakargi haytni himnadir Klavdivos Ptxomevosy Siriows@ hamarowm ein voc thye
 Sirivowse hamarovm ein oc tye kabvowyt, ajl war karmir astx. Senyekan pndvowm er, or «yerknkovm yeryewovm yen amenatarber gowyner SHovne war
 amenatarber kvovjnyer Svovn@ war karmir e, Marsy aveli khamrats e, Jowpitern endhanrabes angowjn e` ardzakelov miayn lovys. ptghomyeos Siriovsy
 lowys. Ptxomyeos Siriowse pnowthakryel e vorbyes «karmravown, hamastyexvovthjan amyenabay&ar (bolor ansarzh astgherits) astgh@, vor kvocvvowm
 astxeric) astgh@, or kvochvvowm e Shvovn». Garmir Sirivovsi masin hishatakovthjvovnnyer kareli e ktnyel naew ayl azkeri lyekendnyervowm. Cinakan
 lekendnervowm 4inakan astxakitowtjan myej astghe ko4yel yen Lan («Kayl») kam Tyanlan («YErknajin kayl»). Sima Cjani xvosqervow «yerp
 Cyani ghvosqyervow «yerb Taj֊po (Vyenera) molorak@ spitak e, ajn hamemateli e Lan astghi (Siriows) het, erp mvolorake karmravown
 molvorake karmravvovn e, hamyematyeli e Sin (Antaryes) astghi hyet»: «Erp ays astxi (Sirivowsi) charagaythnyery popvoghowm yen irenc kovyne,
 pvopvoxovm en irents kvovjn@, erkri wra haytnvovm yen shat gogher yew avazaknyer» Aynowamyenayniv, Sima TSyan@ shat wkayovthjvovnnyer e talis
 vkajowtyovnner e talis ar ayn, vor astghery mstabes pvoxovm yen iryents gvovjny, in4@ stipowm e nra xvoskyerin zgovshvowtjamb verapyervyelHavanakanvowthyovny,
 wyeraperwel:Hawanakanvovtyvovne, or yerkov astgherits myeki wra tyeghi vownecac ewvolyovtsivon kvor&entatsner@ pvokhel en Siriovsi gowyn@, myerjvvowm
 Sirivovsi kvowyny, myerzhwowm e astghagetnyeri koxmic ajn pattcharapanvowtjamp, or mi qani hazar tarin 4apazanc kic zhamanakahatwac e ew
 kic jamanakahatvac e yev hamakarkowm 4i nkatvowm oc mi mikama&vowthjown, vor@ betq e liner, etye ajdbisi armatakan popoxvowtyvown aydvowhanderd
 popvoghovthjvown aydvowhanderz tyexi vovnyecac linyer. Hnaravvor ajlentranqayin patsatrvovtjvovnn ajn e, vor «karmir» makdiry parzapyes panastyegh&akan
 parzabes banastyexcakan pvoxapyerovthjovn e` kabvats astghi vat xvorhrdansannyeri hyet. Hnarawvor e nayev, or astghi vowgex arkajcvowmy, yerp
 ovgex arkaytsowme, erp ayn &agowm kam mayr e mtnovm horizvonvovm` nran hyetewoghneri mot karmir gvovyni tbawvorowthjown e thoghelSirivovse
 tbavvorovtjvown e thvoghel.Sirivovsy aragin eryeq astghyerits meky dardzaw, ori mvot nkatwel e sepakan sharzhowm Sirivowsi, Aldyebarani ev Arktovri
 Aldyeparani yev Arktovri mot ajs sarzhvovmy haytnaperyel e Edmownd Hallyej@ 1718 tvakanin, erb Ptxvomyeosi astxajin erknqi hnagowjn
 astghayin yerknki hnagowjn katalvog@ hamematyel e 18-rd dari owsovmnasirowthjvownneri hyet Hatkanshakan e, vor ays eryek astxern ogtwac
 yeryek astghern ojtva& 4yen sepakan sharjman amenaparzr aragowthyamb, sakayn Alfa Gentavrosy YEvrvobajvowm tyesanyeli ce ir haravajin
 tesanyeli 4e ir haravajin thyekman battcharov ev Byernardi astxy Hallyeji zhamanak der haytnapyervac cher ir chnchin pajli patjarow.Siriovs
 payli patcarvowSiriovs B֊i pacahaytvowm1844 thwakanin gyermanaci hajtni astghakyet yev mathematikvos Qjvoningsbergi astxaditarani tnoren
 astxaditarani tnoryen Fridrix Pesel@ batsahaytyec, vor Sirivowsi sharjman hyetakic@ barperabar, tyeew thvovyl, sexvvovm e vovxigh k&its:
 syexvvowm e ovghix k&ic: Erknvolorti brvoyektsiajvowm ajn irenits nerkajacnvovm er taroinak aliqanman kor (Sirivowsi syepakan shargovmy
 (Siriowsi syepakan sarjvowmy bavakanin nsanakali e ew kazmvovm e tarekan 1-3 ankjvownajin vayrkjan mek tarvovm, ajd batcarvov ovxix g&ic
 batcarvow vowghigh k&ic shyeghovmner@ hnarawvor dardaw fiqsel hamematabar karj owsovmnasirvovtyvownnyeri gamanak). Ajd «shyeghvovmnyer@»
 gamanak) Ayd «seghvowmnyery» Byessele bacatryec inc-vor «thaqnwats zangvatsi» azdyecovthyamb, vore Sirivovsi hyet miasin bttwvowm e zangwaci
 miasin pttvowm e zankwatsi endhanowr kentrvoni svowrg mek ptvovjte 50 tari hashvarkvow. Patsatrowthyvovne terahawatvoryen @ndovnvyec Pesseli
 thyerahawatvoryen @ndovnwec: Bessyeli yenthadrowtyovnnerits hetevovm er, vor mvowg arbanyaki zangvacy betq e mvotavvorabes hawasar lini aryevi zangwa&in:Sakayn
 aryevi zankva&in.Sakajn 18 tari ants 1862 tvakani hovnwarin, Pyeseli kankhatesvowme paylvovn kyerpov hastatvyets: Erb 18-djvowjmanvots
 hastatwec: YErb 18-dyowjmanvots (46 santimyetranots) refraktore pordarkyelis amyerikatsi astghakyet Alwan Krem Qlarky Sirivowsi kvoxk@ poqr astgh
 Siriowsi kvoghqe pokr astgh haytnaperyec, vori ardyvownqowm batsahaytyets arpanjakajin sarzhovm@, ory hamenknovm er Byesyeli hashvarkneri
 er Byeseli hashvarkneri hyet. Da «dgvoghakan astxagitowtjan» haxtanakn er Ajs «haxtanaki» arzhyeqy 4er zijvovm Nyeptovni hajtnapyermane:Siriows
 haytnabermane.Siriovs B-n owni 8.4m tyesaneli baj&arowtjovn: Sirivovs A-its aravelagvowjns hyeranalis (11 ankjvovnayin vajrkjan),
 ankjovnayin wayrkyan), ajn kareli e tyesnyel och mye& astghaditakow. Sirivovs A-i mot ajn dgvar e tyesnyel. Ays astghn aradjin hajtnapyerva&
 aragin hajtnabyerwa& sbitak tzvovkn e yew amyenazankwa&ajin spitak tzovknerits myek@:Sirivowsi owsovmnasirman pajmannyer ev teghadrvovtjvownSirvovsy
 tyexadrvovtjovnSirvovs@ erknki harawajin kisagndi astgh e Mievnvovjn gamanak Sirivovsi shexvovmy mec ce, ayd battcharow ayn kareli
 patjarow ayn karyeli e tesnyel endhvowb mincyev 73°, nvowjnisk Rovsastani ajnbisi hyvowsisajin kaghaqnerowm, incbisik yen Mowrmanske,
 inchbisiq en Movrmansk@, Vyerkhvoyansky ev Norilske: Siriovsy pavakanin pardr e pardzranovm horizonovm (tyesanyeli darnalvow hamar)`

Aisa Eismath THaymovr (arab.` عائشة عصمت تيمور‎‎‎ kam Aisa al-THaymvovrjya عائشة التيمورية‎‎, 1840, Gahirye,
 التيمورية‎‎, 1840, Gahire, Osmanjan kajsrovtjovn - 1902, Gahirye, YEkibtosi ghedivat, Osmanyan kajsrowtjvovn), Osmanyan darasrganowm
 Osmanjan darashrjanvowm yegiptaci hasarakakan kvor&ic, panastex&, ardzakagir yev feminist. Na 19-rd dari skzpin aktiw gorcownyeowtjovn
 aktiw gortsvownyeowthyovn er tsavalowm mardvow iravvovnknyeri olvortvowm. Nra grqer@ lowys tesan ayn zhamanak, yerp YEgiptvosvovm kanajq
 yerb Egiptvosvovm kanayq haskatsan, vor islamvov nrants trwac orosh irawownqnyerits nrank zrkwa& yenMyerwar Fayez Hatyemi xvosqyervovTaymowre
 xvoskyervowThajmovry hatkansakan e nranow, or Wyenyera moloraki vra nvor hajtnapyerva& kharnarany krvowm e ir anvown@.Andnakan
 ir anvovn@.Andznakan kjanqVax kjanqTaymowry Ismayil THajmvovri dovstrn er, or@ Thvowrqakan ishkhanakan migawajri andam er Nra
 migawayri andam er Nra hajr@ THaymowrin krtvowtyan e tvel, isk hvor mahwanits heto na stanznyel e ir expor` Ahmyed Pasa Thaymvowrin
 Ahmed Pasa THaymvowrin krthelvov kvortsy 14 taryekanovm na amowsnatsyel yev texapoghwyel e Stambowl .KrthovthyovnTHajmvowri majr@ nran
 :KrthovtjownTHaymvowri mayr@ nran asyeghnakvortsovthyvovn er cankanvowm svowvoryetsnyel, sakayn hakarak nran Thajmovri hajre nran svowvorecnvovm er Xowran,
 svowvoryetsnvovm er Xovran, islamakan irawakitvovthjvovn, arabyeryen, thovrqyeren yev parskyeren: Nra hajry nran sovorecnovm er nayew yerkyer,
 sowvorecnvowm er nayev yerkyer, ori ardyovnkovm na sksec ir krakan kariyeran gryelvow ir imacac erek lezownyervov Thaymvovre nwirwa& er krthvovthjany,
 nwirvats er krtowtyany, sakajn Ekibtvosovm ajd jamanak ir syeri batjarvow na stipwac er miajn tane ovsanel. Thaymowre khtrakanovtyan
 Taymovr@ khtrakanvowtyan dem ir pvoxvoki dzajn@ barzracryec ir kra& banasteghcvowthjownnyerovm, yerb dyer 13 taryekan er 14 taryekanvowm
 taryekan er. 14 tarekanvovm na thvoxyets owsovm@ ew krakan karieran Mahmvowd Pej al-Islampvowli het amowsananalvow pattcharvov. Ir dster,
 pattcharov: Ir dster, hor yew amovsnvov mahic heto na veradarnvovm e Ekibtvos yev aystegh svovorvowm e banastyeghcakan yerker ararkan dasavandyelov
 ararkan dasavandelow hmtovtyovnner@EntaniqTajmovr@ &nvel e grakan entanikowm: nra expajre` Ahmyed Pasha THaymowr@ hetazvotox

 vov watcharakanvovthjan@, karavarman medj nyergrawyec iranakan avaganvovn. SHahe anxna kerpvow cnsowm er xzlpasneri abstambowthjovnnery.
 apstampvowtyownnyere: Ajsbyes, 1596 thvakanin Appasi hramanow vocn4atsvec xzlpasakan tyekyelow cexy Sakajn kajin tsyeghyer, vorvonk havatarmoren

 orinakov. Wax mankvowthyan tarinerits yerekhanyer@ vyercvvowm ein cnoxnerits yew tarvovm Iran, vortex islamatsvelovts hetvo nrants ovxarkvowm

 vowj@ Abbas A-i zhamanak nrank vyer ein acwel ghrvowowthyovnner vow ankarkvovthyovnnyer snowcogh owgyeri: Patsi ajn, or ayd cexeri migew

 karawarvowthjan himqyery, xzlpasakan tsexer@, oronk aveli shat yentharkvowm ein iryents cexabyet aradjnordnerin, kan tye shahin, havaknvovthyvownnyer
 sahin, hawaknvovtjvownner ovnein betvovthjan myedj xaghalvow ghyekavar der ew kam mstapyes asghatowm ein iryenc dracvonyerin barzratsnyel kah:
 dratsonerin pardzracnyel gah Pnakan e, vor ajd bolvore hankecnovm er kentrvonakan ishxanovthyan thowlatsmane: SHahy ghzlbasakan ev ayl anhnazand

 tsvowcaberyets qrdakan movqri cexi nkatmamb.Ghzlpashakan tsyegheri aznvakannyeri thvowlatsovmn ov axqatacvovm@ aknhayt erewvovm e 1576 yew 1628

 nyerkrawowme zinvvorakan carayowthjan medj.Abbas A-i karavarman shrdjanowm, @st orvos axbyovrneri, tarper zvoratyesaknerovm yndkrkwac

 tarber qo4wvor tsyexyeri nerkayatsvovci4ner: Ajsor kareli e vstah asel, or ajd haytararvovthyovny araspyel er: Sah Abpas 1 zhamanakwa
 Shah Appas 1 gamanakva aghbjovrnery /orinak Iskandar Mvownshi yew ovrishnyer/ o4 mi tyexyekvowtyownner 4en haytnvovm shah Abpasi nman mijotsarvovmnyeri
 nman midjocarovmneri masin. Hakaraky, inchpes nsovm e N.Pikvovlewskajan “Isqendyer Mownsi yew vowris hexinaknyeri haytararvovtjownnyeric
 hajtararovtjownneric hajtni e darnvowm, vor xzlbasakan tsexeri miavorvovme sharvovnakvvowm er Miajn ghzlpashakan tsyegherits myeky` tekyelyvov
 tsyexyerits mek@` thekyelyow cyegh@, vore hajax ghrvovvovthjvownner er bardratsnovm, sahi` 1596 t. hramani hamazayn, kryethe ampoghjowin vochn4atswets
 ampvoghjowin ochnchacvets yew dadarec koyvovthjown vownyenal Sah Abbasi oroq banakvovm krancvac er 120 hazar mard 44 hazar mstakan
 mard 44 hazar mshtakan zork yew 75 hazar awatatirakan asxarhazorayinner”:Hamadzajn aghpjovrneri, yowraqanchjvovr voq, vow kamawor
 jvovraqancjvowr ok, ov kamawvor yndovnwvovm er tsarayvowthjan sah Abpas A-i mot, kochvvovm er shahsewen: Avyeli vovsh, 17 d. yerkrord kesin sahsewennyer
 erkrord kesin sahsewyennyer sksetsin anvanyel artonyal kvorporaciajin, ory kazmwats er nvowjn xzlbasakan tsexyeric:Shah Abbas A-i zinvorakan
 Abbas A-i zinvorakan reform@ ovnyer voch miayn tyexnikakan kazmakerbakan, ajlyev qaghakakan nshanakovtjvovn GHzlbashakan kochwor tsegheri
 Xzlpashakan kvo4vvor tsyexeri hzorvovtjovnn ow azdyetsvowthjovn@, vor@ mye& bardvowtyownner er stegh&ovm shahi isxanvovthyany ir hawaknvovtyvownnervov
 ir havaknvowtyownnerow vow yerkbarakowtyovnnyerov, himnowin xakhtvyets Mshtakan zorqi kadryeri styeghtsowmy tovlatsryec xzlbasakan yev ajl
 thvovlacrec xzlpasakan yew ayl tyvovrqakan tsexeri zinwvorakan aznvakanvovthyan kaghakakan dyer@. Mievnvovjn zhamanak amrabndvec kentronakan
 amrabndvec kyentronakan isghanovtyovne yev vovzhexatsav kaxakaciakan pjowrvokratiaji dyery, vor@ kazmvowm er ardyen oc te thyvowrkerits,
 arden vo4 tye thjowrkeric, ayl irancineric. Incpes nsvovm e N. Pigowlevskajan yew ovrisnyer. “SHah Abbas A-i gamanakneric sksac iranakan
 gamanaknyerits sksac iranakan tarrn arden ghaghvovm e aweli mec der karawarman meg, thebet qvochwor thyovrkakan tarre der sharownakowm er

 thyovrqakan@` adrpeganakan@”:17 dari parsik patmicnyere idealakanacnvowm ein sah Apbasi andy Anshvowsht, na a4ki er ynknovm ghizaxvovthyamp,
 @nknowm xizaxowthyamp, hamardakowtjamp, enyergiayvow, hamarovtyamp ev hyetyewoghakanowtyamp kaghaqakan kitsy antskacnyelvov: Nran khort
 anckacnyelow: Nran khvort er kronakan fanatizme yev na mye& hetaqrkrasirvovthjown er drsyeworvovm yevropakan yerkrneri tekhnikaji ev njvovthakan
 tyeghnikaji ew nyovtakan argeqnyeri nkatmamp: Sakayn, hark 4ka nayew geragnahatelov nra andi dyere Irani batmvowthjan meg: Orknak,
 patmovtjan medj Orknak, razmakan hagoghvovtyvovnnern ir karavarman orvoq karyeli e pacatryel Sefyan byetowthyan akhvojanneri thvovlatsmamp
 akhvojanneri tvovlatsmamp yew shnvorhali zoravarnyeri taghandawor kortsoxovthyvownnyerov (orinak Allavyerdi khani, vorn azkvowtjamb haj er yew
 azkvovthyamb hay er yew Karcikay Movhamyed xani). Vorbes andnawvorvowtyvovn sah Abpasy kmahatch er, kaskatsamit ev dazhan Pavakan e
 kaskacamit ev dazhan: Bawakan e nshyel, or na hramajets spanyel ir awak ordvovn Syefi Mirzajin, ory bawakanin yndownak anznawvorvowthjvown er
 endvownak anznavorvovthjovn er yew mec hambav vovner, avyeli vowsh na kowratsryec ir erkov ordinerin. Gorcnyelow bvolvor vordinyerin, shah Apasy
 ordinyerin, sah Apasy poghantsyets gahe ir manvovk thvoran@ Syefi 1-in:Shah Appasy myets tegh er talis Parskastani kitnakannerin ew grvoghnyerin

Appas al-Akkad (hvownisi 28, 1889(1889-06-28) kam 1889, Asvovan, Egibtos - marti 12, 1964(1964-03-12),
 12, 1964(1964-03-12), Gahire, YEgibtos) (arab:` عباس محمود العقاد‎‎,  'Appas Mahmovd al-Akkad) , arap panastexts, ardzakagir,
 banastyex&, arzakakir, «Divan» grakan khmpaki himnadirTsnvel er Asowanowm, aba teghapoghwyel Kahirye, ortyex asxatvovm er lragrvoxakan
 ashghatovm er lrakroxakan ow mankavarzhakan gorcownevowthyamp: Krel e harjvowrits aveli grker pilisvopayovtjan, kroni ow pvoyeziaji masin.
 krvoni vow pvoyeziayi masin Arajin askharhamartits hyeto na darnvowm e Wafd kowsaktsvowthjan andamAl-Akkad@ porzowm er apatsvovcel panastyeghtsovtjan
 apatsvowcyel panastyexcvowthyan nerkin kabakcwacvovtjan anhrajestvovtjovn@` pvorzelow haxtaharyel midjnadarjan arabakan boeziaji karatsats
 arapakan bvoeziayi karaca& nvormyer@ Angliakan krakanvovthyan azdyecovtjan ardjovnqvovm nra kaxaparnyer@ ev lyezvovn pavakanin pard yen,
 lezvown pavakanin pard en, vowsti ir banastyextsvovthyvownner e nermvovcvowm meknabanvovtjovnner mitky barzyetsnelov hamar. Na himnakanovm
 hamar: Na himnakanowm krel e ir yev ir hayackneri masin Nra mvot handipvovm en naev pnvowthyan nkarakrvovthjvownnerCanothagrvovtyvownnyerKrakanvovtyovnКрымский
 nkaragrovthjvovnner:TSanvothagrvovtjownnyerKrakanowtyovnКрымский А.Е. История новой арабской литературы (XIX - начало XX века). М, 1971.Сафронов В.В. Новая арабская

Abbasjan khalifayowthyvown (arap. الخلافة العباسية‎‎), yerrvord islamakan ghalifayvowtyvownn er, ori himnadirn
 xalifajvovthjvovnn er, vori himnadirn e Abvow-l Appas@: Na syerowm er Mvovhammad margarei horyexpayr Abbasi gyerdastanic. SHovrg erkvow dar ghalifayowtyvovny
 dar ghalifajvovtyvovn@ caxkowm er, sakayn awatatirakan masnatva&vowtjvovne wyerdj i werdjvo hankecrin khalifayvovthjan ankman@ yew nwajman@
 xalifajowthyan ankmany ev nwachmane mvonghvolnyeri koghmits Karavarvvovm er Abbasyannyeri kvoxmits:Omayjannyeri tapalvowmOmayannyeri yev Abpasyannyeri
 tapalovmOmajanneri ev Abbasjannyeri bajkar@ avartwets 750 tvakanin Mijaketkovm, Mye& Zab geti apin tyexi vownyeca& vcrakan chakatamartvowm, ortex
 chakatamartvowm, vortex Omayannyer@ partovtyown kryetsin yew Omayan dinastian, or@ karawarvovm er 90 tari, tapalvets: Ishxanovthyown@
 tabalwyec. Iskhanowthyvovny ancav Abpasyannerin. Ays dinastian amyenayerkarakyatsn er ev nranq karawaryecin aveli kan 500 (749-1258 thwakannyer)
 (749-1258 thwakanner) tari: Sakajn Apvov-l Abbasy khalifa er hr4akwel dyerews 749 tvakanin, yerb apstambnyery mtan Iraki Kvowfa kaghaq.
 mtan Iraki Qovfa qaxak Apvov -l Abbasy, xalifa darnalvow, iryen kvocets «as-Safah», vor@ nsanakowm er «aratazern», sakajn ajn targmanwowm
 sakajn ayn thargmanwvowm e naev vorpyes «aryownahyex»` nkati vovnenalvow ajn pazowm sbanvovtjvovnnyere, or na katarets ir dirqere amrapndyelov
 dirkery amrabndyelvov hamar` arajin hyertin bnadjnjyelow Omayyannyeri awyeli kan 80 yerevyeli andamneri: Omajannyeric miajn myeky` Abd
 Omajannerits miayn myeke Apd al-Rahman ipn Mvowavian pakhav Ispania, ortyegh 756 tvakanin himnadryec Gvordovayi Omajan xalifayvowthyovn@
 Omayan xalifajvovthyvovn@. Omajanneri tohmi pnadjnjowme sakayn andvorrvowthyown 4peryec Abbasjannyerin. Nrants dyem yndwzets Sirian patjarn
 yndwzec Sirian. pattcharn ajn er, vor Sirian Omayannyerii orvok ghalifajvovtyan qaghaqakan kyentronn er handisanvowm, isk ajjm kentrony
 handisanvowm, isk aygm kyentron@ teghapoghwyets Iraq yev Sirian weracwets mi soworakan nahangi Nrank mi qani apstambyetsin, sakayn dranq daganvoren
 sakajn dranq daganoryen jnsvyecin al-Safahi kvoghmicLarvyecin haraperowtjvovnnyer@ naev shianeri hyet. SHianyere, ovqer ognel ein Appasjannerin
 ognel ein Appasyannerin Omajannyeri dem payqarvovm, havatatsa& ein, vor nranc tabalman dyebkvovm ishkhanovtjvowny kamtsner iryents, bayc
 kamtsnyer irenc, pajc Appasjannyere ampvoxdj ishkhanvowthyovn@ kyentrvonacretsin irenc derkvowm: Ajs hoxi wra 750 tvakanin wtangawor
 750 tvakanin wtankavvor hakaapbasyan yelvovjtnyer tyexi vownetsan Mavarannahrvowm: Ays abstambovtjan chnshman mej mec der xaghats Apow
 meg myets der xaghats Abvow Mvowslim@, ov mets der er ghaghacyel Omayannyeri tapalman kortsovm. Ajnvovhyetyew votqi kanknyecin naew Qvovfaji sianery,
 nayew Qowfaji sianyery, voronc klxavorowm er Qowfayi karawari4 Abow Salam al-GHalaly, ovm Abvov al-Abpasy hamarvovm er ir amyenawtankawor
 er ir amenawtangavor mrcakitsnerits mek@: Dra hamar na vorvosets ir tchanaparhic heratsnyel Apvow Salamin yew dra hamar na krkin dimyec
 hamar na krkin dimets Apvow Mvowslimin, vor hamadzajnvyets oknel nranc Nra hramanvov ir hawatarim mardik spanetsin Abov Salamin,
 sbanyetsin Abvov Salamin, sakajn lovrer taracecin, or nran sbanyel en xaridjinyer@.Aydvovhandyerdz, Abow al-Apbasin hajvoxwyec dimakajyel
 al-Appasin hadjvoxwyets dimakayel Abpasjanneri dem owghxvats elvovjthnerin yev zgalioren amrapndyel nvor dinastiaji dirkery:Pyetowtjan pargawatchvowmAbvov
 dirkere:pyetvovthyan barkawatchovmApvov al-Abbasi mahits hyetvo gahn ancaw nra yeghbory` Apov Jaffarin (754-775): Na handisacav ayn ghalifan, ori
 handisatsav ajn ghalifan, vori gamanak irvok hastatvyec yew amrapndwyets Apbasjan dinastiaji ishxanowthyvowne. Na iren kvo4ets «Al-Mansvowr»` «Haxtanak»:
 «Al-Mansvovr»` «Haghthanak». Kahin ancnyelovc heto, nra dem dvovrs yekaw khalifaji kahi hawaknvord, ir hvoryexpayr` Siriaji karavari4 Abdallahy,
 karavaric Apdallahy, sakajn 754 thwakanin KHvorasani karawarich Apvov Mowslimi oknvowthjamp nrank bartvovthyan matnecin Abdallahin.
 matnyecin Apdallahin Ajs gamanak al-Mansvovre sksets mta&yel Abvow Mowslimic dyerbazatvelvow masin, kani or nra azdyecik anznaworovtyovn
 azdecik andnaworovtjovn er, nran kaskatsankvov ein vyerabyervvovm, kani vor nra myeg wtankavvor mrcakic ein tesnovm. Dra hamar al-Mansvovry
 Dra hamar al-Mansvovre Abov Mowslimin hrawiryec ir palat yew hramajets derbakalyel nran yew sbanel` 755 thvakanin. Nra spanvovtyownits
 twakanin. Nra spanvowtyownic hetvo parskastani shianery abstambvovthyown barzracrecin Nisapovrvovm Nranc dem xalify 10000-anots zorq vowgharkets
 10000-anvoc zorq ovgharkyets ev xyeghdets apstampovthjvowne, incbes ajstex aynbes el Mawarannahrovm.Anhankist er naev Arapian Arapiayi
 nayew Arapian: Arapiayi vyernaxavy batrast er ognovtjan dyerk myeknel Appasjannyeri dyem handes ekvox tsankacac ovzhi, inchpisiq ein
 tsankacac vovji, in4bisik ein sianer@, voronq kentronatsyel ein Arapiajvovm: Nrank 762 thwakanin apstambovtjvown bardratsryecin ghalifaji dyem
 barzratsrecin khalifaji dyem Alii vordi Hasani cornyeri` Mvowhammadi, vow krvovm er «Maqowr hoki» titghvos@, ew Ibrahimi klghawvorovthyamb.
 Ibrahimi klxavorvowthyamp. Nranc miacan nayev Iraqi vov Hidjazi shianyery, voronq Mowhammadin khalif hrchakyecin Nranc dyem jakatamartvovm
 Nrants dyem cakatamartovm Abbasjannyer@ krkin haghthanak taran Jakatamartom Mowhammad@ spanwyec. Aynowhyetyev karvoxatsan bartvovthjan matnel
 karoxacan partvovtyan matnel nayev Ibrahimin: Aysbisvov al-Mansowrin hajvoxwyets ir sri nerkvo hamakhmbel Arapakan kajsrvowtyvovn@, baci Hyvovsisayin
 kaysrowthyowny, patsi Hjovsisayin Afrikaji yew Ispaniaji Nra anwan hyet e nayew kabwa& Aapbasjan xalifajowtjan nor majrakaxaki` Baxdadi karvovtsovm@
 mayrakaghaki Paghdadi karovcvowm@ 762 twakanin.Abvov al-Apbas@ orvoq mayrakaxak@ teghapoghwyel er Kovfa, bajts kani or ajn Alii hetevvordnyeri`
 ayn Alii hetyewordnyeri shianyeri kyentrvonn er, Abow al-Apbasy Anbarvovm karowcyec ir nstvots@, kvo4yelvow ayn al-Hasimija Isk al-Mansowry
 al-Hasimija Isk al-Mansowry 762 thvakanin Tigris keti arevmtyan apin poqrik Paghdad gyowghi vra karvovcets nor mayrakaghak, vor@ kvo4vets
 majrakaghaq, ore kvo4wyets «Madina al-Salam»` Xaghaxvovtjan qaghak, sakajn aweli gvortsatsakan er Paghdad anwanvowmy Al-Mansowrin hadjordec
 Al-Mansvowrin hagordyets nra ordin` al-Mahdin(775-785): Na sarvovnakyets dinastiaji, isxanvovtjan, betvowtyan amrabndvowmy. Nra oroq
 amrabndovmy Nra orvoq sharovnakwvovm ein sianeri hyet wechyery kabvats Abpasyanneri ishxanvowthjan orinakowthyan hyet: Ovsti nvor elovytnerits
 Vowsti nvor elovjthneric khvovsapelvov ew larwatsowthyown@ mexmacnyelvow hamar al-Mahdin mi sarq kaylyeri dimyec. Na nervovm snvorhyec 762-763
 nervovm shnvorhets 762-763 tvakannyerin Al-Mansvowri dyem pardzracrats apstambvowthjan masnakitsnerin, inchy ovnyecaw drakan ardzakanq: Dran
 drakan ardaganq Dran hakarak xist anhankist er khalifayvowthyan aryevelyan srjannern anhangist ein. Aystex Mervvovm 776 brnkwyec
 Mervvowm 776 brnkwyec apstambvowtjovn, vory glkhavorvovm er Hashim ibn Hakim@, ow iryen hamarowm er Abow Mvowslimi poghanvord. Nra
 Mvovslimi pvoghanord. Nra abstambvowthjown@ tyewyec mi qani tari, vore chnswyets 783 twakanin Al-Mahdin mahacaw 785 twakanin, na ovner
 785 tvakanin, na ovnyer 2 vordi Mowsa al-Hadin ev Harvovn ar-Raside, vow Hayastani yev Aghwanqi karavaricn er Hvor mahits hyetvo gahin
 Hor mahic heto kahin e nstvovm al-Hadin 785-786 tvakannyerin ew eghpayrnyeri meg payqar e skswvovm kahi hamar. Nrants bajqarin midjamtowm
 Nrants bayqarin migamtovm e nrants majr@: Na 786 twakanin townavvorvovm e al-Hadiin ev gahin e nstvowm Harown ar-Rashidy (Harvovn ibn
 ar-Rasidy (Harown ipn al-Mahdi Apvow Jafar al-Rashid, 786-809).KHalifajvovtyvowny Harovn al-Rashidi oroqNra orok xalifayowtyvowny
 orok khalifajowthjvovne hasnovm e ir hzorvovtyan gakathnaketin. Na sharvovnakets Apbasyan dinastiaji dirkyeri bahbanman ew ovgeghacman
 bahbanman ew vowgexatsman qaghakakanvowthyown@. Irakanovm na eghyel e mi dazhan karawarogh, ori zhamanak awyelatsan harkyer@ yev ghstacaw dranc
 harkery yev khstatsaw drants ganzvowm@ kajsrvovtjan jvoghowowrdnerits: Harstowtyowny kyentrvoncwa& er nra ew nra myerdzavvor xorhrdakanneri
 myerdawvor xorhrdakannyeri dyerkvowm. Shrajlowtyvovnnyery, animast nviratwvowthyvownnere svowvorakan erewowyth ein dardyelDra hyet mektegh na
 darzyel:Dra het mektyegh na achqatogh 4er anowm ishkhanvovtjovnn amrabndyelvov yev bashtbanyelvow harcyery Na aradjin khalifan er, vor myets ovshadrowthjvovn
 or myets ovshadrvovthyown dardzryets mvowsowlman hvokevor aradjnvordneri adjaktsvovtjany yew qaghakakan ojandakovthjvowny shahyelown talvov nranc
 shahyelvown` talow nrants me& hvoxapazhinnyer ev kalwa&knyer Dra dimac nrank amen kyerb ajaktsvovm ein Harown al-Rashidin amrapndyelow
 al-Rashidin amrabndelvow ir isghanovtyvovny. Wyergins shat zkowjsh qaghakakanowtyown er wajyelvowm shianeri nkatmamb, vorbyeszi ckrkri nrants
 vorpyeszi 4krkri nranc. Payts aynovamyenajniw na ckaroghatsav kanghel jvoghvovrdakan hvovzovmnery, orvonk himnakan batjar@ harkyer achn
 himnakan pattchary harker atchn ov drants kandman dajan metvodnyern ein YEv ayd dzhgohowthjvownneri hoghi vra 798 twakanin abstampyetsin Sistani
 apstampecin Sistani gjowxatsiowtjvown@ Nranc jnshelow hamar ovxarkwa& zvorqyere partvovthyvovn krecin ew ghalifan dadaryetsryec harkeri
 xalifan dadarecryec harkeri gandvovmy Sistani mowsowlman bnakcvovtyvovnic. Nran awyeli sat anhangstacnovm er 806 tvakanin Ghvorasani abstampvowtyvovne:
 Khorasani abstambovthjowne: Apstampnyeri thiwe hasnvovm er 100 000-i: Harown ar-Rashid@ nrants dyem owgharkowm e 20 000-anvoc panak, vore
 000-anoc panak, vor@ partvowthyovn e krowm ew apstambnre kravvovm en Samarghand@, vor@ mets hajoghowthyown er nranc hamar Sa mec
 nrants hamar: Sa myets kvorowst er khalifayvovthyan hamar, ovsti Harown ar-Raside inkn e ancnvovm myec panaki klvovx ew sarzhwvovm e
 banaki klvowx yev shargvvovm e abstampnyeri dem, sakayn chanabarhin na hiwandatsaw Thowsowm ev ajstyex el mahatsav 809 t..Towlacowm ev masnatvovmHarvovn
 th.THvovlacovm yev masnatovmHarvovn ar-Rashid@ owner 2 vordi` Mamvownn vov Amine. Na ir zharangord e nsanakvovm pvoqrin` Aminin: Sakayn 799 thvakanin
 Sakayn 799 thwakanin na popvoxovtjown e mtcnvovm ir orosman mej yev Mamvovnin nshanakvowm 2-rd garangord: Ays tarorinak vorvosmany
 Ays tarorinak voroshmane hajordvowm e ews mek@` na Aminin naew nshanakovm e Iraki, Siriayi, Arabiaji, YEgiptvosi, Hy. Afrikayi karawarvogh,
 Afrikaji karawarox, isk Mamownin nsanakovm e Ghvorasani karavarich. Amin@ iravovnk chowner Mamvovnin yerbeve zrkel ayd bastvonits,
 zrkel ayd pashtvonits, wyerdjins el betk e havatarim mnar Aminin. Ayspisov na xalifajovthyowne pazhanec 2 masi, vorvoncits jowraqancjvovrn
 orvoncic yowraqanchyvowrn vovnyer ir karawaricn ov mayrakaghak@ Baghdady yew Myerv@. Ajs anheratyes qaylvow Harvowne ankagh ir kamkits himqyer
 ankagh ir kamkic himker naxapatrastets ghalifayvowtjan bajanman hamar Aysbisvow nra mahits heto Mamvowny Aminin yndvovnyets orpyes xalif
 @ndvovnyets orpes ghalif ew havatarmovthyan erdowm twec. Thwvowm er amen inch hart e, bayc voch YEghpayrneri midjew hakamartvowtjvown sksvyec,
 hakamartvowthjown skswyets, kani vor Aminy 810 tvakanin kahi zharangord nshanakets voc thye Mamovnin, ajl ir ordvown: Mamvown@ haytnyets ir
 ordvovn: Mamvown@ hajtnyets ir anhamadaynvovtjvovne, inci hamar Amin@ hrovartak arzakec nran areveljan srdjanneri pvogharkayi pashtonic zrkelvov
 pokharkaji pashtvonic zrkyelow hamar` aydbisov khakhtyelov ir hor sahmanac 2 karyewvor nakhabayman Mamovn@ chyndovnyets nra orvoshovme: Ajs iravijakovm
 orvoshvovm@: Ays irawicakvovm Aminy paterazm sksec yeghbor dem 811 thwakanin, sakajn partvowthyown kryec Mamowni zvorker@ tanowm ein haghtanak
 tanovm ein haghtanak haxtanaki hyetyevic ew 812 thvakanin mvotetsan yew shrdjapatyecin Baxdad@ CHkarvoghanalvow vocin4 anyel` Aminy haytararets,
 anyel Amin@ hajtararets, vor patrast e hragarwel gahits hogvovt Mamvovnin. Sakayn Mamovne ajd lovr@ byerox panpyerin sbitak shabik tvyets,
 panbyerin sbitak shabik tvyec, vor@ glxi wra ekowst 4owner: Da nshanakvovm er mah nran byetq er Amini klvovkhe: 813 thwakanin Paghdady kravwec,
 thwakanin Paghdad@ kravwec, isk Amine spanwyec: Kahy antsav Mamvownin, vore karawaryets minchyev 833 twakaninKhalifajowtyan thowlatsman vov
 tvakaninKhalifajovthjan thovlatsman ov kayqajman himqyery dretsin Aminn vov Mamown@, oric hyetvo eghpayrasban hakamartvovtjovnnern vow paghovmnyer@ sovvorakan
 pakhovmnery sovvorakan erewowjt dardzan. Da hankyecryets kentronakan iskhanvovthyan yev xalifaji dirkyeri thovlatsmane, inchi hetyewanqow tovlacaw
 in4i hyetevanqvov towlatsaw hskoghvowthyowne &ayramasyeri wra, vor@ kvorcownyevovtyan layn asbarez pacec kyentronakhovjs vowgyeri hamar. Ays
 kyentronaghvowys owzhyeri hamar. Ajs bankawarovm ir nerdrowmn vovnyetsav arabakan ev parskakan vernaghaveri hakamartvowtyowny, ore tsakel er derevs
 hakamartowtyvowny, ore tsagel er deryews dinastiayi karawarman arajin tarinerin Skzpnakan srganvowm xalifanery karvoxanvowm ein araba-barskakan
 ein araba-parskakan hakamartovthyvovne pahel irents hskoghovthyan tak Sakajn ays hakamartvowtjovn@ kor&ovm er naew Aminin ew Mamovnin
 nayev Aminin ev Mamvovnin hadjvordats ghalifanyeri gahakalovtjan srdjanvovm: Ayd pajkar@ jlatec ghalifayowthjan owjery ev ir dyerakatarvowmn
 ovzhere ev ir dyerakatarvowmn ovnecav nra tkaratsman myedj. KHalifayvovthjan trvohvowmy naghapatrastox gortson yexav krona-dawanakan hakamartovthjovne
 krvona-dawanakan hakamartvowtyovne arajin hyerthin islami meg, ory aydpes el miasnakan kron chdardav yew svovnineri yew shianyeri midjev pajqary weracwets
 mijew pajqare vera&vyec paxvovmnyeri ew aryvovnali paterazmneri. Trohman gvor&von er naev ghalifajvowtyan razmakan vovzher@. Tarineri enthatsqvowm
 ovzhery Tarinyeri @ntatskowm banaky sksyets kotvorakvyel. Teghakan karawari4nyer@ steghtsowm ein irents syepakan zinwac owzhery Drowtyvovny
 zinvac vowzhyere Drowthyown@ srvets sksa& Harvown ar-Rashidits, yerb na towrqerits kazmawvorets iryenc bahapan panaky, vor@ darzaw karewvor razmakan
 darzaw karevvor razmakan vowg. THvowrqakan gvardian aynqan owgexacav, or 847 thwakanin ghalifa Vasiki mahic hyetvo khalifa «darzryetsin»
 hyetvo xalifa «darzryetsin» nra eghbory Mvowthawakilin, sakajn na sbanvyets 861 twakanin ir thvovrq hramanatarneri dzerqow ir awak vordi
 dzerkov ir awag ordi Mowstansiri kitowthjamp, vow dardav khalif yew karawarets kyes tari 861-862 twakannyerin, hetvo tvovnavorwyec.
 thvakannyerin, hyeto thownawvorvyec: Tvowrqakan kwardian pacyeipats arhamarhvovm er xalifnyerin: Ays amyene hankecryec nran, vor erkri nyersvovm kaghaqakan,

Abdowl Hamid II (septembyeri 21, 1842(1842-09-21), THvopkap@ amrvoc, Eminyvonjvov, Fathih, Stampowl, Osmanjan
 Fatih, Stambvovl, Osmanjan kaysrvovtjovn - petrvari 10, 1918(1918-02-10), Stampowl, Osmanyan kajsrvovtyown), Osmanjan kaysrovtjan
 Osmanyan kaysrvowthjan sowltan 1876-1909 thvakannyerin. Hajtni e naew «Garmir svowltan» makanvownov, vor statsel e hajkakan aryownali
 e hajkakan aryvovnali djardyer kazmakerbelow hamar: Gah parzracaw balatakan hyexasrgman hyetyevanqov, Osmanyan kajsrowthyan canr
 Osmanjan kaysrowthjan canr katsvowthjan paymannervowm: Skzpowm zyewanowm er ibrev barenorvokowmnyeri ov barlamyentakan karkyeri koghmnakits:
 barlamyentakan kargyeri kvoxmnakits 1876 thvakani dektembyeri 23-in hrcakyets sahmanadrvowtjown, styexcvats Midhat pasayi ghekavarovthyamb, Krikor
 xekawarowthyamp, Grigvor Otyani ew vowrisneri masnaktsovtyamb, shahelvov hamar «Nvor osmanneri» ow yevrvobakan petowthyvownnyeri vstahvovthjovn@.
 byetvovthyownnyeri wstahvovthyvovny: Sakayn 1878 tvakanin Apdvovl Hamid@ tsrec parlamente, hastatyets miahyetsan war4akarg (hajtni e «zvovlvovm»
 (haytni e «zowlvowm» anovnow). Mttsrets dajan kraknnvovthjown, argelyets «heghapoghowthjvown», «azatvowtyown», «Hajastan» yev ayl baryeri
 «Hayastan» yew ajl baryeri oktakvor&vovm@. Daganoren chnsec bvowlgharnyeri, makedvonacineri, arabneri, hajeri azatakrakan sargowmnere
 azatakrakan sharzhowmnyer@: pyetakan qaxakakanvovtjan makardaki pardracrec banislamizme yev panosmanizme.Abdovl Hamidi gahakalovthjan
 Hamidi kahakalvowthyan srganvowm Osmanjan kajsrvowthjan artakin kaghakakanvowthyvovn@ anhagoghowtjvovnner kryets Anglian zawthets Giprvosn
 Anklian zavthyec Kiprvosn vov YEgiptos@, Fransian` Thvovnise: 1877-1878 thwakannyeri rvows-towrkakan patyerazmi hetevankvow Osmanyan kajsrvowthyvovn@
 Osmanjan kaysrvovthyvowny kvortsrets ir yevropakan tirovjtneri zkali mase, Rovsastanin antsan Karse, Ardahann vow Batvowm@ Svowlthan@
 ov Pathovme. Svovlthan@ partawvorwyets parenvorokvovmner mttsnyel Thrakiajvovm, Makedvoniayvovm, Albaniayowm, in4pyes nayev hajapnak nahanknerovm
 hajabnak nahanknyervowm (San Styefanvoji baymanagir yev Pyerlini kvonkres): Dra pvoxaryen Apdvovl Hamide thovrq zvorkyerov yev krdyerits kazmva&
 zorqyerov ew krderits kazmwats «Hamidie» hetselagndervow Osmanyan kaysrovthyvownovm pnajndjyec aweli qan 300 hazar haj (Hajkakan kvotvora&ner
 (Haykakan kotoracner (1895-1896)). Nra orvok vovzhyexatsav yewropakan petovtjownneri tntesakan ev qaxakakan nyerthapancovm@ Osmanyan
 nerthapantsvovm@ Osmanjan kaysrovthjown: Gaysrvovthjan andamahatman vtang@ yew erkri nyerkin canr iravicak@ araj perin yerittowrqeri
 aradj berin eritthvowrkeri sarjvowm@, ew 1908-i yerittvovrqakan heghapokhvowthyvovnits hetvo Apdvovl Hamid@ stibvac wyerakangnets 1876 thwakani
 wyerakanknets 1876 tvakani sahmanadrowthyvown@. Sakayn, 1909 twakani marti 31-i hyeghasrjman anhadjvox porzic hyeto, abrili 28-in kahazrkvyets
 abrili 28-in gahazrkwets ew pantarkvyec Salvonikovm, aba pokhadrwyec Stambvovl, isk 1918 tvakanin` Manisa (Aryewmtyan Pvokr Asia), owr
 (Arevmtyan Poqr Asia), vovr yew mahatsav.Karawarman skzpnakan shrganyApdovl Hamid II-e karawarman skzbnakan shrjanovm eghel e barenorvogvovmneri
 eghel e parenorvokovmneri yew sahmanadrakan kargi koxmnakits. 1876 thvakani dyektyempyeri 23-in hrcakyel e osmanyan sahmanadrowtyowny:
 osmanjan sahmanadrowtjvown@. Sakayn 1878 thwakanin tsryel e xorhrdaran@, hastatel razmavostikanakan var4akarg, or@ hajtni e «zovlowm»
 or@ haytni e «zowlowm» anovnow Dajanvoryen jnsyel e povlgharneri, makyedonatsineri, arabnyeri, hajeri azatakrakan sharjvowmner@, hastatyel
 sarjvowmner@, hastatel e khist kraqnnvowthjvown, arkelel «azatvowthjvovn», «irawownq», «hawasarvovthjvovn», «Hayastan» yew nman ayl haskatsovtjownneri
 ajl haskacovthyownneri kvortsa&vowthjvowny. 1890-akan thvakannyerin panislamizm@ (hamaislamakanvovtjvovn) Osmanyan kaysrvovthjownowm himnakan

 e.Osmanjan kajsrvovtjan ankovmyApdvowl Hamid II-i orvok sarovnakvyel e Osmanjan kajsrovthjan ankvowme. Anklian kravyel e Kiprvosn

 hetevankvov azatagrvyel yen yevrvobakan mi sharq zhvoghowvowrdnyer, Rvovsastanin yen ancyel Karsy, Ardahan@ yev Batvowme: San Styefanvoji ev Berlini

 kvotvora&nyer@, vorvonk mets caperi en hasel 1894–1896 twakannyerin pnagndjwel e aveli qan 300 hazar mard Da arewmtahajvovthyan aragin tsexaspanvowthyovnn
 aragin tsexasbanowthjownn er. Gardern irakvor&yel en tvovrqakan zvorkyery yew hatowk stextsva& hecyelakndere, vorvonq svowlthan@ ko4yel e ir
 sowltane ko4yel e ir anvownvow` «hamidiye» Ajd aryvownali kortsovnyeovthyan hamar Apdvowl Hamidin twyel yen Garmir svowlthan makanown@:

Apd al-Rahman SHowkri (hvoktyempyeri 12, 1886 / 1304 hijra – dyektyembyeri 16, 1958 / 1378 hijra) (arap:` عبد
 1378 hijra) (arab عبد الرحمن شكري‎‎,  'Apd al-Rahman SHvowkri) , arab banastyeghc, ardzakakir, «Diwan» grakan khmbaki himnadirNa
 ghmbaki himnadir:Na krtowthjown er statsyel Myec Pritaniayvovm` SHefildi hamalsaranowm. Nra arajin divany kvo4wowm e «Arewatsaki
 kvocwvovm e «Arevatsagi lovys» (arab  ضوء الفجر‎‎ dvow al-fagr): pvoeziayi nvoratsman vyeraberjal ir hayatskner@ na nyerkayacnovm
 hajatsqnyer@ na nyerkayacnvovm e «Pvoyezian yew nra dyer@» divanvowm, ortegh nsyel e, vor banastxe&ovthjownnerowm byetq e anpajman artahaytvyen
 anbajman artahajtvyen hexinaki zkatsmvownknery, pvordz@ ew kaxaparner@ yev vo4 te kowroren hetyewen darer sarvovnak koyvowtyown vovnetsox
 sharownak gvoyovthyvovn vownecvox banastyex&akan avandvowjtnyerinSHat hacax siro teman miahyvowswvowm e mahwan tyemaji het: Orinak, «Kegheckvowthjvovn
 Orinak, «Gexeckvovthyovn ev mah» banasteghtsovtjan myeg pvoete giseryew tesnowm e ir mahatsats siretsjalin, payts yerp pvorzovm e krkyel nran,
 porzovm e grkyel nran, na norits mahnvovm e nra krkvowm «Mah@» panastyex&owtjan mej mahvane xndrovm e tanyel nran ir hyet yev mahwany
 nran ir het yev mahwany nerkayacnvowm e gyeghecik knvoj kerparov:Svovkrii` twvov yotyerord divani` «Asnanajin tsaghiknyer» (arab: الأزهالر
 &axikner» (arap الأزهالر الخريفي‎‎ «al-Azhar al-KHarifi») hraparakvovmic hyetvo sksowm yen taradaynvowtyovnnyer nra, al-Akkadi ew al-Mazinii
 al-Akkadi yev al-Mazinii midjyev gamanakakic arabakan bvoyeziayi nkatmamp nranc hayatsknyeri harcowm, in4 hankecnovm e khmpaki kazmalvow&many:
 khmpaki kazmalvowtsmany: Egiptatsi knnadatnyery yerkar gamanak SHvowkriin hamaryel yen «Diwan»-i arawyel var nerkayacvowcich.TSanothakrowthjvownnerKrakanvowtyovnКрымский

Ibn GHaldovn (hidjraampvoxjakan anvown arap.`  أبو زيد عبد الرحمن بن محمد بن خلدون الحضرمي‎‎, Abvov Zyeyd
 الحضرمي‎‎, Apov Zyeyd ‘Apd ar-Rahman bnvov Mowhammad ipn KHaldvown al-Hadrami, majisi 27, 1332, THvownis, Hafsid dynasty - marti
 Hafsid dynasty - marti 17, 1406, Gahire, Mamlvowqnyeri sovltanvovthjown), arap movsvowlman patmakir yew patmaban, gamanakakic patmakrowthjan,
 gamanakakic patmakrvovthjan, svociolvogiaji ev tntesakitowthyan himnadirnerits mekeNra grqyerits hatkabes haytni e al-Mvovkaddima (vore
 e al-Mvovkaddima (ory hajtni e naev hown Prolegomena anwamb): Girqn ir azdyetsowthyownn e ownetsel Osmanyan kaysrowthyan 17-rd
 Osmanyan kajsrovtyan 17-rd dari batmapanneri wra, in4pisiq en Haji KHalifan ev Mowstafa Naiman, vowqyer gvorcacyel yen grqvowm arka tesowtjvownnery
 arka tesvovtyownnyery Osmanjan kajsrowthyan tvowlatsovm@ yev tsaghkowmy wyerlvov&yelvow hamar: Tyeyew Ibn Khaldvovn@ hamarvvowm er mvovsvowlmanakan
 hamarwvovm er mvovsvovlmanakan ashkharhi me&agvowyn pilisvopanyeric meke, 17-rd dari evrvobaci sqolarnery yews krtvovm ein ajs grqvow.KyensagrvovthyovnIbn
 krkowKensagrvowthjvovnIpn Khaldvowni kyensakrowtjowne bawakan manramasn pahpanvyel e, kani or pilisvopan kryel e inknakensagrakan (التعريف
 inknakyensagrakan (التعريف بابن خلدون ورحلته غربا وشرقا, al-ta'rif bi-ipn GHaldvovn ova rihlathvowhvow gharban owa sarkan` Canotvovtyovn
 sarkan` &anothovtjovn ibn Khaldvowni yew nra arevyeljan ov arevmtjan chanabarhvordvowtyan masin),vorvovm baratsi nkaragrvats en ir kyanqi
 nkaragrva& en ir kjanqi bazmativ pastyer:Haytni e, vor Ipn GHaldvowne tsnwyel e THvownisvovm 1332 twakanin, andalvowsyan arapakan parzrasxarhik
 arapakan pardrashgharhik @ntanikvovm : Nra entaniki nyerkayacvowtsi4nery pazmazan bardr bashtvonnyer yen zpaghyetsryel Andalvowsvowm: 1248
 zpaxyecrel Andalvowsvowm: 1248 tvakanin Sevilyayi ankovmic hetvo isk panov Khaldvown entaniky kaghtvovm e Thvovnis: THovnisjan Hafsineri dinastiayi
 Hafsinyeri dinastiayi ishghanovthyan tak panvow Khaldown  yntaniki orvos andamner@ zpaghecryel yen qaxaqakan bastvonnyer. Naghkin palatakan
 pashtvonner. Naghkin palatakan asxatanqi bashtvonin en werakanknvovm kitnakani  bab@, aynvowhyetyev` hajry: Nra yexbayr@` novjnbes batmaban
 expayry novjnpes patmapan Jahya ipn Ghaldvowne, ashxatanki e endownwowm dataranvowm:Ir inknakyensagrakanvovm Ipn Khaldowny hisatakowm
 Ghaldowny hishatakvovm e ir armatnyer@` hascnelvov minchev Mvowhammad margarei gamanakner@` batmelvov, or syerowm e Emeni arapakan
 syervovm e YEmyeni arabakan tsyeghyerits, masnawvorabyes Hadramaowtits: Arapakan nwacowmnyeri darasrjanovm 7-rd dari ir naxniner@ yekel
 dari ir naghninyer@ ekyel ein Sewilya ev hastatvel ayntegh: ( 2429, Al-Waraq): Hetakayvowm nrank tyeghapvoghvvovm yew hastatvowm en Thvownisovm`
 hastatwovm yen Tvovnisvowm Ispaniayi vyeranvatchman kam Ryekonkistayi darashrdjanovm:KrthovtjvownIpn Xaldvowni aznwakan tsagvovme tvovjl
 aznwakan &akvovm@ tvowyl e talis nran myeknyel Maxrib yev vowsanel lavagovjn vowsowcicnyeri mot: Na stanvovm e islamakan dasakan krtowtyvovn,
 dasakan krtowthjown, syertvowm e GHvowrany, svovvorovm arabakan qyerakanvowthjovn@, hadisnyery, shariathe yew fikhy (irawakitowthjvown) yev
 (irawakitvovtyvovn) yew i hastatvovmn ajs amen in4i` stanovm e vkayakan: Matyematikos yev pilisopa, al-Apilii mot na svovvorovm e
 al-Abilii mvot na soworowm e islamakan matyematikajin, tramapanvovtjan@ yew pilisvopayvowthyany, owsanvowm Ipn Rowsdi, Ibn Sinayi, Faxr al-Din
 Sinayi, Faghr al-Din al-Razii ev al–Thvovsii krqyery: 17 taryekanovm na kvortsnovm e cnvoghnerin, owqer mahacyel ein 1348-49 thvakannerin
 1348-49 thwakannyerin Tvovnisovm prnkwats sev mah hamacharakits:Vagh shrgan` Fyes, Tlyemsen, Granada20 taryekanvovm Ipn GHaldvown@ ir
 tarekanvovm Ipn Khaldvowny ir kaghaqakan karieran sksovm e Townisi karavarich Ipn Thafrakini mvot vorpes kyeghakir qartvowghar` pastonakan
 kartowghar` bashtonakan pastathxtyer@ gryelow asghatankow: 1352 thwakanin Gvostandnvovbolsi sowltan Abov Zyejde arsawvovm e Thvownis ev
 arshawowm e Townis yew kravowm ajn: Ibn Ghaldovne ir ovsovcich al-Apilii hyet meknvowm e Maghrip` Fes: Ajstex Apvov Inan Fares I
 Ajstex Apvow Inan Fares I Marini svowlthane nran nshanakovm e tagavorakan hajtararvovtyownnyeri krakir: 1357 tvakanin sranic bkha& hyetyevanqnervov
 sranic bgha& hyetyewanqnervow na 25 tarekanvovm datapartwvowm e 22-amsya bantarkovtyan: Svowltani mahwan zhamanak` 1358 tvakanin, wyezir
 1358 thvakanin, vyezir al-Hasan ibn Omare azatvovm e nran ev nsanakvowm ir mvot gragir ashxatanki: Ajnowhetyew Ibn Xaldvovny nsanakwvovm
 Khaldvown@ nsanakvowm e naghararakan bashtoni: Tarazaynvovtyownnyer ovnenalow maxripyan vyernaghawi hyet Ibn Xaldvovn@ orosvowm e
 Ibn Xaldovn@ oroshovm e hyeranal Kranada:Fesvowm na ognyel er Granadayi sowlthan Mowhammad 5-rd Nasriin, vowsti ajntyex aknkalovm
 ovsti ajntegh aknkalowm er djerm yndvownyelovthyown: 1364 tvakanin svowlthany nran diwanagitakan arakyelovthyan e ovxarkowm Kastiliayi
 vovxarkowm Kastiliayi arqa Pedrvo Dagani mvot` hastvowthyan baymanagir stvorakrelow hamar: Na och miajn hajvoghowthyamp katarovm e
 hajvoghvowthyamp katarvowm e ir handznararakan@, ajlev mergowm Pyedrvo thagavvori aragarky mnal Isbaniajvovm yew tiranal nakhnineri zharangowtjany:
 nakhninyeri zharankowthjane: Kranadayovm Ibn KHaldvovny taradzajnvowtyvownneri meg e mtnowm wezir Ibn al-Ghatipi hyet, ow dem er nra ev sowlthani
 dyem er nra ew svovlthani merdzetsmany: SHvovtvow Ipn KHaldvowne et e owxarkvowm Hjowsisajin Afrika, isk vezire hyetakayowm sbanwvovm e:Afrikajovm
 spanwovm e:Afrikajovm Powdji svovlthan Abvov Apdallah Hafsin, ovm het Ibn GHaldvovn@ exyel er pantvowm, nran nshanakvovm e ir wezir@:
 nshanakvovm e ir vezire: Na zbaxwvovm e byerbyerakan tsexeri harkahanovthyamb: 1366 tvakanin` svovltani mahits hyetvo  Ipn Xaldvowne merzenvowm
 Ibn Khaldowny myerdzyenvovm e THlyemsyeni sovlthan Abow al-Abpasi hyet: Tariner anc na pantarkwowm e Apov Faris Apd-al-Azizi koghmits,
 Apd-al-Azizi kvoghmits, ov haxtovm e sovlthanin ev gravvovm gahy: Verdjinis mahits hetvo na heranvowm e Fes:Ibn GHaldvovni kaghakakan
 Fes:Ipn Xaldovni kaghaqakan karoghowtjvownnery parzr ein gnahatvovm hyvowsisafrikjan karavaricnyeri koghmic, minchdyer na inky hvognel er
 mincder na ink@ hvoknyel er ayd qaxaqakanowthjvownits: Ibn Xaldvowne veradarnovm e Alzhir, ortyegh aprvovm e ereq tari yew krvowm Mvovkaddiman:
 yev grovm Movkaddiman: 1378 twakanin na veradarnvowm e Thovnis, ore nwatchwyel er Apov al-Appasi kvoxmits, ev antsnvowm nra mvot ashxatanki:
 ancnovm nra mot asghatanqi Sakayn krkin tarazaynowthjownnyeri meg @nknelow` sowltani` Hadjic weradarnalovts hetvo` na heranvowm e Thovnisits
 hyeranvowm e Tovnisic Alyeqsandria, aba Kahire, ew hastatwvovm mamlovqjan tirabetvovthyan nyerqo gtnwvox YEgiptosvowm:Wyerjin tarinere
 YEkibtosvovm:Wyerdjin tarinery EgiptvosowmEkiptosi masin Ipn KHaldvovnn asel e. "Ayn mardy, vow ci tesyel YEkibtos@, chi karogh imanal islami
 karvox imanal islami zorvovthjvowne": Ayn gamanak, erp mvowsvowlmanakan pyetovtjvovnnery batyerazmner ein mghovm mimjanc dem, mamlvowqneri
 mimjants dem, mamlovqnyeri ishxanvowthjan nyerko Egibtose tntesakan ov mshakvowtayin &axkvowm er abrovm 1384 th. al-Maliq al-Zahir al-Barkowke
 al-Zahir al-Barkvowky ipn Xaldownin nsanakovm e dasaxvos Gamarijya madrasajvowm, ew kadi maliqiakan irawagitakan hamakarkowm
 iravagitakan hamakarkovm. Aveli vovs gitnakan@ katarvowm e ir Haje, ori masin waxowc crakrel er: 1388 th. wyeradarnalow Kahirye na
 wyeradarnalow Gahirye` na sarvownakovm e krthakan gvorcy 1401 th. Parkvowki vordi yew hajvord svowlthan Faragi orvoq ibn Khaldvovne masnaktsvowm
 GHaldown@ masnakcowm e monxvolakan harzakman dem, ore glkhaworvovm er Lyenk Thyemovr@: Hajvord 5 tarinyer@ na antskacnowm e Ekiptosvowm,
 anckatsnowm e Egiptosowm, ortegh lracnvovm e inqnakyensakrowthyvovn@, hamashkharhayin batmvovtyovne, yev ashxatvowm irawapanovtjan olvortowmTes

 Khaldvovn, araperenIpn Khaldovn, arapyerenIpn Khaldvovn, steghcakorcvowthjvovnner arapyer
Apdowl Paha (Abd el Baha, arab: عبد البهاءله‎‎ «strowk Paha», i cne Abbas efyendi, mayisi 23, 1844(1844-05-23),
 23, 1844(1844-05-23), Thyehran, Iran - nvoyembyeri 28, 1921(1921-11-28), Hayfa, Israjel), kronakan gor&ic, bahai krvoni himnadirneric
 krvoni himnadirnerits myeky, hajtni ajnpyes inchpes «bahayizm»:GensagrowthjvovnMirza Hvovsejn Alii me& ordin, haytni e Bahaovlla
 vordin, haytni e Pahaovlla anovnvov (arab.` Baha Allah‎‎` Astco pajl, hrasq), ayd hawati himnadir@: Apdowl Bahan &nvyel e 1844 twakani
 cnwyel e 1844 thvakani majisi 23-in Iranvovm, &nvowndic hetvo stacel e Abbas anvovne, @ndovnel e Abdvowl Baha anvovne («tsara Baha»)
 anovn@ («cara Paha») yev  ir hetaga kyanqy nwiryel e hvor owsmvovqi tara&man@:Bahaowllaji ktaki hamadajn, 1872 twakanin vaxchanwyelowts
 tvakanin vakhtchanwyelvowc hetvo, Apdvovl Pahan darzaw bahayi hamajnki glxawvor@: Abdvovl Pahan jnshwel e sowltanakan isghanovtjvownits:
 sowlthanakan iskhanovthyovnic: Erittowrqakan hexapoxvovtyovn@ 1908 twakanin azatets nran pantayin 40 tarva kalankic: 1911-1912 thwakannerin
 1911-1912 thvakannyerin Apdovl Bahan aytsyelyel e depi YEwroba ew Amyerika: Shvowtvow na ktrvovk dyewvov hyeratsel e yeritthovrkerits:Apdvovl
 erittvovrkyerits:Apdvovl Bahayi bazmatiw stex&agvorcvovtyvovnnyere krva& yen, incpes kanvon, havatatsyali hartseri ev drants batasxannyeri
 ew dranc batasxanneri teskov: Grarvac yen nra pazmathiv zrvowytsner yev dimovmnyer: Aradjin hamashxarhajin batyerazmi tarinyerin Apdovl
 baterazmi tarinyerin Apdovl Pahan eghel e Hajfayovm (ajjm` Israyyel): Na clqyets Hayfan, 4nayelvow pritanakan nawyeri (Royal Navy) gndakocowtyan@,
 Navy) kndakocvovthyany, thovrkakan xmperi wtangnyerin: Na anzamb kazmakerpyel e laynamasshtap gyowxatntesakan ashkhatanknyer, dra patcarvov
 asxatanqnyer, dra batcarov vomanc hadjvoxvel e pax4el Hajfa yev Akrye kaghaqner:1920 twakanin hasarakakan tsarajvowthyownnyeri (batyerazmi
 &arayovtjvovnneri (patyerazmi gamanak Paxyestini sovjalnyerin ognelow) hamar nran snvorhwyel e Pritanakan kaysrvovthyan aspeti titxosi:
 kaysrowtjan aspyeti titxvosi: Abdovl Pahan mahatsyel e 1921 thwakani noyyemperi 28-in Hajfayvowm:TsanvotakrovtyvownnerKrakanvowthjvovnBrowne,
