Abdovl Hamid I(osm. عبد الحميد اول‎ — Abd ül-Hamîd-i evvel, tvovrk. Birinci Abdülhamit, , Gvostandnovpvolis,
 Abdülhamit, , Kostandnvovpolis, Osmanyan kaysrvovtyvown - aprili 7, 1789(1789-04-07), Kvostandnvovbvolis, Osmanjan kaysrovtyvown), Osmanjan
 kajsrowtyvovn), Osmanyan kajsrovthyan sovlthan 1774 - 1789 thth.. Ahmyed III-i vordin e:&nownd ew vax kyankCnvyel e Kostandnvovbolis
 kjanqTsnvel e Gvostandnovbolis qaghakvovm, na Ahmed III-i krtsyer zavakn er (karavarel e 1703–1730 thwakannerin): Ahmyed III zidjyec kahe
 Ahmed III zigets gahe ir zarmik Mahmovd Iin, vovm pogharinets ir exbajr Osman III-@, ovm ir hertin pvogharinyec Ahmyedi avak ordi
 pvogharinyec Ahmedi awak ordi Mvovstafa III-e.Vorbyes gahi hawanakan garangord Apdowl Hamid@ pakwets bantovm ir avak eghpor het miasin,
 avag expvor hyet miasin, incpyes yndovnva& er ajd jamanak: Na pantowm mnats mincev 1767 thvakane. Ajs ynthatskovm nran krthel e ir mayry
 nran krthyel e ir majry` Rabia SHyermin, vow sovvoryetsnvowm er batmvowtjvovn ew vayyelchakrvowtjown:Erb mahatsav III-e, Abdowl Hamid@ darzaw
 Abdvowl Hamide darzav sowltan 1774 thvakani hownvari 21-in:GahakalovthyvownApdvovl Hamidi yerkar azatazrkowm@ nran antarper
 azatazrkvovm@ nran antarpyer er darzryel petakan kortserin yew khorhrdakannyerin myec ishkhanowtjvovn er twel. Na naev shat krvonakan yev khaxaghasyer
 krvonakan yev khaghaghaser er i &nye:Cnaya& kajsrvovthyan towyl vijakin yev sovlthani ghaghaghamet tramadrovthjany, Osmanjan kaysrvovtyvovn@
 Osmanjan kajsrovtyvown@ stibvats er wers sksyel baterazmy Rvovsastani dem. Partwelvov rovsnyerin thowrqian stipva& nvastacovcich baymanagir
 nwastatsovtsic pajmanakir knqyec, vorov tarackner zijyets rvowsnerin, paci ajd thvowjlatrets rvovsnerin kharnwyel kayserakan gvor&erin.Abdowl
 kaysyerakan kor&yerin.Apdowl Hamidy sksets barepvoxvowmneri irakanatsnyel kaysrvowthjan zinva& owgerowm Na pvordyets verapoghyel YEnicarnyeri
 wyerapoxyel Eni4arneri korpvovsy ew nawatormy Na styeghcyets hradgajin korpvows Na nayev styex&ec kayserakan razma&vowajin ingyenyerakan
 razmacovayin ingenerakan ovsvowmnakan dprocApdvowl Hamide naew pvorzyets ovzhexatsnyel kaysrvowtjan dirkyery Siriajvowm, Ekibtosowm yev Iraqovm:
 Ekiptvosovm ew Irakvovm: Sakajn nra ajs pvokr hagvoghvovtjovnner@ i ciqs yen darnvowm Xrimi thyerakxzov korstjan hyet hamyemata&.==
 het hamematac:== Canvothakrowthjvovnner 
Abdvowl Hamid II (syebtyempyeri 21, 1842(1842-09-21), Topqape amroc, Eminyvonjvow, Fatih, Stambvovl, Osmanjan
 Fathih, Stambowl, Osmanyan kaysrovthyvown - pyetrvari 10, 1918(1918-02-10), Stampovl, Osmanjan kaysrovthyvovn), Osmanyan kajsrvowtyan
 Osmanyan kajsrvovtyan sowltan 1876-1909 tvakannerin Haytni e naew «Karmir svowltan» makanownvov, or stacyel e haykakan arjvovnali
 e haykakan aryvownali gardyer kazmakerpelow hamar. Gah pardratsav palatakan heghashrjman hyetewankov, Osmanyan kajsrvovthyan tsanr
 Osmanyan kajsrowtyan tsanr katsvovthjan bajmannyerowm. Skzpvovm zyewanvovm er iprev parenorokovmnyeri ov parlamyentakan karkyeri kvoxmnakits.
 parlamyentakan karkeri kvoxmnakic: 1876 twakani dyektyempyeri 23-in hr4akyets sahmanadrovthjvown, styexcva& Midhath pasaji ghyekavarvovthyamb, Grigvor
 xyekawarvowthyamp, Grikor Otjani ev vovrishnyeri masnakcvovthjamb, shahelov hamar «Nvor osmanneri» vov ewropakan betvowthjovnneri wstahvovtjovny
 betvovtjownneri wstahowtyowny Sakajn 1878 twakanin Apdovl Hamid@ cryec parlamyente, hastatec miahye&an varchakarg (hajtni e «zvovlvovm»
 (haytni e «zvowlvowm» anvovnvow): Mttsryec dazhan graqnnovtyown, arkyelec «hyeghapoghvovthyown», «azatvowtjovn», «Hayastan» yev ajl pareri
 «Hajastan» ev ajl paryeri oktagortsowmy Dajanoren cnshyets bowlgharneri, makedonacineri, arapnyeri, hayyeri azatagrakan sharjvovmnery:
 azatakrakan sargvovmner@. petakan qaghaqakanvowthjan makardaki pardzracryec banislamizmy yew panosmanizm@.Abdovl Hamidi kahakalowthjan
 Hamidi kahakalvowtjan shrdjanowm Osmanjan kajsrowthyan artakin kaxakakanvovthjowne anhadjvoxvovthjownnyer krec: Anklian zavthyets Kibrvosn
 Anglian zavthets Giprvosn ov Ekibtvos@, Fransian Thvovnisy 1877-1878 twakannyeri rovs-tovrqakan paterazmi hyetyewankvow Osmanjan kaysrowthyovn@
 Osmanyan kajsrovtyowny kvortsrets ir yewrvopakan tirvovythnyeri zgali mas@, Rvovsastanin antsan Gars@, Ardahann ov Patowm@ Sowlthane
 vov Batvowm@: Svowltan@ partawvorwyec barenvorvokowmner mttsnyel Thrakiajowm, Makedvoniayovm, Alpaniayovm, inchbyes naew hajabnak nahanknyervowm
 hayabnak nahanknerowm (San Stefanvoji pajmanakir ev Perlini kongres). Dra pvogharen Apdovl Hamid@ tvowrq zorkerov ew krderic kazmwats
 zorkervow ev krderits kazmwa& «Hamidiye» he&yelagndyervov Osmanyan kaysrvowtjvovnowm pnagngyets aweli kan 300 hazar haj (Hajkakan kvotvoratsnyer
 (Haykakan kotvora&nyer (1895-1896)): Nra orvoq vovgyeghacaw yewrvopakan petvowthyownneri tntyesakan yew kaxaqakan nertapantsovme Osmanjan
 nyertapancvowme Osmanyan kaysrvovthyvown: Kaysrowthyan andamahatman wtank@ ev yerkri nerkin tsanr iravijak@ araj byerin erittvovrkeri
 arag perin yeritthowrkeri sharjvovmy, yew 1908-i yerittovrqakan hexapokhvovthyvovnits hyeto Abdvovl Hamide stipwa& vyerakanknec 1876 tvakani
 verakanknyets 1876 thwakani sahmanadrowthjovny. Sakayn, 1909 tvakani marti 31-i hexasrjman anhagogh pordits hyetvo, abrili 28-in kahazrkvyets
 aprili 28-in gahazrkwyec yev pantarkvyets Salonikvovm, aba pvoghadrvyec Stambvovl, isk 1918 thwakanin` Manisa (Aryewmtyan Pvoqr Asia), vovr
 (Aryevmtyan Pvoqr Asia), vovr yev mahatsavGaravarman skzbnakan shrganeApdvowl Hamid II-@ karavarman skzpnakan shrjanvovm yexyel e paryenvorokvowmneri
 yexel e barenvorogowmnyeri yev sahmanadrakan kargi koxmnakits. 1876 thvakani dektyemberi 23-in hrcakyel e osmanjan sahmanadrvovtjvown@
 osmanyan sahmanadrowtyvowny Sakajn 1878 thwakanin tsrel e ghorhrdarane, hastatel razmaostikanakan varchakarg, ory hajtni e «zowlowm»
 vore hajtni e «zvovlvowm» anvovnow Dajanoryen cnshel e powlgharnyeri, makedonacinyeri, arabneri, hayyeri azatagrakan sarjvowmner@, hastatyel
 sarjovmnyere, hastatyel e xist kraknnowthjvovn, arkelel «azatowthjovn», «iravownq», «havasarovtjown», «Hayastan» yev nman ayl haskatsowthyovnnyeri
 ayl haskacowtjvownnyeri gvortsatsowthjvown@ 1890-akan twakannerin panislamizm@ (hamaislamakanvowthyovn) Osmanjan kajsrvovthjvovnvowm himnakan
 kajsrowthyownvowm himnakan kaxaqakan ovxxovtjownn er, ori himkowm islam dawanvox jvoghowowrdnyeri qaxakakan miaworman yew panthvowrkizmi
 miaworman yew banthowrkizmi thovrqalezvow zhoxvowvowrdnyerin myek byetovtjan myedj miavvorman gaghaparaghvosowtjvownn e:Osmanyan kaysrvowthjan
 e:Osmanjan kajsrvowthyan ankvowmyAbdowl Hamid II-i orok sharvownakvel e Osmanyan kaysrovtjan ankowm@. Anglian grawyel e Kibrosn
 Anglian kravyel e Giprvosn ov Egiptose, Fransian THvownise: 1877–1878 tvakannyeri rvovs-tovrqakan baterazmi hyetewankow azatakrwel yen
 hyetevanqvov azatagrvyel yen evrobakan mi sarq joxvowovrdner, Rovsastanin yen ancyel Gars@, Ardahan@ yev Patowme. San Styefanvoyi ew Byerlini
 Stefanvoyi yew Berlini paymanakrerov (1878 tvakan) svowlthane bartawvorvel e paryenvorvogvowmnyer katarel Trakiajowm, Makyedoniayvowm,
 THrakiayvovm, Makedvoniajvovm, Alpaniajovm ev erkri hajapnak nahangnervovm: Sakayn dran hyetevyel yen hajeri kotora&nere, vorvonk mec chaperi
 kvotvora&nyere, voronq mec chapyeri yen hasel 1894–1896 thwakannyerin bnajndjvel e avyeli qan 300 hazar mard. Da arewmtahajowthyan arajin tsyexaspanowtjvownn
 arajin tsyeghasbanovtjownn er: Gardyern iragorcel en towrqakan zvorqyere ev hatovk styeghcwa& hecyelagndery, oronq svowlthane kvo4yel e ir
 svovltany ko4yel e ir anvovnvov` «hamidiye» Ajd aryvownali kvortsvowneovtyan hamar Apdowl Hamidin tvyel yen Garmir svovlthan makanowne
 Karmir sovlthan makanvowne: YEritthvowrkyeri hyeghashrdjvowmic (1908 twakann) hyeto Abdovl Hamide harkadrva& wyerakanknyel e 1876 twakani sahmanadrvowtyvovne,
 tvakani sahmanadrowthjowne, sakajn 1909 thvakani marti 31-in ir kazmakerpac hyeghasrjman anhadjox pordzits hetvo` aprili 28-in, gahazrkvyel
 aprili 28-in, kahazrkvel e ev aqsorwel.CanothakrvowthyvownnerArtaqin hghowmnyerApdowl Hamid II-i masin Hajkakan Hanragitarano
Apdovl Baha (Abd el Baha, arab` عبد البهاءله‎‎` «strovk Paha», i &ne Abbas efendi, mayisi 23, 1844(1844-05-23),
 23, 1844(1844-05-23), THyehran, Iran - noyemberi 28, 1921(1921-11-28), Hayfa, Israjyel), kronakan gvorcich, pahai krvoni himnadirnyerits
 kroni himnadirnerits mek@, haytni ajnbyes inchbyes «bahajizm»:GyensagrvowtyovnMirza Hovsejn Alii me& ordin, haytni e Bahavowlla
 ordin, haytni e Pahavowlla anvownow (arab-` Paha Allah‎‎` Asttsvo payl, hrask), ajd hawati himnadire: Apdvovl Pahan cnvyel e 1844 twakani
 tsnvel e 1844 thwakani mayisi 23-in Iranvovm, tsnvowndic hetvo stacel e Abpas anvowne, @ndvownel e Apdvowl Paha anvown@ («tsara Baha»)
 anvovne («tsara Baha») yew  ir hyetaka kyank@ nviryel e hvor vovsmvovqi taratsman@:Bahaovllaji ktaki hamadzayn, 1872 thvakanin waxtchanwelovc
 twakanin vaghjanwelovc heto, Abdvowl Pahan dardaw pahaji hamajnqi glkhavvore: Apdovl Bahan cnshwyel e sovlthanakan isghanvovtjovnits:
 sovltanakan ishkhanvovtyownits: Erittovrkakan hyeghapvokhowtyovne 1908 twakanin azatyets nran pantajin 40 tarwa kalankic: 1911-1912 thwakannerin
 1911-1912 tvakannyerin Abdvowl Pahan ajcelel e dyepi Ewroba ew Amyerika: SHowtow na ktrowk dyevvov heracyel e eritthvowrqyerits:Abdovl
 erittvowrqyeric:Abdovl Pahayi pazmatiw styeghcagortsvowthyvownnere grvac en, inchpes kanvon, havatatsyali harceri yev dranc patasxannyeri
 ev dranc bataskhannyeri teskvow: Grarwa& yen nra bazmathiw zrvowycnyer yev dimvowmnyer: Aradjin hamasgharhayin paterazmi tarinerin Abdvowl
 baterazmi tarinyerin Apdowl Pahan yeghyel e Hajfajvowm (ajgm Israjyel): Na 4lqets Hajfan, 4najyelov pritanakan navyeri (Royal Navy) gndakotsvowtjane,
 Navy) gndakvocowtjany, towrqakan xmberi vtangnerin: Na anzamb kazmakyerbyel e laynamasstab gjowghatntyesakan askhatanqnyer, dra batcharow
 asghatanqner, dra batjarvov vomants hadjoxvyel e paxcel Hayfa yew Akrye qaghakner:1920 tvakanin hasarakakan &arayvovthjovnneri (paterazmi
 carayvovthyvovnnyeri (baterazmi gamanak Paxestini svovyalnyerin oknelvow) hamar nran snorhvel e Pritanakan kajsrovtjan asbyeti titxvosi:
 kajsrvowtyan asbeti titxosi: Abdowl Bahan mahatsyel e 1921 thvakani nvojembyeri 28-in Hajfajowm:TSanvotagrvovtyovnnerKrakanowthyovnBrowne,

Apvov Baqr (573-634), ampoxjakan anovn@` (arap. أبو بكر الصديق‎‎, Abov Paqr al-Siddik kovjsi hajr jsmartaxos)
 kvovjsi hajr cshmartakhos) 4ors vovghghahavat xalifnyeric (Apov Baqr, Omar, Osman, Ali) araginy, isxyel e 632-634 tvakannerin Na aydbyes
 twakannyerin: Na ajdbyes e kvochwyel, vorowhyetew nra dvovstr Ajisan amovsnaca& er Mvowhammad markaryei hyet.Abow Baqre yev Mowhammad markaryenMowhammad
 Movhammad markarenMowhammad markaryei mahvanic hetvo mvowsvowlmanakan hamajnqin anhragesht nvor aradjnord: Apvov Paqr@ mekqaci harovst vajarakan
 myekkaci harvowst wacharakan er, Mvowhammad margarei mtyerim @nkern vov zinakice. Hamarvowm e islam @ndownats aragin tghamardkantsits: Min4yew
 tghamardkancits Mincev Medina tyexapokhvele, bawakanin me& finansakan ognvowtjovn er tramadrovm movsvowlmanakan hamaynkinMedinayvowm
 hamaynqinMyedinajvovm Abvov Baqre aweli mtyermatsaw Mvovhammadi hyet` ir dstere` Ayishajin, knvovthyan talvow vyerginis: Apvov Pakry
 werginis Apow Pakr@ vovxektsovm er Movhammadin ir polor chanabarhvordvovtjownneri yew razmarsavnyeri gamanak, sakajn andzamp yerbyeq
 sakayn andzamb erbeq chi xyekawarel oreve nshanavor qaghakakan kam razmakan arsav: Islamakan aghpjovrnyer@ Apow Baqrin bnvowthakrvowm
 Abov Paqrin pnowtakrowm en mexm pnavvorvowthyamp andznavorowtjvown` zvovrk isxanasirvovthyovnits ew parasirowtjovnic.Mvovhammad markaryei
 parasirvovthjvovnic:Mvowhammad margarei mah@ mvowsowlmanakan hamaynkin kanknecryets pard yntrvovtyan ardjyew, kani or markaryei hyexinakvovthjown@ aynkan
 hyeghinakvovthyvovne ajnqan mec er, or voreve meky novynisk pvorz cher arel mtatsyel abagaji masin kam batkyeratsnyel kjanke arants Mvowhammadi,
 kjanqe aranc Mvowhammadi, sakajn nvor arajnvord @ntryel@ anhrajest er Mowhajirneri ew ansarnyeri yerkaratyev knnarkvovmnerits hyeto oroshwec
 knnarkvowmneric hetvo voroshwyec vowmmayi nor aragnvord @ntrel Markarei zinakitsnerits Apow Paqrin. avandowtyvovn@ wkayvovm e, vor Mowhammad@
 vkayovm e, vor Mvowhammad@ yevs Abov Baqrin tyesnowm er orbyes iryen hajord yew patahakan ce, vor ir hiwand exa& jamanak, axvotqi gamanak
 zhamanak, aghvothqi jamanak hyenc nran er nsanakel` iryen nyerkayatsnelvow hamar. Abdallah ibn Osman Apow Bakr al-Sadiky dardaw arajin
 al-Sadike darzaw aragin ghalify ew sksvyec vowxghahawat xalifneri karawarman srjan@Apow Pakr@` khalifKlghawvoryelvov mowsvovlmanakan
 ghalifGlxavvoryelvow movsowlmanakan hamajnqe Apov Baqry pavakanin hamyest kjanq er varowm, endgcelvov, or inqe vovxxaki hamarvvovm e markarein
 hamarvowm e margarein trvats vovxteri katarox@ Abov Bakry karavaryec yndamene erkvov tari, bayts ajs yerkvov tarovm nran lvowrdj pordowthjownner
 lowrdj pvorzovthjovnner ein sbaswvowm, qani or Mvovhammadi mahy aradj er berel khrowvovthyovnnyerMeqqajic yew Medinayic herov gtnwvogh
 Myedinajits herov ktnvvogh srjannyervovm aktivatsel ein kyegh&-margarenery  Tvowleyh@, Sajah@, Movsyeylim@: Ays paymannervovm Abvov Baqre
 baymannyervowm Abvov Bakr@ stipwa& er vtchrakanovthjovn ev nvowynisk kvobtvovtjovn covtsaperyel islami miakovtyovny yew ambvoghjakanovtjvovne
 ev ampoghjakanowthjvowny bahpanelvow hamar. Aryevelyan tsyeghyere, vorvonk hrajarvovm ein wcarel sadak@, sarjwvovm yen dyebi Medina` kyeghts-markarye
 Myedina` kyexc-margarye Sadjahi glxavorovtjamp: Mowsvowlmanner@ hetapndovm yew gakhdjakhvowm en abstambnerin, isk inke Sadjahy pakh4vowm
 ink@ Sagahe pakh4ovm e Iran, vortex hyetagayowm yndownvovm e islam: Ajnvowhyetyew jakhjaghwyets Tvowhyeyle ev hpatakyecwets arabakan harawy
 hpatakecwets arapakan haravy` minchev Oman yew Hadramavovth, ev wyerdjapes movsowlmanakan banaky hrchakavor hramanatar Khalid ipn Validi klkhawvorvowtyamb
 Validi glghawvorvovtyamb bartovthyan matnyets Mvowsyejlimi jvokatnerin, isk inq@ Mvovsyeylim@ sbanwets. Ajs paykarovm ynkan eryesvown hafiznyer
 @nkan yeresvown hafizner (mardik, owqer angir hishowm ein GHovrany), orits hyetvo Apvov Pakre hramayyets, vor hafiznyere o4 miajn angir
 hafiznyer@ och miayn angir hisen, ayl nayev thyeladren Svovrb grovtyan arzhyekawor hatwacnery.Avartyelvov pajkar@ Mowsyeylimi dem` KHalid
 Mvowsyeylimi dem Khalid ipn Walidy ghalifi hramanov sharjwets dyebi YEprat, bartowthyan matnelow Irani sahin sghtanyeri martvovm ew kravecin
 sxtaneri martowm yev kravetsin Hiran  Laxminyeri majraqaxaq@: paghestinowm KHalide pjovzandakan panakin partovtyan matnyets Agnadayni mvot.
 matnyec Agnadajni mvot. ajs haghtanaky chanaparh bacec debi Siria. Ir zorkeri hajvoghvovthjownnyeri shnvorhiv Apov Pakre statsav Siriayi
 Paqr@ statsav Siriaji nvajogh makanowne, sakayn Abvow Baqrin wichakwats cher tyesnel islami taracvowme Arapiayi sahmanneric dvovrs:
 Arapiayi sahmannyeric dvovrs: Na hivandatsyel er min4yev Agnadajni jakatamart@ ew showtov mahanvowm e abryelov watsvovn eryeq tari. aynqan,
 watsvovn ereq tari. ajnqan, orkan margaren Nran hvovxarkawvorel en Mowhammad markarei koxqin` Margaryei mzkithvovm: Mahanalvovts aradj
 mzkithvovm. Mahanalowts arag Abov Pakre hascrel er iren hadjord nshanakel Omar ipn Ghattapin:AghbjvovrnyerИслам энциклопедический словарьИслам
 энциклопедический словарьИслам классический энциклопед
Apdowl Baha (Abd el Baha, arap. عبد البهاءله‎‎ «strvowk Paha», i cnye Appas efendi, majisi 23, 1844(1844-05-23),
 23, 1844(1844-05-23), Thyehran, Iran - noyembyeri 28, 1921(1921-11-28), Hayfa, Israyyel), krvonakan gvorcich, pahai krvoni himnadirnyerits
 kroni himnadirnerits myeky, hajtni ajnbyes incpes «bahajizm»:KyensakrvowtyownMirza Hovsyejn Alii myets ordin, hajtni e Bahaowlla
 ordin, hajtni e Pahaowlla anovnov (arab.` Paha Allah‎‎` Astcvo payl, hrashq), ayd hawati himnadire: Apdovl Bahan &nwyel e 1844 thvakani
 tsnvel e 1844 twakani mayisi 23-in Iranvovm, tsnvowndits hyeto stacel e Appas anowne, yndownyel e Abdvowl Paha anvovn@ («&ara Baha»)
 anvowny («tsara Baha») yew  ir hetaka kjank@ nwirel e hor owsmowki taratsmany:Pahaowllaji ktaki hamadayn, 1872 thwakanin vakhcanvelowts
 twakanin vaxjanvelovc hetvo, Abdowl Pahan dardaw bahayi hamajnki glkhavvore: Apdvowl Pahan chnsvyel e sowltanakan isxanowtjvovnits:
 sowltanakan ishxanvovthyvovnic: YEritthovrqakan hyexapvoghowtyvowne 1908 thvakanin azatyec nran bantayin 40 tarwa kalanqic: 1911-1912 thwakannerin
 1911-1912 twakannerin Abdowl Pahan ajtsyelyel e debi YEwrvopa yev Amerika: SHovtow na ktrvovk zevvov hyeracel e eritthvovrqerits:Apdowl
 yeritthvovrqyeric:Apdowl Bahaji pazmathiv stex&akvortsowtyvovnnyer@ grvac yen, incpyes kanon, havatacjali harcyeri yev drants patasxanneri
 ev drants batasghannyeri tyesqvow: Grarwats yen nra pazmathiv zrovycner ev dimowmner: Arajin hamaskharhayin patyerazmi tarinyerin Abdvovl
 patyerazmi tarinyerin Apdvowl Bahan yexyel e Hajfayvovm (ayjm` Israyyel): Na 4lqyets Hayfan, chnayyelow pritanakan navyeri (Royal Navy) gndakvo&vowthyan@,
 Navy) kndako&ovthjany, tvovrkakan ghmpyeri wtanknyerin: Na anzamb kazmakerbyel e laynamasshtab gyovxatntesakan ashxatanknyer, dra pattcharvov
 asxatankner, dra patcarvov omants hadjoghvel e pakhchel Hajfa yew Akrye kaghakner:1920 thvakanin hasarakakan tsarayvovthjvownneri (baterazmi
 tsarayovthjownneri (batyerazmi zhamanak paxestini svowjalnerin ognelow) hamar nran snvorhwyel e Pritanakan kaysrowthyan aspyeti titghvosi:
 kaysrvowthjan asbeti titxvosi: Apdovl Bahan mahatsel e 1921 tvakani nvoyembyeri 28-in Hajfayvowm:CanotagrvovtjvownnerKrakanovtjownBrowne,

palat Apdin (arab:` قصر عابدين‎‎), batmakan palat Gahirevowm, aystyex e asxatowm Ekibtvosi naghagahe Teghakajwa&
 naghagahy: Teghakaywats e Kasr el-Nil pvoxoci vra, kaxaki arewyeljan masvowm.Garvovcovmy sksvyel e 1863 thwakanin yev tewel e 10 tari:
 thwakanin ew tewel e 10 tari: Pastvonakan palate batsvel e 1874 twakanin: Garvovtsman gowmary balati kazmyel e 700 000 yegibtakan fovnt,
 000 yekiptakan fvownt, kvowmarac 2 milion fownt nersi kahaworman hamar:palatvovm ka 500 senyak. Arqajakan @ntaniqe vyerin harkvovm
 entaniky verin harkvovm e apryel ev dra patcarvov ayntex voc mi popvokhovtyovn chi katarvyel, or zbosasrjiknere tesnyen ayd tyeghy: Nerkevi
 tesnen ajd tegh@. Nyerqyewi harkyervowm kan arqajakan @ntaniqnyeri, naghagahakan nvyerneri, zyenkeri ew ayl tankarannyer:palat Abdin@ hamarwvowm
 thangarannyer:Palat Abdine hamarvvowm e ashkharhi lavakvovyn palatnerits mek@. Palati hawaka&ovn nyerarvowm e nkarnyer, jamacovjcner ev ajl nyowtyer:
 zhamacowjtsner yew ajl nyowther: Ays palatovm kazmakyerbwvowm yen tarper midjvotsarvovmnyer:Patekerasrah&anvothagrovtjvovnnyerEgypt’s Royal Archives:
 midjvocarvovmnyer.patekerasrah&anotakrowthjovnnyerEgypt’s Royal Archives: 1922-52historical Abdeen Palace: Archives housed in the pala
Adaleth Aghaoghlow (i &nye Sjvovmer, hoktyemberi 13, 1929(1929-10-13), Nallyhan, Ankara, Gyentronakan Anatolia,
 Kentronakan Anatolia, Towrqia), tvowrk grox yev dramatovrg: Hamarvvovm e 20-rd dari tvovrkakan krakanowtjan amenahajtni vipasannyerits
 amyenahajtni wipasanneric mek@: Na nayev gryel e essenyer, hishvoghovtjvownner yew patmwatskner:KyensagrowthyvovnFathma Inajth («Adalyeth») Sovmyer@
 Inajth («Adaleth») Svowmyer@ tsnvyel e Ankaraji nahangi Nall@han kyowghvovm, ortex hajakhel e tyexi tarrakan dbrvoc@: Yntaniki hyet miasin
 @ntaniki het miasin tyexapoghvyel e Ankara, vortegh statsyel e mignakarg krtvowthyvovn yew hajaxel gimnazia: YEritasard tariqovm nra
 YEritasard tarikvowm nra vra mye& azdetsowthyvown e vownyecel Ryeshat Nvovri Gyvovntyekini «Tsakhasaryak` yerkox tr4vown» weby: Ankarayi hamalsaranvovm
 Ankarayi hamalsaranvovm svovvoryel e franseren lezvow yew grakanowthjvown: Masnaktsvowtyvovn e ovnetsyel kaxaki grakan kyankin, hatchaghyel e
 krakan kyanqin, hatchaxel e Yaha Kyemal Byeyatlii, Ahmyed Hamdi Tanb@nari yev Orhan Vyelii cyerekvowjthnerin:1951 thwakanin Adalete ashxatanki
 thwakanin Adalyet@ asxatanqi e ancel Ankarayi pyetakan radiojvowm (TRT-i nakhorde): Ajntyex ashghatel e orbyes dramatovrk ew tharkmanich: Ajs
 dramatvowrk yev tarkmani4: Ays zhamanakasrdjanvovm na gryel e ir grakan aradjin styexcakortsowtyownnyer@: 1955 tvakanin amvovsnatsel e inzhyener
 amowsnacel e ingener Halim Axaoxlowi hyet, vori hyet yerkov tari bnakwyel e Miatsjal Nahangnyerovm: Batsi radivoji ashkhatanqits, 1961
 radioyi asghatankic, 1961 twakanin ynkyernyeri hyet miasin himnyel e Ankarayi aradjin masnawvor tatrvone` «Meydan Sahnesi»: Chnaya& dran,
 Sahnesi»: Cnaja& dran, nra aragin pyemadrowthyowne mets hagoxowthyown chi ownetsyel:1970 thvakanin na toghyel e radioyi ir asxatanky
 radioji ir askhatanky yev krel ir arajin «Parkel yew mahanal» vep@, vory 1973 twakanin tbagrwyel e Stampvowlovm: Dran hajvordel yen
 Stambowlovm: Dran hadjvordel en poqr &awali batmva&knyeri 4 hatvorner yev yevs 8 wyeber, voronq arzhanatsel yen krakan tarpyer mrtsanakneri: 1975
 tarpyer mrtsanakneri: 1975 tvakanin nra «Pardzr larwa&vovthjown» patmwa&kneri jvoghvovacovn (tovrk.` Yüksek Gerilim) statsyel e Sait Faiqi
 statsyel e Sait Faiqi grakan mrcanak, isk nra «Im karoti papvowk vardy» (thovrk.` Fikrimin Ince Gülü) vepy stacyel e Madaralii
 wyep@ statsel e Madaralii mrtsanak: 1980 thvakanin statsel e Orhan Kyemali grakan mrtsanak: 1983 twakanin krox@ Ankarajits tyexapoxwyel
 Ankarajits teghapvokhwel e Stampvovl:1998 tvakanin Aghaoxlovn statsel e Anatoliaji ew Ohayvoji hamalsaranneri batwavvor doktvori gitakan
 batvavvor doktori kitakan astijan:== TSanotakrvowtjownner 
Ayn Xazal ( arap`. عين غزال , 'Ayn Ghazāl , "Gazyeli axpyowr") - Hordanani majrakaxak Ammani kaxaqatsiakan
 Ammani qaxaqatsiakan odanawakayanic erkov kilomyetr dyepi hyvowsis-arewmovtq enkac hnavayr: Zpaghecnovm e motavvorabyes 15 hektar
 mvotawvorabyes 15 hyektar taracq, bnakecvats e eghel m. t. a. 8440 - m. th. a. 6500 thvakanneri midjakaykvovm: Naghakaryedaryan-karedaryan
 Naxakaryedaryan-qaryedaryan gamanakneri ajs pnakawajry hamarvvovm e Migin Aryewelqvovm hajtnaberva& nakhapatmakan amyenayndardzak pnakawajre:Pyexovmnyeri
 pnakawajry:pexvowmneri patmvovthyvovnHnavajry haytnabyerwel e 1974 thvakanin, janaparh anckacnyelvov nbatakvov irakanatswac askhatanknyeri
 irakanacwats ashkhatanknyeri zhamanak: Hnagitakan peghovmern irakanacvel en 1982 - 1985 , 1988 - 1989,  1993 - 1996 twakannyerin, in4pes
 thwakannyerin, incbyes nayev` 1998-in, Garri O. Rvolefsoni ghyekavarvowtyamb:Bnakavayr@Skzpnakan shrganovm` Kristosic aradj motawvorapyes
 Qristosic aradj motavorabes 7000 thwakanin, pnakawajrn zpaghyecryel e 10-15 hyektar taratsq, vovnyecel e shvowrj 3 hazar bnakic` cors-hing
 hazar bnaki4` cors-hing angam avyeli, kan asgharhi hnagovjn qaghak hamarvvogh Erikow@ ayd nowjn zhamanakasrganowm: Sakajn m. t. a.
 jamanakashrjanowm: Sakayn m. th. a. 6500 tvakanin pnakcvovtyovny motaworabyes vets angam nvazyel e (havanapar` shrdjaka migawayrowm tyeghi vownyecats
 migavajrowm teghi vovnyetsac klimajakan popoghovthyvownneri hyetewankvov):Skzbnapes da yexyel e tipik naghakaryedarjan-qaryedaryan kyovghakan
 nakhaqaredaryan-qaryedaryan kyowxakan pnakavayr, vor@ ktnvyel e dyebi dashtavayr nayvogh kokaworvowthyovnowm: Tner@  karvowcvac yen yexel hovm kawits
 karovtswac en yeghel howm kawits trcva&, zvovgaheranistyeri kam khoghovaknyeri dyev ovnecvox aghjovsnervow: Paghkatsa& yen eghyel myek hamyematapar myec,
 myek hamyematabar mye&, karakvovsadzew senyakits yev mek pvoqr nakhasenjakits: Pater@  drsits tsepvel en kawvow, nersic` alepastrvow (tsepwatsq@
 alebastrvow (tsepva&k@ eryek-4vors tarin mek angam tarmacvel e): Bnakicnyer@ zbaxwel yen gjovxatntesvovtyamp , msakel yen hatsahatikayin
 mshakel en hacahatikajin bowjsyer` gari ev tsoreni hnagvovyn tesaknyer, endawornyer olor, vosp, lvobi, novs, kyowghits dowrs taracvvogh
 kyvowxic dovrs tara&wogh dashtyervovm aracecrel yen ay&yer: Snndi bashare hamalrel en vorsvordvovthjan haswin. vorsatsyel en yexniknyer, kazyelnyer,
 yeghniknyer, gazyelnyer, wajri xozyer, cirer, napastaknyer ew ajln:MsakovytyAin Ghazal-i bnakichnern irents hankovtsyalnerits vomants
 hankovcyalnyerits vomants taxel yen tneri hataki nyerkewowm (hatchakh` kank@ aranzin, aweli ghvor posowm, or@ hnagyetneri kvoxmits myeknabanwvowm
 koxmic myeknapanwvovm e vorbyes naghninyeri nkatmamp bashtamovnqi artahaytvowthjvovn), mjowsnerin kyvovghi srgaka hoxyervovm: Mardkayin
 hvogherovm: Mardkajin marminnyeri mnacvordner en hajtnaberwel naew taponnyeri zyetexman npatakvow porvac hatvowk poserovm: Da wkajvowm
 pvosyervowm: Da wkayvovm e, or aystegh gvoyvovthjvown en ovnetsel hvovgharkawvorvowthjan &isakarker, sakajn derews anvorosh e mnovm, the kvonkryet
 e mnovm, the konkryet ovm hamar en kirarwel ayd &esyery, inc chapanishnervov yen @ntrwyel hangowtsjalnery:Tarpyerakvac ev cisakargajin
 hankovtsyalnyere:Tarpyerakwa& yew &isakargajin nsanakovthjown vownyetsac vorvosh karowcwa&kneri srgakajkvovm hajtnapyervyel yen araroghakargvow taxva&nyeri marminneri
 taghwatsneri marminneri mnacvordner, orvonc kvoxqin ktnwel yen alyebastrye mardanman qandakner: End orowm` ajd qandaknerowm mardik
 qandaknerowm mardik artatsolvats en bnakani kes chapervov: Qandaknyeri wra patkervac en mazyer@, zkestnyere, oros debqerovm batkernyer
 depkyervowm batkernyer kan naev marminneri vra: Acqyere vostryeatip kyendanineri ghetsinyeric yen, piper@ djowthits (bitvowmic):@ndhanovr
 (pitvovmic):Yndhanovr armamb haytnabyerwyel e 32 tsepatsvo figowr. 15-y liachap,  nowynqan el` kisandriadzev, ev erkow klvowxneri pekorner:
 glvowkhneri pekvornyer: Kisandriadzev fikvowrneric ereki wra exel e krknaki klvovkh, bajts dra imastn vov nsanakovtyown@ dyeryevs mnvovm

Ajn GHazali ardanner ('Ain Ghazal Statues), Hvordananvovm, Ajn GHazalvowm haytapyervac mi sark monvovmental
 mi sarq mvonvovmyental krakare cepa&o yev exyegya arzanner, oronk twakrvowm yen Nakhaxetsekor&akan nyevolit P gamanakahasrdjanin: Hajtnaperwyel
 gamanakahashrdjanin: Hajtnapyervyel yen 1983 ew 1985 thwakannyerin yerkvow stvorgyetnya thaqstvotsnerowm, yndhanvovr twvov 15 kisandrinyer yew 15 ardzanner,
 kisandrinyer yev 15 arzanner, vorvonq steghtswel en mvot 200 tarinyeri entatsqvowmM. th. a. 7-rd hazaramyaki keserin ev 8-rd hazaramyaki
 yew 8-rd hazaramyaki keserin twakrvvogh arzannyerits mardkayin dzyewi amenavax laynamasshtab nerkajatsvowcvowmnyerits yen yew hamarvvovm
 nerkajatsovcowmnyeric yen ev hamarwvovm yen khecyegvortsakan Nyeoliti P gamanakasrjani nakhapatmakan arvyesti amyenahaytni nmowsnerits.Theyev hamarwvowm
 nmowsneric.THyeyev hamarwvowm e, vor nrank nerkajatsnowm yen ajd gyovxi naxninerin, nra npataky mnovm e 4wyercanwa&.Nranq kazmovm yen
 chwyer&anva&Nranq kazmvovm yen Ammanowm gtnvox Hordanani tangarani hawaqatsvowneri mi mase Mi arzan@ ktnwovm e Parizi Lvovwri thankaranvowm
 Lvowvri thangaranvowm: Erkvov klghov figovrnyeric myeke cvovcadrvvowm e Abow Dabii LvowvrvovmNkaragrovtjvovnFigowrnyer@ erkow tesaki
 Lovvrvowm.NkarakrvovthjvownFigvovrnyer@ erkow tesaki yen` amboxjakan arzanner yew kisandrinyer Vorvos kisandriner yerkglxani yen. Myec jankeri knvov yen modelawvorvyel
 knvov en modyelawvorwel layn pacwats yew pitovmye k&answats ciatsanathaghanthnerov achqyer ownetsvox glvowghnyere: Arzannery batkyerovm en tghamardkanc,
 batkerovm en tghamardkanc, kanants ev yeryekhaneri. Kanayq tarbyerakwowm en @st kr&ker hisecnvox ew poqr-inc mecatsac stamoqsi zeweri mijvocov:
 stamoksi zeweri migvotsvov Sakayn voc txamardkants, vo4 kananc serakan nshannyer@ @ndgca& 4en. arzannerits yev voc myeke serakan orkannyer
 myek@ serakan organner chovnyen, ayn depqvowm, erp ardanneri orosh masi mot amenayn manramasnerov nerkajacwac en demqyer@Hvowsardzannyere
 dyemkyer@Hovshardannyere styexcwyel yen zhayrapor kraqari tsepwa&qits ryezvonajin himqi` yegheki wra mvodelawvorelov tchanaparhvov, oktakortsyelow
 tchanabarhow, ogtagvortselvow ajnbisi bowjsyer, vorvonk atchyel en Zarqa keti apin. Eghyegy qajkajvyel e hazaramyaki ynthackvowm` thvoxnyelvow krakhyetsyeghen
 thoxnelvow kraxecexen nyerqin amboxjvowtjowne. Kryeghyen swagh@ stanalov hamar krakare takatsvyel e 600-ic min4ew 900 astijan celsiovs
 900 astitchan celsivows djermastichani paymannervowm. Stacwa& kraqari hidroqsidn ajnovhyetev gharnwyel e gri het, orbyeszi thanzr zangwac
 orpyeszi thandzr zankwac statswi, orits hyetvo miajn ayn oktakvorcvel e Svaghy grakayvown njvovti e vyeratsvel chvoranalvowts hetvo, yerb ajn
 4voranalovc hetvo, erp ayn karacel e. Klvovkhnyere, irannyere ov otqyere dzyevaworwel yen exeki aranzin pndjyerits, orvonq aynovhyetyew havakvel
 ajnovhyetyew hawakwel en ev ca&kvyel en svaxvov. A4qyeri tsiatsanataghanthnyery vowrvagcvel en pitowmi mijvocow, isk klvowxnere catskwyel
 isk klvowxnyery &a&kwyel en kyegh&am hisyecnvox catskvov:Nranq hamematapar pardzrahasak yen, bayc vo4 mardvow irakan 4apervow. ardzannyeric
 4apyervow. ardzannerits amyenapardri barzrvovtjvovn@ mot 1 m e. Nrants makerevvowythnern anhamachap hart en, mvot 10 sm hastvowthjamb.
 mvot 10 sm hastovthjamb: Nranq, aynvovamyenajniw, stextswel en kanknac linelov hamar, hawanapar, amratswyel yen pak syenjaknyeri hatakin,
 senyakneri hatakin, yev nakhatyeswac yen eghel miayn dimacic dityelvov hamar Ardzani batrastman yexanakn, ajnvowamyenajniw, towjl
 aynvovamyenayniv, thowyl cer tar nrants erkar &arajyel: YEv kani or nrank thaxwel en styeghtswa& skzbnakan witchakowm, hnaravor e, vor
 witchakvovm, hnaravvor e, vor nranq yerbeq chyen covcadrvyel erkar jamanakvov, ayl stegh&vel yen kanxamtatswa&` hyents thaxman npatakovBacahajtvowm
 nbatakovPatsahaytowm ew pahpanvovmAyn GHazal tyexanke haytnabervyel e 1974 tvakanin karovtsapatoghneri kvoxmic, vorvonk arakentats
 koxmic, vorvonk arak@ntats awtomajrvovghi ein karvowcvovm, ore kabelow er Amman kaxaky El Zarkaji hyet: Pyexovmnery skswel yen 1982 twakanin
 sksvyel en 1982 thvakanin: Ays texank@ bnakyetswac e eghyel m. t. a. 7250-5000 thvakanin Ays darasrjani skzpowm` 7-rd hazaramyaki arajin
 7-rd hazaramyaki aragin kesi ynthacqowm, bnakawajre dzgwel e 10-15 ha (25-37 akr) yew pnakicnery kazmel en 3000 mard:Ardzannyer yen
 3000 mard.Arzanner yen hajtnabyervyel 1983 twakanin: Bvovldvozerneri koghmic lajnakan porwats tchanaparhi khachmyervovky owsowmnasiryelis
 khacmervovke vovsvovmnasiryelis hnagyetnery hajtnapyeryel yen 2,5 myetr (8 votnachap) makeryesov xvosvor pos, ortyegh kipse ardzannyer kayin: 1984-1985
 arzanner kajin: 1984-1985 thwakannerin pyeghowmnyer en irakanacvyel Kari O. Rollyefsvoni klghaworvovtjamb. Pyexvovmneri erkrord pvovly, vory
 Peghowmnyeri yerkrord povl@, or@ tyeghi e vownyecel 1993–1996 thvakannyerin, ghyekavarvowm ein Rolefsony ev Zejdan@ Gafafin.Hajtnapyerwa& yerkow
 Gafafin:Haytnapyerwats yerkvow taqstotsnyervowm yndhanovr armamb gtnvyel en 15 ardannyer yew 15 kisandriner, voronq patrastwac yen yexel kryetye
 patrastwa& en eghel grethe 200 tarinyeri ynthackovm: Qani vor nrank khnamqvow taghwac ein lqvac tnyeri hataki pvorwacknerovm, nrank bavakana4ap
 porva&qnyerovm, nranq bawakanachap law en bahbanwel Iyerighonovm yew Nahal Hemarowm nmanatip ardannyeri miayn vorosh drvagnyern yen hajtnabyerwel:Porvacqi
 haytnapyerwyelPorvatski shovrgy, ortyex ktel yen ardzannyer@, vowshadrvovthyamb porwel e, yev gta&onery texadrvel yen pajtye taranyeri medj,
 paytye taraneri medj, vor@ lcvac er polivowretanajin prpovrvow` araqman entatsqvovm vnasvyelvowts bashtbanyelov hamar. Ardanner@ batrastwats
 Ardannere patrastvats en gibsic, ore shat aweli pxrovn er dardzyel hatkapyes ajdqan jamanak hoxi tak taghvats linyelow hyetewanqvov:
 taxva& linyelvow hyetyevankow. Hajtnabervats ardzanneri arajin gtacvonyery ovgharkvel en Mec Britaniaji  THagaworakan hnagitakan institvowt,
 hnakitakan institovt, isk erkrvord ghvovmb@, vory gtnwel er mi kani tari ants, owxarkvyel e Njow Jorqi Smitsvonjan institovt` verakangnoxakan
 institvovt` verakanknoghakan ashkhatankneri hamar: Ardzanner@ wyeradarzwyel yen Hordanan drants pahpanman askhatanqyeri awartits heto yew dranq
 avartits hyeto ew dranq kareli e tesnel Hvordanani thangaranvowm:Kta&oneri mi masy  2013 thvakanin gamanakavorapyes exyel e Britanakan

 mek@MyeknapanovtyvownnerDranq himnakanvowm irencic nerkajatsnovm en hamaynkovm pnakvvoghnyeri nakhninyerin kam nranc hyet kabwa& thyemanere
 het kapwa& tyemanere nerkajatsnelvov hamar: Karyeli e ajd pastarke himnavvorel` henwelvow ays arzanneri tereri nkatmamb wyerabermownki
 nkatmamb vyerabyermovnki wra, yerp nrants taghyel en iryents nmanovtjamp &epats gangyeri het: Howsardzanneri hvovgharkavvorvowtjvovny nvovjnbes
 howxarkavorowthjown@ novynpes nman e ajn yeghanakin, thye inchpes yen Ayn GHazali pnakicnery thaghel irenc mahacatsnyerin: Sakajn, ethe ayd ardzanner@
 Sakayn, yetye ajd ardzannery yndhanrabes cyen kyerbavorvowm mahatsa&nyerin, ayl kyendanatswa& ararkanyer yen: Inc, yetye nranq taxwac ein mardkanc
 thaxvats ein mardkants nman devvow, orvowhyetyev mardik mtatsvovm ein, or nrank mahatsel en kam korcryel yen iryents ovj@: Ajs ardzanner@
 ovzhe: Ajs arzannyere novynqan sat harcer yen arajacnvovm, vorqan bataskhanner, ev ajd patjarov el harvowst nyowt en handisanvovm

Aisa Eismath Thajmowr (arab.` عائشة عصمت تيمور‎‎‎ kam Aisa al-THajmvovrjya عائشة التيمورية‎‎, 1840, Kahire,
 التيمورية‎‎, 1840, Kahire, Osmanjan kaysrowthyvovn - 1902, Gahirye, Ekiptosi khyediwat, Osmanjan kajsrovthjvown), Osmanyan darasrjanvovm
 Osmanyan darashrdjanovm yekiptaci hasarakakan gor&ic, banastexts, arzakagir yev feminist. Na 19-rd dari skzbin aktiw korcvovnyeowtyown
 aktiw kortsvownevowthjvown er &awalovm mardow iravownkneri olortvowm. Nra krkyery lovjs tyesan ajn gamanak, erp YEkiptvosowm kanayq
 erp YEkiptosvowm kanajq haskatsan, vor islamov nrants trwats oros irawovnknerits nrank zrkwac enMervar Fajyez Hathemi xosqervowTHaymovr@
 xoskyerovThaymvowre hatkanshakan e nranvow, or Venera mvoloraki wra nor haytnabyervats xarnaran@ krowm e ir anown@:Anznakan
 ir anown@:Andnakan kyanqVagh kjanqTajmvowre Ismajil Tajmovri dvovstrn er, vory Towrqakan ishkhanakan midjawayri andam er: Nra
 mijawayri andam er Nra hayr@ Taymovrin krtvowtjan e tvyel, isk hvor mahvanits hyetvo na standnel e ir eghbvor Ahmed Pasha Thaymvovrin
 Ahmyed Pasa Tajmvovrin krtyelow gorce 14 tarekanvowm na amvowsnacel ew tyexapoghvyel e Stambvovl KrtvowthyvownThajmvowri majr@ nran
 GrtvovthyovnThaymovri majre nran asyexnakvor&vowthjovn er tsankanovm sovoretsnel, sakayn hakarak nran Taymovri hajr@ nran svowvoretsnvovm er Ghovran,
 soworyecnvovm er Ghvowran, islamakan iravakitovtjvovn, arabyeren, thvowrkeren yev parskeryen: Nra hajr@ nran svoworyecnvovm er nayew yerkyer,
 soworetsnvovm er nayev erker, vori ardjovnkovm na sksets ir krakan karieran krelov ir imaca& yereq lezvovnervov THajmvovre nwirwa& er krtvowthjany,
 nwirwats er krtowtyany, sakajn YEkibtosovm ayd zhamanak ir seri battcharow na stibwats er miajn tan@ ovsanyel: Tajmovre xtrakanvowtyan
 THaymvowry xtrakanowtyan dyem ir pvoghoqi zayn@ pardratsrec ir gra& banastex&vowthyvovnnyerovm, yerb der 13 taryekan er 14 tarekanvowm
 tarekan er. 14 tarekanvowm na thvoghyec ovsvowm@ ew krakan kariyeran Mahmovd Pyey al-Islambovli hyet amvowsananalvov patcharov: Ir dster,
 batjarvov Ir dstyer, hvor yev amovsnow mahic hetvo na vyeradarnovm e YEgiptos ev ajstegh sovorvowm e banastyeghtsakan yerker ararkan dasawandelow
 ararkan dasavandyelvov hmtovtyovnnyer@YntaniqTaymowr@ cnwel e grakan entaniqowm: nra eghbajry Ahmyed Pasha Thajmvowre hetazotogh
 Pasha Tajmvowr@ hetazvotvogh yev wipasan er Na naev vowni yerkov yeghbvorvordinyer` dramatvovrg Mvohammad Thaymowr, yew vipasan Mahmvovd Tajmvovre:THaymvovri
 Mahmovd Thaymvowr@:Thaymovri hayre mist cankatsel e ir dstyere tal hamapatasxan krtowtyan . Thaymovr@ 1854 tvakanin 14 tarekanovm,
 thvakanin 14 taryekanvowm, amvowsnatsel e Mahmvowd Bek Al-Islampovlii het, ow thowrk hr4akawvor and er, aba zovjky meknyel e Stampvowl.
 zovjky myeknel e Stambovl: 1873 twakanin Thajmovri dovstr@ Tawhidan, mahatsel e anhajt hiwandvowtyownits: Nra hayr@ mahacyel e 1882
 hayre mahatsel e 1882 thwakanin, orin aynvovhyetev hadjvordec amowsnvow 1885 thvakani amovsnvow mahe, vorits hyetvo nra weradardyel e Ekiptos,
 wyeradarzel e Egiptos, ortex sarownakyel e ir grakan karieran Dstyer svowke artahajtvogh nra banastyextsvowthjvovnnyer@ hamarvvovm yen
 panasteghtsowtyownnyer@ hamarvvowm en ajs ganri yew myer zhamanaknyeri lawagvowjn nmvovsnyere.AktivizmAmvowsnvov yev dster mahits THajmovr@ sksyel e ir
 Thajmowr@ sksyel e ir ashxatanknyery, oronq pastbanvovm ein kanants irawownknyer@: Nra stegh&akortsvowtjownnyere lvovjs tesan YEkibtvosi
 lowjs tyesan YEkiptosi social-tntesakan werapvoxman zhamanak, vori jamanak kanayq haskatsan, vor zrkvvowm en islamic trwox nranc
 islamits trwox nrants iravvovnqneric: THaymvovrin anwanovm en «yekibtakan feminizmi mayr» Na ashxatel e ayl kin mtavorakannyeri
 ajl kin mtavvorakanneri ev aktiwistnyeri hyet krtvovthyan arsawnyeri, baregvortsakan asxatankneri yew gaxvowthatirvovthjan dem pajqaryelvow

Agman (arab. عجمان‎‎), qaxak Miacjal Arabakan Emirvovtjvownnerowm, Adjmani Emirvowtyan varchakan kentrony:Pnakchvovthyovne
 kyentrvon@.Pnakchvovthyvowne 225 haz. mard (2003): Pnakcvowthyamb 5-rd qaxaq@ MAE-ovm.Der hin jamanaknyerits hajtni e vorpes dzknorsakan
 haytni e vorpyes zknvorsakan kentron, inchpyes naew margariti hanqavajr Sakajn, minchew vyerdjin jamanaknere hamarwvovm er pokr qaxak. Miayn
 er pvoqr qaxaq. Miajn vyerjers qaghaqy sksyets aragoren zarganal shnorhiw haryevanowthyamp ktnwox myegapolisneri Dvovbay ev SHardja.Qaxak@

 astaraky, Al-Nvowami mzkith@ yev ovxtyeri mrcawazqi harthake.HxvovmnyerAjman - MAE-i hangstavayre
Akqa (ebr. עכו‎, arap-` عكا‎‎), Aqko, Sen-Gan d’Akr,  hnadarjan qaghaq aryevmtjan Kalileayovm, orn enka&
 Galilyeayvowm, vorn enkac e Hayfa qaghaqic 23 km hyvovsis Midjyerkrakan &owi apin:Pnak4vovtyovnEst (2010)-i mardahamari qaxakovm
 mardahamari qaghakvowm pnakwovm e 46 300 mard`66, 4 % — hryea25, 7 % — arab-mowsowlmannyer2, 4 % — arab-kristvonyanyer0, 2
 arap-kristvonyanyer0, 2 % — drvovzyer5, 3 % — aylkPatmowtyvovnKaghaki @st hneapannyeri vovni 4000 tarwa patmovtjvovn: Akqan ir
 batmowthjvovn: Aqqan ir erkaramya patmvovthyan enthackvovm shat ankamnyer e zerkic derq poxancwyel. Qaxaki aragin hishatakovmnere kalis
 hisatakovmnyere kalis yen THowthmvos III-i arshawanknyerits. Heto kaghakin tirel en khyetyer@: Q.a. 725 th Asvoryestani arka` Salmanasar
 Asvorestani arka` Salmanasar V-@ nvachvovm e qaghaq@: parskakan tervowthjan jamanak qaxaky tsarayyel e orbyes razma-&vovajin kajan, inche
 razma-cowayin kayan, inchy lvowrdj dyer e ghaghatsel YEkibtosi dem baterazmyelvow jamanak: Strapvon@ kaghaqy nyerkajatsnvowm e vorbes` parsits
 nerkayacnvovm e orbyes` barsic zorkyeri hawaqatexi yegiptatsinyeri dyem patyerazmelov hamar Q.a. 539 t Babyelvonjan kyerowtjovnic azatvats hreaner@
 gyervovthjvovnic azatwa& hreanyere chyen wyeradarnalvov chyen gravowm qaxaq@, vyergins mnvowm e Tyowrvosi kazmowm Hovjn patmi4nyery kaxaky anwanovm
 batmichnyer@ kaxaqy anvanowm yen Ake inc@ nsanakowm e abakinvowm @st hvownakan araspyeli Hyerakles@ aystex ktnvowm e bvovzhi4 ghotabovysyer
 e pvowgic khotabvovyser incvov yel powgovm e ir wyerkyer@: Q. a. 333 thvakanin Alyeqsandr Makyedvonatsin gravvowm e kaxake ev anwanapoghovm`
 qaxaky yew anwanapvokhvovm` ptxvomajisi Nra mahits hyeto kaxak@ antsnvovm e ptxomeosnerin, isk hyeto Syelyevkjannerin: Q. a. 71 thvakanin
 Syelevkjannyerin: Q. a. 71 twakanin qaxak@ kravowm e Tigran Mec@, vory hyetakajowm teghapvoghwovm e merdepratjan Selyevkia berd@ ev ajntyegh mahabatji
 byerde ev ajntegh mahapatzhi yentarkwvowm: Q. a. 52-54 tt. Pombyevose kravvovm e kaxak@: Jarmvowk kyeti cakatamartowm bartwelowts ew Ervovsaghem@
 bartvyelvovts ev Ervovsaxyemy kortsnyelvowc heto. Aqkan 638 thvakanic ancav Arabakan xalifajowtjan kazme ev ghalifajowtjan kazmvovm mnac
 xalifayvovtyan kazmovm mnats mincew 1104 tvakany, yerb GHacakrac aragin arsavanqi jamanak Paldown I-@ gravyec ayn. 1187 t. Salah al-Din@
 1187 th. Salah al-Dine karoxacav hyet grawyel qaxake sakayn 1189-1191 tth. Aqkaji basharman gamanak gha4akirnere hyet kravecin kaxaqy
 hyet kravecin qaghak@ ew iryenc tirapetvowtjan tak bahetsin ayn mincew 1291 thwakany: 1517 thvakanin osmanjan zorker@ Selim I hramanatarovthjamp
 I hramanatarvovtjamb krawovm yen kaghaqy 1799 thvakanin kaghak@ basharvovm e Napvolyeon Ponapart@, sakajn 4i karoghanowm gravyel.
 chi karvoxanvovm krawel: 1918 tvakanin kyeneral Allyenbii ghekavarats britanakan zorqere karoxanvowm yen gravel qaxake, aysbisvow Pritanian
 kaxaq@, ajsbisvov Britanian stanvovm e Aqkan paghyestinjan mandatvow. MAK-i Paxestinjan naxagci hamazayn kaghaq@ pyetk e antsner paxyestinin
 e ancner paghestinin sakayn Arabvo-israyyelakan baterazmneri zhamanak Israyeli zinowzh@ grawvowm e qaghaqe:Nerka iravicakyPatyerazmic

Aqkar (arap:` قضاء عكار‎‎), Libanani 25 shrganneric myeke, ory mtnovm e Hjvowsisayin marzi myeg Warcakan
 marzi myeg: War4akan kentrvonn e Halpa kaxaky Srjani bnakchvovthyovne 330 000 mard e, pnakcvovthyan xtvowtyown@` 304 mard/km²AshgharhakrvovtjvovnShrdjane
 mard/km²:AshxarhakrvovthyovnSrjany tyexakayva& e Libanani hjowisiaryevmtyan masowm` zpaghyetsnyelvov 776 km² taracq Arevelki sahmann e Hyermyel shrgan@,
 sahmann e Hyermel shrgany, haravayin sahman@` Pvoqr-Danan, haraw-arevmvovtqvowm Tripolii srjan@, hjovsisi ew hyovsisi-arewyelqi sahmane

 90 hamaynknyeri== &anvotagrvowthyvovnner

Alawinyere siakanvovthjan mi vowghxvowtjovn yen. Alavi anvanvovm@ statsel en Ali xalifaji anvovnic, vorin hamarovm
 anovnits, vorin hamarowm yen astcov marmnavvorvovm Irenc erkrord anvanvowm@ novsayrinyer, statsyel en Movhammad ipn Novsajri (887
 Mvovhammad ibn Nvovsayri (887 twakan) anownits, ory hamarvvowm e ays vowxghowthjan himnadiry. Linelov 11-rd siakan imam Al-Hasan al-Asqarii
 Al-Hasan al-Askarii hetnvord@ sksyec karozel ajs imami astwatsaynvovtjan masin, ori markaryen na hamarovm er iryen: Alawinyer@
 hamarvovm er iren. Alavinyere nran hamarowm yen Al-Hasan al-Askarii (bab), ajsinqn` darbasAlavinere himnakanowm pnakwovm en Siriayowm
 bnakvvovm yen Siriayvowm (Latakia, Tartows), Harawayin Thowrkiayvovm (Antiok, Tarson, Adana) ew Hjovsisajin Libananovm yndamene`
 Lipananowm endamen@ 2 milivon mard. Alavinyeri davananqe mot e ismayilakanovtjan@ (aradjacel e 8-rd darovm yev ir anownvow bartakan
 ir anownow bartakan e shiakan 6-rd imam Gafar al-Sadiki vordown` Ismajilin), sakayn ir mej krowm e nayev siakanvovthyan, kristvonevovtyan
 siakanvowthyan, qristvonevowtjan yew nakhakristonyeakan astghayin hawatalikneri tarryer:patmvovtyvownNvowsajrinyeri batmowthyvown@ skizb e arnvovm
 patmovtjvovny skizp e arnvovm e 10-rd darvowm Hyowsisajin Siriayi «&ajrahyex» sianeri srganovm Avyeli owsh hamaynqi anwanwowme darnvovm
 hamaynki anwanwovmy darnovm e «al-Alaviyvown» («Alii kvoghmnakitsner») alawinyer. Nra wra iryents azdyetsovtjvovnn en thoghel ayl «kafirakan»
 thvoghyel ajl «kafirakan» (anhawat) ghmbyere batenijakanvovtjvovne, ismayiliakanvovtyovny, bvowddajakanowtyvown@ yev ayl xmpyer, orvonk
 bowddajakanvovthjvowne yew ayl khmbyer, oronq dowrs yen yekel zradastakanvovthjovnits (hin parskakan kron): Nvovsajrineri hamaynki anvanvowm@ kapvovm en Movhammad
 kapovm yen Movhammad Nvowsajra an-Nvowmayrii hyet ( mah 883 th Pasrayvovm), or@ hajtararyec, vor inqy margarye e, isk Apvov al-Hasan
 e, isk Apvov al-Hasan al-Askarin` 11-rd siakan imamy Astvacn e, vorn iren owxarkel e margareakan aradjadrankvow: Nowsajrineri
 arajadrankvov: Nowsayrineri hamaynqi pastaci kazmakyerpiche exyel e sia astva&aban Mvowhammad al-Jannan al-Gvovnpowlanin (mah 957 kam
 al-Govnbovlanin (mah 957 kam 968 t Halepovm) Nvowsayrinyeri hawat@ himnwats e ismayilizmi vra qristvoneakan gnvostik tarrerow. Nvowsajrinyere
 tarrervov. Novsajrinery ktnvovm ein, vor margarei tan andamner@ «Ahl al Peyt» tirapyetvovm en batsardzak kityelikneri. Nrantsic Ali
 kitelikneri Nrancic Ali ibn Abvov Talibe ci mahatsel yev hamarvowm e Asttso marmnacovm: Nranq naew hamarovm en, vor kron@ vowni «patin»
 or krvone vowni «patin» (taqnva&) ew «zahir» (hajtni) koxmyer Novsayrizm@ jvovratsrel e antik pilisvopa neoblatvonakanneri kaxaparnere
 neoblatonakannyeri kaxaparnyery hatkabes emanatsiaji (tcharagaytowm) masin owsmownkeAstwacvovthjan jarakaytvovme hamarwvowm e anxapan yeryak`
 hamarvowm e anghapan eryak Imast (ma'na), anvown (ism), darpas (pap): Sa asotsacwowm e lowsni, aryevi yev yerknqi hyet yew jamanak ar jamanak
 ew jamanak ar gamanak artacvolwvovm e arakjalnyerovm, vorontsits werginnyern ein Mowhammad Alin ev Salman al-Farisin Nowsajrinery
 al-Farisin: Novsajrinere havatvowm en tghamardkanc hokineri marmnapoxvovtyany (tanasovkh) Hajtnvowthyan makardakvow ayn bajanwowm e
 makardakov ayn bazhanvovm e «amma» yew «xasa» («hasarak» yew «hatovk») Novsayrinyere merjowm en islami mi sarq kanvonakarkyere. tsyeservowm
 kanvonakarger@. tseserowm oktagortswvowm e ginin, sakayn kan kerakrajin arkelqnyer` @ndhanvowr (ghoz, nabastak, odzazovk) yew masnawor
 odzadzvovk) ev masnawor: Nranq endvovnvowm en Isayin (Hisvovs) ew mi sark ajl qristvonyeakan «srpyeri», nshvovm yen mi sark kristonyeakan
 mi shark kristonyeakan tvoner (Sowrb Tsnovnd, Zatik) Novsayrinyery paganwovm en «knqva&nyeri» yew «och knkvatsneri» «Knkvacnery»
 knkwacneri» «Gnkvatsnery» hnarawvorowtyown ovnen batsahaytelvov iryents «sovrp» grqeri «patin» imast@, vor@ nranq myeknapanowm en ajlabanvoren

 kentrvonov Kardaghvovm (Siria) Novsajrinery bahpanowm yen nayew cyeghayin pajanowmnyery (tvohmakan kalpiya, ghayatin, xaddadin, matavira yev

 hvoxakvor&nyer yen:Nrank vovnein mec tsnamanq yev atyelvowthyvovn islami vov movsvowlmanneri nkatmamp, ori hetyevanqvow Omar al Farvowkin anwanvovm

 quddas –nyeri masnawvor tnyerowm kam myekovsatswats vajryervowm. @st Sowlejman al Adanii` jvowraqan4jowr harvowst txamard bartavvor er

 nayew kryel ampvoxj tsaghse. Gvowmary, vory na caghsowm e vowteliqi, ghmicki ew ararvoxvowthyan wra, nra baryebastovtyan karewvor chapanish e hamarwvowm:Ginow
 4apanish e hamarvovmKinvov araroxvowthjowne katarvovm e xist gaxtni: ZHvoghvowi wajrvowm pahaknyer en kangnetsvvovm, vorbyeszi och mi otar mard
 vorbeszi voc mi otar mard ners chmtni:Al Adannin haxordvowm e, or ajd zhvoghvowner@ anc en kacwowm erekojan ew miajn kaghaknervowm, orvovhyetyew
 qaxaqnyerovm, vorovhyetyew cajrahex kaghtnivowtyan pahpanman anhrajyestvowthjvovne hnaravvor 4er gjovghervowm. Hamaynqi miayn tghamardik

 an-Nvowr»( Lvovjsi cara). Yst evovtjan, lovsi kontsyepcian asocatswvowm e parskakan Navrvowzi hyet(Nvor Tari). Gvowddasnyeri pvovandakvovtyvown@
 Kowddasneri bvowandakowtyvovn@ yndgrkvovm e mi kani hartser.Alawinyeri ovsmownqe himnwac e inknatip yerrordovtjan wra Ali (imast), Movhammad

 endvownyets islam) (darbas) Alawi nery erkrpagovm yen Mvovhamedi dvovstr Fathimajin` vorbyes ansyer mi eaki: Alavineri klxavor sowrp kirqy
 klxavvor sowrp kirk@ hamarvowm e , or@ paxkatsats e 16 sowranyeric. Alavi nyery @ndownvovm e hokvov werapnakyetsman gaxapare. Nrants
 werabnakecman kaghapar@. Nranc ovsmownqi hamadajn havatacyal mardvow hokin ancowm e katarvovm dyepi astxayin volort, isk anhavati hvokin
 olort, isk anhawati hvogin kendanineri migvocvow dyepi hryesi volvort Irenc avandowjtayin braktikayowm Alawi nyere myergowm en shariate

 srber yew markaryener. Alavi ner@ tonowm en qristonyeakan mi kani toner (Amanvor, Zatik), oronts jamanak Astvatsasvovnch e kardacwvovm.
 Astvacashvown4 e kardacvvovm Ginov maqrazertsvelow awandvowjthe nowynbyes yndvownwac e: Drants hyet mektyegh arka yen nayew hyetanosakan havataliknyeri
 hetanosakan havataliqnyeri elemyentnyer (arew, astgher, lvovsin) Ganants arkelvvowm e &arayyel havatqin. Alawi nyern iryents krvonakan araroxovthjownnere

 nmanyetsnovm yen qristoneakan yekexetsineri. Ays aghotatexinere tyexakajwa& yen bardradir blvowrnyerin.Alavinery pajanwvowm yen yerkow ghmbi`

 kiteliqnyeri, ory thvowyl e talis nranc isxel hetyewordneri massanyerin Vyerdjinneris handisanowm yen kataracvovnyer iryenc hamaynknyervowm.Alawinyery
 hamajnqnyerowm:Alavinere SiriayowmSiriaji naghakahakan Asadnyeri entaniqe nerhamaynkayin cakovmnapanvovthyamb handisanowm e AMMA
 handisanvowm e AMMA Ayjm Siriaji pnakcvowtjan 10-12 %, isk oros tvyalnyerow ajs thive hasnowm e minchyew 16 %, Alawi nyer en, voronk
 Alawi nyer en, voronq himnakanvowm kentronacats en Latakiaji ev Tartovsi marzerowm 20-rd dari yerkrvord kyesin Siriajvowm qaghakakan
 Siriajvowm qaxakakan nor iradrovtjan paymannervovm, erb Hafyez al-Asade darzav Siriayi nakhagah, nkatvovm e Damaskos teghapvokhwogh
 Damaskvos tyeghapokhwogh Alawi nyeri tvakanaki atchSiriaji noragovjn patmvovthjvovnn anmigabes kabvats e Alavi akannyeri het: Pann
 Alawi akannyeri het. Pann ayn e, vor Siriaji naxkin naxagah Hafyez Asade Lathakiajits er ew Alawi akan er YErb 1970-akan twakanneri
 1970-akan thwakannyeri skzbin na ekaw ishxanvowtyan glowgh, ir sowrj hawaqyec iren havatarim Alawi akannyeri, voronk karawaretsin
 akanneri, vorvonq karawaryetsin erkiry mvot 30 tari: Ajzhm nra ordi Bashar al-Asade nvowynbyes erkri kareworakowyn bortfejlnyery twyel e alawiakannyerin
Namaz (bars.نماز‎) (parskeryen) kam Salath (arapyeryen) (arap.صلاة‎)- amenorja hnkapatik axotk islamvovm,
 hngabatik axothq islamovm, or@ havatki hing sjovnyerits myekn e:Ghovranovm namazi hamar kan konkryet cowcvovmnyer` namazi jami, bvovandakvowtjan,
 zhami, bovandakvowthjan, namaz anyelis vorosh sharjvowmneri yev aylni masin: Namazn irakanatsvvowm e @st ayn sarzhvowmnyeri ov dirqyeri, or
 sharjvowmneri vow dirkyeri, vor aryel e Movhammad margaren ew vorvonk pokhantswel en syernde serownd:Himnakan aghotq@ hamarvovm e Rakate, orn
 hamarwowm e Rakaty, orn irenic nyerkajatsnovm e orvos dirqeri vow sarjowmnyeri cikl, vorvonk ovghektsvowm yen aghotki baryervow: Polor dirqery,
 baryerow: Polvor dirqyere, sarzhvovmnyery yew paryer@ hetyewvowm en irar xist karkvow ew voreve syexvowm anelvow dyepkovm, aghvotqe hamarvvowm e chirakanatsvac:
 hamarvovm e 4irakanacvac: Aghotqi jamanak barery petq e artasanwyen arapyerenov:Aghvotki amyenorja cikle kazmva& e hing himnakan aghvothqneric.
 himnakan axvothqnyeric. Aravvotyan erkraqat axvothk (fagr). Gyesori chorsrakat axvothq (zvohr). Tsyeryekajin 4orsraqat axotk (asr).
 chorsraqath axvothk (asr). Eryekvojan yereqraqath aghotk (maghryep). Gisyerajin chorsrakath axotq (asa). Lracvowci4 gisherajin aghotqe(vatr)ArkelknerArkelvac
 aghotqe(watr)ArkelqnyerArgyelvac e aghvothyel tchisht kyesorin, naew areva&agi ov mayramovti zhamanak: Jvovraqancjvovr mvovsowlman, paci partadir axvotqnyerits,
 bartadir axotknerits, karox e irakanatsnyel nayew tsankacats qanakowtyamp inqnakam aghotkner: Batsi tsisakan axothqnerits, mvowsvowlmann
 axvotknyerits, mowsovlmann owni nayev Asttsvovn anmidjapes dimelvow hnaravvorovtjvovn, sovorakan aghvothki mijocov, vory kvocvovm e Doa: Ayn
 ory ko4vovm e Dvoa: Ajn karvox e irakanacwyel tsankatsa& zhamanak ew cankatsac lezwvov:Namazi wajreNamaz karyeli e anel incbes myenak,
 e anel inchbes myenak, aynbyes el khmbvov, tsankacac hamapatasxan vajrvovm: Vovrbat orva kesori axvotq@ ghvorhowrd e trvvowm irakanacnel
 e trwvowm irakanacnel mzkitowm: Tyexe, ortex irakanacwovm e namazy, petk e lini &isakanvoryen maqowr: Axvothoxner@ karvox yen pryel
 Axvothoghnyer@ karogh en prel axotki hamar naxatyeswa& pvokrik ghalin (sadjjada). KHmbajin aghotqi zhamanak, aghothvoghnyer@ kangnvovm en imami
 axvotoxnyere kanknovm yen imami hyetyevvovm, or@ xekavarvovm e axotke: Ganayq aghvotowm en txamardkancits arandzin kam kangnvovm amyenawyerdjovm:
 kangnovm amyenaverjowm: Aghvothki jamanak ci kareli khosyel, owtyel, khmel, citsaxyel, katarel koghmnaki sargvowmner yev ajln: 4i kareli
 sarjvovmnyer yew ajln: Chi kareli aghotel alkohvol kam orewe tesaki thmranyovt ogtakor&a& vitchakovm: Hivandnyere ew hasmandamnery aghvothk@ karvox
 hashmandamner@ axvothke karox en irakanacnyel inchbes nsta&, aynpyes el barkac wicakovm` sarzhvowmnern irakanatsnelvov mtowi: Namazi cisakarkn

 bartadir bajmannyerXmpajin namaz mzkitvowm•	TSisakan markowtjvown- YEtye marde naghqan axvotely hvogacel e ir bnakan kariqnyere kam vovnecyel

 dyemkvov dyepi GHyeplye (tyes` Kaapa)•	Hagvowst- Aghothvoxy byetq e hagats lini maqvowr hakvovst, vory hamabatasxanowm e sariatin•	 Sthapovtyovn-
 sariatin•	 Stapvowtyovn- islamvowm alkvoholy ew thmranyvovther@ argyelwac en: Ajd amene hamarwvowm e haram•	Gamanak- 5 namazneric yowrakan4yowrn
 namaznyerits yovraqancjvovrn irakanatsvvowm e dra hamar sahmanvac jaminRaqathNamazi himqe Rakathn e, orn iryenits nerkajacnovm e voroshaki
 nerkayatsnovm e orvosaki dirqei vow sarjvovmnyeri cikl, vorvonq vovxektsvovm yen axotqi paryervow: Bolor dirqery, sarjvovmnery yev parery
 shargvowmnyere ev baryere hetyevowm yen irar khist kargow yev oreve shexvowm anyelov depkvowm, axvotk@ hamarwvowm e chirakanatsva&: Axothvoghy irakanatsnvowm

 parabanets iryen" (thasmi): Dranits heto na cnki e galis yew irakanacnvowm yerkrayin khonarhovm (svovgvovd): Vovxghwelvow, na nstvovm e krvownknyeri

Nawoi, Alisher Navoi, Nizamaddin Mir Alishyer (petrvari 9, 1441 – hvovnvari 3, 1501), ovzbek banastyex&, mtacvogh,
 ovzpyek panastexc, mtatsox, byetakan gvortsich:Gyensagrowthjown15 tarekanowm Nawvoin arden haytni e yeghyel vorbyes panasteghts: Steghtsagvortsyel
 panastex&: Stextsagorcel e miginasiakan thyvowrqi ew farsi lyezvovnyerov: 1472 twakanin nshanakvyel e vezir yew statsel emiri titxvos: Hovanavvoryel
 titghos. Hovanavoryel e gr4i, gitvovthjan yev arvyesti mardkanc. GHarazanyel e astichanavorneri carasahowmnyere, kasharakervovtyvovn@,
 charashahvovmnyery, kasarakervowtjovny, svowlthani argew handes e yekyel joxvowrdi pashtpanvovtjamp Ays ameny dgkohvovtyvown e arajacrel balatvowm, 1487
 aragatsryel palatowm, 1487 twakanin na artaqsvel e hyerawor Astrabad, nshanakvyel nahanki karawari4. 1488 twakanin veradardel e Herat
 tvakanin veradardzyel e Herat yew mincev kjanqi verdje nwirvel styeghcagvortsakan asxatanqi. Nawoin hexinak e banastyeghtsovthjovnnyeri, cavalovn
 banastextsovtjownneri, &avalvovn boemnyeri, arzak gorcyeri ew kitakan traktatnyeri 30 jvoxvovatsvowneri. Nra «Mtqeri kandzaran» qnarakan panastex&vovtyownnyer
 banastex&ovtjownnyer (ayd thvowm avyeli kan 2600 gazel) ampopvox zhoxvova&ov e, vor na inky 1498-1499 thvakannerin havaqel yew ir
 tvakannerin hawakyel ev ir tariqajin cors powlyerin hamabatasghan zhamanakagrakan karkov dasaworyel e «Mankvovthjan zarmanaliqnyer», «patanvowthyan
 zarmanaliqnyer», «patanovthjan hazwadeb paner», «Midjin tariqi zarmanaliqner» yev «&yerowthyan xratnyer» divannyervovm Navvoin lajn canachowm
 Navoin lajn cana4owm e gtyel, est Aryevyelki krakan avandowythi, Nizami Kyanjewii ev Hndkastani barskalyezow panastyex& Amir GHosrov
 banasteghts Amir GHosrvov Dehlewii «Hnkamatjannyeri»-n orbes patasghan gra& ir «Hngamatyanvow» («Ardarakyatsnyeri sqancacovme», 1483,
 sqancatsowm@», 1483, «Leyli yev Mejnvovn», 1484, «Farhad yev Shirin», 1484, «Yoth molorak», 1484, «Iskandari pate», 1485). Naghordnyerits
 bat@», 1485). Nakhvordnyerits wertsvats syvovgenyern ov orosh zyewakan arandnahatkvowthyownnyere Navvoii «Hnkamatyani» boyemnervovm statsel en gaghaparagegharvyestakan
 kaxaparakyexarvestakan nvor meknapanvovtjovn: «Ardarakyacnyeri skanchacvovm@» pilisopayakan-hraparakaxvosakan pvoyemovm Nawoin myerkatsrel
 boemvowm Navvoin merkatsryel e fevodalakan irakanowtjan aratnyery, arajadryel ardarvowthyan, aznwowtjan ir idealnery Aryewyelqvovm taracwats
 idealnyer@. Aryevelkowm taracvac sirayin avandvowtjvovne nra «Lyejli ew Myedjnvovn» bvoyemvowm &arajyel e mard-anhati nkatmamb antarpervovthjowne
 nkatmamb antarbyervowtyvowny datapartyelow gaxaparin. Hay geghyetskowhi Sirini anvan hyet kabwac avandawepin andradarnalvow, havatarim
 andradarnalow, hawatarim ir dyemvokratakan hajyetsaketin, Navoii «Farhad ew Shirin» pvoyemvovm sah Ghasrowi pogharyen klxawvor hyervos e dardzryel
 glghavvor heros e dardzrel qartas Farhadin: Sasanjan Pahram Dovr tagavvori ew nra sira& strkowhi Dilarami batmovthjownn e «Yvoth molvorak»
 batmvowthyvovnn e «Yvot mvolvorak» pvoyem@ hjovsva& 7 heqiath-nvowelnerits, voroncvovm knnadatwowm en Timvowryan tirakalnyeri ov balatakanneri
 tirakalnyeri ow balatakannyeri barkere. «Iskandari baty» pvoyemowm Nawoin artahaytel e petakan karavarman ir hajacqnyere iskandar@ ardaradat,
 iskandary ardaradat, imastvown, bardraparvo tirakali tibar e: Mardkayin hasarakowtjan karowcwacqi weraperjal Nawoii hvovmanistakan

 (1500) kyegharvestakan ardzak yerkvovm Ays grki himnakan gaghaparn e «dagan, tgyet yew anbaroyakan tagaworneri» datapartvowmy, yerkrvovm

 arapakan myetaxadramnervowm arandnacnvowm e yeryeq himnakan ovghi.EbrayyeryenYEprajerenvowm alefy grwovm e א yev kardacvvowm` אָלֶף Gamanakakic
 kardacvvowm` אָלֶף. Gamanakakic israjelyan yeprayyeryenovm, ays daynawvory kam nshanakovm e kokordajin kanky (ʔ ) kam horangy (aranc baxazayni
 horanje (arants baxadayni irar kits kangna& yerkov zaynaworneri anjatovm@ tarbyer wankyeri): Ayn hachax andayn e` himnakanvowm paravyerjowm,
 himnakanovm parawyergvowm, hatchakh paramidjovm הוּא [hu] «na (ar.)», רָאשִׁי [ʁaˈʃi] himnakan, רֹאשׁ [ʁoʃ] «klvowx», רִאשׁוֹן [ʁiˈʃon]
 «glowkh», רִאשׁוֹן [ʁiˈʃon] «aradjin»). Artasanvovtyvowny tarpyervowm e tarper hryeakan xmpyeri motKyematriayvowm, alef@ vovni 1 thwi imast@,
 alefy ovni 1 twi imaste, eprayakan oracvovycovm tarinyeri skzbovm gvortsa&elis nsanakowm e 1000, (א'תשנ"ד arabakan twanshannyerov klini
 arabakan twanshannerov klini 1754 twakan@).Alef@ ayini, resi ev hethi byes chen karvox dages stanal: Jamanakakits yebrayyerenovm alefi kvorcacowthyan
 yebrajyerenovm alyefi gortsatsvowtyan hajakhvowtyown@ barervovm kazmowm e 4.94%AraperyenAraperyenowm ayn krvovm e` ا, kardatsvowm` ألف yew taradarzvovm
 kardacvvowm` ألف ew taradarzvowm orbes` alif, ajn arapyeryeni aragin tarn e. YEbrajakan alefi het, hvownaren alfan ev latinyeren A-n, cagel
 latinyeryen A-n, cakyel yen pjvovnikyan ajbovpeni it ʾāleph-its:Kakhwac pari myedj texadrowtyvownits alife grwvowm e hetewjal kerb.MathematikaBazmvowtjvownneri

Anwan ajl kirarvowmnyeri hamar tyes Alia (ayl kirarvowmnyer)Alia (ebr.` עלייה‎, «weryelk», «bardzratsovm»),
 «vyerelk», «pardracowm»), hryeanyeri hajrenadardovtyvovny Israyel, isk min4yev Israjyeli betvowtyan himnovmy paghestin. «Alian» sionakanovthyan
 «Alian» sivonakanvowthjan himnakan haskacvoghvowtjownneric mekn e, or@ aygm fiksva& e «Hajryenadardvovtyan masin» oryenqi medj. Hakarak
 oryenqi medj: Hakarak gorcenthatsy` hreaneri artagaxt@ Israjyelits yew paghestinits, ko4vowm e jyerida («ankvovm», «ghvonarhovm»)Alia
 («ankvovm», «khvonarhowm»):Alia katarvogh hrean yebrayyenervow kvochvvowm e ebr.` עולה‎ «ole» (igakan «עולה» — «ola», hvognaki «עולים» — «olim»,
 hvognaki` «עולים» — «olim», hognaki igakan` «עולות» — «oloth») Ajd bar@ himnakanovm ogtagvor&vovm yen qich arag Israjyel hajryenadardwa&
 Israjel hayrenadardwa& mardvow weraperyalIsrayeli hryeanyeri keraksrogh myecamasnvowthyovnn ajsor kam olim e, kam el alia kataratsneri`
 el alia katara&nyeri 1-4-rd syerndi garanknyer:paxestinyan irakanvowthjvovne awyeli dajan er, qan da karvox ein patkeracnel Aryevyeljan
 patkyeracnel Aryeveljan Ewropayits yev Rovsastanic yekac nyerkaxtjalnere. 19-rd dari kesin paxyestinn owner hamyematapar poqr bnakcvowthjovn
 hamematapar pokr pnak4vovthyown motavvorabes 400 000 mard, vorvontsits hreanyere kazmvovm ein 6 000. Miayn 1880-akan twakannerin nranc thiw@
 thwakannerin nrants tive sksets ajyel klghaworabes nergaxtjalnyeri hasvin, himnakanvovm dranq havatacjal mardik ein, voronts npatakn
 mardik ein, oronc npatakn er irenc kyanqi wergin orern antskacnel yev mahanal svowrb hoghvovm:Hreanyeri nyergaxth@ (ebr.` עליה‎` alia)
 (yebr. עליה‎` alia) dyebi paxestin @ndovnvats e pajanyel hink pvowleri`Aragin gaghth 1882-1903YErkrvord gaxt 1903-1914YErrord
 gaghth 1903-1914Errvord gaghth 1919-1923CHvorrvord kaght 1924-1928Hingyerord kaxt 1929-1939paghestini hryeakan bnakcvowthjvown@ himnakanowm

 ashxatanqi hasvin, nrank batsasapar ein verabervovm ajn hrea idyealistnerin, ovqyer galis ein irents isk ashkhatanki haswin azkajin
 asxatanqi haswin azgayin okin vera&nelvov nbatakov Hatkapes owsakraw er yerkrvord alian, ajn chakatagrakan er hrea goghvovrdi hamar,
 hryea gvoghvovrdi hamar, qani or nranc tvovm ein ayn andzink, vowkyer myec dyer xaxacin Israjyel byetvovthyan stegh&man gortsowm: Ajd twvovm
 styeghtsman gorcvowm. Ayd tvvovm er naev pen Kovrivon@, ow tsnwyel e 1886 thvakanin Rowsakan kajsrowthyovnowm gtnwogh lehakan Polvona qaghakvowm:
 lyehakan Polvona qaxaqvovm: Jamanyelov Paghyestin` pyen Gvovrivone irakanatsrec ir kyanqi yerazank@` werjabyes na Eryec-Israjelovm er` hreakan
 Eryec-Israyyelvowm er` hryeakan hvoghi vra. Erkrvord aliaji masnakitsnyeri zhamanovmic hyeto Paghyestinovm hastatwvovm en &anr pajmannyer (masnavorapes
 baymanner (masnaworapyes hiwandowtjvovnner) ayd er pattchare, vor nranc gryetye 80%-@ lqets paghestin@` 4dimanalow tsanr pajmannerin.
 cdimanalvow tsanr paymannyerin: Sakayn da pattchar chhandisatsav, vor ben Kvowrione lqi Paghestine, awelin, na darnowm e sivonistakan sarjman

 khalifajvowthjan kazmi myeg. 1516 tvakanits yew mincyew Aradjin hamasgharhayin baterazmi awarty ktnvyel e Osmanyan kaysrvowthyan kazmi
 Osmanjan kajsrovthjan kazmi medj.Pnakcowtjvovny 1 919 000 mard (2010 thvakani drovthjamp):PatmvovthjownM.t.a. XIII darowm Amman kaxaq@
 darowm Amman qaghak@ (ayn gamanak Rabpat-Ammvon) Ammonjan thagavorvovthyan majrakaghaqn er Ajd taratsqn aweli ovs grawel yen asvorinery,
 kravel yen asvorinere, hetvo` parsiknyery. YEkibtvosi hvovyn karavarich Ptxomyevos II Filadelfe ayn anvanapoxel e Filadyelfiaji Ayn
 e Filadelfiaji: Ayn darnowm e napatakan takavorovtyan mas mincyew 106 thvakane, incits heto Filadelfian haytnwvowm e hromyeakan
 haytnvvowm e hrvomeakan verahskvoghvowtjan tak ev mianvowm e Dyekabvolisin:M.th.a. 326 thvakanin kristonyevovtyvovne darnvowm e kajsrvovtyan
 darnvowm e kaysrowthjan himnakan krvone, isk Filadelfian` pjowzandakan darashrdjani qristonyeowthjan kyentrvon. Ajd zhamanakashrgani
 kentrvon: Ayd zhamanakashrjani ekexecinyerits mek@ gtnwvovm e kaxaqi amrvocvowm:Filadelfian anwanapokhvel e Ammani Hasanidnyeri zhamanakashrdjani

 yev minchev 1887 twakany mnvowm er awyeraknyeri teskvov. Kaghaqi wyerakarvovcovmy sksvets, yerp Otvomanyan sovlthan@ oroshvovm e kayatsnovm
 oroshovm e kajacnvovm Ammanvov yerkatvovxi antskacnel` miatsnyelow Damaskvos@ yev Medinan` dranov isk hyeshtacnelvov ev! amenamja hagi
 hyestatsnyelvow ev amyenamja hadji owkhtagnatsvowtjown@, yew! arevtvovre:TntyesvovthjvownQaghaq@ hamarvovm e karyevvor ardjvovnaberakan kentron: Ammanowm

Amr ipn Qvowlsvowm (526 - 584) (amboxdjakan anown arap.  عمرو بن كلثوم التغلبي‎‎, Amr ibn Kvowlsovm al-Thaghlibi),
 Kowlsowm al-THaxlibi), Naghaislamakan Arapiaji 7 haytni panastyexcnyerits:Na tsagvovmov qristvonyeadavan banvow Thaghlip tsyeghic er Ays
 Thaxlip tsyeghic er Ajs tsyeghe Arabakan tyerakghzvov amenapazmamard vov haytni tseghyeric er Panastyeghtse vovner aznvakan &agovm patmowtyvovnits
 cagvovm: Patmovthyvovnits hajtni e, or Taxlib ceghe chvors tasnamjak batyerazmel e mek ajl hajtni Pakr tsexi hyet (Basvovsi paterazm)
 (Basovsi batyerazm). Laxmineri hjovsisarapakan betowtjan midjamtovtjamb nranq hastvowm en: Mi angam Laghmi ishkhan Amr ipn Hinde,
 isghan Amr ibn Hind@, vowm nstavajre Hiran er, ir balatakannyerits harcnowm e, ardyoq ka myek@, vow 4vowzena ir mory carajel. Nran
 ir mvore carayyel. Nran batasghanvovm yen, or aydpisin miayn Amr ipn Qowlsovmn e, vowm hayry` al-Movhalhil ibn Rabian, azdecik mard
 Rapian, azdetsik mard e. Isghane Amrin ev ir mory hravirvovm e balat ev varkabekowm nrants Amr@ zayranowm e, myenamarti prnvvovm
 e, myenamarti prnwowm ishxani het ev srakhvoghkhvox anvovmMvowallakanerowm Amr ipn Kvovlsvovm@ himnakanowm oktagvor&el e hyetewyal janrern
 oktagorcel e hyetevyal zhanrern vov zyevyer@Nkaragrvovthyvown (araperyen` وصف, ovasf). Kasidan skswvovm e kinarbvowknyeri yew khndjowjkneri nkaragrvowthjamb

 xamrijath@` ginow kovk@ (araperen` خَمْرِيَّةٌ)Zvon (arapyeren مدح, madh): Amr ipn Qowlsowmi dzonn vovghxvac e sirac eakin. Sirayin
 sirats eakin: Sirayin knarerkowthjan masy hajvordvovm e owasfin. Aystyegh na batmovm e ir siryecyali hyet paganman masin, kovyerkovm
 baganman masin, govyerkvovm nra geghyeckovthjvowne. Sakayn nshanakali tegh chtalov knarakan mvovtkin, banaasteghts@ arag e antsnvovm:Parapanvowm
 ancnovm.Parapanvowm (arapyeryen فَخْرٌ , faxr) THaxlibcinyeri yew bakrineri bajqar@ nkarakrwac e gvovnyex vow maanramasn masin.
 vow maanramasn masin. Amr@ kvowyerkvowm e thaghlib cexi aravyelowtjvovnnere, ir sepakan sghrakortsvowthyvownnere: Mvovallakaji erkrord

Antara (525, Najd, Savovdjan Arabia - 615, Savowdjan Arabia) (ampoxdjakan anovn arap عنترة بن عمرو بن
 arap- عنترة بن عمرو بن شداد بن معاوية بن قراد العبسي‎‎,  'Antara ibn Amr ipn Shaddad ipn Mvowawia ipn Kirad al-'Abpasi), Naghaislamakan
 al-'Abpasi), Nakhaislamakan Arapiaji 7 haytni panastex&nyerits.Nakhaislamakan bedvin boetnyeri sharqovm heghinakavor tegh e zbaghecnvovm
 hyexinakawvor tyegh e zpaxecnvovm bvoyet-razmik Antara ipn SHaddad@: Nra kyensakrvovtyan mye& masy arasbelakan e yev bahbanvyel e awandvovtjvovnnyerowm:
 awandvowtjvovnnervovm. Antaran abs cyeghic &agvox tchanachvats razmiki vordi er. Sakayn na ceghvovm hamarwvovm er oc liirav andam, kani
 voc liirav andam, kani vor nra majry ethowpaci sewamvort strkowhi er: Sakayn paterazmi srdjanvovm na qagovthyown e drsyevorvowm yev azatwvovm`
 drsyevorowm yev azatvvowm` darnalvow liiraw andam. Na janachvec baterazmi shrjanvowm mrcaktsvovthyan shnorhiw: Nra glxawvor styex&akvor&vovthjovne`

 zinvori ara& viravoranqi. Movallakanyerovm Antaran himnakanvovm ogtakvor&yel e hetyevyal zhanrern vow zever@`Nkarakrvowthyvown (arapyeren
 dzyewyer@`Nkaragrvovthjvown (araperyen` وصف, vowasf) Myec tyegh en zbaxyetsnowm andznakan zgatsmvownqner@ yev tanganqner@ miakvoghmani siro hamar. na sirowm
 siro hamar. na sirowm er ir kroje kexyetskvovhi Aplajin, vory zzvank er zgvovm nra nkatmamp Lkva& bnakavajri nkaragrvowtjownits

Anwan ajl kirarovmneri hamar tyes` SadatMovhammad Anwar Al-Sadathe (arab.` محمد أنور السادات‎‎‎, dektembyeri
 السادات‎‎‎, dyektyempyeri 25, 1918(1918-12-25), Mit Abu al-Kum, Minovfia, Egibtakan svovlthanvowthyovn - hvoktyempyeri 6, 1981(1981-10-06),
 6, 1981(1981-10-06), Kahire, YEkibtos) ekibtaci kaxakakan, zinvorakan kvortsich e, vov 1970-1981 thvakannyerin zbaxecryel e Ekiptvosi
 zbaghetsryel e YEkiptosi naghagahi baston@: Anvar Sadathy exel e «Azat spanyer» kazmakyerpowtyan andam, vor@ 1952 twakani hvowlisin
 1952 tvakani hovlisin heghapoxvowthyown e kazmakyerbel YEgiptvosovm Na exyel e YEkibtosi nakhakah Gamal Abdel Naseri myerdawor hamaghoh@,
 Nasyeri myerdzawor hamaghoh@, vowm naghakahvovthyan tarinerin zbaxyecryel e erkri poghnaxagahi paston@. Na ir naghakahvowthjan tarinerin nerkayatsryel
 tarinerin nerkajacryel e Infitah anwanvowmvow haytni tntyesakan barepvokhowmneri cragiry, werakanknel e bazmakovsaktsakan hamakarke,
 bazmakvovsakcakan hamakargy, 1973 thwakanin masnaktsel e Israyeli dem baterazmin 1979 twakanin Qemp Dewidowm Israyeli het stvoragryel
 Israjyeli het stvoragryel e xaghaghvovtjan hamadzajnagir, in4@ lvovrg dggvohvowtjownner e arajatsryel Egiptvosovm ew arapakan askharhovmAnvar
 arapakan asgharhvovm:Anvar Sadath@ spanwyel e 1981 thwakani hvoktemperi 6-in Islamakan jihad xmbawvorman andami kvoxmits.Wagh tarinyeryAnvar
 kvoghmitsWagh tarinyer@Anwar Sadathe &nvel e 1918 tvakani dektyemberi 25-in Ekiptosi Mit Abow al-Gvowm pnakavajrvowm, aghqat @ntaniqvovm
 pnakawajrovm, aghkat yntaniqovm. Na 12 yexpayr vow qowyr vovner: Anvar Sadati hajr@ yekibtatsi er, isk majr@ Sit al-Byerain@, sovdanci er
 al-Peraine, sovdantsi er tatiki tchjovghvov:Anwar Sadati vra mye& azdecvowtyown en gvortsel nyerkajis THvowrkiayi himnadir Mvovstafa Qemal
 himnadir Mvovstafa Qyemal Atathvowrky. Sadaty nran hamakrowm er otar azdecowtjvovn@ tothapyelvow yew svocialakan baryepoghvowmnyeri hamar.
 paryepvoghovmnyeri hamar Nra kowrqerits er naev Mahathma Gandin ir oc brni bajkari masin ovsmovnkvow: Ekiptvosi` Myets Britaniaji iskhanovthyan
 Britaniayi ishghanovthjan tak ktnvyelov tarinyerin, Sadaty hamakranq er ta&vowm naew Advolf Hitleri nkatmamb, kani or vyerdjins sparnaliq
 vor werdjins sparnaliq er pritanatsineri hamar.Sadaty 1938 twakanin awartel e Gahirei THagawvorakan razmakan akademian: Na orpes
 akademian. Na orbyes lyejtenant vovgharkwyel e &arajyelvov Sovdanvowm, vortyegh el handibel e Kamal Apdel Naserin ev ajl krtser spaneri,
 ayl krtsyer sbanyeri, vorvonts hyet hetagayvovm dewaworyel e «Azat spaner» gaxtni kazmakyerbovthyvovny.YErkrord hamashxarhajin batyerazmi
 hamasgharhajin paterazmi tarinyerin britanakan isxanvowthjownnyere pantarkyel en nran Arantsqi owgerits ognvovthyovn stanalow porzi hamar.
 stanalow pordi hamar. Sadat@ masnaktsel e 1952 th. egibtakan hyeghapokhovthyane. Nran er handznararvel radioyvov jvoghowrdin hexapvoghowthjan
 gvoghowrdin hyeghapvoghowtjan masin teghyekacnelow kor&@.Nasyeri naghagahvovtjan tarinerinGamal Abdyel Naseri naghakahowthyan tarinerin
 naghakahovthyan tarinyerin Anwar Sadathy 1954 thwakanin nsanakwyel e petnaxarar. Na naev norabats Al Gomhvowria oratyerti ghmbagirn er
 oratherthi xmpakirn er: 1959 thwakanin na standznyel e Azgayin miowthyan qartowghari bashtone: 1964-1968 thvakannyerin Sadathe yexel e
 twakannerin Sadaty yexyel e YEkiptvosi Azkayin goxvowi nakhakahy, 1964-in erkri pokhnaghagahe: 1969 thvakanin na veranshanakvel e pvoghnaghagahi
 veranshanakwyel e poghnaghagahi pastvonovm.Naghagahvowtyan tarinyer@1970 thwakani hvoktyemberin Gamal Abdel Naseri mahits heto Egiptosi naxakah
 hyeto Egiptvosi naxagah dardzaw Anvar Sadath@  Nra naghagahvowtyan tarinerin arancqajin iradardovtjovnnyerits yen KhSHM het Egiptvosi
 en GHSHM het Ekiptosi erkaramja dasnaktsayin kaperi xzowmy, 1973 twakani hvoktembyeryan baterazmn Israjeli dem, Kemp Dyevidi ghaxaghvowthyan
 Kyemp Devidi xaxaxvowthyan baymanagirn Isrrajyeli hyet, tntesakan barepoghvovmnyeri kaxaqakanowtjown@, vore stacaw Infitah anwanowmy
 statsaw Infitah anvanvovme yev nra sbanowtyowny.Ir naghakahvowtyan tarinerin karavarakan, qaxaqakan ew anvtangovthjan marminnyerits hetatsryets
 marminnyeric hyetacrec moli nasyerakannerin, xraxowsets islamakan sharzhowmnyeri gor&ovnevovtjovny, or@ chnsvac er Nasyeri naxagahovthjan
 Naseri naxagahovtjan tarinerin. Sadathy hvowys vownyer msakvowthajin vov kaghaparakan inknavarvovtjan dimats islamistnyeric kaxaqakan
 islamistnyeric qaxaqakan agaktsvovthyovn stanal:Owxghi4 hexapoxvovthyvownNakhagahi bashtony stanznyelovc heto Sadate tsntsyec bazmathiv
 Sadat@ tsntsets bazmatiw ekiptatsinyeri heracnyelov ov bantarkelov varchakarki amyenaazdecik kvorcichnyerits erkovsin poxnaxakah Ali
 erkovsin pvoghnakhakah Ali Sabriin, vow sert kaper vovner xvorhrdayin pashtonyaneri het ev Saravi Komaajin` nyerkin gortseri naxararin,
 nyerqin kvorceri nakhararin, vov werahskovm er kaghtni ostikanvovtjan@Sadathi hexinakowtyvovne parzratsav, yerb atyeli darza& gaghtni ostikanowthyownic
 kaghtni vostikanvovtyownic vyercryets liazorvovthjvownnery ev artaqsec xorhrdayin razmakan ghvorhrdatvovnyerin.Jom Kipowri paterazm1973
 Gibvovri paterazm1973 twakani hoktempyeri 6-in Siriaji naghagah Hafez al-Asadi hyet bajmanaworva&vovthjap Egiptose sksyets okvostosyan
 Egibtos@ sksyec ogvostvosjan patyerazme, or@ haytni e naew Yvom Kibowri patyerazm anvovnow Ekiptakan vov siriakan vowzhyern anaknkal hardzakowm
 ovzhern anaknkal harzakvovm sksecin Sinaji therakxzovm ew Golani pardovnqnyervowm, voronk Israjel@ YEkibtvosits ov Siriayits gravyel er 1967
 Siriayic kravyel er 1967 twakani Vyecorya batyerazmi gamanak1973 t. hvoktyemberi 22-in MAK Anvtankvovthjan ghorhrdovm endownvyec tiw
 xvorhrdowm endownvyec tiw 338 banadzyevy, vory hradadari ko4 er anovm : Hvoktyemberi 24-in israyelakan owjyer@ Sinajowm shrgabatyetsin yekibtakan
 shrjapatyetsin yekiptakan zvorqerin. Hvoktempyeri 25-in storagrvyets nor hradadar, orow verg trwyec batyerazmin. Hradadari pahin israyyelakan
 Hradadari pahin israyyelakan ovgyer@ Damaskosic 40 ev Kahireits 100 km heravorowthyan wra ein:CanvothakrowthjownnyerGrakanowtyown Sadathi

Arad (yebr. ערד‎, arab-` عِرَادَ‎‎), qaghak Israjelvovm, Hovdajakan anapati lernancqowm Qaxak@ ktnvovm
 lyernanckowm: Kaghake ktnvovm e aveli kan 2700 tari araj qandats yev Astwacasn4vowm hisatakva& hin Aradi awyerakneri mot. Arady ktnwvowm
 awyerakneri mvot Arade gtnwowm 25 km dyepi aryevmvovtk Merjal covic ev 45 km debi arewelq Byeer Shewayits: Qaxaqovm pnakwovm e 23,5 hazar mard
 pnakvovm e 23,5 hazar mard (2010), vorvonts himnakan masn yen kazmvovm sefardnere, ashkyenacnyery, syev hreanery yev bedowinnyer@ JVowNYESGO-n
 bedvovinnery: YVovNYESGO-n Arad qaxaqe tchanacel vorpes «asgharhi ekvolvokiapes amenamakovr qaghaqe»:Artakin hghvovmnerPastvonakan kajq
 hxovmnyerpashtvonakan kajq (Ebrayyeren)Aradnik, the internet version of Arad's local HaTzvi weekly (YEbrayyeryen)Arad by Google MapsArad
 by Google MapsArad GIS system (Eprayyeren)== TSanotakrovtjvownner 
Henri Gyeyms «Harri» Ryednap (ankl. Henry James "Harry" Redknapp, marti 2, 1947(1947-03-02), Lvondon, Miatsjal
 1947(1947-03-02), London, Miacyal THagaworvowthyvovn), ankliatsi fvovtbvolist yew fvovtpolayin marzi4. Tghan yerkar gamanak khaghacel e «Livyerbowl»-owm,
 xaxacyel e «Liverpvovl»-owm, yexyel e timi avake Harri Ryednab@ «4elsi»-i naghkin kisapastban Frenk Lempardi qyerin e: Fovtbolisti kariyeraji
 Fvovtpolisti karierayi skizb@ hamarwovm e «West Hyem Yovnajthyed»-vovm yev «Pvornmvowt»-vovm handes galy, isk karierayi wergvowm handyes
 karieraji werjovm handes e ekel angliakan yev amerikakan akowmbnyervovm: Fvowtbvolisti karieran sksel e glkhavvorelov «Bornmovth»-e ev
 klkhawvoryelow «Bornmovt»-y yev awartvyel e 1982 thwakanin: Rednapn ir karieraji lawagvowyn tarinyere antskatsryel e «Vest Hyem Jvovnajthed»-vovm
 «Vyest Hyem Yownajthyed»-ovm ew cvowjts twel amenalaw ardjvovnknyer@:Glghavvorelvow «Vest Hyem»-e 1999 thwakanin haxthyel e Intertotoyi kawathe,
 Intertvotvoyi kawathy, isk 2008 thwakanin klxawvorelow portsmowt thimy` haxtyel e Ankliaji gavathi ghaxarkowtjvovnovm: 2008 thvakanin
 ghaxarkvovthjovnovm 2008 twakanin nshanakvyec Totenhyemi marzic. 2009-2010 mrtsasrdjanin Totenhemy CHyempivonneri ligajvowm dovrs ekaw 1/4 yezrapakic.
 yekaw 1/4 yezrapakich Tarva verjovm arjanatsav premiyer Likayi lavagovjn marzici titxosin 2012 thvakani noyyemperi 24-in Rednapy
 nvoyyemperi 24-in Ryednap@ klkhavoryets ir wyergin akowmpe` «Qvowins park Reyngyers»-@, na akvovmbowm mnats 3 tari2007 twakani nojyemberi
 tari.2007 tvakani nvojyempyeri 28-in kasharakyerovtyan hamar Rednapy zyerpakalwec.Wagh tarinerRednape cnwel e Londvonvovm, na Hyenri Jvozyef
 Londonowm, na Henri Jozef Voviljam Ryednapi (1922-1996) yev Wajvolyet Mej Praovni (1924-2001) miak zawakn e: Gvozyef Rednapi klghawor nbatakn
 Rednapi klxawvor npatakn er Harri fovtpolist darnale Pvoqrik Rednapi sira& akvowmbn er «Arsyenal»-@, shat er gnvovm timi xaghyerin
 knvovm thimi ghaxyerin: Nran hatkapes dvovr er galis Jimi Blvovmfildi khax@Fvovtbvolisti karieraEritasardakan kariyeraHarrin
 kariyeraYEritasardakan kariyeraHarrin 11 tarekan er, erp yndownwyets Arsenali fvovtpolajin akademia, nran nkatyec «Tvotyenhyem»-i kvor&akal Diki Vowoker@
 kor&akal Diki Ovokere. Akvowmpvowm nra ghax@nkyernern ein Bill Nikolson@, Makaj Dejvy, Dyenni Blancflaowere YErb lratsav Harrii
 Blancflavovyere. Erp lratsaw Harrii 15 amyake, nranov sksecin hyetakrkrwyel «Arsenal@» ew «Cyelsin», masnawvorabyes Cyelsii marzi4 Tvommi Dokhertin
 marzich Tvommi Dvokhertin anzamp ekav Ryednabi town. Rednab@ texapvoxvyets «Vest Hemi» akadyemia, ore glkhaworvowm er Mvovr Bvobpin: 1963
 er Mowr Bopbin: 1963 thvakanin Harrin thimi hyet miasin dovrs ekav Angliaji yeritasardakan gawati ezrapakic: Aragin handipna
 ezrapakic Arajin handipna zhamanak «Vest Hem@» partvyec «Livyerbvowlin» 3:1 hashvvow, isk hajvord handipman aradjin khaghakyesvowm partwowm
 khaghakesvowm bartwvowm er 2.1 hasvow, sakajn Vest Hemi fvovtpvolistnerin hadjvoxwyec pvoxel xaghi @ntacqy yew khpel 4 gvol Da Rednapi
 khpel 4 kol: Da Ryednabi arajin pashtonakan aragnovtyovnn er, orvovm haghthec nra time. 2 or hyeto Ryednaby tyeghapoxwyets londvonyan «Chyelsii»
 teghapoxwec lvondvonjan «Chelsii» eritasardakan akovmpy1964 twakanin Rednapy Angliaji hawaqakani kazmovm ghaxvovm er Ewrobayi arajnvovtyan
 Ewrvobaji arajnvowtjan yezrapakcvovm, @nddyem Isbaniaji azgajin havaqakani: Isbaniaji hawakakan@ 4:0 haswov haghthanak taraw:Wyest
 haghtanak taraw.Vest HemRednaby 18 tarekan hasakvowm mianovm e «West Hemi» arajin kazmin, vorn ayd jamanak glxawvorvovm er Rvon
 gamanak klkhaworvowm er Ron Kriwvovnde: Ryednaby thimvowm ir aradjnakhagh@ antskatsryel e 1965-1966 thvakanneri mrcashrganowm.Himnakan kazmi
 mrcashrganvovm:Himnakan kazmi xaxacvoxneri vnasvatsqneri batcharvow marzi4e Rednabin shat khaghazhamanak e tramadrvovm: 1965 thwakani okvostvosi
 1965 tvakani ogostvosi 23-in na ghaxadast dvovrs ekaw Vest Hyemi ew Sanderlendi handibman aragin robenyerits, orowm Vyest Hem tan
 rvopenerits, vorowm Vest Hyem tan tiroj kargawitchakvowm er Ryednapy thimin ognyec havasaretsnyel hasivy, katarelov gvolayin pvoxancvowm: khaghn awartwyets
 pvokhantsvowm ghaxn awartwec 1:1 hasvow. 1966 twakani abrili 8-in na ghpets ir aragin koly Tvotyenhyemi darpas@, Vest Hem@ haghthyec 41
 Vyest Hyem@ haghthets 4.1 hasvvow. Ayd mrtsasrdjanovm West Hyeme hasaw midjev YEwrapayi kawati khagharkowtyan kisaezrapaki4 pvowl, vortyex
 kisaezrapaki4 pvovl, vortyex 5:2 hashvow bartwets Dvortmovndi «Bvorvowsiajin» YEritasard Rednaby chmasnaktsec Ewrobaji kavati aragnovtyan@
 kawathi aradjnvovtyan@. Kani or mijew 1975 twakany akovmpe cpardzratsaw 8-rd hvorizonakanic vyeryew, Ryednabn ajdpes el cmasnakcyec YEwrvokavati
 cmasnakcets Evrokawati arajnvovthyane: 1966 twakani askharhi aradjnvovthjovnits heto Ryednabi yereq akvowmpakicner tim vyeradardan voske
 tim weradardzan oskye myedalnerov- nrank ein Pvobbi Movre, Martin pityers@ ew Gyeffri Herste:1966-1967 thvakannyeri mrcasrdjanvowm,
 twakannyeri mrtsashrjanowm, nra aragnakhaxe yeghaw orbyes bahestajin fowtbvolist. 1966 tvakani dyektembyeri 3-in, yerb Vyest Hyemy xaghowm
 erp Vyest Hyeme xaxowm er enddyem «Vest Prvomwic Alpivoni», Ryednap@ bacyec hashiwy yev akovmbin ognyets haxthel 3:0 hashvvov: Ryednabe 2-rd
 hasvov Ryednaby 2-rd mrtsashrganin antskacryets 12 handipvovm yev xpets 1 kol 1967-1968 thvakanneri mrcashrdjanvowm na sksec ghaghadasht
 mrcasrdjanvovm na sksyets ghaxadasht dowrs gal avyeli hajagh. na anckacryets 28 handipvowm yev xpyec 2 kol, «Byernlii» ew «Sandyerlyendi» darpase. Qani
 «Sandyerlyendi» darpasy: Kani vor Rednape &nowndov aryewmtjan Londonits e yew yeghel e West Hyemi san, yerkrpagownyere nran shat ein sirvovm. 1968-1969
 ein sirvowm. 1968-1969 twakanneri mrcashrganin Rednap@ ghaxac 42 khagh ev khpec 3 kvol: 36 ghax ghaghats Angliaji aradjnowthyanvovm yev yeryeqakan
 aradjnvowtjanovm yew erekakan xagh Angliaji kawati, Ligayi gawati xaxarkvowtyvownnervowm 1968 twakani okostosi 31-in «Vyest Promwi4»-in
 31-in «Vest Promwich»-in «Vest Hyemy» haghtyec 4:0 hasvow, isk hagord ghaxovm vor@ kayanovm er Angliayi kawathi ghaxarkvovthjvovnvowm 4:0
 ghaxarkvovtyvovnvowm 40 hashvvow «Vest Hemy» haghtanak tarav:Pornmvowt1972 thvakanin Ryednabe tyexapoghvec 3-rd yentaxmbi «Pvornmowt»
 yentaghmbi «Bornmowt» akowmp, vori marzicn er West Hemi naghkin fvovtpvolist` DJon Pvond@: Paymanagri arjyeqe kazmyets £ 31000. Bondin
 kazmyec £ 31000: Bondin betk er fovtpolist, vor@ kkaroxanar iracnyel lav ankyvownainner yev karoghanar ognyel Tyed Makdagallain. Sakajn
 Makdakallain Sakayn 2 amis 4antsa& Makdagall@ teghapvokhwec «Mancyesther Yovnajthed». Rednabn akvowmpi kazmvovm ankacrec 4 mrtsashrdjan`
 ankacrets 4 mrcashrjan nra kazmowm ghaxalow 1972-1976 thvakannerin: 1972-73 thwakanneri mrtsasrganovm khaghacyel e 37 khagh (34-e aradjnvovtyownvowm)
 (34-y arajnovtyvownovm) ew khpel e myek gndak. «Pvornmvovt»-y mrtsasrdjanvovm krawets 7-rd teghy. Hadjord mrtsasrjanvovm na anckatsryets 46
 mrcashrdjanvowm na antskatsryec 46 handipovm ew ghpyec 5 gvolWitchakagrowthjowny== TSanvotagrowtjvovnner
